Summary: I arrived at 4am after driving for 18 hours. I was tired and hungry. Robert from Front Desk helped me with my luggage. When he found out I had not eaten, he opened the store so that I could grab a sandwich and drink - so that I don't have to go out and search for food at an unearthly hour. What a thoughtful person. I have been staying in the hotel since it opened 6 years ago and the service keeps getting better. Other folks that deserved special mention for making my stay wonderful is Peter (Bellman), Rosie (Reservations), Eddie (Front Office Manager) Eddie (valet). They are what makes Pasea the best place to stay in Huntington Beach
Manager Response: none

Summary: We traveled to Orange County to spend time with friends and Pasea Hotel couldn’t have been a better place to stay.  Convenient location on PCH, close to shopping and right across the beach.  Our room had a fantastic view of the ocean, beautiful to enjoy sunset with a glass of wine or morning coffee on the balcony.  Hotel has restaurant on site and also located steps away from the Pacific City shopping and dining center with so many options for a fun night out.  Staff members at the Front desk offered great recommendations and were knowledgeable about the area and Valet team were gracious and accommodating.  Thank you for making our stay comfortable and enjoyable.  We will definitely be back to explore the area soon! Would definitely recommend and stay there again!
Manager Response: Thank you Julija C for the 5 star review about your recent stay with us at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are excited to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and that our team members exceeded expectations. We can agree that our property is all about the location and convenience to shops and restaurants in Pacific City. We cannot wait to welcome you back in the near future!

Summary: Excellent location and perfectly appointed rooms with ocean view. Beds and pillows were dreamy, food was all delicious. Will definitely go back, although the pool lady could’ve been friendly. Perfect stay otherwise!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I dropped just about everything that was set in front of me and Katy was quick to come to my rescue every time. Drink and food were amazing and all requests were accommodated. She even played into our humor which most servers would probably be annoyed with because if you have worked in the biz, you know when 8 ladies walk into the restaurant, it’s gonna be a treat. Katy for president!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was a 1 night stay to meet up with family before a cruise.   From the minute we arrived the staff was friendly, helpful and welcoming.   The bellhop, Peter, was extremely helpful and informative about the hotel and room amenities.  The front desk staff was awesome too.  The room was clean and comfortable and had nice decor.    We were happy to see they offered coffee and water in the room.   We enjoyed breakfast and dinner in the hotel restaurant, tanners,  their waitstaff, Ana and Sam were friendly and welcoming too.  The food and the hotel weren’t cheap but the great service made it worth every penny!  Would recommend!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Pasea is hands down one of my favorite hotels. The service is always top notch, the views are spectacular, and the food is fantastic. Tanners has such an interesting menu. Great drinks as well. The service at pasea is always great with a fantastic valet team. Kyle was very helpful with getting us our car in a timely manner. Thanks Kyle & thanks Pasea
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Awesome service, great staff, fun area
Summary: I had a great stay at the Pasea with my family this last weekend. The service was great and the views were spectacular. The valet we had, Kyle was very friendly and gave us plenty of recommendations for fun activities around the area and was also very speedy on getting us in and out of the hotel even with the rush that was going on. Thanks Kyle !
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Friendly staff and a great atmosphere
Summary: I met a friend at Tanners for lunch. I was promptly greeted by a valet named Paul who explained how parking worked and directed me to the restaurant. We had a very friendly server and got to sit in a nice corner booth. The restaurant staff was on top of things and provided everything we needed with a smile. The valet staff was just friendly when we left as when we arrived. Great experience from start to finish!
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are so happy to hear that you were warmly greeted by Paul on our valet team. In addition, it is nice to know that you enjoyed your overall experience at Tanners. We definitely strive to provide a positive experience from start to finish. We hope to welcome you back again in the near future!

Summary: Came here for Tanners and had such an amazing experience! I was greeted by Paul and Gerardo at the valet and both of them were so kind and helpful. They really went the extra mile for me.   The food at Tanners was great, I highly recommend the crab BLT. Ana P. was such a great server and really made sure we were taken care of. Definitely coming back again!
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are excited to hear that you enjoyed your time with us at Tanners and that service exceeded expectations. We will definitely be celebrating this review with Paul, Gerardo and Ana P. We hope to see you again soon to enjoy another round of our crab BLT!

Summary: The hotel strikes a balance between the comforts of home and being wholly catered to.  The is nothing presumptuous about the hotel, but at the same time there is nothing overlooked.  The rooms are very quiet,  with solid doors and quiet floors. and hallways.  The elevators were quiet.   Room service and valets were fast and the coffee shop took care of between meal needs.  I am celiac and was able to eat at Tanner’s without consequences.   They actually directed me away from potential cross-contamination.  😊 For me this was the perfect vacation.  I’ve waited 59 years for this and I’d go back in a heartbeat.
Room tip: Don’t overpack.  The nicest spa robes are provided as well as flip flops, beach towels, chairs,...
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive feedback about your experience with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are so grateful to hear that you had a peaceful visit and that service levels exceeded expectations. We hope that we are able to serve you again in the near future.

Summary: Wedding was a dream, food was excellent, staff was great, but communication was not so great. There was confusion regarding the welcome party and the brunch after the wedding. (What and where)  We waited an hour to be seated for brunch (there were 20 people). There was also some confusion as to billing, like what the couple had already negotiated for parking and rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are very happy to hear that the wedding went smoothly and that you enjoyed our food options. We will definitely be following up with the events team to see where the confusion was with the brunch service. We definitely strive to ensure that all team members have the information they need to ensure that our guests are pointed in the right direction. We thank you for your feedback and will use this as a way to better coach our team going forward.

Summary: Great place one of the best hotels i have stayed in and will be back. The rooms are great with a big balcony. Complementary bottle of vine. Valet parking you can pic up your car any time with out ekstra cost.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your beautiful balcony and complimentary bottle of wine. We definitely offer in and out privileges to all customers on property and hope that our service levels exceeded expectation. We hope to see you again very soon!

Summary: Katy was so sweet!!! So knowledgeable about the menu and had great recommendations. Will come back for sure. I love this place. The heaters were warm and the views were amazing. The French friends are to die for we ordered them twice.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting us at Tanner's! We are happy to hear that Katy was able to provide exceptional service during your experience. Another round of fries is ALWAYS the way to go! We hope to welcome you back in the near future.

Summary: Every element of this resort is beautiful. The rooms are clean and comfortable. The amenities are first class and the staff is friendly and very helpful. Can’t wait to go back and experience this awesome place again!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive feedback about your stay at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are excited to hear that you enjoyed our clean and comfortable rooms. We do our best to provide first class amenities and service all around. We will definitely celebrate your review with the rest of our team and are excited to welcome you back in the near future.

Summary: Katy was my server last night and her service was amazing! She was so friendly and was fast to help when needed. The food was delicious. Katy recommended the herb crusted river salmon and it was delicious. I will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting us at Tanner's! We are happy to hear that Katy was able to provide exceptional service during your experience. The herb crusted salmon is an absolute dream! We hope to welcome you back in the near future.

Summary: One of the best hotel stays in a long time.  I am a seasoned business traveller so hard to impress.  This hotel impressed me on so many levels.  From the amazing view and location to all the small details in the hotel room.  I loved the complimentary bottle of wine, water, flip flops but most of all the noise cancelling system that made sleep amazing.  Stay here..you will love it.
Manager Response: Of course you can come back! We are so excited to hear that you enjoyed your time with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. We truly appreciate your positive feedback about our amenities, location and service levels. We will be sure to celebrate this review with the rest of the team and hope to see you again very soon!

Summary Heading: Gorgeous Hotel right on Huntington Beach
Summary: If you are looking for a beautiful Hotel across from one of the most iconic beaches in California, Pasea is the one.  Luxurious in its furnishings, and the service is fantastic.  Be sure to stop by the 'rooftop' bar for a drink.  The pool is serene, and offers wide views of the ocean.  We got a nice upgrade and had the most beautiful view of the Pacific and of Catalina Island that I have ever seen.  Service was excellent.  I highly recommend Pasea for its spa, location and service.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed some of our facilities such as Tanner's Treehouse and our pool facing the beautiful HB ocean. We can agree that the views from our hotel are absolutely life changing! Taking in the sun and the views are two of our top priorities. We hope to see you again very soon!

Summary: The meal was great and Katy provided great dining experience !!  We will definitely be back!!! The salmon was great and really like the cauliflower appetizer and the chocolate peanut banana dessert!!
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting us at Tanner's! We are happy to hear that Katy was able to provide exceptional service during your experience. Thank you for sharing some of your favorites on the menu so that our potential guests can try out some of the best items! We hope to welcome you back in the near future.

Summary: Bartenders are fantastic………..but I must say, Ellan made the best espresso martini shots! It’s a must when visiting! Thank you so much Ellan for making our trip so much better definitely coming back because of you !
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa! We are so happy to hear that your enjoyed some of the best espresso martini shots in HB! We will definitely celebrate your positive feedback with the rest of the team and cheers to Ellan and our bartenders for exceeding service expectations. We are excited to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: We enjoyed the spa! Hailey was Amazing and we had the most delicious lunch delivered by a ray of sunshine, Barbara Moses made our day extra special, she made us feel like queens! Barbara is so sweet. Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback about the experience you had at Aarna spa! We definitely will share your review with the rest of the team and thank Hailey and Barbara for the service they provided. We hope to see you again soon at the Pasea Hotel & Spa!

Summary: Barbara Moses was so Amazing. She brought us the food already split into two, drinks and what a great, fantastic service. Love her.  Sarah my Massager  was so Amazing. She gave me a wonderful massage and she's super delightful to talk to and great customer service
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are happy to hear that your enjoyed your visit and appreciate that you recognized some of the team members we are grateful to have on this team. We will definitely be celebrating this review with Barbara and Sarah! We hope to see you again very soon!

Summary: My car had a major flat tire (down to the rim). Paul P from Valet noticed it and without hesitation, offered to patch the flat right away. He also kept my car parked in line of sight to see if the patch would hold up before my actual departure date. He had the most positive, reassuring and compassionate approach to the situation which allowed me to continue working throughout the program without any worries. I’ve worked corporate events for many years and have never seen anything like this done on-property right in front of the hotel before. Very kind service!!!  Thanks Paul. I’ll never forget it. I hope you get a commendation for this is because you sure do deserve it.   Overall a great place, excellent service by all, delicious food and dog friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. We appreciate you writing a review about the service that Paul provided in the valet department. We will absolutely celebrate him in his success in providing above and beyond customer service. Paul is definitely a fantastic asset to our leadership team. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: What a great lunch we had today!  We are local to the Huntington Beach area and finally made our way to the Pasea to soak up the beautiful view and enjoy some food.  The food was delicious - calamari, avocado toast, caesar salad and crab BLT... but I'm here to acknowledge the outstanding service.  Ana has all the right skills - friendly and attentive, without being intrusive.  Our meal was perfectly orchestrated:  water, drinks, appetizers, lunch and the bill - everything at the right time and at the right temperature.  A perfect venue for business or pleasure.  We'll be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive feedback in regard to your experience at Tanner's. We will definitely celebrate your experience with the culinary team and recognize Ana for her service. We hope that you visit us again soon for more fun in the sun and another round of food and drinks!

Summary: I enjoyed a delicious Mexican lollipop and my girlfriend had a cucumber delight and it was delightful!! Ellan was our bartender at the treehouse and was a superb bartender. The sunset and the views were a dream. Definitely coming back & we hope we get served by Ellan again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience at Tanner's! We are very excited to hear that you enjoyed your drinks and overall service. We will definitely celebrate this review with Ellan and appreciate your positive feedback. We hope to welcome you back in the near future!

Summary: This place is perfect for parties or just going out with a friend. I have had work parties, birthdays and casual get together at Tanners and the service is amazing. Ellan Guajardo gives amazing service. His drinks are unmatched with amazing taste and unique style!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience at Tanner's! We are very excited to hear that you have enjoyed our location for multiple events and parties. We will definitely celebrate this review with Ellan and appreciate your positive feedback. We hope to welcome you back in the near future!

Summary Heading: Enjoyed Their Waves of Wellness Day
Summary: I think it is great to start off the New Year with a hotel and community event like this.  They had vendors and coaches on hand for all different kinds of people and exercise levels. It was a beautiful day to exercise and look at the ocean.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting us for our Waves of Wellness event! We are so excited that you could kick off the new year with us. What could be better than a double work out with a view? We hope to see again on the property in the near future!

Summary: A group of us went to Waves of Wellness and it was fantastic! Very organized, the workout was great and the view could not be beat!  First time to the hotel and I will definitely go back for stay! Thanks for a great morning!
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting us for our Waves of Wellness event! We are so excited that you could kick off the new year with us. What could be better than a double work out with a view? We hope to see again on the property in the near future!

Summary: Enjoyed a morning with friends, overlooking the Pacific, for a fun, tough Waves of Wellness event on Sat. The staff was very friendly & helpful. Everything was very professionally done. Timothy and those from Motion were exceptionally professional & positive. Great vibes all around!
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting us for our Waves of Wellness event! We are so excited that you could kick off the new year with us. What could be better than a double work out with a view? We hope to see again on the property in the near future!

Summary: We came to tanners for an engagement dinner and Brie was an amazing server.  She made us feel welcome and kept the drinks flowing. She really made our dining experience fabulous! So grateful that Brie was our server !
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting us at Tanner's at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We will ensure to celebrate this review with Brie and appreciate your kind words. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Brie was such a lovely server! The food was 11/10 and they were so friendly! The chef Jonathon came out and had a conversation with us about the food. We will definitely return with family, thank you so much for having us.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us at Tanner's! We are very excited to hear that Brie and Jonathan were able to provide a unique and genuine service experience. We cannot wait for you to come back in the near future!

Summary Heading: Great hotel - watch out for many hidden charges
Summary: Beautiful hotel. Beautiful spot. However - both my colleague and I received many additional charges (fees, additional overnight parking). Because both her I and had the same mistakes, it feels like common practice of the hotel. Double check you invoices!
Manager Response: Thank you Meredeth for staying with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are very sorry to hear that there was an additional valet charge on your bill. It appears that on your friend's bill, there were a few vehicles that had stopped by the hotel so the additional charges should have been added to her room. We did send you an updated receipt with the one $48 charge refunded to your credit card on file. We hope that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to welcome you back in the near future.

Summary: Absolutely great hotel. Great amenities great stuff. Great food. Honestly 10 out of 10. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone. Breakfast was absolutely delicious. I had the steak and eggs it’s was perfect.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your 10/10 experience with us at the Pasea Hotel and Spa. We are very excited to hear that you would recommend our spot and enjoyed your breakfast at Tanner's restaurant. It is our hope that we can welcome you back in the near future to enjoy another round of steak and eggs!

Summary: Very friendly staff, great food at Tanners! The Treehouse lounge was awesome.  Enjoyed the heated pool and jacuzzi.  I would highly recommend this Hotel.  We went for an overnight stay, 3 miles just to get away from the kids for an evening.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. We thank you for sharing your experience at our property. We are very excited to hear that our team exceeded expectations and that you enjoyed the pool facility and Tanner's restaurant. We hope to welcome you back again in the near future for another date night away from the kids. Otherwise, we hope to see your whole family back for some summer fun!

Summary: My first time staying here during this time of the year. Let’s start by saying the customer service and hospitality is second to none. Every single employee made us feel very welcomed. We have always looked at this hotel as our home away from home. Food is also phenomenal! Huge thanks to entire staff for making my birthday extra special
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your positive experience at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are very happy to hear that our team members exceeded expectations for your Birthday celebration. We definitely strive to make our property feel like a home away from home. We are excited to welcome you back soon!

Summary: I ate at Tanner’s for a birthday party. Our server, Brie, was great! Brie was attentive and very friendly. The food had some hits and misses…the gnocchi was delicious, but the hanger steak was only ok.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. We will definitely be sharing your positive review with the Tanner's team. We are so happy to hear that Brie was able to exceed expectations. Please let us know when you will be returning so we can ensure to make up for the misses you experienced with your hanger steak. We would like to make this up to you soon!

Summary: We stayed at the Pasea to celebrate my husband’s birthday. It was a very lovely stay starting from when we checked in. The staff was professional, friendly and welcoming. The valet staff ensured we got our car quickly when requested.   We had an oceanfront room which was beautiful. We took long walks on the beach, watched the surfers and incredible sunsets. The boardwalk was very nice. There are many good restaurants that are within walking distance.   The amenities that the hotel provides is a wonderful touch. There are hand sanitizer dispensers throughout the hotel. The room had complimentary flip flops to take home and soft comfy robes with a hood to enjoy during our stay. A bottle of complimentary white wine in the refrigerator was quite good. The shower has a window that
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive feedback with us about your stay at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are very excited to hear that the team members and property exceeded expectations. We agree that our location cannot be beat! It is so nice to hear that you were able to enjoy the sunset and other shops/dining options in Pacific City. We hope to welcome you back in the near future to enjoy another complimentary bottle of wine and Pasea flip flops! Cheers!

Summary: We celebrated a birthday dinner at Tanners and the food and service were both excellent. Our server Brie was attentive, pleasant, knowledgeable and well versed on the menu, bar offerings and had an excellent knowledge of the wine list. Food was outstanding. Chef is amazing. We had scallop crudo, buttermilk fried cauliflower, octopus, arugula salad with persimmons and barrata, and lamb lollipops as appetizers. For dinner we had a filet, the gnocchi, and the salmon. All were excellent. Save room for dessert because they were amazing as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are so excited to hear that Brie was able to exceed expectations during your dining experience at Tanner's. We strive to ensure that we are delivering the best quality while cohesively providing excellent customer service. We hope to welcome you back in the near future to enjoy these coastal menu items again! We thank you for your loyalty.

Summary: Tannaz at the counter literally turned an ordinary weekend trip into the most fabulous experience one could encounter at a hotel! With the help of Karina I will make this hotel a regular after this experience! Thank you so much!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing review about your experience at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are so happy to hear that Tannaz was able to exceed expectations during your stay. We are excited to welcome you back in the near future!

Summary Heading: Turning a boring rainy night into the best New Years Eve Ever!
Summary: Could be a ho hum New Years?..rainy, no plans, too busy at work.  On a whim I contacted Pasea their super team got me an amazing room, w/spec Ocean views, awesome dinner at Tanner's- great start 2023!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive experience at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are very grateful to hear that you decided to spend your NYE Holiday at our property. We are excited that you were able to try out Tanner's and that it exceeded expectations. We hope to welcome you back in the near future!

Summary Heading: The Spa is beyond incredible and hotel is absolutely beautiful
Summary: Beautiful hotel, with lovely staff! My sister couldn't have picked a better venue for her wedding, the property is absolutely stunning. Malls and restaurants literally next door. Got the best facial of my life at the Spa from Masayo. Will certainly be back!!
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are so happy to hear that your sister chose our location to host her wedding festivities. We appreciate your positive feedback and are excited that our spa services exceeded expectations. Please come back to see us soon!

Summary: If you are coming to Cali or want a beach staycation, this property is right across from HB Beach and connected to Pacific City. This hotel has an incredible pool, spa overlooking the beach, clean, comfy trendy rooms with all the necessities. We had two rooms for our family and we were able to also enjoy a date night out at the treehouse bar.. awesome cocktails and fun vibe. The staff is so friendly and there for anything you need during your visit. They also have a fun bar/restaurant next to the pool. We will definitely be coming back. Thank you to the super friendly manager, Mr. Finley.
Manager Response: Thank you Nicole for staying with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed the property and facilities we have to offer. We appreciate your kind mention about the team and our Director of Rooms, Timothy. We hope to invite you back soon to have more fun in the sun. Cheers to a few more cocktails at the pool!

Summary: Brie was a great server! I came here with friends to celebrate a birthday, and they were so nice and accommodating. The Brussels sprouts were so good, and the restaurant overall is just so cute. We’ll definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to celebrate your Birthday with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are so happy to hear that Brie was able to exceed expectations and take care of you and your party. We hope to welcome you back for another round of brussels sprouts soon. Cheers!

Summary: We dined at Tanners at the Pasea hotel. The food was incredible and the service was even better! Our server, Brie, was really kind, gave great menu recommendations, and provided incredible customer service. We will definitely come back!
Manager Response: Thank you for dining with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are very excited to hear that you enjoyed your meal and our team's service. We will definitely be celebrating this review with Brie and the rest of the Tanner's team. We look forward to seeing you again very soon!

Summary: The property is beautiful but BEWARE ice skating is only 1 hour not 90 minutes as their website advertises!!!  Drinks are costly, bar staff overwhelmed at times, but its decorated nicely and a beautiful venue.  However, the website definitely needs to be fixed.
Manager Response: Thank you Katrina for visiting us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are sorry to hear that you did not get to enjoy you full skate time. We definitely take your feedback seriously and would like to make this up to you next year. Please reach out to us when you plan on coming back to the property so that we can ensure to make this up to you. We definitely want to turn this around!

Summary Heading: Best location for any kind of getaway
Summary: Great location! Offers a beach themed relaxing getaway but also offers other types. Has nice restaurants and shopping mall right next to the hotel. They had an excellent ice skating rink for the holidays. Very kind and knowledgeable staff that helped us experience all they had to offer!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your little getaway. In addition, we are excited to hear that you enjoyed the ice rink. Our team strives to provide the best experience for all of our guests and thank you for the shout out. We hope to welcome you back in the near future!

Summary: My family and I had a wonderful time at Pasea. The end of December was the perfect time because there wasn’t  the usual Huntington Beach crowd. The hotel’s pool overlooks the beach. The bar and food service at the pool were perfect. While it was too cold for me to hop in the pool, the jacuzzi was wonderfully relaxing while watching the sunset over the ocean. Our room was nice and had a great view of the shoreline. The ice skating rink was an added bonus. We had so much fun ice skating at night. There are restaurants and a fun tree bar attached to the hotel. I live locally and absolutely love this hotel. I look forward to my next “staycation”.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review about your stay with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are so happy to hear that you and your family had a wonderful time. We will definitely celebrate your review with our entire team. We hope to invite you back soon to soak in some sun, enjoy the view and consume a few more drinks. We look forward to spoiling you on your next staycation!

Summary Heading: Eddie P. - Above and Beyond Service
Summary: Eddie P. went above and beyond. Our car battery died and he jump started it for us without any hesitation. He retrieved his own personal car quickly & easily. Very professional and kind. Thank you Eddie P.!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback about your recent stay with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are very excited to hear that Eddie P. was able to exceed expectations and truly go above and beyond for you. We know what a hassle it can be when car batteries die. We thank you for your time and hope that you come visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: Wonderful Hotel with a Compassionate Staff
Summary: It was our first time staying at Pasea Hotel and Spa and the hotel exceeded our expectations. The hotel is extremely dog friendly and features a dog relief area that is gated, safe, and conveniently located. The hotel has amazing views and we had delicious meals every time we ate on site and through room service. The complimentary bottle of wine and flip flops were a nice touch, as well.   As amazing as this hotel is, what really made a lasting impression was the staff. My husband had a medical issue right before our arrival and was struggling to walk. Staff members kindly got a wheelchair for him. The bellman Peter went above and beyond to help my husband, show us around the resort, and lift our spirits. He even checked in with us the next day. Peter's compassion,
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are excited to hear that your stay exceeded expectations. We absolutely love to welcome our furry friends of all shapes and sizes! how could a vacation get any better with your pup by your side throughout? We have shared your review with our team and celebrated Peter for the service that he provided during your stay. We will be happy to welcome you back in the near future!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at Pasea. The service was good, great location and proximity to beach walks, shopping and dining. keep in mind the Bungalow is next door and they have a very loud DJ on weekends so if you are not planning to be up until 2am, I would not recommend a weekend stay. The front desk will call to ensure the music does not exceed the agreed upon decibel level but even at that level and with the white noise machine on, it's extremely loud if you stay on the side of the hotel that overlooks the ocean/pool. Very dog friendly! We brought 2 dogs and all staff treats dogs well and are very accommodating. fitness center is nice. Tanners rooftop is great particularly during the week when it is a little less crowded.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are excited to hear that you enjoyed our location and that the team was welcoming to your furry friends! We would love to welcome you back to ensure that we exceed expectations during your next visit. We are sorry to hear that you were able to hear noise from the DJ, but will be happy to book you a room facing the south direction next time so that it is nice and quiet. We hope you are having happy holidays!

Summary Heading: Beautiful Hotel but rooms can be misleading.
Summary: We felt like the pictures and the names of the rooms were misleading. We booked an ocean view room, and out of all our travels that mentioned ocean view room, this was the one that was the most disappointing. This was at best a partial ocean view. We were on the 5th floor and when we walked into the room all we saw were buildings.  I literally had to lean up against the desk to see the ocean view. Yes you get a nice view from the corner of the balcony but that again was a partial view.   After calling the front desk, we finally got moved to directly above our room to the 8th floor. This was more of an ocean view, where you can actually see the ocean when walking in instead of being blocked by buildings. The even numbers apparently have a better view. If you get an odd number
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to provide feedback about your recent stay with us at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are very sorry to hear that the room booked was misleading. We strive to details room views and inclusions on our website to ensure that our customers are always satisfied. Some people do prefer the ocean view rooms facing the Hilton Waterfront as it is a little more quiet at night. In regards to the hot tub, we would love to welcome you back to enjoy our facilities. Our hot tub did go down for one day, so I am saddened that you had to experience this. When you plan on returning, please reach out to our Director of Rooms, Timothy Finley (timothy.finley@paseahotel.com), so that he can ensure that your next experience is perfect.

Summary: I took my girlfriend to Tanners last night, and the food was really good. We had great service there and also a great experience with the valet. Justin helped us out with our car, and he treated us very well. He even helped us out with directions around town when we were confused. Overall, we had a great time, and we will definitely be returning.
Manager Response: Thank you Ryan for visiting to dine with us at Tanner's. We are so happy to hear that the food was great and the team was able to exceed expectations. We will be sure to celebrate this review with the whole team and thank Justin for providing you with directions around the town. We are excited to welcome you back in the near future!

Summary: We had a self-tour scheduled of Pasea as a potential wedding venue. Danny Gundy went above and beyond to make sure we had access to each place we’re thinking of using. Especially Danny went above and beyond in accommodating us. Very nice and made the trip so worth it, especially since we went 90 miles out of the way to visit. Such great service from him and the rest of the Pasea staff. Thanks for making our trip so fruitful, Danny!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback about the self-guided tour you took with us at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are happy to hear that Danny was able to take care of you and truly go above and beyond with assisting you while on property. We appreciate you driving 90 miles out of the way to see our beautiful property in Huntington Beach. We hope to see you back again very soon!

Summary: This hotels location in Huntington Beach is excellent! All of the staff members top to bottom are amazing.  Great valet service, great bell service.  Rooms are very nice and clean. We had a nice room overlooking the pool on the 2nd floor. Breathtaking sunset views!  Only reason this places 4 stars instead of 5 is the bed quality and load music from nearby clubs.  Overall very satisfied with my stay
Manager Response: Thank you Jason for staying with us at the Pasea Hotel and Spa. We are happy to hear that the team members were able to exceed expectations and that you enjoyed our facilities on property. We apologize that you experienced noise coming from next door. We just adopted a sleep amenity in the room that acts as a white noise machine for our guests just in case that happens. However, we also will continue to monitor this and minimize any noise that we hear around the area. We thank you for your feedback and hope that you will come stay with us again soon.

Summary: My sister booked rooms to get ready and took their wedding photos at the Pasea. Aaron from valet helped us w/our cars, he was kind and attentive knowing we had a lot of luggage to bring up. He’s awesome!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review about your stay with us at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are so happy to hear that Aaron was able to assist you while you were visiting. Thank you for choosing our property to get ready for the special day. We hope to welcome you back in the near future. Happy Holidays!

Summary Heading: Great experience with Valet and Ice Rink
Summary: I had a very positive experience visiting Pasea recently to go to the ice rink with my family. I had to write this review to commend Eddie from valet for his outstanding service and make my visit to the hotel all the more special - along with skating with my family at the ice rink, he truly was one of the highlights that evening.  He was polite and had a great sense of humor. I’m normally reserved and don’t like making small talk, but my brief interaction with him would have proven otherwise. He seemed genuine and down to earth which made it very comfortable having a conversation - it felt almost as if we were old friends catching up.   I definitely would be visiting Paseo again and would feel assured recommending this place to all my friends and family! Thank you for making our
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback about your experience at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are excited to hear that Eddie was able to take care of you and your family and exceeded expectations. We will definitely celebrate him with the valet team. We hope that you had a fantastic time on the ice rink and hope to welcome you back in the near future.

Summary Heading: Overall experience was amazing and I can’t wait to make it a tradition with my friends!
Summary: First off I love this hotel!! I had gotten help from Eddie. He was very nice and gave us directions on where to go. I had came to the ice rink with my girlfriends for the first time and we had so much fun . I can’t to come back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback about your experience at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are excited to hear that Eddie was able to take care of your efficiently and exceeded expectations. We hope that you had a fantastic time on the ice rink and hope to welcome you and your girlfriend back in the near future!

Summary: For my last weekend before my move, Ellan made sure that I went out with a bang. From the champagne, to the creative drinks and the ambience, everything was perfect. I would definitely recommend friends go to Tanners treetop lounge and ask for Ellan because you will get exceptional service!
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback about your "unforgettable experience" at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We thank you for taking the time to write a review and will be sure to celebrate Ellan and the rest of the food and beverage team. We hope to welcome you back to Tanner's Treehouse soon!

Summary: Sorry, I forgot the kids name and I can’t read it on the card. I attached a photo of the card that was given to us. He was very friendly, pleasant and helpful. He was quick in assisting us and even quicker in retrieving our car.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting us for the ice rink at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We will ensure to celebrate the valet team and thank you for taking the time to write a 5 star review about your experience. We hope to welcome you back in the near future!

Summary: Our stay was amazing.  Tyler P at your front desk got us right in and directed us to all the amenities of your great hotel..  Grounds, Rooms, Bars and Dinning are a  10 of 10 on our list.  By far the best Hotel stay we have ever had in that area..!!  Thank you  Rosales family
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback about your stay with us at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are excited to hear that you enjoyed our property and all of the amenities that come with it. We will ensure to celebrate Tyler with the rest of the team. We hope to invite you back in the near future!

Summary: Cam went above and beyond to make sure we had an enjoyable experience. The restaurant had a good environment. The breakfast burrito was delicious, kind of sweet, and much bigger than i expected it to be.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review about your recent experience with us at Tanner's restaurant. We will ensure to celebrate this review with Cam and the rest of the team. We cannot wait to welcome you back in the near future!

Summary: I went to valet my car I have gotten taken care of by 2 men named Eric and Simon. They were very kind and also the bartender had great vibes. The bar has alot of drinks to choose from and alot of mixed drinks
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review about your experience at Tanner's Treehouse. We are grateful to hear that Eric, Simon and our other bartender was able to take care of you and your party. We appreciate your positive feedback and will ensure to celebrate this review with the team. Cheers!

Summary: We recently hosted our company holiday party at Tanner's so having our top executives stay at Pasea just made sense. After lots of coordination, no rock was left unturned making sure everything was perfect for our team who stayed. They allowed early check-in (per request) for those that needed it, they add beautiful amenities in our CEO and COO's room and they went above and beyond to make sure everyone was comfortable. A huge shoutout to Rose, who I did most of our last-minute coordinating with. Even when she was off of work, she was making sure that her team was ensuring we were all comfortable. The customer service displayed by Rose was truly admirable!
Manager Response: Thank you for the  5 star review about your recent experience at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are so happy to hear that Rose was able to exceed expectations and ensure that your VIP's and guests had a seamless experience. We thank you for hosting your holiday party with us and hope to see you again next year. Happy Holidays!

Summary Heading: Hotel Excellence in Meeting Planning & Execution
Summary: Best level of service from an entire hotel staff I have ever experienced. Sales Mgr Jackie Floyd, Event Mgr Kevin Diaz and Group Reservation Mgr Samantha Griffin ensured every detail of our conference was executed perfectly. The Banquet Captains Anka, Lily and Mercedes took care of every request our attendees had. Bellman Peter, Rose in reservations and our bartender Patrick all provided exceptional professional service. The hotel is amazingly beautiful inside and outside, the food is outstanding and every staff member exceeded my expectations of service. Thank you again and I can't wait to come back to the Pasea Hotel and Spa.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a 5 star review about your recent experience with our team at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are very excited to hear that Jackie, Kevin, Samantha, Anka, Lily, Mercedes, Peter, Rose and Patrick were all able to exceed expectations. We thank you for booking your event with us and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: Came for dinner at Tanners restaurant downstairs. Totally delicious. Our server Dominique was awesome. The ricotta toast was delicious and the filet and hanger steaks were perfectly cooked. The bread pudding dessert (Christmas special) was the perfect wrap up.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback about your experience with us at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are very happy to hear that Dominique was able to take care of you. We will definitely celebrate this review with her and the rest of the team. We are excited to welcome you back to Tanner's soon!

Summary: I ate at Tanners with my parents. They were visiting for my mom’s birthday. We had Brie as our server and OH MY GAAWWWD! She is the sweetest, most genuine, AMAZING person I have ever met. Such an awesome server. I live a few miles away and never get out- I want to come back just for her! BRIE DESERVES A RAISE! She is amazing!
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback about your experience with us at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are very happy to hear that Brie was able to take care of you. We will definitely celebrate this review with her and the rest of the team. We are excited to welcome you back to Tanner's soon!

Summary Heading: Love our Server! New Best Friebd!
Summary: Our server was the best we have ever had and I am 54 this month! Btw Bre is great! Love her! We will be back just to have Bre as our server! She is the best! She made our experience as first timers at Tanners the best!
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback about your experience with us at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are very happy to hear that Bri was able to take care of you. We will definitely celebrate this review with her and the rest of the team. We are excited to welcome you back to Tanner's soon!

Summary Heading: Great atmosphere, drinks are made really well. The views are beautiful. Make sure to ask for Ellan.
Summary: I stayed at Pasea Hotel for the first time visiting friends in the OC, flying in from NY. I just wanted to relax by the beach. Check in was smooth, love the coffee at Blend. The highlight of my trip was definitely one of the bartenders, Ellan. He knows how to make a spicy margarita and an amazing espresso martini. The views, I can't complain about. Sundays are really popular, did not expect a crowd, had such a fun time. I will be back soon, simply because Ellan made it that much better!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback about your positive experience at Tanner's Treehouse and Pasea Hotel & Spa! We are so happy that Ellan was able to exceed expectations during your visit. Thank you for visiting to enjoy a cocktail and the holiday vibes at hotel all the way from NYC. We hope to welcome you back in the near future!

Summary: I have been to this nice restaurant so many times, especially at the bar, he is always friendly and he takes good care of me and my friends. It’s amazing how he always smiles no matter what, he also jokes around with us like we do with him, highly recommend to visit him and the place he works at Tanners! He makes the best old fashions!! Thank you Ellan! 😃
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback about your positive experience at Tanner's Treehouse! We are so happy that Ellan was able to exceed expectations during your visit. Thank you for visiting to enjoy a cocktail and the holiday vibes at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We hope to welcome you back in the near future!

Summary: Went to a friends party on Saturday, Dec 3rd The party was totally rocking and most of all, the BARTENDER Ellan Musk ! Made the party all the more HAPPENING!! His drink selections were on point, he made amazing recommendations although my ultimate favorite is his version of the MEXICAN PALOMA interestingly enough a drink sooo good he should name is Elons Paloma  #WINNER!! If you’re looking for a professional, great great all around bartender, this is the ONE TO HAVE and ELLAN the guy who will serve and deliver!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback about your positive experience at Tanner's Treehouse! We are so happy that Ellan was able to exceed expectations during your visit. Thank you for visiting to enjoy a cocktail and the holiday vibes at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We hope to welcome you back in the near future!

Summary: Ellan is the best bartender at Tanners Treehouse! He is super attentive and makes an awesome cocktail! Tanners is great for the winter with decorations and lights everywhere! They even have a tent and fire pits to keep you warm
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback about your positive experience at Tanner's Treehouse! We are so happy that Ellan was able to exceed expectations during your visit. Thank you for visiting to enjoy a cocktail and the holiday vibes at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We hope to welcome you back in the near future!

Summary: Brie killed it! We are a big group of a lot of personalities and Brie was so prompt getting our food and drinks. She was so kind and helpful. We would definitely come back and ask for her! Thank you, Brie!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive experience with us at Tanner's to celebrate the Holidays. We are so happy that you and your friends enjoyed your time. We look forward to welcoming you back soon and will be sure to celebrate this review with Brie!

Summary: I love Brie so much!!! Brie has made this trip so much fun!!! Love Brie! And tanners!!! Can’t wait to go back!! If I can give more than 5 stars I will!! I love pasea!! And Brie!!! Coming back ASAP! Thank you for the best customer service!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive experience with us at Tanner's to celebrate the Holidays. We are so happy that you and your friends enjoyed your time. We look forward to welcoming you back soon and will be sure to celebrate this review with Brie!

Summary: Brie made our trip!! She made everything so much fun and was so kind! We love Brie and the pasea!! I highly recommend staying here and having brunch at tanners!!!!! Great views, vibes and food! Come here!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive experience with us at Tanner's to celebrate the Holidays. We are so happy that you and your friends enjoyed your time. We look forward to welcoming you back soon and will be sure to celebrate this review with Brie!

Summary: We always have a lovely time at Pasea. We come every year for our friends Christmas gathering. We had brunch at Tanner’s and Brie was amazing! Great service and truly had such a great experience because of her.
Manager Response: Thank you B3809OOlarenw for sharing your positive experience with us at Tanner's to celebrate the Holidays. We are so happy that you and your friends enjoyed your time. We look forward to welcoming you back soon and will be sure to celebrate this review with Brie!

Summary: Brie was an amazing server and made our brunch x1000000 better her energy was top notch!! She really made our group feel special as we were celebrating our friend group Christmas party! Definitely coming back!!
Manager Response: Thank you meagany808 for sharing your positive experience about your trip to Tanner's with us. We are so happy to hear that Brie was able to take care of you during your Christmas party. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future. Happy Holidays from the Pasea Hotel & Spa!

Summary Heading: Great Hotel in a safe area
Summary: Well appointed rooms.  Ocean view room has great view of the beach and Catalina Island.  Several dining options in the building.  Next to Pacific City pedestrian mall.  2 blocks from Main Street and more dining options.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review about your experience with us at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the beautiful view from your oceanfront room. We are so grateful to be located right in the middle of Pacific City for all of our guests to enjoy. We hope to see you back again soon!

Summary: I can not say enough good things about our stay this November during our Wedding! We needed some last minute accommodations for family and friends for the weekend of our wedding and Rose Moglianesi could not have been more helpful and patient with all of our changes, additions and last minute requests (and there were a lot! We were a slightly difficult group). She was quick to respond and took care of everything we needed ASAP. I also worked with Jackie Floyd and Kevin Diaz and again, such a pleasure to work with! The hotel is clean and the amenities are a bonus! Not only will we be back, but our friends and family will be as well. Thank you for an amazing stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your positive experience with us at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are so grateful that Rose, Jackie and Kevin were able to take good care of you and your wedding party. We definitely do our best to accommodate all requests to ensure a seamless and enjoyable stay. We are so excited to hear that you will be back with your friends and family. We hope to see you again very soon!

Summary: Hadn't been to Huntington Beach for a very long time so when I came upon Pacific City and The Pacea, I was pleasantly surprised. I stayed at the hotel one night and enjoyed the warm welcome and hospitality of the hotel staff. I was particularly impressed with my room service attendant, Barbra (?) . She made sure I was  comfortable with my accomodations and represented the Pasea brand and environment with poise and professionalism--even helped me figure out the best way to get to my next day DTFullerton appt. Great stay. Would certainly recommend to my friends and family and hope to be back myself sooner than later.  Mahalo Pasea
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive feedback about your recent stay with us at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are happy to hear that Barbara exceeded expectations and that your accommodations were most comfortable. We will definitely be celebrating this review with our team members and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary: For such a beautiful property, I’ve never seen any hotel or resort nickel and dime their clientele more so than here.  They charge you to sit by the fireplace while your kids skate $150 just to sit, another $150 for a bottle of cheap champagne.  Then they charge $17-$18 a drink for rum with eggnog or hot apple cider with any alcohol in it.  To skate it cost $35 for just an hour to Skate.  Think about that for a moment?  3 kids skating cost $120 bucks for a Hotel ths5 should offer this close to free as a benefit to hotel guests, it’s a Money pit they use to financially molest locals here, why not invite locals in, offer free hot coca and apple cider To The kids and create a fun friendly environment ?  The Pasea management as a whole truly don’t get it.  Th3 holidays are meant for
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out to us in regard to your feedback about the ice rink. We definitely do our best to provide memorable experiences for all ages at on the property. At this time, we have non-alcoholic drinks that range from $5-$7 and many kid friendly food options. While staying at the hotel, we also have complimentary hot cocoa for the month of December at the front desk, as well as kids gifts and candy canes. It is my hope that you will give us another opportunity to serve you again to offer more value during your stay.

Summary: We have been coming to Tanners for about a year and the best service we’ve had is from Ellan. He recommends the best drinks, he’s so fast with service. Can’t wait to come back and enjoy more of his on and off menu drinks! If you come to Tanners Treehouse definitely ask Ellan.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback in regards to your recent stay with us. We are happy to hear that service at Tanner's exceeded expectations. We will definitely be celebrating this with Ellan and will be excited to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Me and my family had a great time at the Paseo. When we arrived we were greeted by the courtesy valet staff they made us feel like royalty. Once inside the wonderful staff helped us find everything we were looking for. The location is very clean and well kept.. I would recommend this hotel to all my friends I can’t wait to go back…
Manager Response: Thank you Rocky for your feedback about your recent stay with us. We are happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your time. We cannot wait to welcome you back in the near future!

Summary: Great location, clean, and employees were all very welcoming and nice. Would definitely recommend this hotel  to everyone.  Can't wait to be back again for another stay! Overall great experience here, I loved every part of it.
Manager Response: Thank you rometripcruise for your feedback about your overall stay with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa! We are very happy to hear that the team members exceeded expectations and that your experience was pleasant. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary: Property is very nice.  The staff was overall exceptional and very willing to help.  Highly recommended for both reasons - staff and property.  We also went to Tanners for a late night cap and enjoyed ourselves.   Rooms were vey quiet from road noise and the white noise machine was amazingl
Manager Response: Thank you ROGUECOOKERS for your feedback about your overall stay with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa! We are very happy to hear that the team members exceeded expectations and that your experience at Tanner's was memorable. We are happy that you enjoyed the sleep amenity that have been installed in all of our guests rooms for a pleasant night's rest! We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary Heading: Excellent location, very comfortable, clean, shiny, well-maintained resort.
Summary: Love this place. Great, friendly greetings when arriving, great lobby and common areas, wonderful rooms, inviting pool. Beautiful views. Restaurant and bar are great, welcoming places. I don't see the value of being charged a resort fee. Maybe they can do a better job of explaining what is provided for the resort fee, as most resorts do explain it, as opposed to just adding it to your bill.
Manager Response: Thank you FredDouglas for your review! We are so happy to hear that the property and restaurant exceeded expectations. I will definitely follow up with the front office team on your feedback about the resort fee. I agree that all of our guests should know the details of what this involves to celebrate the value: complimentary in-room wine and waters, wifi, beach butler service, pool access, 24-hour gym access. business center, amenities for the beach, bicycle rentals, etc. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future to enjoy all of these items.

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel w/ great views, way overpriced on some things.
Summary: Stayed here for work for 2 back to back trips. Get an oceanfront view, amazing! Balcony is lovely! A couple of call outs to the staff: Babs in    food & beverage is outstanding, she is on top Of things, so sweet and extremely attentive. Bailey in valet was excellent.   I will say prices are ridiculously high and frankly unacceptable- a can of coke was $5.39. I realize everyone is trying to make a profit but that’s insane. Parking is $45 a night so make sure to add that on if you have a car. There is no self parking. Food was average and overpriced. Breakfast was good but inconsistent. Drinks depended on who made them. Dinners good but again overpriced.
Manager Response: Thank you bizntravel for your feedback about your recent stay with us. We are happy to see that Babs and Bailey were both able to take great care of you in our venues. We are sorry to hear that a few items were a little bit pricey. We base our pricing for F&B and parking on the market and assure that we are comparable to other hotels in the area are charging. We take your feedback seriously and will definitely look into this in hopes to take better care of you during your next experience with us.

Summary: I will never stay at your hotel again.  I could not believe how dirty the room was.  The air filter was 100% clogged. The shelving in the room looked lime it had not been cleaned in months.  Black marks all over the walls and cobwebs on the lights.  Worst experience I've ever had.  I've seen cleaner places at truck stops.
Manager Response: Dear Jeffl,  I want to thank you for your feedback about your recent stay with us. I have sent you a direct message to ensure that we make things right for you. I look forward to speaking with you soon.

Summary: I was there to attend a company conference for my travel agency. We also had many of our suppliers attending. There were hotel companies, cruise line companies, tour operators and other travel companies in attendance.
Manager Response: Dear Passport107119,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! I am so happy that you enjoyed your experience during your work trip. We hope to see you back again very soon!  Sincerely,

Summary: This hotel was a perfect location for a great weekend with friends - The hotel was busy and well organized for everything going on - Highly recommend a stay at this hotel. The rooms are great and have wonderful details and it is my favorite hotel room key ever! love the flip flops. The staff were friendly and helpful. The view is amazing!
Manager Response: Dear BVQ121212,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! I am so happy that you enjoyed your experience and our guest rooms. We hope to see you and your friends back again very soon!  Sincerely,

Summary: What a great new addition to Huntington Beach. Hadn't been to Huntington Beach for many years, so coming up on the Pesea Hotel and adjunct Pacific City outdoor mall was a treat. While waiting for a client in the Pasea Lobby I was welcomed and treated so kindly by Pasea employee, Barbara (?). She was very attentive, kind, and even  helped me figure out the best way to get to my following OC appt.  Thank you Barbara, and everybody at the Pasea. 10 outta 10!  Looking forward to an extended stay in the near future.
Manager Response: Dear Q6586TKma,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! I am so happy that you enjoyed your experience and that Barbara helped to exceed expectations. It is definitely a great experience to be located right in the fun of Pacific City. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely,

Summary: Came here with my mom for a lunch date. Ruben was the best! Recommended the best plates and drinks. The  calamari is a must if you like a little spice and the shishito burger was AMAZING! Overall the service was attentive and great vibes! Will definitely be coming back!   And the views of the beach were a plus 🙏😍
Manager Response: Dear carm1118,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! I am so happy that you enjoyed your experience at Tanner's! We will definitely celebrate with Ruben and appreciate your kind feedback. I will have to say, those are two of my favorite menu items as well. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future to soak in more of that gorgeous beach view!  Sincerely,

Summary: A bottle of chilled wine and free flips flops? Yes please. Gorgeous hotel and spectacular views. Rooftop bar was also a delight for sharing apps, drinking craft cocktails and hanging out with my 30-person work group. Plenty of movable seating to accommodate all.
Manager Response: Dear aneciadawnp,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! I am so happy that you enjoyed your experience and our the amenities in our guest rooms. Welcome wine and flip flops are always a must when traveling to Huntington Beach. What could be better than soaking in the view with a nice cocktails while on a work trip? We hope to see you back very soon.   Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Spa is Horrible/Dirty but Hotel/Bar was great
Summary: The spa was a complete letdown. I paid for a spa experience and I will say that the massage was good, however, the overall spa was extremely dirty. The jacuzzi was covered in algae & there was hair floating all over it. I mentioned it to the staff prior to my massage and it was still in there afterwards. Robes were not comfortable and shoes were not even sized, so just flipping water every where. The Sauna was never started at beginning of the day so when I went to get it, it was cold-never even room.   Good luck getting a towel as they were not available you had to go find one.   Both days we were there we had to ask for towels because they were not stocked. Cold washcloths to use in the steam room/sauna were also not stocked   The steam room floor was filthy.   There was one
Manager Response: Dear Tiffany T,  Thank you for your feedback in regards to your recent stay with us. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed the hotel and bar. However, I am very sorry to hear that the spa did not exceed expectations. If you have a moment, please reach out to the spa directly so that our Director is able to make things right for you. We would definitely like to welcome you back to the hotel in the future to turn this around. We appreciate your time and hope that we can connect with you soon!  Sincerely,

Summary: Barbara Moses was fabulous!  She was energetic when I called in my order and even better when she hand delivered it below the 20 minutes promised.  She talked of the places to visit while waiting on the tab to be signed.  Just a stellar experience!!
Manager Response: Dear Lovemariiedlife,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! I am so happy that you enjoyed your experience and that Barbara was able to take great care of you. We hope to see you back again very soon!  Sincerely,

Summary: Tanners Resturant, server Brie and chef Johnathan provided the best food and service during the dinner service we attended the other night. It was top quality and professionally presented food with a tasty variety to choose from.  Brie was fun and very personable. I recommend dining here.
Manager Response: Dear Voyage797678,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel and your experience at Tanners! I am so happy that you enjoyed our food, service, and overall experience. I will definitely be celebrating this review with Chef JJ and Brie. We hope to see you back again very soon!  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Miss Barbara Moses and her great customer service skills
Summary: She was very nice and generous and she offered me free cake.I will never forget her I have a customer service skills. we was in a lobby and we had a great conversation and she offered us free cake she was very nice and respectful.
Manager Response: Dear 540princez,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel and Tanners! I am so happy that you enjoyed your experience and that Brie was able to take good care of you. Who doesn't love a special celebration cake on the house? We hope to see you again very soon!  Sincerely,

Summary: It's all about the breathtaking scenic ocean views here at Treehouse. Overlooking Huntington Beach inside the Pasea Hotel & Spa this gorgeous rooftop lounge is definitely a vibe. We stopped by for drinks on the weekend and came around 5pm, It's walk-ins only but since we were a bit early, there was plenty of open seating available. I imagine it probably gets harder to snag a good seat closer to sunset. Only thing is there isn't a lot of shade to shield you from the sun, so don't forget your sunglasses or hat if you're coming in the daytime. We ordered the Cucumber Delight & Espresso Martini, along with Calamari to share. Now I'm not usually a martini person but this cocktail was so freaking good i had to get a second thank to Ellan who was the bartender who made it. It was
Manager Response: Dear fabianmT5719KH,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel and Tanners Treehouse! I am so happy that you enjoyed your experience and the beautiful view of Huntington Beach. I am very happy to hear that Ellan was able to exceed expectations. Who doesn't love an espresso martini during sunset? We hope to see you and your friends back again very soon!  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Excellent Service & Experience Thanks to Ellan!
Summary: Where do I begin...I had such an amazing experience at Treehouse/Tanners I originally came in for a special event cocktail hour, and the food and cocktails was so delicious that we decided to stay for dinner. Thanks to our amazing and loving bartender Ellan, he payed attention to every detail and checked up on us to make sure everything from the apps to dessert was taken care of.  I couldn't think of a more beautiful place to have lunch or dinner, or two sit by the fire and have dessert and drinks. The food at Tanners is delicious and well thought out. We tried a little of everything, and not a single course disappointed. My suggestion would be to order family style so everyone can share and experience the entire menu. This restaurant also boasts a well-rounded vodka selection
Manager Response: Dear arthurbX6228TV,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel and Tanners Treehouse. We are very excited to hear that you enjoyed our food and service. We will definitely be celebrating this review with Ellan. We hope to welcome you back again for a few more drinks while enjoying the view and ambiance. Thank you so much for your kind words!  Sincerely,

Summary: My wife and I stayed at the Pasea Hotel & Spa last week and visited the Treehouse lounge to have some drinks. We were served by one of the bartenders, Ellan G and he did an amazing job. Drinks were great, but his hospitality and personality was even better. Would definitely recommend visiting for some awesome drinks and a great atmosphere.
Manager Response: Dear BVQ121212,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel and Tanners Treehouse! I am so happy that you enjoyed your experience and our cocktails. We will definitely be celebrating this review with Ellan and appreciate your kind words. We hope to see you and your friends back again very soon!  Sincerely,

Summary: The Pasea Hotel is an incredible property. The staff is very friendly and willing to assist. You have incredible dining options at the hotel or just a short walk up the street is Main St. HB with a number of options. We will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear shawnbP9376DR,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! I am so happy that you enjoyed your experience and our team members. We hope to see you again soon to enjoy more beachfront dining in Huntington Beach!  Sincerely,

Summary: The Pasea Hotel is conveniently located on the beachfront of Huntington Beach.  Pacific City shops are right below it, as well as other fun, touristy shops located a couple of blocks away.  Everything you would want to do on a beach filled vacation is at your fingertips here ~surfing, beach walks, shopping, eating, relaxing at the ocean.  The actual rooms are situated so you can view the ocean.  There are partial ocean view rooms as well as full ocean view rooms.  Valet parking, excellent customer service, cleanliness, and professionalism are why we keep going back to the Pasea!
Manager Response: Dear jlstar7,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! I am so happy that you enjoyed your overall experience. We hope to see you and you back again very soon!  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: You'd expect more for what you pay a night
Summary: The gentlemen helping me at check in was great, but after that it was all down hill. The bedding was nasty, the pillow cases and the pillow covers were so yellow it looked like someone urinated on them. The mattress was super cheap, and for some reason the bedding / sheets felt wet while laying in them. The room was also very dusty like it hasn't been cleaned in weeks. I had to lint roll my pillows cause of all the dust on them. The floors had food all over, like it hasn't been swept in weeks as well. Overall, 1 star. Days Inn or Super 8 cleans their rooms better than this place.
Manager Response: Dear ChrisBlare,  Thank you for staying with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. As customer service is my passion, it saddens me to hear that we did not exceed expectations. We definitely work hard to maintain a high standard in our guest rooms in regards to cleanliness and amenities so I am very sorry that you did not have the experience that we strive to provide on a consistent basis. Please let me know when you plan on booking another stay with us so that we can make things right. We would love another opportunity to turn this around in the future.  Thank you,

Summary: Further to other recent reviews, the hotel is of a high standard and the nightly charge reflects this - what annoyed me was the four other “taxes and fees”  that were added on top. This turned a US$369 nightly charge into over US$450.  Facilities were clean and accessible and we found the pool to be a wonderful sanctuary during a warm day. Towels were plush and lounges were available. Drinks were a bit expensive but as mentioned prior, the hotel rating would indicate that beverages wouldn’t be cheap…. Check in is at 4pm and check out is at 11am. Understandably to have housekeeping knock and enter on our final morning at 9am ready to clean was not ideal.  Additionally the request to extend checkout by an hour (due to a cancelled overseas flight) was met with a hard “no” but
Manager Response: Dear terenia1970,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback about your recent stay with us at Pasea Hotel & Spa. Although you enjoyed the overall location and resort, we are very sorry to hear that there were other experiences that did not exceed expectations. Please let me know when you plan on returning to Huntington Beach so that I can turn this experience around. This is definitely not the standard so many other visitors enjoy so we would like to make this up to you. We appreciate your time and hope to hear from you soon!  Sincerely,

Summary: Remarkable location but significantly overpriced.  On top of the high room fee, the resort fee seems like robbery.  The forced valet parking (there is no self park) is $45 per night.  Cocktails on the menu are all $19.  Inflation has really gotten a hold of this place.  On the upside, the food and service at Tanner's was very good.  Apparently it's a brand new menu and everything our party of five had was appetizing.  There's a lot of to like about the place, but it's good to be rolling in the dough if you want to stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you Gary_n_Kimberly for you feedback about your recent stay with us at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your experience at Tanner's with our new menu. We price our property with competitors in the area so our rates are based on occupancy, however, there are times throughout the week where the rooms are priced more economically depending on events, bookings, etc. We hope to welcome you back soon so that you are able to enjoy the property while celebrating the value of our offerings.   Thank you,

Summary: I have stayed here 3 times now. In the end it is not worth the nightly rate. They Hyatt and Hilton resorts in the area have better service and more than likely have better rates. This is a 3.5 star resort.
Manager Response: Dear Z9067ULtonyo,  Thank you for staying with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. As customer service is my passion, it saddens me to hear that we did not exceed expectations. We definitely work hard to maintain a highlevel of service and offerings so I am very sorry that you did not have the experience that we strive to provide on a consistent basis. Please let me know when you plan on booking another stay with us so that we can make things right. We would love another opportunity to turn this around in the future.  Thank you,

Summary Heading: Abysmal service from check-in to check-out
Summary: Although the hotel is conveniently situated for a quick stay in Huntington Beach with excellent views of the water and pier, the condescending and rude manner in which the hotel staff treated me from check-in to check-out is significant enough to ensure I will never stay at the Pasea Hotel & Spa in the future.   Due to the reservation being made through AMEX, the staff at the registration desk informed me that the resort fee would be waived at checkout. When I questioned why I was paying the resort fee if it would be waived, the staff even went so far as to slowly and condescendingly define what constitutes an incidental fee versus a resort fee and that the resort fee would be refunded at checkout. At checkout, the same attendant that 'explained' only the resort fee would be
Manager Response: Dear ttontheroad,  Thank you for staying with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. As customer service is my passion, it saddens me to hear that we did not exceed expectations from service levels to room satisfaction. We definitely work hard to maintain a high standard in our guest rooms in regards to cleanliness and amenities so I am very sorry that you did not have the experience that we strive to provide on a consistent basis. Please let me know when you plan on booking another stay with us so that we can make things right. We would love another opportunity to turn this around in the future. We take your feedback very seriously and promise that you will have a completely different experience with us when you come back.   Thank you,

Summary: Just ate at Tanners at Pasea hotel in Huntington Beach and it was amazing. Our server Ruben was so inviting and made us feel at home. He was knowledgeable about the menu and the area. I never really do a review but I was so impressed by him, the service and the food that I had to give a shout out to Ruben and Tanners in HB. If you want a great view and great service, definitely give Tanners a try and ask for Ruben. He will make you feel at home.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great five-star review of our restaurant, and for taking the time to recognize one of our team members! We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: This hotel was packed for the AirShow, however they made our stay very enjoyable. We ordered room service and it was delivered to our room in less than 30 minutes. I am looking forward to staying again when it's not so busy and get a real feel for the resort and all its amenities.
Manager Response: Dear Juniper1228,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! I am so happy that you enjoyed your experience with our IRD team.
