The Air Show is definitely our busiest day of the year at the hotel so we look forward to seeing you again soon on a date that you can enjoy the whole property a little bit more. We are excited to welcome you back to enjoy our offerings and Pacific City!  Sincerely,

Summary: The Aarna spa is beautiful! I had a wonderful massage there and the amenities were great. I loved the outdoor area. When I arrived I was greeted by Maggie, she had a bright smile and answered all my questions. She gave me a tour of the area and answered all my questions. Throughout my time at the spa she checked on me to make sure I was relaxed and enjoying the spa. Cant wait to go back! Thank you Maggie for going above and beyond!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great five-star review of our Spa, Lauren, and for taking the time to recognize Maggie. We look forward to your next visit to Aarna Spa!

Summary: Management does not prioritize guests staying on the property over the walk-in business.   Leaving you waiting in long lines or being turned away.  The location is close to shopping, dining, and the main street, so we chose to give this property a second chance.   I'm not sure we will stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Nick M,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! I am so happy that you enjoyed the location of the hotel, but am sad to hear that you did not feel prioritized as a guest. Please reach out to me when you plan on returning to Huntington Beach so that I can ensure that we exceed expectations during your next trip. We take your feedback very seriously and hope that we can turn this around soon.   Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Book elsewhere and save the hassle
Summary: Don’t stay here, save your money and book at the surrounding properties instead. Booked ourselves an early birthday celebration by taking in the air show that was taking place this busy weekend. After paying an exorbitant rate, the service was even worse. Other 5 star hotels I have stayed at has gone out of their way to treat all guest right and made feel welcomed.  This place treats you like you are at a motel. Asked for a late checkout and was rudely told no by the night manager in charge with another manager looking on. What an absolute disgrace, complimentary bottle of wine wasn’t in the room when we checked in. They have no kettle for you to boil water. I don’t drink coffee and need to sterilize the water by boiling it before consuming it. No mugs either, just paper cups.
Manager Response: Dear will_i_am_traveling,  Thank you for staying with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. As customer service is my passion, it saddens me to hear that we did not exceed expectations. We definitely work hard to maintain a high standard in our guest rooms in regards to cleanliness and amenities so I am very sorry that you did not have the experience that we strive to provide on a consistent basis. In addition, I am very disappointed our service levels left something to desire during your stay. Please let me know when you plan on booking another stay with us so that we can make things right. We would love another opportunity to turn this around in the future.  Thank you,

Summary: The atmosphere was great. The music made a great vibe and the drinks were amazing! Thank you Ellan for making it a great night with your exceptional service! I will definitely return for another night of good people and great vibes
Manager Response: We're so happy to hear about your experience at our restaurants & bars. Thank you for taking the time to leave this five-star review, and for recognizing our team member. We look forward to your return!

Summary: Hugely disappointing.  It starts with the manager, Jerry Garcia, who is rude and unhelpful. Restaurant service is poor.There is one good waiter. The rest are pleasant but not adequately trained. We made the great mistake of booking breakfast in advance.We found virtually nothing good on the menu. Sugar Shack, down the road,provides a far better menu at a much lower price. Service was so bad that they reduced our bill to $30 on one day and provided us with a free breakfast ( as a result of the previous days service ) on the next . Jerry Garcia refused to give us the resulting credit , and walked off smirking, saying, Have a nice day. Talk about unprofessional!! On 2 occasions, in a week, the room was cleaned after 4 pm. We rang down, each time, thinking we had been forgotten.
Manager Response: Dear Passenger603681,  Thank you for staying with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. As customer service is my passion, it saddens me to hear that we did not exceed expectations. We definitely work hard to maintain a high standard from a guest room and service perspective so I am very sorry that you did not have the experience that we strive to provide on a consistent basis. Please let me know when you plan on booking another stay with us so that we can make things right. We would love another opportunity to turn this around in the future.  Thank you,

Summary Heading: Delighted at Paseà Hotel. Huntington Beach
Summary: We visited the hotel today, to view the Pacific Air Show and dine at the hotel restaurant called Tanners. From the very moment we pulled up to valet parking we had a delightful encounter with Kyle. He immediately recognized that we were military members and extended us such courtesy, and recognition that we were truly overwhelmed. For him to be so perceptive and kind was a true delight. We cannot praise him enough, and would appreciate it if  you will pass on our thanks and kudos to him.   We were also quite pleased with our dining experience, both the service and the food were on pointe, and we had a thoroughly enjoyable experience. The manager at the front desk. Eddie also was very personable and helpful.  Based on our experience today, we will be planning an overnight stay at
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this great five-star review. We're so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us during the Airshow weekend, and that our team was able to accommodate you during your time with us. We will definitely share this great feedback with our team members. Thank you again, and we look forward to your return in the future!

Summary: Wow!! The service & the food was amazing. Jake was so fun to talk too & he gave the best service! Thanks Jake(: Also the chef Armando came out to talk to my family about the food & he was awesome & everything was cooked to perfection! A really great experience here!
Manager Response: We're so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us at our restaurant, Tanner's! Thank you for leaving this great review, and for taking the time to recognize our team members. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: The most beautiful place to stay in Huntington Beach. Superb attention by the hotel staff, excellent location, top notch decoration, absolutely everything is enjoyable. This would be my 6th time at Pasea and I am definitively coming back next year!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great five-star review! We're so glad to hear that you've enjoyed your times with us, and look forward to your 7th visit and beyond.

Summary: During our stay, we wished to upgrade our room. The upgrade was $1000 per night. The staff said it was well worth it. During our first night in the upgraded room, our TVs did not work. Maintenance was in the room the following day for some time and they were very nice, but could not fix the problem. The manager did allow us to move to another upgraded room however, they did not tell us that we would be staying right next to the restaurant and rooftop bar which play music late into the night. All of that is great unless like us you are there on business and need a good rest. Their valet team did not charge our electric vehicle as we had asked, and we were assured that they would. Overall, this hotel was not what we were expecting. We thought we were going to a luxury hotel to
Manager Response: Dear danifV2162SB,  Thank you for staying with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. As customer service is my passion, it saddens me to hear that we did not exceed expectations. We definitely work hard to maintain a high standard in our guest rooms in regards to cleanliness and amenities so I am very sorry that you did not have the experience that we strive to provide on a consistent basis. Please let me know when you plan on booking another stay with us so that we can make things right. We would love another opportunity to turn this around in the future.  Thank you,

Summary: Paid for an ocean front room with two queen beds. Very small room and view was of PCH then camp ground before you see the actual surf and sand.   Pictures are very misleading. Very noisy with DJ just outside window from Roof Top bar until midnight. Ate one breakfast and one dinner at Tanners and food was very poor quality and very limited menu.  Had cocktails in bar off the registration area twice sat at a table each time and had to ask that the table be wiped down both times and had to go get our drinks while we watched bartender chat with wait staff. I am sure the reason  for non-refundable full payment at booking is because once   you see the place you don't want to stay there.
Manager Response: Dear ChrisBlare,  Thank you for staying with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. As customer service is my passion, it saddens me to hear that we did not exceed expectations. We definitely work hard to maintain a high standard with our service levels/hotel amenities so I am very sorry that you did not have the experience that we strive to provide on a consistent basis. Please let me know when you plan on booking another stay with us so that we can make things right. We would love another opportunity to turn this around in the future.  Thank you,

Summary: Not much to say except for major problems checking in, still can't get a receipt for my stay, and stale muffins first thing in the morning that cost $7 two days in a row.  Terrible experience and very disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear Derek S,  Thank you for staying with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. As customer service is my passion, it saddens me to hear that we did not exceed expectations. We definitely work hard to maintain a high standard with our service level and offerings so I am very sorry that you did not have the experience that we strive to provide on a consistent basis. Please let me know when you plan on booking another stay with us so that we can make things right. We would love another opportunity to turn this around in the future.  Thank you,

Summary: We had a group of 11 at Tanners and Miguel went above and beyond his duties. He attended to all the guest in our party meticulously. He explained the best drinks and food to order. We ate outside and he made sure that there were plenty of umbrellas to hide us from the hot sun. After lunch we went upstairs in one of the room and his stellar service continued. Making sure we had everything that we needed while always smiling. We will be back for sure but just wanted to write this note that the service was incredible. Well done Miguel!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to recognize our team member, Miguel. We're so glad to hear that you enjoyed your time with us at Tanner's, and hope to welcome you back again sometime soon.

Summary: Ellan was the best bartender made our drinks quick & had amazing customer service. This was my first time going to the TreeTop bar my experience was a 10/10 will definitely be going back & recommending to friends!
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review, and for taking the time to recognize one of our team members! We look forward to welcoming you back to Treehouse soon.

Summary: First experience at Treehouse was great. Came with some friends & was greeted by Ellan. He was highly attentive even with the bar at max. He made sure we were taken care of throughout the night. Best bartender in town. Definitely will be returning.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave such a great review of Ellan. We're delighted to hear about your experience, and look forward to your return!

Summary: Great time at the tree house amazing atmosphere and great service by ellan the barteder and even though the bar was at full capacity service was quick  defenetly coming back thank you ellan for a Awsome experience !!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review, and for taking the time to recognize one of our team members! We look forward to welcoming you back to Treehouse soon.

Summary Heading: 10/10 Ellan is the best bartender In HB !
Summary: Ellen is such an amazing customer service based bartender, definitely will be coming back with more  I came her with friends business meeting and decided to go to treehouse and had an amazing time I will bring more friends next time 10/10 THE BEST BARTENDER EVER.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave such a great review of Ellan and our Treehouse lounge! We're delighted to hear about your experience, and look forward to your return.

Summary: Beautiful hotel, great location. Room with a balcony and ocean view was perfect for a California experience.  All staff was extremely friendly and helpful.  I stayed alone and felt safe at all times.  Very clean with beautiful decor.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave this great five-star review. We're so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us on property, and hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: I came to Pasea Hotel & got greeted by the very handsome bartender Ellan. Compared to the many bars in the OC I will admit he has made one of the best espresso martinis I’ve had in my life, to top it off 5 star customer service and very attentive! I will definitely be back to pasea because of Ellan’s exquisite taste & attention to detail.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave such a great review of our team member, Ellan. We're delighted to hear about your experience, and look forward to your return. Cheers!

Summary: Great modern  hotel, loved the decor, very clean, enjoyed our stay! Very close to the beach and to the pier. Loved Tanner's patio restaurant. The staff was great. Will come back soon. Next time will try the spa.
Manager Response: Thank you for the taking the time to leave such a great five-star review! We're delighted to hear about your experience at our hotel and at our restaurant, and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We came for a conference and we couldn't be more pleased with the hotel. Everything was perfect, including the very powerful AC in the room. The staff was very helpful and we had all we needed. With Pacific City right next door, we could leave our car in the garage and venture out at night. Would definitely go again and have recommended the hotel to family and friends.
Manager Response: We're so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us! Thank you for taking the time to leave this great five-star review, and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: I and my family stayed at the Pasea hotel the past couple of nights. I’m writing you this email in regards to bad experience during my stay.  I had the pleasure to speak in regards to same matter with: Lesse - supervisor that claimed she never had a business card. I found this is interesting.  Mia - front desk representative  Lesse was raising her voice on me while talking. Who claimed that she has hearing aid when I asked her to lower her voice and to control her anger and hand signals. I said “I respect that but this doesn’t mean you raise your voice and talk aggressively and many hand signals that show anger.  Lesse did provide a 50% credit of the first night stay charge (for clarity - we still paid the parking and resort fee). When I asked her about a full night credit, she
Manager Response: Good Evening,  Thank you very much for this feedback. I do feel more follow up is needed regarding the opportunities you have mentioned. I will have my Hotel Director reach out to you shortly.

Summary: The hotel was absolutely amazing! I was there with a group of girlfriends for a business conference and the hotel plus the staff was great! The pool was beautiful and so much fun. Tanners - is DELICIOUS and a restaurant I would go back to in a heart beat!   The last day there - our flight didn’t take off till 6:00pm and room check out was at 11am. We didn’t know what to do so we decided to go to the beach and have our bags checked in with the front desk. Teresa at the front desk was absolutely wonderful! She let us use the beach chairs, beach towels and a couple umbrellas that the hotel provides. Even though we already checked out!! We spent the rest of our time at the beach. I have never had that great of service at a hotel. I can’t wait to go back!! If you see Teresa at the
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review, and for recognizing our team member Teresa! We're so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us, and were able to use our complimentary beach amenities during your stay. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: From the moment I walked in, I was treated like a VIP guest.  The front desk staff is amazing, and all the staff goes above and beyond.  But even that is surpassed by the gorgeous, romantic rooms and amazing grounds overlooking the ocean.  I was there on business, but want to return for a romantic weekend with my man.  5 stars is not enough.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great five-star review! We're so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us, and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: From the surfboard shaped key to the shower to the view this was by far one of my favorite hotels right across from the beach. They provided an umbrella, chair and towels when we walked to the beach (last minute decision to even go to the beach.) The hotel smelled good, was very clean and the services was phenomenal!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave this great review! We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, and were able to use our complimentary beach amenities during your stay. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Beautiful, but I got no sleep
Summary: The facility was gorgeous, wine included in resort fee, beach was super close, etc.However, the bar across from the pool plays loud music during the week, every night, until 11 pm. It made it very hard to sleep. Even with the white noise machine that was in the room, it still was loud and disrupted me.
Manager Response: Dear ChrisBlare,  Thank you for staying with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. As customer service is my passion, it saddens me to hear that we did not exceed expectations. We definitely work hard to maintain a high standard of service (including our noise levels) so I am very sorry that you did not have the experience that we strive to provide on a consistent basis. Please let me know when you plan on booking another stay with us so that we can make things right. We would love another opportunity to turn this around in the future.  Thank you,

Summary: From the moment we arrived we were greeted by Dave and then Peter who both loved my English Springer that was welcomed at the Pasea.  Jerry Garcia at the front desk was very helpful and provided some great information about the local dog beach and information about Tanners and other amenities Pasea offered to their guests.  The food, wine, cocktails, staff and the proximity to everywhere we planned to visit was perfect!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave this great review! We're so happy to hear that you and your pup enjoyed yourselves, and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Tanners has to be one of my favorite places to come to! If you’re looking for a place with good drinks, good music, and amazing bartenders this is the place to come to. Especially Ellan he makes the best drinks for you and will attend to you right away. It does get busy on the weekends, but he is so quick with getting the drinks out! The vibes and atmosphere are immaculate!  Thank you Ellan for always making my visits wonderful!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of Tanner's & Treehouse, and for taking the time to recognize our team member Ellan! We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Ellan is one of the only reasons I continue to return here!!! Up at the Treetop it can get crowded around the bar, he is extremely attentive makes a damn good margarita. Try their Violet of HB if you’re looking for something sweeter and picture worthy.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of Tanner's & Treehouse, and for taking the time to recognize our team member Ellan! We look forward to your next visit with an even better margarita next time.

Summary: Everything about this resort is great. Especially if you were one like we are is it like to stay up late and be entertained. The proximity to shops and other restaurants is excellent. You won’t starve, and you won’t be bored.  We use this at his hotel as a home base for our electric assist bicycle rides north and south. Great fun great accommodations. Clean, and professional. Excellent staff!
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words! We're happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and our nearby attractions in Surf City U SA. We look forward to welcoming back soon!

Summary Heading: Idyllic stay at this coastal paradise!
Summary: My daughter and I enjoy a summer beach getaway weekend each year and this was our first time staying at the Pasea Hotel.  There are so many terrific reviews for the hotel and staff and they are all correct!  The hotel itself is so modern and beautiful.  The lobby is so impressive and the rooms are really nice.  We did have a partial ocean view room and we really had a nice view of the coast from our balcony. The room was very quiet and the bed and pillows were crazy comfortable! We had breakfast at Tanner's, which was delicious and the patio overlooking the coast was amazing. The pool was incredible with great views, fine staff and very yummy food and drinks!   The hotel itself is a peaceful oasis with a wonderful and convenient location to the beach, wharf and downtown. But as
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave such a fantastic review of our hotel, and for recognizing our team members! We're so delighted to hear that you and your daughter enjoyed your stay with us, and we very much look forward to your next visit.

Summary: This hotel is like a destination instead of just a place to stay. We were greeted as if we were VIPs and the vibe was ‘ like so California’. I have already recommended The Pasea to my friends. Bravo!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words! We're happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us at our California coastal hotel, and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We had a great stay at the Pasea! We especially appreciated Barbra M. And the service she provided. She was extra attentive and really made sure our stay was special. She was very timely, kind and courteous.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave such a great review, and for recognizing one of our team members. We look forward to welcoming back to Paséa again soon!

Summary Heading: Henry is a bastion of knowledge in a godless world
Summary: I met my boy Henry at Tanners and I asked if he could make me a Quill and I will be good golly gosh Rodgered if this man didn't make me the most immaculate drink I've ever drank.  I was fully expecting him to add the absinthe like a savage, but I lacked the requisite motivation to make a fuss and.  Then, lo and behold, he actually did a rinse like a good and proper civilized person!  It was glorious.  From that point forward the door was opened and we had a lengthy conversation about not only our favorite cocktails but also the history behind them and the way they evolved over the ages.  I don't think I've been that genuinely interested in a conversation since before I got married.  I don't know and don't care about anyone or anything else who works there and I can't speak to
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of Tanner's & Treehouse, and for taking the time to recognize our team member Henry! We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We recently stayed at the Pasea Hotel and our stay could not have been better!  This is truly a 5-star hotel. The room was beautiful and comfortable. The staff were all friendly and helpful. In addition, our dog was able to stay with us!  I recommend Pasea without hesitation.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time here at Paséa, and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Poor service, subpar room, bad restaurant, and indifferent management
Summary: I planned a solo vacay for myself just for the weekend. I did some research ahead of time as I wanted the purpose to be to spoil myself. When I arrived to the room, the "ocean view" room I had paid for had a view of the neighboring hotel. It is until you go out on the balcony and curve your neck you can see the ocean. The phone in the room didn't work so if you want room service, good luck. Second, I waited 15 minutes at the hotel bar one of my two evenings without water or a menu before I left. I had much better service at Nardo, a neighboring restaurant - AMAZING btw! The pool was overcrowded and difficult to find a space and waiting for service took 45 min to get my order.  I did speak to a manager when I was asking for late checkout only to be met with attitude and
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your most recent stay. I am very sorry to read the stay was not up to par due to the view. I will pass this feedback to the appropriate leaders for follow up as the service you experienced is not indicative of our standards at the Pasea.

Summary Heading: Pasea is a beautiful hotel in the heart of Huntington Beach
Summary: The Pasea is a wonderful hotel with a fantastic location and stunning views. The room was extremely comfortable and the pool, restaurants and fitness center were also really good. Service at Tanners was a little slow but the food and staff were exceptional
Manager Response: none

Summary: Amazing  staff, modern, clean and also beautiful hotel .Lovely views from my room balcony. Fabulous valet parking service . All the staff members are polite and always with a big smile.  Super super soft towels at the pool , surprised at the good prices at the bar located there, the view of the dream beach five minutes to reach it on foot, the security of the area where the Hotel is located cannot be better, one of the most beautiful beaches in California .
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this amazing review. We're so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us, and look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary Heading: Great hotel and Tanner’s rooftop lounge never disappoints!
Summary: Pasea is an awesome hotel at pacific city in Huntington Beach. We love going to Tanner’s, their rooftop lounge, and Ellon is the best bartender! He is very friendly, prompt with his service and makes the best drinks. His espresso martini is a must try! We always make sure to check to see if he is working and get our drinks from him. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Hi Shannon, Thank you for the great review and for taking the time to recognize our team member. We're so happy to hear that your experiences at Tanner's & Treehouse have been enjoyable, and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: Really enjoyed my stay for my bachelorette party with friends and family. All of us girls enjoyed the pool and our hotel stay. The best part for me was the spa where I got a massage that was definitely needed after planning a wedding. Haley at the spa was such a help and made this spa visit a great day! Thank you Haley!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this great review, and for recognizing Haley at Aarna Spa. We're so happy to hear that you enjoyed our hotel & our amenities for your bachelorette party, and we hope to welcome you back again sometime soon!

Summary: I had a Swedish massage with Victor today and it was amazing! The spa facilities are very nice and all the staff super friendly. We came specifically for the spa (didn’t stay at the hotel itself) and definitely planning on coming back!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this great review of our Aarna Spa, and for recognizing our team member Victor. We're so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us, and hope to welcome you again sometime soon.

Summary: Hayden helped us down by the pool and his customer service was unmatched! Welcomed us as we walked in and helped us find a spot. Brought us towels/menus etc. continued to check on us throughout the day! He was extremely kind and welcoming. Would return to just say hey! It was great chatting with him and truly appreciated the excellent customer service. Thank you Hayden!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this great review, and for recognizing our team member Hayden. We're so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us at our Ninth Island Pool, and hope you can join us again sometime soon!

Summary: We had a great 2 night stay. Would definitely go back. Staff was friendly and very helpful. We asked for beach chairs and umbrellas and towels for the beach and were supplied for all 4 of us. The location of the hotel is next to a great shops and restaurants, The breakfast we had at Tanners in the hotel was fabulous and so was the service from our hostess and waitress.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this amazing review. We're so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us here on property, and were able to enjoy our complimentary beach amenities during your stay. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: The view from our room was amazing.  Awesome night life, food, drinks and pool area.  We decided this will be our annual girls trip destination. Would recommend to anyone coming into the Huntington Beach area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review! We are thrilled that you had a wonderful time and that we will be your destination of choice in the future the next time you come to Huntington Beach. Thank you again for staying with us and we look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary Heading: Great place to go for a drink!!!
Summary: Super cool place!!! Amazing view and really friendly people!! My bartender, Henry, was very knowledgeable. I don’t drink a lot so he asked me a few questions, then made me an amazing drink!!! I highly recommend and I will definitely be back next time that I’m in town!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to submit this review and for recognizing Henry! We are so appreciative of your comments about your experience and we are excited to welcome you back very soon.

Summary Heading: Tyler brings the  reception desk to life
Summary: I arrived super early in the morning to head to a work event, and my pre-check in experience was great. Gasper in the valet was so friendly and patient as I figured out what I did and didn’t need from my car. Tyler at check in was awesome- he was bright eyed and bushy tailed and his “happy to be here” attitude nearly made me forget I had been awake since 5am. Peter the baggage porter was an absolute sweetheart, and so incredibly helpful.  I had a really comfortable stay.  I love the pillows- many smaller pillows was much more comfortable than the standard 2 gigantic pillows you find in most hotels.  My only issue was that there is no way to get hot water for tea/coffee before 7am. I travel with a portable aeropress so I can make my coffee the way I like it early early in the
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of Pasea Hotel & Spa, and for taking the time to recognize our team member Tyler! We look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Gorgeous hotel with a wonderful team !
Summary: I can’t say enough about this hotel !  It’s gorgeous all around and just flawless !  The rooms are so perfectly set up for comfort.  The restaurants are fabulous !  But, the most important part was the staff.  They sure know how to make you feel welcome and comfortable and so accommodating.  My husband and I had a wonderful time staying there and we can’t wait to go back.  I give this hotel and the staff 5+++++++ Stars all the way !
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this amazing review and for recognizing our Paséa staff. We're so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: It’s a bad experience I’ve had in my life. The management is not straightforward..I paid $1200 a night for some wrong advertisement..I would never come back again. Got my bottle of expensive wine stolen at the front lobby and I asked the manager to check the camera to see who stole my wine and he didn’t do nothing
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a poolside room, with a wonderful view of the pool and courtyard, and ocean off to the left. Just lovely. We were concerned the noise might be a problem but the glass doors were so soundproof it was not a problem at all. I'm so glad because I loved the view and the pool was so pretty. The hotel is next to a shopping area with a bunch of restaurants so you never get bored with food choices! We ate at Cucina Alessa  on Main St which was delicious.  I loved this unique hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this great review. We're so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and our neighboring shopping center, Pacific City. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: My wife & I had a great time at Pasea. Room & facility were awesome. We had partial ocean view room and very happy with it. We had lunch at hotel restaurant and food was great. Also enjoy massage there. Clean & very friendly and helpful staffs.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this great review. We're so happy to hear that you enjoyed your room and facilities, including our restaurant Tanner's and our Aarna Spa. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: My stay was flawless. The room and service was excellent and staff was very helpful and accommodating with a great welcoming energy.     Would definitely recommend and definitely plan to come again soon.!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this great review. We're so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us, and look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel very soon.

Summary: My husband and I came to Pasea to enjoy some drinks and appetizers.  We sat at the bar top and was quickly greeted by Mathew the bartender. He was very social and we ordered a couple of the Cadillac Margaritas which were excellent. Then he recommended some appetizers which we chose the mozzarella cheese balls which were very yummy then had the burger. Mathew also recommended desert the chocolate soufflé omg it was delicious.  Thanks to Mathew our night was a success.  Would definitely recommend for anyone just to come and experience a night with Mathew..
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review and for taking the time to recognize Mathew. We are so thrilled to read that he made a positive impact on your visit. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary Heading: Pasea a must tanners even better
Summary: Views & vibes are incredible! My husband and I loved the pool and hotel restaurant but Tanner’s rooftop was by far the highlight of the trip. Our bartender Elon was so much fun & always showed us a good time ! 10/10 recommend this place and the entire shopping center around.
Manager Response: Hi Claire, Thank you so much for this great review and for taking the time to recognize our team member. We're happy to hear that you enjoyed your time both on property and at our neighboring shopping center Pacific City, and look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel very soon.

Summary: i stayed here for 3 days and love the view but my best experienced  was when i got greeted by ellan the treehouse bartender and he not only made the best drinks but was so attentive and made sure my night was memorable and enjoyable  thank you ellan !
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review and for taking the time to recognize our team member, Ellan. We are so happy that you enjoyed your staycation with us & your time at Treehouse, and look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: Being a local resident, my friends and I decided to do a stay-cation. We had an amazing stay but the best time at tanners treehouse. Ellan was attentive and made us feel so welcome. Would come back just for him and his cocktails!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review and for taking the time to recognize our team member, Ellan. We are so happy that you enjoyed your staycation with us & your time at Treehouse, and look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary Heading: The  best memories start with the Pasea Hotel !
Summary: Top notch. The Pasea Hotel & Spa is absolutely wonderful. My husband and I  have stayed here multiple times and it never disappoints. The hotel is beautiful, the people are super friendly, and Tanners Restaurant is the best. Plus, with the ocean right out the back door, the location can't be beat. You won't be disappointed. Just book it.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This Spa is absolutely next level! It is the most beautiful facility I have ever visited and the staff is top level! From my check in with Charissa to my check out with Maggie, it was an amazing experience. I am a local in Huntington Beach and my family sent me there for a much-needed Swedish massage and  de-stress  time. Charissa gave me a tour and made sure everything was already handled so I had nothing to think about or be concerned about during my massage. My masseuse (Mesio) made me feel very comfortable and worked out all my knots, relieving all my stress that let me let everything go. She’s a very skilled masseuse who can read where your body needs more pressure. She’s been in the business 14 years all at top end spas. When you purchase a service at the spa, you can come
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to submit your review and for all your positive comments about our spa. We also deeply appreciate you recognizing Charissa, Maggie and Mesio. We are so happy that you had a wonderful time and we look forward to welcoming you back to Aarna Spa very soon.

Summary: Awesome place! Great service, good food, nice staff very flexible! Balcony bar is fun!  Ocean view rooms recommended. Close to Los Angeles and other beaches.  Laguna Beach is close. The whole family enjoyed. We will be back here next time in California.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for this amazing review and for taking the time to submit your feedback. We are so happy to read that you had a great time while staying with us. Thank you for choosing Pasea Hotel & Spa and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: NOT SO PET FRIENDLY - STAFF LIED
Summary: We booked this stay because it was labeled pet friendly, close to the beach (which is not pet friendly, by the way), and looked like a fun place to stay.  However. shortly after arrival we were unable to be pool side with our pet, THEIR policy.  I asked if it was posted on their site, figuring I must have somehow missed it and they claimed it was posted on their site. However, when we went back and checked for that posting, we were unable to find it, therefore I requested a front desk staff help us find it and he could not find it.  So the trick is you can't leave your pet in the room unattended and you can't go with them to the pool side, I don't know about you but a large part of the reason I pick a place is something like using the pool!  So if I wanted to use the pool I'd
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Always a good time at the Pasea.
Summary: We have stayed at the Pasea since the beginning.  6 years now.   We have always been a fan of its location and the accessibility to nearby attractions.   David and staff are top notch.   David has remembered us from the beginning.  He always goes out of his way for us.  I recommend this hotel to all of the Central Valley people that are my customers.   The OC has so much more to offer than our heavily visited central coast.    😎
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your continued loyalty and for taking the time to recognize David! We deeply appreciate the positive feedback and that we remain your hotel of choice in the area. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon and thank you so much for your business.

Summary: While the hotel sits on a lovely parcel, the hotel in itself did not match up to the cost. We were a large family group (27 rooms) and had nothing but trouble with the service from the onset of signing our contract. I will not go into details, but in my vast experience of planning a trip with 60+ people, I have NEVER in 10 years had a resort tell me the things that this one did.   When we toured the property, they did not tell us that if you have a room overlooking the pool and facing the bar that the bar is actually a club and the music goes until Midnight, which is not a problem unless you have small children.   Dogs are allowed, fine. But, don't expect me to be happy if I am in the same vicinity as an attack dog.   Valet guys were a joke. Had no clue about anything. When we
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.  Sincerely,

Summary: Very nice hotel  Get to the pool early if you want a lounge chair  Great rooms and staff Pet friendly is a plus  The hotel dog park needs to be attended to more often Some guests don’t clean up after their pet.  Great location  Convenient to beach, shops and restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review and for taking the time to give us your feedback. We are so thrilled to read that you had an amazing visit, and we have shared your comments about the dog park with our housekeeping team. Thank you again for staying with us and we look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: It was a very nice checkin process. No hassles. Very relaxing place to be. They have an amazing amenities that allows you to take a break and unwind. The view is breathtaking. The bellman that helped us was very experienced and knowledgeable. He helped us with luggage, helped us to check every part of the room to make sure we didn’t leave anything, he called the valet to make sure we can easily get our cars out. I have to say he went above and beyond what is expected of him. I’m usually good with names but I definitely did not get his name.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review and for taking the time to recognize the bellman who assisted you. We are so happy that he made your visit extra special and that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon and thank you for choosing Pasea Hotel & Spa.

Summary: Great location, modern layout, nice size room. Good service. They allow dogs in the hotel, but all common areas are kept super clean. Pool with view of the ocean, spacious fitness room. Main drawback was some rowdy loud customers  in the hallway late evenings ( or more accurately early mornings)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this great review and for taking the time to submit your feedback. We are so thrilled to read that you had a great time,  but apologize that you were disturbed by other guests in the hallway. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future! Thank you for choosing Pasea Hotel & Spa.

Summary: Such an awesome Hotel. I went there to spend my birhtday weekend and the Room was amazing with a Fantastic View of the Ocean. The Staff was top notch and the Food was great at Tanner's restaurant but most importantly for us was the fact that they catered to our two Furry pups! they got beds, treats, toys and cool bowls :) We will definitely come back!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review and Happy Birthday! We are so thrilled that you spent your birthday weekend with us and that you had a wonderful time. We look forward to your return as well as your pups! Thank you for choosing Pasea Hotel & Spa.

Summary Heading: Not a Family hotel, Room descriptions are deliberately misleading
Summary: We tried two different rooms before we decided to eat the cost and just leave. The wild variety of “ocean view” descriptors are wildly and deliberately misleading. Wildly overpriced for the quality of the rooms and the size of the pool, especially when there are so many other, better ocean front options.   Would NOT recommend to families traveling with children. We felt unsafe with the party crowd at the pool.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to submit your feedback of your recent visit. We apologize that we were not able to meet your expectations and that you had a negative experience with us. We certainly do not wish for any of our guests to feel unsafe. If you would like to provide any further feedback, please feel free to reach out to Zach Kerns, our Director of Operations at zkerns@paseahotel.com. Again, our deepest apologies for your experience and we hope to be able to be of service again in the future.

Summary Heading: Nice location, great service, not terribly family friendly
Summary: Good place, good location, not terribly family friendly. We were there on a holiday weekend, and this hotel caters very much to people out to party hard. We were lucky that our kids had their headphones on when our neighbors decided to have some “adult fun” — Multiple times.   Also, there was an interesting degree of security at the pool. They were consistently checking for “knives and contraband” for folks going into the pool area.   Other than that, it was fun. Good service, great beach rentals, such as umbrellas, chairs, towels, (except the bikes - they only had one functioning bike for kids).
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to submit your review of your recent stay and for choosing us for your holiday vacation. We appreciate your kind comments and that you had a good time. We do apologize that some things did not meet your expectations. Thank you for choosing Pasea Hotel & Spa, and we hope to welcome you back in the future.

Summary Heading: Great hotel but know before you go
Summary: The hotel is beautiful and the rooms were well appointed. The only criticism I have is the small $750 cabanas & $350 lounge chairs. They don’t have a great deal of “free” lounge chairs around the pool so with these pay lounge chairs and cabanas open the pool looks less full. At the high price, the cabanas were empty on our entire stay. It seems like a list revenue for the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to submit your review and for your feedback. We are thrilled that you had a great time with us, but apologize for the experience at the pool. We are on the verge of receiving new furniture for our pool deck which will also add more seating as well. We hope that we can be of service again in the future if you return to Huntington Beach. Thank you for choosing Pasea Hotel & Spa.

Summary: Loved the property and staff.  Excellent customer service.  Tanners bar and restaurant were excellent.  One of the best Bloody Mary’s I have ever had.  Beautiful hotel!  Definitely coming back and highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review and for taking the time to provide your feedback. We are so thrilled that you had a wonderful time and appreciate the recommendation. We look forward to seeing you back very soon.

Summary: We stayed overnight at Pasea Hotel & Spa to attend a wedding on June 24, 2022. Everything from the hotel staff to the room to the wedding and event the next day was PERFECT!! Can’t say enough about the venue, not to mention the delicious food! And the Spa is so nice—huge thanks to Ann for the wonderful Swedish massage the next day. Pasea Hotel definitely set the bar for overall hotel experiences, and we’ve been to a lot of hotels!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review and for taking the time to recognize Ann in the spa! We are so thrilled to read that you had an amazing experience at Pasea and that you enjoyed the wedding you attended. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to being of service again in the future.

Summary: We had a great time at Tanner's Treehouse! We had a private work event and everything was fantastic. The food and drinks were amazing. We've had meeting in the hotel, and have had employees stay overnight - no complaints! The Pasea is our new favorite spot and we can't wait to come back!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review and for hosting your event with us! We are so happy to read that everything exceeded your expectations and that everyone had a great time. We look forward to seeing you back very soon and thank you for choosing Pasea Hotel & Spa.

Summary: My wife and I stay here whenever we're looking for a staycation at the beach.  Always friendly, always clean and being able to walk to restaurants and shopping in just a few minutes is a big plus!  Special shout out to Dave the bellman, who was super knowledgeable and always friendly, anytime we were in the lobby.  Thanks, Pasea!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for returning to Pasea and for your amazing review of your visit. Thank you also for taking the time to recognize David for his service. We look forward to seeing you back very soon and thank you again for choosing Pasea Hotel & Spa.

Summary: This hotel is beautiful and high-end. The staff are very helpful and kind, and the overall service is great. Although it is pricey, the location is ideal. You can cross the street and be on the gorgeous beach, or walk right out the hotel door into a chic outdoor mall. There are so many food options in the area, making it so convenient. We really enjoyed the stay. The pool, hot tub, and outdoor area is very well maintained, and as stated the location is worth it.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review and for taking the time to give us your feedback. We are so thrilled to read that you had a wonderful time and that we exceeded your expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: Our stay was perfect and having the treetop lounge right across the pool is such a plus. Our bartender Ellan was super nice and helpful throughout the night! Looking for a place in HB? This is your sign! Rooms are perfect and it’s less than a 5 min walk to the water.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review and for taking the time to recognize Ellan for his service! We are so excited that you had a wonderful time with us. Thank you for choosing Pasea Hotel & Spa and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: We had so much fun at the pool! Cameron was our server for 3 days in a row and he was amazing!! He deserves everything! Completely professional and very good at his job! He had the best dinner suggestions and helped us out-of-towners figure out what to do for dinner and drinks! We will miss him when we leave!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review and for taking the time to recognize Cameron for his service! We are so thrilled to read that he made your stay extra special. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future the next time you visit Huntington Beach! Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: Cameron was the best!!! We all had so much fun by the pool with him and he was a great server! He helped us each day we were here and always was at our service! He helped us pick fun drinks and appetizers too!! Loved him!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review and for taking the time to recognize Cameron for his service! We are so thrilled that he was able to make your stay more enjoyable. We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in Huntington Beach and thank you again for choosing Pasea Hotel & Spa.

Summary: Beautiful well maintained facility with outstanding employees! Great location and terrific atmosphere. Rooms are cleaned and maintained to the highest standard which is evident if you spend time by the pool. Great pool area as well.  Well trained staff is on top of their game   We will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this incredible review of your recent visit with us and for taking the time to recognize our amazing team members for their service. We are so happy that you had an amazing time at Pasea and we look forward to seeing you back very soon.

Summary: Ellan was awesome! Best bartender! Made my experience special. :) The drinks were amazing and the atmosphere was great! I will definitely be back. Thank you Ellan for making my experience one to remember!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback about your recent stay at Pasea and for taking the time to recognize Ellan! We are so happy that Ellan was able to make your experience with us extra special and we look forward to being of service again in the future the next time you are in the Huntington Beach area! Thank you for choosing Pasea Hotel & Spa.

Summary: Room were very clean and staff was very accomodating. Hotel grounds well kept. Bicycles available, short ride to pier and downtown. Bars close at 10. Treehouse rooftop bar open till 11. Plenty of options for food and entertainment within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review and for taking the time to submit your feedback! We are so happy to read that you enjoyed your visit to Pasea and that we exceeded your expectations. We look forward to seeing you back very soon. Thank you for choosing Pasea Hotel & Spa.

Summary: Weekends are noisy with bumping music and big wedding events. Not a chill beach vibe, more like Vegas. Newer hotel with nice rooms but definitely a party atmosphere. Just be warned in case you are staying over a weekend
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback on your recent visit. We apologize that you were disturbed by the noise from the event that took place during your stay. We are currently exploring options for technology in the rooms to better mask sound from outside so that our guests are able to fully relax and enjoy their stay. We hope to welcome you back in the future and we appreciate your positive comments about our guestrooms. Again, our apologies for the disturbance and look forward to seeing you again in the future if you are in the Huntington Beach area.

Summary Heading: Watch out! This hotel sells an ocean view and doesn't provide it
Summary: What a terribly disappointing start to the week vacation. I bought the Ocean View King studio for the week. On arrival we got the parking lot view. My first compliant at the front desk was received with the statement that I must have got the other side of the building, which is obvious, but didn’t help me. The manager at the front desk received my complaint but could only offer a 2nd floor pool view which was not right. I find the business practice of the hotel to be deceitful in getting a customer to pay a rate for a view that they do not provide. If I sold a customer a different product to what they paid for in my business it would be termed fraud. Even after raising my logical complain I still have to pay for an Ocean view.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. We do our best to accommodate all room/view requests but are not always able to do so.

Summary: I stayed at Pasea last weekend for a girls weekend and we absolutely loved it! We got food and drinks at Treehouse which we loved! Ellan G. was our server/bartender and was the best. He made sure our group had the best service and the drinks were phenomenal. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Pasea Hotel & Spa for your girls weekend and for taking the time to submit this amazing review. We were also so thrilled to read about your experience with Ellan and we thank you for recognizing him for his service. We look forward to seeing you all back very soon and thank you for choosing Pasea Hotel & Spa.

Summary: This is one of my favourite places to stay when I’m on my business trip. I wish I can stay there all the time. I love the food and the bar. I love to stay in the bar and Ellan the bartender is very friendly, and overall he amazingly gives us outstanding customer service and of course, he makes us bomb drinks.  I can't wait to come back here.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for this amazing review and for your continued loyalty to Pasea! We are honored to be your destination of choice when you are in the area for business or fun and we also thank you for recognizing Ellan at Treehouse for his service. We are so excited to welcome you back very soon and thank you for choosing Pasea Hotel & Spa.

Summary: The expensive rooms face the pool and pick up the sound of a very loud nearby club.  The music was unbearably loud and didn't stop til 2 am.I was not forewarned of the loud music so I listened to the vibrating base all night.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to submit your feedback from your recent visit. We apologize that you were disturbed by the noise from the club next to the hotel. We will certainly share this feedback with our team members to ensure that we are communicating about noise disruption in order to perhaps provide an alternate room option. Again, our apologies for the disturbance and we hope to be of service again in the future.

Summary: We had such an amazing stay and Ellan at treehouse bar was really awesome 👌. This hotel has such a beautiful view of the ocean at sunset and the service really capped off a great experience for everyone.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for this amazing review and for taking the time to recognize Ellan for his service! We are so happy to read that you had a wonderful time and we hope to see you very soon back at Pasea Hotel & Spa.

Summary: I stopped by for a couple of drinks with my girlfriends at Treehouse Rooftop Bar in Huntington and was served by our bartender, Ellan. Not only were the views beautiful but Ellan made our experience amazing as well! He gave great recommendations on drinks and gave exceptional service. He recommended the cucumber delight. It was very refreshing! I would definitely go back to this bar but if you do go, make sure you ask for Ellan. He’s the best!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to submit this wonderful review and for recognizing Ellan for his service! We are thrilled that you had an amazing experience and look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: Ellan is an amazing bartender who wants everyone to have the best time! He took care of our huge group so fast and had time to have fun and make us laugh! We can't wait to go back! Thanks for everything Ellan!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to submit this amazing review and for recognizing Ellan. We are so thrilled that you had an wonderful experience and we look forward to seeing you back very soon.

Summary: I’ve stayed here 3x and loved everything about it. I love the location, the front desk staff; the cup of wine upon arrival and the comp bottle of wine in the room. There are also beach cruisers guests can borrow for no extra charge. Location is great. There is a small outdoor mall next door and Main Street in walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review and for your continued loyalty to Pasea Hotel. We are thrilled that you once again had a great experience with us and we appreciate you recognizing our team members for their service. We look forward to welcoming you back for your 4th visit in the near future.

Summary: I was at the pool for most of the day on Sunday Memorial Day weekend. My server, Cameron, was amazing!! Give him a bonus! He as attentive and quick and had perfect timing. He came by enough but not too much. Best experience I’ve had at a pool. It really was the highlight of my weekend.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to submit this review and for recognizing Cameron for his amazing service. We are thrilled that you had an amazing holiday weekend with us and we look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Huntington Beach area.

Summary: Aesthetics are 10/10! You get a view of the ocean and the decor is so hip.   Food is also 10/10  Drinks are strong thanks to Ellan our amazing bartender! He’s seriously the best—so personable and attentive! Definitely ask for him when you go!  Overall, I’ll be back each week and so should you!
Manager Response: Thank you so much Nancy for this amazing review of your experience at Pasea Hotel and Treehouse! We are so thrilled that you had a wonderful time and we also appreciate you taking the time to recognize Ellan for his service. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: We had a wonderful time at this resort like hotel!  It was beautiful, clean and all the staff were so warm, friendly and welcoming!  We will visit again!  The only thing I might change:  We had an ocean view room which was across from the Treehouse Restaurant where there was a lot of music and partying.  Luckily we are heavy sleepers but it was hard to get my 3yo to sleep.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to submit your review about your recent visit! We are so happy to read that you had an amazing time with us and next time we will be happy to assign you to a room perhaps on the other side of the building so that you can all sleep soundly. Thank you again so much for choosing Pasea Hotel and we look forward to seeing you very soon.

Summary Heading: Hotel Stay - Not really worth the money
Summary: - The curtains were worn off in your Ocean Front View hotel room - When we mentioned it to the staff they didn't really do anything about that other than saying sorry and that they will take care of it once we checkout  - The swimming pool was not getting cleaned properly considering people were having food and drinks near it and spilling them in the pool. - The AARNA SPA was really good and that's something we surely would recommend
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to give us your detailed feedback from your experience with us. We regret that we did not meet your expectations in all areas and that we were not more accommodating in addressing your concerns while on property. We are thrilled that you had an amazing experience at our spa. Regarding the curtains in your room, we are in the process of changing these out in all the guestrooms. We hope to welcome you back in the future, and we again thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback.

Summary: This hotel was great. The front desk agents were fantastic and very accommodating. Mia is awesome, she communicated really well with me during my stay and even helped me extend my stay one more night when the hotel was sold out!! She is the best. Can't wait to come back and see the staff and stay at the best hotel in Huntington Beach.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review and for taking the time to recognize Mia for her service! We were so thrilled to read that you had a wonderful experience with us and that Mia was able to make it an even more memorable visit. Thank you for staying with us at Pasea Hotel & Spa and we look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: Nice hotel but seems overpriced for what it is. Rooms are fine but nothing special. With $45 parking charge and a resort fee tacked-on, the property just isn’t nice enough to charge those high levels of prices. The ocean view is nice but certainly not pristine with an RV camp ground directly in front of the hotel and oil derricks in the distance. The staff is pleasant and helpful, especially the bell staff but housekeeping was dismal. The first day our room wasn’t made up, even after requesting it twice and they skipped us the second day too. I finally had to call late in the afternoon on our second day to request it be made up and have coffee and water replenished. Annoying for a property charging $500+ per night. Conveniently located adjacent to Pacific City which is a plus
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to provide this very detailed feedback of your visit to Pasea Hotel & Spa. We regret to read that we did not meet all of your expectations during your visit and apologize for the areas in which we fell short. We do appreciate you taking the time to recognize our amazing team members as well for their service. If you would like to discuss further with us, please feel free to reach out to Zach Kerns our Director of Operations at zkerns@paseahotel.com. Thank you again for staying with us at Pasea Hotel and we look forward to being of service again in the future if your travels bring you back to the Huntington Beach area.

Summary: Tanners is my local favorite bar.  Amazing views, beautiful esthetics and superior service. My favorite bartender is Elon who works most Friday and Saturday nights. I’m picky with my drinks and he always handcrafts works of art that look and taste delicious. Highly recommend this bar and their service.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review and for taking the time to recognize Elon! We are so thrilled that you had an amazing experience with us and that Elon continues to exceed your expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future the next time you are in the Huntington Beach area.

Summary: This visit was phenomenal. I was serviced by Theresa and she was amazing. Incredibly sweet to us and we had a lovely conversation. She always checked on us to see how we were doing and I felt so loved and appreciated. Will for sure be coming back.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review and for taking the time to recognize Theresa for her service! We are thrilled that you had an amazing stay with us and that you will be returning in the future. Thank you again for choosing Pasea Hotel & Spa and we look forward to your return.

Summary: Beautiful hotel that is walking distance to the beach. I'd say my only complaint is the cleanliness of the carpet and curtains. We found stains on both, but besides that, every thing else was satisfactory. This is our second time staying here and would definitely come back
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to provide your feedback about your recent visit to Pasea Hotel. We appreciate your continued loyalty to the property and we apologize for the cleanliness issues in your room during this visit. We will certainly address those concerns. Thank you again for staying with us and we look forward to your return.

Summary: We enjoy the rooms and the pool area here.  They need more lounge chairs and to offer room service later than 10pm...  But it is a great location and nice hotel.  The also provide 2 waters and a bottle of wine.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to submit your feedback of your recent visit to Pasea. We are thrilled that you had an amazing time and appreciate your feedback regarding our room service hours as well as seating at the pool. We continue to strive to meet all of our guests expectations and to offer a wonderful experience. Thank you again for staying with us and we look forward to being of service again in the future.

Summary Heading: The best hotel on Huntington Beach!
Summary: Check in was a breeze! Also I was offered an upgrade on a higher floor with a better view for a great price! Got to the room it was absolutely gorgeous. There was a Complementary bottle of wine and slippers. The shower was see through with a privacy door as an option with a view of the ocean! The balcony was a great size with two chairs and a small table. There was plenty of Square footage and space in the hotel room, even with two queen beds and a nice sitting chair near the balcony. There was a very large TV and a large Dedicated workspace area as well. There was a full-sized mirror. the bathroom area had its own door. The front desk was very responsive as well as the valet and the staff in the hotel we’re ready to help at anytime generously. The restaurant downstairs had
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review of your recent visit to Pasea! We are so happy to read that you had an amazing time with us and that we will be your hotel of choice the next time you are in the Huntington Beach area! We appreciate all of your wonderful comments and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary Heading: This place is NOT for the middle class
Summary: Just way too expensive at every turn.  45 a day to park, what's the point of a resort fee?  Breakfast was 50 bucks for 2 sandwiches (think egg McMuffin at best) and 2 coffee's.  Its clean, it smells good, but stand by for when they start to charge you for air.....
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to submit your review from your recent visit to Pasea. We sincerely apologize that we did not meet your expectations during this visit to our hotel. We strive to offer a wonderful experience to all of our guests and it seems that during this stay with us we did not deliver. We hope to earn back your trust in our hotel and to be of service again in the future.

Summary: The hotel is lovely but when I arrived after experiencing car trouble on the way, I was stressed. While checking me in, Mia assisted me in finding what I needed for repairs in the area. Above and beyond!  And then I was able to relax and enjoy my stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking time to write this amazing review and for recognizing Mia for her service! We deeply appreciate it when our team members are recognized and we are thrilled that you had a great experience with us. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: My experience was top notch thanks to Mia. She was so helpful and recommended so many good places to eat in the area!! We also loved the view in our room! I can't wait to come back to paradise and relax.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review and for recognizing Mia for her service! We are so happy to read that you had an amazing time with us and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future the next time you are in the Huntington Beach area.

Summary: Room needs to be better inspected for a five start hotel. Robe had a hole, broken light switch, dirty pillow on arrival, old pealing soap dish. The hotel itself is very nice. People are friendly, but I would expect more from a five star hotel. Great location. I’m curious how the other hotels nearby compare.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to submit your review of your recent visit to Pasea. We greatly appreciate the feedback and apologize for these areas you mentioned where we did not meet your expectations. We are currently in the process of changing out all of those dishes and amenity trays in all the guestrooms. We also appreciate you recognizing our amazing team members for their service. Thank you again for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa and we look forward to being of service in the future.

Summary: What a gorgeous place to stay. The hotel accommodations are impecable, the employees are so polite! The restaurant/bar also really good! But nothing can beat the view! I will be back to enjoy this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to submit this amazing review of your recent visit at Pasea! We appreciate your feedback and for recognizing our amazing team members. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: A truly superb hotel with a modern, vibrant buzz. Cannot fault anything about it. Any issues were quickly resolved. Will definitely go back. Best place to stay in Huntington Beach. Excellent food, brilliant staff. We had a room issue so they simply moved us to an even better room with no fuss. We had a brilliant 2 week vacation thanks to all the staff.
Manager Response: Thank you Keith so much for this amazing review of your stay at Pasea! We deeply appreciate the feedback along with the kind remarks about our amazing team members. We are thrilled we were able to offer a wonderful experience during your time with us and we look forward to being of service in the future.

Summary Heading: Not recommended for a family stay.
Summary: The room was very dirty and dusty and uncomfortable to stay in. The toilet leaked so there was a constant puddle around the toilet that we had to keep wiping up. The loud music from the event they had kept us up until after 1:00am. It was far from an enjoyable experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to submit this review about your experience. We apologize for the issues you described in your guestroom as that could have been resolved prior to you arriving in the room. We regret that you did not have a great experience with us during this visit and certainly hope to have the opportunity in the future to earn back your trust. Thank you again for staying with us and we hope to be of service again if you are in the Huntington Beach area.

Summary: Awesome Location!    Friendly staff, nice Bar and restaurant.  Easy access to beach.  Beach chairs and umbrellas for guests.  Found this to be a perfect spot in Huntington Beach.  We will return for a longer stay.  Also had bikes.  Easy walk to shopping.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to submit your review of your stay at Pasea! We appreciate your feedback and were thrilled to read that you had an amazing time. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: Staff was friendly, room was great.  Super nice to be able to walk across street and be @ beach. Restaurant open, room service available, cute little store in lobby..   Water & a bottle of wine in room upon arrival.  Next time will check out the spa
Manager Response: andreakN1126TH Thank you so much for this amazing review of your recent stay! We were thrilled to read you had a great time at Pasea. We look forward to seeing you in our spa upon your return.

Summary Heading: Best Bartender in OC. Treetop @ Tanners Pasea HB
Summary: Ellan has all the right moves & mixes for one of the best social experiences I always have at Tanners Treetop.  He’s always there to greet with a smile & hand shake, he seems to always know exactly what to make me and it’s perfect every single time. Not only does he make amazing craft cocktails in a FLASH, but he also helps to find the perfect 🤩 spot to sit either for a business meetup or an intimate sunset beach view for 2.  I call this place my backyard treehouse. My fave in HB!  Anisia
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review and for recognizing that we have the best bartender in OC! We appreciate you taking the time to recognize Ellan and all his hard work and expertise. We look forward to welcoming you back to Pasea and Treehouse in the future!

Summary Heading: Good location, dirty room, poor upgrade
Summary: The location is great. Tanners food is terrible and the service at the pool is almost non existent. We paid for an upgrade upon checkin from a partial ocean view to ocean view. They put us on the lowest floor in the back corner looking at a dirty rooftop full of cigarette buds and loud music from the concert at pupchella. I really wanted to love this hotel but I would much prefer the hyatt or kimpton. I have included a photo after we picked up the cigarette buds that were within reach.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa and for taking the time to provide this critical feedback about your experience. We deeply apologize that we did not meet your expectations on this visit and would love an opportunity to have you  back again as our guest. These issues you encountered could have all been avoided and we have shared this feedback with our team. Again, we apologize for the experience and hope to be of service again in the future.

Summary: This hotel had everything I was looking for. Our drinks and food were amazing.  Ellan was very attentive, answered all my questions and the drinks were definitely on point!! I enjoyed my stay at Pasea hotel!!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for submitting this amazing review and for recognizing Ellan! We were so happy to read that he made your stay more enjoyable and that you had an amazing experience with us. Thank you so much for staying at Pasea and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: My friends and I went to Treehouse for drinks and appetizers and were so lucky to be served by Ellan. He is so kind and attentive, not to mention the drinks he made were fantastic. Every time I visit I will be requesting Ellan. He is the best!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review of your experience at Pasea and for taking the time to recognize Ellan! We were so thrilled to read that you had a wonderful time with us and that Ellan made you feel welcome and taken care of. We look forward to seeing you in the future so that we may provide another fantastic experience.

Summary: We lucked out with absolutely amazing weather! We last minute decided we should enjoy the pool on our last day & we stayed for 5 hours! Our server/bar tender Johnny went above & beyond. He made our stay so special. Thank you so much Johnny!! I felt like a princess. Pool side service. Bringing us our food. Checking on us if we needed refills or anything at all. For once as mom and dad we truly relaxed, made new friends and didn’t want to leave!!  If we do come to stay in Huntington again, it won’t be anywhere but here! And I would love to bring my babies after seeing how kid friendly it was and how sweet the staff was.   Thank you for a beautiful stay Pasea. I hope to be back soon!!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for this fantastic review and for taking the time to recognize Johhny! We were so thrilled to read that you had an amazing time with us and that Johnny made such a huge impact during your visit. We look forward to welcoming you back if you do return to Huntington Beach in the future. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Amazing hotel right in the heart of Huntington Beach!!!
Summary: Great location, great accommodations- the smell of the lobby- amazing. Would stay here every time we visit this area. Friendly staff, the food was fabulous and the location was superb! Can walk to everything.
