Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review of your recent visit to Pasea! We appreciate you taking the time to submit your feedback and for recognizing our amazing team members. We look forward to welcoming you the next time you are in Huntington Beach. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: This is our 3rd time staying at the this great resort!  All the staff are very friendly. check in was easy. the room was super clean. the view is amazing. the beautiful pool is salt water. Hacving bikes at the property is a big bonus!  We will definitely return!
Manager Response: jeff r Thank you so much for this amazing review of your experience with Pasea! We appreciate you taking the time to submit your feedback and we look forward to seeing you in the future!

Summary: Love having this pet friendly hotel for a weekend getaway.  My pooch and I had a blast and everyone was very accommodating even though he is a bigger sized dog!  We'll definitely be doing this again next year, if not sooner.
Manager Response: traycef2022 Thank you so much for this amazing review of your recent visit. We are thrilled that you and your pooch enjoyed our event as well! We look forward to having you back again soon and thank you for choosing Pasea Hotel & Spa.

Summary: Elevators broke at Sunday 2:30am . Had to wait 30 mins for security to escort me to “hidden” staircase to finally get to room. Next morning elevators still broke - had to walk down 8 floors with suitcases and duffel bags. Girl with glasses working the front desk at 2:30am on Sunday was by far the worst hotel employee I have ever come across and I’ve stayed at hundreds of hotels. I’m loyal to pasea - every time in in SoCal I always stay here. It was probably my 6th or 7th time here and it will be my last.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to submit your review of your recent visit. We apologize for the elevators not working, but even more so for the behavior of our team member that you encountered who did not provide any empathy or assistance. We greatly appreciate your prior communication with us on this matter and for your loyalty to Pasea and hope we can be of service again in the future.

Summary: I stay at this beautiful resort for both business and personal trips 4-6 times every year since they opened. Great location, excellent service and good vibes all round. This review is specific to a staff who went above and beyond to help me out of a bind. I had my pet Frenchie on this trip. I had coordinated with a pet sitter to take care of my pet while I was at work. Unfortunately the pet sitter was a no show and could not be contacted. I was scrambling to find at back up at 7am in the morning and it was impossible. I asked a staff for help and he went above and beyond to take care of my pet while I was at work. I am very grateful to Peter Hoyt for his care of my pet, allowing me to get to work with peace of mind that my pet was in good hands. Great service with a smile!
Manager Response: I8127KLalanI Thank you for this amazing review of your recent visit and for recognizing Peter! We are so proud to have him on our team and thrilled that he was able to make a strong impact during your visit by helping with your Frenchie! Thank you for your continued loyalty to Pasea and we look forward to being of service the next time you are in the area.

Summary: The Pasea Hotel and Spa in Huntington Beach is simply the best place for to enjoy everything the area has to offer. Right across PCH from the beach and in the heart of everything downtown. Pet friendly, our dog was spoiled with kindness by everyone there. Samantha and everyone at the front desk and throughout the property are outstanding and make you feel like family. Just outstanding and so highly recommended for your beach getaway.
Manager Response: 728darinm Thank you for taking the time to submit this review of your recent visit and for recognizing Samantha. We are so happy that you had an amazing time and thank you for choosing Pasea Hotel & Spa. We look forward to your return in the future.

Summary: Kudos to Rose Moglianesi for ALL her help! She went out of her way to make sure my stay was seamless. Prompt when replying to my email request and a true pleasure to work with. When booking a room in the future, I would be happy to be able to work with her again .   Thanks, Rose!!
Manager Response: aubreed Thank you for this 5-Star review and for taking the time to recognize Rose in our reservations department! We greatly appreciate it when our team members are mentioned that make positive impacts to the guest experience. We look forward to seeing you back at Pasea in the future!

Summary: Classic “ bait and switch “ … if you’re going for resort amenities .. pool , outdoor bar and spa , it’s mediocre. A king room for 700 a night , not oceanfront , not on holiday was absurd . Rooms were small , outdated , no plush amenities, soft uncomfortable bed and pillows . No nice bedding / comforters , towels or bath and body products . 2 star hotel accommodations. Highly disappointed .. 45.00 a night extra for parking 🤦‍♀️
Manager Response: GlobeTrotting297003 Thank you for submitting your review and for providing your feedback. We apologize that our property did not meet your expectations. We certainly would value a future dialogue on this matter if you would like to provide us further feedback. Please feel free to reach out to our Director of Operations, Zach Kerns at zkerns@paseahote.com, if we may assist with anything further. We certainly hope to be of service again in the future and earn back your trust. Thank you for visiting Pasea and we again apologize that your visit was not satisfactory.

Summary: Beautiful location. Very pricey but enjoyable. This was a 2 day getaway and we relaxed at the pool/jacuzzi after enjoying our brunch from Tanner’s restaurant.  The poolside service was very attentive and made sure we had our beverages quickly.
Manager Response: SelinaRae Thank you very much for taking the time to submit this review of your visit! We are thrilled that you enjoyed yourself and look forward to being of service again in the future if you are in the Huntington Beach area.

Summary Heading: Beautiful resort but some issues during our stay made it less enjoyable.
Summary: Several issues with billing made our stay difficult and unpleasant.  Everything got sorted eventually but the experience was ruined by the issues.  Also the bed was not very comfortable.  Beautiful views and a nice room.  Tanners food was ok but not great.  Spa also had some issues with no hot water in the shower as well as cold sauna rooms.
Manager Response: @tonyv425 Thank you for taking the time to submit this review and provide this critical feedback to us. We are sharing this with all corresponding teams here on property so that we can make improvements and address any maintenance concerns related to the spa. We hope we can be of service again in the future and provide a more pleasant experience. If there is anything further we may do to assist, please feel free to reach out to our Director of Guest Services, Eddy Daniel at ediyani.daniel@paseahotel.com  Thank you again for staying with us, and we apologize for the issues you encountered during your visit.

Summary: We stayed here with our teenagers and found the hotel was dated and showed a lot of wear and tear. For the price I regret that I did not take friends advice and book an airbnb for my family. The description of the room we booked said "ocean view" but it really was more of a pool view with a slight side ocean view. We received housekeeping on 1 day of our 3 day trip and even that day I'm not sure how well they cleaned. There was a streak of something in the bathroom when we arrived and it remained there the entire trip (picture attached). We were disappointed in the quality of the hotel room for the cost of this hotel and they do not include your overnight parking in the fee. That is an additional $45 per night. The location was the only redeeming feature as it was right across
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us this detailed feedback of your visit. We apologize that we did not meet your expectations  in several areas. Our housekeeping service is in fact still limited at this time, but we again apologize that we were not able to provide service every day. We hope you may consider us again in the future if you return to the Huntington Beach area. Thank you again for your visit and we hope to be of service again.

Summary: The hotel was beautiful and great location. The bikes were fun to ride but need updated. The pull out sofa mattress was horrible. Took three duvet covers and mattress cover to make it feel decent. Not worth the upgraded room. View and location to beach is great! If you are by the rooftop bar the music gets loud at night. The staff was not good in the kitchen, cocktail bar and tanners. We are over the covid excuse. Fish was terrible and service not good. We decided to eat off property. At the pool nobody could sit front row with cushions because they wanted more money. Silly because no pool servers to take drinks. You order food at bar and comes to go boxes.   They need new head of kitchen and staff immediately to keep up. Funny rate has not changed but staffing has.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to write this review and for giving us detailed feedback. We pride ourselves on providing excellent service, but it seems in this case we fell short in several areas. We apologize that we were not able to meet your expectations during your spring break visit and we have shared your comments with our team so that we may learn from this and continue to grow and improve our service. If there is anything else we may assist with or further feedback you would like to provide, please feel free to reach out to our Director of Operations, Zach Kerns at zkerns@paseahotel.com. Thank you again for staying with us and we hope to be of service again in the future if you return to the area.

Summary: Great location , very friendly staff and great restaurants nearby.  We enjoyed walking , checking stores nearby  807 lot shops.  Blends coffee Shop has excellent choice of coffee menu and pastries. We definitely will stay here again. Thanks hotel manager for changing our room to ocean view - great accommodating staff service.
Manager Response: @Nick D Thank you very much for taking the time to send this review. We are thrilled to see you had an amazing time and appreciate you recognizing our team. We look forward to seeing you again in the future and thank you for choosing Pasea Hotel & Spa.

Summary Heading: Gorgeous hotel! gorgeous beaches! gorgeous weather!!
Summary: The staff was perfect, their greetings were just what we needs after our long flight. They really made me feel like a part of their team:) Our view was stunning and I'll 100% be staying here in the future!
Manager Response: 625mickys Thank you so much for this amazing review of your recent stay. We are so thrilled to read about our team members making a positive impact during your visit. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future the next time you are in the area.

Summary: My experience was amazing. I love everything about their interior and decor so much. It was my birthday weekend. My room was a corner suite ocean front with pool and restaurant view on the side. So modern and organized well. The restaurant cooked my meal just right everything I ordered was delicious. I had a issue about the charges but Sam G. the front desk person took great care of me with patience. I’m completely satisfied with her customer service she provided. I would definitely come back aoon again!
Manager Response: T224 Thank you for spending your birthday with us and for this amazing review! We are thrilled that you had a great experience with us and in the restaurant as well. Also, thank you for recognizing Sam and we are glad she was able to address your concerns. Happy Birthday again, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: Invited family from Maui, Hawaii for 3-day stay at Pasea.  Front desk overcharged for 3rd day…said charge would be adjusted, but pasea then overcharged  both my guests and me.  As a result, my guests and I were BOTH charged.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to submit your feedback of your recent visit. We deeply apologize for the errors with your final bill for you and your guests. We understand how frustrating that can be and we have shared this with our team  to ensure accuracy on billing. We hope to be of service again in the future if you ever find yourself in the Huntington Beach area.

Summary Heading: Relaxing, clean, beautiful accommodations for a quick three night trip. Perfect location for strolling about town.
Summary: Had a wonderful stay at this hotel. The environment was very relaxing and also fun! The staff seem to really enjoy working here, and that is always a good sign. Service post covid seems to be a little better than other experiences, and I’m sure it will get better over time. Will be back!
Manager Response: @forrest ann f Thank you very much for this amazing review of your recent visit to Pasea. We appreciate the great feedback and recognizing our team. We are glad to hear that your experience was an improvement over past visits. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future and thank you again for choosing Pasea Hotel & Spa.

Summary Heading: Get ready to pay for mediocre
Summary: restaurant breakfast starts at 8am (who does that for business travelers), hugely over priced, no housekeeping service, and they do not even know then own pricing. Told me it was my responsibility to call laundry vendor to ask a pricing question. Luxury prices without the luxury. They staff is what makes this place a pleasure.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us this detailed feedback and for also recognizing our team members. We apologize that this visit did not meet your expectations in many areas such as dining and housekeeping. We are continually working on providing excellent service and apologize that we fell short this time. We hope to be of service again in the future and offer a better experience if you give us the opportunity.

Summary Heading: Wonderful experience from A to Z!  It even SMELLS great!
Summary: Attention to detail and quality in every touch while keeping a comfortable and casual atmosphere was a wonderful balance.  It even smelled wonderful!  The staff were helpful and eager to make sure we were happy and had a wonderful experience.
Manager Response: I4758SCstephanieo Thank you so much for your review of your visit! We are thrilled to see you had an amazing experience with us. The scent you were smelling is sandelwood. We also appreciate you recognizing our amazing team members and we look forward to seeing you back again.

Summary: This is a nice hotel.  There wasn't much I had a big problem with.  However, be aware that your room rate is only the beginning.  The Pasea philosophy is to charge you for everything they can.  The hotel did provide a complimentary bottle of wine, which was appreciated.  But that's the end.  Huge parking, resort fees, coffee, etc.  They also use the pool area like a club seen.  Locals can pay a day pass fee.  So, while you have access to the pool, it can be extremely crowded.  The location of the hotel is ideal.  A short walk to the beach and Main Street Huntington Beach.  Nice hotel.  Be prepared though.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We apologize that we did not meet your expectations during your visit and felt this way about our services. We are constantly working on finding ways to improve our services and it is with feedback like this that we are able to do so. We hope we can be of service again in the future if you give us another opportunity. Thank you again for staying with us and we again apologize for your experience at Pasea.

Summary Heading: Fine if you're not looking for luxury
Summary: If you're fine with basically a Hilton Garden Inn but with a nice pool and across the street from the beach, this place is perfect for you. With what I paid, I was looking for something MUCH nicer, more luxurious, with better front desk staff, and just higher quality all around. For those saying this is a luxury hotel, they've never actually stayed at a luxury hotel. The differences are apparent.   My main draw towards this hotel was the dog park - they tout that they are 'Dog Friendly' but still make you pay a $150 fee, even if you have an ESA form. And the aforementioned dog park, while cute to the eye, is a danger zone for ankles and knees. There are so many holes and divetts, I almost fell multiple times. The Dog bowls and bed were delivered used/unwashed. One bowl literally
Manager Response: @jp289 Thank you for taking the time to submit this very detailed review of your stay. We appreciate all this critical feedback on your experience so that we can take corrective action on these matters. The issues that you have described are unacceptable and certainly avoidable had our team executed everything with care and attention to detail. We apologize for the experience that you had and we hope to regain your trust in us in the future if you stay with us again.  If there is anything else we may assist with on this matter, please feel free to reach out to Zach Kerns, our Director of Operations, at zkerns@paseahotel.com. Thank you again for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa and we hope to see you again in the future for a more pleasant experience.

Summary: I stayed here for a company meeting. Staff was overall very good but rooms are starting to show significant wear. Also, lots of room-to-room noise, even at night.  I need 40 more characters, so I'll say I loved the super fast elevators
Manager Response: @keatingclan Thank you for taking the time to submit this review of your recent stay. We appreciate the positive feedback about our team. We apologize the room did not meet your overall expectations as well as the noise from room to room. We hope to welcome you back in the future if you return to the Huntington Beach area. Thank you for choosing Pasea Hotel & Spa.

Summary: This use to be a great place. But the last 2 times I have visited it has disappointed. It comes down to service. They are always overwhelmed on the wait staff and valet. Meanwhile you have an army of front desk agents happy to give you the worst possible location for your room unless you complain, and I get suite level rooms, have to complain every time and magically a new room of the same level is open and not w a view of the AC unit or next to a party in the next room. The pool wait staff seems annoyed you are asking for food and beverage and are slow. The rooms need a refresh to make them feel clean and time period appropriate. They still have a great location and nice touches at the hotel but the service is terrible. I’m happy to pay a premium for drinks, sunscreen, food,
Manager Response: @Paradise21362333587 Thank you for taking the time to provide this detailed feedback of your recent experience and for choosing Pasea again for your visit. We were disappointed to read the several comments about our team being overwhelmed or not helpful. We take great pride in our service delivery and when we see comments like these we take them seriously so that we may correct the behavior or direct resources during busier times to provide timely execution in all tasks. We apologize for the experience you had with us and hope to be of service again in the future if you return to the Huntington Beach area.

Summary: Another great stay at The Pasea, this was our fifth.  We always get a friendly welcome and the staff do remember you which is a nice touch.  Sam and her team on front desk are second to none as well as Peter and David the bell men.  The valet attendants are also very courteous.  The rooms are great especially if you get a pier view, breakfast at Tanner's is amazing...the burrito and pancakes are out of this world.  Can wait to come back again
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to submit this amazing review and for recognizing so many of our team members. We appreciate your continued loyalty to Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are thrilled that you had such an amazing time and look forward to your return very soon.

Summary: I stayed at the Pasea hotel to celebrate my birthday, and it was amazing. The room, the view, the food, the amenities, and the service were all impeccable. I loved every part of my stay. I highly recommend visiting the Pasea. You won’t be disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for this amazing review and for taking the time to submit your feedback. We are thrilled that you decided to spend you birthday with us and that you had a wonderful experience. We look forward to being of service again in the future the next time you are in the Huntington Beach area.

Summary: I loved the service here. The only thing I did not really like was the tanners restaurant. I loved the food but the service was poor they could have asked us if we need anything and been more attentive. The pool was great but could have been open longer and the pool could have been warmer. The lounge chairs where great! I loved the hot tub too it was perfect. One thing you need to add to your cafe shop is Dr. Pepper! We loved the hot drinks there. I loved the bikes and the location of the hotel. On your website it states valet is optional. However both times I came back with my car it was not an option. I was told we had to use the valet. Then causing fees I did not expect to my bill. Thank you for a great stay I hope to come back soon and have these things fixed.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to submit your feedback from your recent visit. We apologize that our restaurant did not meet your expectations. We were thrilled to read that you enjoyed the rest of your stay with us and we look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: We stayed for 4 nights after taking our college aged son to Disneyland.  After 3 days at Disney, this was amazing.  The Front Desk, Valet, and Coffee Stand employees were all amazing and friendly.  Check in was quick and I really appreciated the prearrival text message so we had a way to communicate questions.  We both work in hospitality and really thought this was a step above what most companies do.  We also notice odd things being in hospitality management so were very impressed with the cleanliness and again the service levels.  We would definitely stay again.  Its in a great location within walking distance to everything!
Manager Response: cantermanager Thank you so much for this amazing review of your visit. We greatly appreciate the feedback and recognition of our team members. We are pleased to hear you were able to find some relaxation after your visit to Disney. We look forward to seeing you and your family again if you are in the Huntington Beach area.

Summary Heading: Beautiful, trendy but no mask enforcement
Summary: On the weekends, the hotel has a party vibe with loud music, and intoxicated people not wearing masks walking through the lobby through Tanners. It was a little hard to sleep with flashing lights from the screen on the wall peeking through the black-out curtains. The noise from the bar didn't bother us- it was white noise. There were MANY guests and visitors in the hotel not wearing masks throughout our stay, and there was no mask enforcement.   Otherwise, the hotel is beautiful and the service is excellent. Everyone was warm and welcoming (from the front desk to servers at Tanners to housekeeping). The room was extremely clean.
Manager Response: none

Summary: From the moment we arrived to the moment we left, we had an exemplary experience thanks to Miguel.  He greeted us with a big smile always, and went way out of his way several times to help us.  For example, he was so lovely during our walk to the room to help us with our bags, and gave us so much information about out stay, and we really appreciate this as it helped us acclimate immediately to the property.  Another time, our key seemingly stopped working, and when I went down to the Lobby, he came out of nowhere it seemed offering to help.  He insisted on escorting me back to the room, where he diagnosed the issue of the battery in the lock being dead.  He then dispatched the technician, who came within minutes.  Really incredible service!  He seemed to be working all the time,
Manager Response: amysvortex Thank you so very much for this review and for taking the time to recognize Miguel! We are so thrilled to read these comments about him and your experience. We are so very fortunate to have him as a member of our team. He prides himself on providing excellent and caring service at every opportunity. Thank you again and we look forward to welcoming you back the next time your travels bring you to Huntington Beach!

Summary: We stayed here five years ago and enjoyed the hotel so much that this was the only place we considered when coming back to visit family in Orange County. The Pasea is a modern, boutique hotel; our room was super clean, big, modern, and had a super comfortable bed. We also had a balcony with ocean view. The restaurant is very good; we had lunch and dinner there a couple of times. The location is great; we took a 4 mile walk every morning along the bike path as the beach is right across the street. Everyone at the front desk (especially Micky), was super nice and helpful. The valet parking was great too! It was a great stay and I look forward to coming back.
Manager Response: 310nancyd Thank you so much for this amazing review of your experience and for recognizing Micky and our other team members. We look forward to being your hotel of choice the next time you find yourself in the Orange County area. On behalf of all the team members here at Pasea, thank you.

Summary: Loved it! Great views, great property, lots to do nearby. Beach toys and bicycles available to borrow. Was there for a conference and all meals were superb! Staff was friendly! Looking forward to staying again!
Manager Response: elomboy Thank you very much for this great review of your experience at Pasea. We were thrilled to read that you enjoyed our amenities as well as the conference. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future the next time you are in Huntington Beach.

Summary Heading: Great hotel. The food needs an upgrade!
Summary: The meals were not fine dining and not a match for the hotel. From the plating to the portion sizes, they seemed more appropriate for a 2-star, family hotel vs a luxury hotel.   The flavors and use of spices lacked sophistication. I didn't eat the dessert but heard from several in our party that it was not good and had a sauce that could break a tooth.
Manager Response: myram368 Thank you for taking the time to submit your review. We apologize that your dining experiences with us did not meet your expectations and we appreciate your specific comments. We have shared your feedback with our culinary team as well. If there is any other feedback you would like to provide, please feel free to email Zach Kerns, our Director of Operations, with any further details.

Summary: First class hotel in every way.  Oceans views from very comfortable rooms.  Tanners food is exceptional and the catering of our business meetings quite extensive.   Hotel is clean and staff friendly. Next time we will try the spa
Manager Response: Janine S Thank you for this amazing review of your experience. We appreciate the feedback about the rooms as well as the event you attended here. We look forward to welcoming you back to Pasea in the future and hope you will have time to visit the Spa next time.

Summary: I attended a meeting here with my company.  We were provided catered breakfast and lunch each day.  The food was excellent and well presented.  The meeting rooms were well appointed.  My room was clean.   I enjoyed this business trip
Manager Response: BarbC21 Thank you very much for this 5 Star review of your experience. We were thrilled to read the event you attended was executed well and that you enjoyed your time with us. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future. On behalf of all the team members here at Pasea, thank you.

Summary: I gave Pasea a 1 star review back in May after I had taken 8 friends for my 50th birthday. Paul Maddison, the general manager, reached out to me and made it a point to speak with me over the phone. We talked about my experience and he was amazingly helpful and understanding. I went back on my own in June and it was a completely different experience. My favorite part as a local was sleeping with the balcony door open and listening to the surf. I had a blast at the pool and my server Cynthia took excellent care of me. I highly recommend a visit. If you can, stay in room 836 and watch the waves from your shower. Thank you Paul for all your help!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to submit your feedback and we were thrilled to read that you had an amazing time with us this visit. We deeply appreciate you giving us another opportunity to be of service. We look forward to your return the next time you are in the Huntington Beach area.

Summary: The pool feels very secluded even though it is next to the highway. We sat in the round lounges and our server Ivie was very attentive and helpful! The service was amazing and I would highly recommend a stay here!
Manager Response: emilyfP2072VS Thank you for this amazing review of your experience and for recognizing our team member Ivie. We pride ourselves on providing excellent service and a relaxing environment. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future the next time you are in Huntington Beach.

Summary Heading: Vegas in HB-Make sure that’s your expectations!
Summary: Wife and I have always wanted to stay here as we loved the outward vibe and the connection to the mall next door and the access to the beach.  We decided on a staycation for our 24th anniversary and since the hotel was offering a reasonable package of restaurant credit, no parking cost and no Resort fee we thought we would spend the dough and go relax in HB!  Well.  First room they checked us into smelled like smoke so they moved us.  That night they checked guest in at 2:30 in the morning they probably were a carry over from their night club scene.  Needless to say it was a party on the room next to us from 2:30am-5am.  Not hating I wish I had it in me!  If your expecting relation by the Ocean think more  Vegas pool scene till 2am right outside your room.  The pool and their
Manager Response: none

Summary: First off very familiar with the their brand of hotels our go to is Estancia La Jolla hotel & spa located in La Jolla CA. So my wife and I decided to make it a Pasea stay and save on the drive time, visiting from Las Vegas & let me tell you we work at high end Las Vegas resorts but Pasea blew us away from the location, cleanliness & staff were superb. Views from guest room & let alone Tanner’s & the tree house by Tanners’s both food and drink experiences were amazing. Definitely will be back for a visit this October also for those of you who post bad reviews please stay home, you’re miserable and actually you probably carry a entitlement persona and you know who you are. Also management please recognize these outstanding individuals on your team: Kyle valet  Roland valet  Peter
Manager Response: none

Summary: #1 best review would be for the staff at Pasea.   We had great meals at Tanners, awesome spa experience, pool/spa was perfect and our rooms were exceptionally clean.  Thanks to the following people who made our stay escpecially perfect,   Ed, Katie, Masio, Andrew and Pim.   We will be back
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to submit this wonderful review of your visit with us and for recognizing so many of our team members. We are thrilled that you had an amazing time and look forward to seeing you in the future.

Summary: My sole reason for booking this hotel was because they are part of the GHA discovery loyalty program. As a black member there are a range of benefits one should receive when staying at a hotel thats part of the program. These include (as stated on the Pasea web site) Double upgrade at check in if available, welcome amenity and note from the management, early check in from 9am and late check out, free wi fi, free bottled water each day and a range of other things.  We arrived at 3pm and they told me the room was not ready, despite me telling them what time I would arrive. There was no acknowledgement of my membership of the discovery program nor was I offered an upgrade. When I asked about it they said they had no rooms available at the double upgrade level. I told them I had
Manager Response: MidAtlanticMan, thank you for taking the time to lave us this detailed review as we appreciate your feedback. We ask that you reach out to our Director Of Guest Services, Jovani Guzman at Jguzman@paseahotel.com to further discuss your recent visit with us. We look forward to resolving some of these issues in a timely manner. Thank you and we look forward to hearing from you.

Summary: This was a very relaxing visit. The staff did an exceptional job to make us feel comfortable and welcome.  The room was perfect, the view of the ocean from our balcony was awesome. There was a lot to explore within walking distance. Thank you for a great stay.
Manager Response: H5047WKdavidh, thank you for leaving us this amazing 5-star review! We are thrilled to see you enjoyed your recent visit with us and we look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future.

Summary Heading: Not at all worth the $$$$. REVAMPING IS NECESSARY!
Summary: Pasea in-person looks like it was once upon a time "the place to be".  For the price to stay it doesn't fit the bill!    Upon entering the room it smelled unsanitized.  The walls were dirty, huge carpet stain, unwiped coffee spill near the Keurig, and the soap dish holder was filthy.  Hotel moved us into another room which was better however there were noticeable white stains on the fabric chair.  The beds were comfortable.  The pool water was clean and nice temp to be in.    Poolside manners.. while  renting the cabana and at the bar,staff member (Ivie) was unattentive, rude and confrontational.    Many staff members were nice starting with Myra, Ronnie,  Avila , Sammy and Joselyn .  Valet was on point. Thanks!  Three stars are for the comfy beds and the nice staff members.
Manager Response: JEANIE P, thank you for taking the time to leave us this review. Although it is not the experience we want any of our guests to have, we will be bringing up some of your concerns in the next department operation meeting. We thank you for the detailed feedback and we hope that you give Pasea a try again sometime in the near future.

Summary Heading: Amazing Pet-Friendly Hotel with Breathtaking Ocean Views!
Summary: Paséa Hotel & Spa has the perfect location in the surf city! It’s just a few steps away from Pacific City mall and walking distance to downtown Huntington Beach and Pier. The hotel is stunning with a beautiful pool and lobby. We stayed at the Ocean King room located on the 7th floor and the views of the pacific were breathtaking!  Paséa Hotel & Spa is also named one of the best pet-friendly hotels in the US and they even have a little dog park for your pets to play and walk. We brought our dog Maple, and she was very comfortable throughout our stay. She even got a bag of dog goodies and we thought that’s very special. Everyone at the hotel was super friendly. They went out of their way to make us feel at home and accommodate us to make our stay enjoyable and memorable. I was
Manager Response: Jules C; thank you for taking the time to leave us this awesome 5-star review! We have a lot to offer our guests and it is so great to see that you loved your recent stay with us. We love our dog friends and it is always great when guests are able to travel with them. We look forward to welcoming you and your furry friend back sometime in the near future. Safe Travels!

Summary: Was in the area and wanted to find a nice place to relax. Got a pool pass and it was wonderful experience! Facilities were great and the service was wonderful!   I was helped by Ivie and she had excellent recommendations and lifted the mood with her great sense of humor
Manager Response: J9670MVandred, Thank you so much for leaving this 5-star review. We are so glad that you enjoyed your time at our pool. We are always trying to offer great things for our guests and our pool is one of those. Thank you for taking the time to name some of the amazing team members that we have here at the hotel as well. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future as well.

Summary Heading: Theft from rooms! Watch your belongings!!
Summary: Well...for $550 per night, plus a loss of over $250 is stolen property (designer shoes), I'd say not your best value.  The property is new, the lobby and pool area are nice...you'll have to flag down servers in the pool area (even when the pool is not busy), but that is a sign of the times (we left here for the Ritz Bacara in Goleta/Santa Barbara and had a similar experience with pool service - but no theft).  I would have rated this a 3.5 star - but the theft brought this down to a 1 star.  It's also not a $550/night hotel.  Total bummer!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: I can't believe this place is this loud
Summary: This hotel is right next to a restaurant that turns itself into an outdoor club at night.  Trying to sleep here is like trying to sleep in the middle of a concert taking place on a runway at LAX.  If you're at all noise sensitive, find somewhere else to stay.
Manager Response: traviss503, thank you for taking the time to leave us this review. We do apologize about the inconveniences that occurred with noise on your recent visit with us. Unfortunately we are located directly next to a Bungalow Lounge and they do tend to play loud music on weekends. We do our best to work with them but at times can not control their noise levels. We hope to see you here at our resort soon to give us another try.

Summary: I was there with my wife celebrating our anniversary and Sam made it feel like a true destination vacation.  It felt like Cabo with the type of hospitality she welcomed us with.  I can't say enough good things about Sam.  She was pleasant and warm.  Something that we don't find often find these days.  We wouldn't hesitate to go back.  Sam deserves a raise.  Her efforts went above and beyond.  If there's a team player at Pasea it's definitely her.  Thank you Sam.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us this amazing 5-star review. It is great to see that Sam was able to take great care of you! She is a huge part of our front office team. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future.

Summary: We brought our family here (older kids in own room)for 3 nights  and although the location of this hotel is amazing, the services and amenities are really  lacking. No seating at the pool during the day due to the fact that they allow day use guests and it’s a super small pool. We did enjoy the beach across the street (they do have lots of beach chairs and towels available but very few umbrellas) and Pacific City next door is key - best  meal was at Bluegold.  Won’t be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us this review. We do apologize that your recent stay with us was one that you did not expect. We value the things you have brought up in this review and will be going over some of them in our next operations meeting. We do admit the pool has been challenging as seating is limited and on a first come first serve basis. We hope that you do choose to stay Pasea sometime in the near future. Thank you and safe travels

Summary Heading: Great stay(s)! Outstanding individual service by Tavia.
Summary: I stayed for a week at Pasea in July for business travel. Not my first stay, but my longest. I will return as my travel takes me back to the LA area.   Positives - Had outstanding service by a desk team member, Tavia. She helped with several needs throughout my stay, but during checkout was of extraordinary help. Assisting me through several billing questions, solving an issue for me related to breakfast credits, and was super pleasant throughout! Service like that really makes me happy to return.  - Clean lobby, despite the crowds.  - Good food at Tanners.  - Awesome location.  Only downside is the service of the rooms doesn't take place every day, and was tough to get sometimes even when specifically requested (likely due to operating at near capacity i was told).  Great stay,
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this amazing 5-star review!! We are so happy to see that you made a connection with Tavia and that she was able to assist you while visiting us. We hope to see you sometime in the near future!

Summary: I recently purchased Day Passes for the Pool at Pasea, in order to accommodate 7 friends and family members.  What was initially planned as a fun, short afternoon to casually enjoy the summer, turned out to be an ABSOLUTE BLAST, thanks to Micky at the Front Desk!!  She provided us with superb Customer Service, helping us get a Cabana and Day Bed. We spent the entire day sipping on Prosecco and eating fruits, while the kids enjoyed their burgers and fries under the nice shade.  The ocean view was so SO beautiful and we couldn't get enough of the pool and jacuzzi, specially during the sunset. Our Pool Waitress, Ivy, was always ready to help us out. And Dominic handed us towels with the biggest smiles.   :-) We are so grateful to this AMAZING staff, for making our day the highlight
Manager Response: WOW! Thank you for leaving us this wonderful 5 star review. It is so nice to see that you were able to connect with some of our amazing staff here at Pasea Hotel and Spa. they truly make the difference in our operations. We hope to see you here sometime in the near future!

Summary: Visited Huntington Beach for a wedding with my wife, son & his wife. We got to the hotel around 2:30. Since there were no rooms ready at that time we went into Tanners for a bite. The patio of this restaurant is beautiful, is surrounded by glass partitions and has a awesome view of the beach just across the PCH.  Our room was ready at 4pm. It was room 402 which is a corner room that was located closer to the front of the hotel than the beach. It still had a great view of the beach and city. Very nice, clean & comfortable. The A/C wasn't working but maintenance came later and fixed it. I think it is one of the quietest hotel room I've stayed in. If you get down to the pool before 10am there are plenty of chairs but as the day goes on it fills up quickly. The first day when we
Manager Response: none

Summary: Sarah at Tanners Bar and Resturant is an outstanding bartender, extremely well-made cocktails great conversation and suggested incredible food to munch on at the bar!, if you’re staying at Pasea Hotel, I highly recommend coming down to visit Sarah and enjoy great drinks  Try the cucumber delight!!!
Manager Response: Q1095CWdaveg, thank you for leaving this amazing 5-star review!! Sarah does such a great job over at our bar at Tanners and are so happy that you were able to connect with her. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future for some more tasteful beverages.

Summary Heading: Staff trained to lie. Substandard room.
Summary: I was part of a corporate group. I informed the staff on the day of arrival but before checkin that I'd be arriving after 10pm and needed a rollaway bed for my toddler. I was assured that one would be available. None was available at checkin, or the next day, or the next day. The room (203) had a musty smell. The shower did not work properly. The balcony had cigarette and joint roaches as well as a dirty rag on it. I also had no view. Time and again I asked to be moved and was told that the hotel was fully booked while rooms of all types were available to be booked on the website on all days. The shower was not fixed the 2nd day as requested. It was fixed somewhat on the 3rd day but was still substandard and the engineering crew left sharp plastic and metal shavings on the floor
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have mixed feelings about our stay here over the last weekend. The things I expected to be poor were good, and the things I had high expectations for were terrible.   I'll start with the good: -The pool was lovely and the service staff was friendly and efficient. The seating was also ample, even on a Sunday in July. The environment was fun but not too wild. -The coffee shop staff were also friendly and the coffee was good.  -Check in was easy and we were actually given a room close to 11am, which we didn't expect arriving so early.  -We were allowed to use the amenities the whole day after we checked out, that was great. We enjoyed a nice bike ride before heading home.   The bad: -The bed and the pillows are AWFUL. Like actual garbage. Perhaps the worst bed and pillows I've
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us this great detailed review. It is unfortunate that your stay was not up to your standards because we do want all of our guests to enjoy their time with us. It appears there are some opportunities for training with some of the staff and your comments will be brought up in our next operations meeting. If you do decide to join us sometime in the near future, we ask that you reach out to Jovani Guzman at Jguzman@paseahotel.com. He is our Director Of Guest Service and this way we can try to ensure that you have a splendid stay. Safe Travels.

Summary Heading: Amazing mini vacation thanks to Pasea
Summary: We went on a couples trip from Vegas to California and thanks to Pasea we had an absolutely perfect vacation.  A special thanks to Jovani Guzman, the Director of guest services, for the amazing hospitality during our stay.  The hotel itself is stunning, the restaurants are amazing and the rooftop lounge / bar is by far one of my new favorite hangout spots.  I definitely won’t be staying anywhere else but Pasea when I chose to come back to California.
Manager Response: BrieWilli, thank you for taking the time to leave us this 5-star review. We are so glad that you enjoyed your recent stay with us and we look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future. We do have a lot of offers for our guests and are so glad that you chose to stay with us. Safe Travels.

Summary: HUGE shoutout to Sarah at Treehouse for the absolutely amazing service. 10/10 recommend! Got a moscow mule and it was amazing. Held some great conversation and she was super friendly with her nature. Will be coming back soon!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us this amazing 5 star review 43ramia. We are so glad that you were able to meet Sarah and have her take care of you. She does a great job with our guests and always gives them the best service. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime soon for some delicious tasting cocktails.

Summary: The hotel is a clean, comfortable, relaxing vibe throughout with beautiful views.  The staff is friendly & very attentive.  Coffee maker in the room & a splendid bottle of wine-BONUS. Don't forget to lounge in your luxurious robe & take home flip flops.   Be aware of fee's & Taxes. No self parking. Valet Only.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us this review. Overall is seems like you enjoyed your time with us. I do apologize that you felt that we had hidden fees and taxes. We do try to be as clear as possible when booking but appreciate the feedback and will look to see where we can be more transparent.

Summary: This was my first time in Huntington Beach and I am so glad my friends and I stayed at the Pasea! This boutique hotel is a great for a weekend getaway with the family or group of friend and would recommend to anyone! Great food and atmosphere, check out the roof top bar where they have live music every night and even have cool swings hidden in the back! Tons of stuff to do around the area, including an outdoor shopping mall and tons of restaurants. Come here to relax and enjoy the beach and beautiful sunsets!
Manager Response: We are so glad that you were able to join us for the 4th of July holiday weekend. It was great to see most of the festivities return to HB this year. The hotel had a lot to offer that weekend and it is nice to see that you were able to enjoy some of them. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future. Safe Travels!

Summary: My family stayed over 4th of July weekend, and we had so much fun! The pool and cabanas were great and we all loved the live music each night. The location is also great putting you close to shops, restaurants, and the pier at the beach. Would highly recommend!
Manager Response: 5-star reviews are our favorite and we are so glad to see that you enjoyed you recent stay with us. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future with your family. Safe Travels until then.

Summary: Great place for family and friends to gather!!!   Food and service at the hotel was amazing.  Staff very friendly and courteous and responded to any requests made.   We recommend this hotel to anybody who is looking for great proximity to the beach and night life.
Manager Response: The 4th was an amazing time around the hotel and it is so nice to see that you enjoyed your recent visit with us. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future. Safe Travels!

Summary: This was my first trip to Huntington Beach since moving to California.  The Pasea is a beautiful hotel! I found the rooms nicely appointed and the staff very friendly. We had an ocean view room and enjoyed seeing the sunset each night. There is conveniently a small mall next door. Enjoyed our stay very much!
Manager Response: First off we would like to say; WELCOME TO CALIFORNIA. We are so glad that you were able to stay at Pasea. We are located in such a great location here in Huntington Beach and have a lot to offer to our guests. We hope that you are able to come back sometime in the near future and enjoy our property again.

Summary Heading: Celebrating a birthday with style!  Accommodating and wonderful stay!
Summary: Wonderful stay!  We traveled here from Colorado to celebrate my daughter’s birthday.  The property is gorgeous, the staff was accommodating and location was convenient and I. walking distance to everything.  The pool staff and front desk was helpful and friendly.   They offer chairs and umbrellas to take to the beach and had live music on the rooftop.  We all loved the Beatles music.   We will definitely return.
Manager Response: Sue A.; thank you for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review. We are so glad to see that you were able to celebrate a birthday here with us and look forward to making more memories with you in the near future. Safe Travels until then!

Summary Heading: A dream experience. Can't wait to come back
Summary: I came in town for a wedding on July 2nd and from the moment that I pulled my car into the valet, the experience was next level.  I had mistakenly booked the wrong nights and was unable to make a change over the phone or online. When I walked in Jazzmarie was so kind and immediately helped me to modify the reservation. Micky helped me get my room situated and directed me to the rehearsal space. Throughout my stay, the front desk staff was beyond accommodating, they were exceptional.   The grounds were LOVELY. Each space is curated to keep comfort and relaxation as the focus. It's also off of the PCH but raised so that there was an unobstructed view of the ocean.   I had an ocean view with a king bed, and the mattress was mad of clouds, actual clouds. I always prefer a firm
Manager Response: none

Summary: The entire staff acted like our employees were an inconvenience. Charged 180.00 to move my room away from the noisy valet area. Couldn’t get towels, soap or coffee pods to the room after 3 try’s. This is the third time our company used this place for an event and it will be the last. The sheets seemed dingy and the pillows were a yellowish color as well.   Very disappointed in this property
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: If you want to start your vacation right. Go see Sarah @ Tanner’s
Summary: First day of vacation and my family and i wanted to start off with some welcoming drinks. Sarah  was nothing but PHENOMENAL. Not only did she do great on our original drink orders but the drinks she suggested were AMAZING! Sarah if you are reading this, keep doing what you are doing cause it’s nothing short of great! Highly recommend
Manager Response: M542TSmicheller, thank you for taking the time to leave us this amazing review. Sarah and the rest of the team over at Tanners does an incredible job. It is great to see that you had a great time with some great tasting drinks. We hope to welcome you back sometime in the near future.

Summary: Visiting Huntington Beach for the weekend with friends. This morning I went to tanner’s bar to have a drink in the morning ended having multiple because Sarah was the best bartender I’ve had! She’s spunky fun and makes amazing drinks. Definitely will be back!!
Manager Response: We are so glad to see that Sarah gave you some incredible service and some amazing drinks! The team over at Tanners does incredible work and we thank you for taking the time to write this review and give them credit. We hope to welcome you back to the bar for some great tasting drinks soon.

Summary: If you want great customer service from check in to check out, go to Pasea Hotel and Spa. Every text request was answered in a timely fashion. The room was oceanview and very clean. We were able to enjoy a concert right outside of our room which was a great touch. The amenities are great!! The walk across the street to the beach, the eateries, and shopping in walking distance was outstanding. We enjoyed ourselves and will definitely be back. Thank you to all the staff that made our vacation a memorable one.
Manager Response: ShannineandDex, we love our 5-star reviews. It is great to see that you received great service throughout your time with us here. We are so glad to see that you enjoyed some of the live music that we have to offer here at the hotel. We are fortunate to be located in a great spot here in Huntington Beach. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime soon.

Summary Heading: Modern hotel steps from the beach!
Summary: Pasea is a very modern hotel in a perfect location in Huntington Beach. It was my first time traveling with my baby and we really enjoyed our stay here.  Our room had a balcony with a killer view of the beach and the pier. Once we valet parked our car, we didn’t have to use the car again until we left. We just had to cross the street to get to the beach and it was a short stroll away to the pier.  What was super convenient as well was being right next to Pacific City, a nice outdoor mall with shops, a food hall and restaurants.   Our room was spacious enough for our luggage and the crib which the hotel provided. I loved that it also had a mini fridge with a complimentary bottle of wine and bottles of water. It also came with the softest robes and nice flip flops to take home.
Manager Response: We love this amazing 5-star review! Thank you so much for taking the time and leaving us this detailed review. We are so happy to see that you enjoyed your time with us. We hope that you are able to join us again and look forward to seeing you again one day. Safe Travels!

Summary: Stayed at the hotel for a weekend getaway in the most lovely room with a fantastic view! The staff was friendly, accommodating and very COVID conscious. The room was clean, check-in was easy, and the location is unbeatable. We will be back!!   We were thrilled that we could enjoy the dining experience at Tanners and Treehouse from the heated canopy with tables safely distanced apart. The food was outstanding and the service was great, too. We will definitely be back to try out the other menu/cocktail options!   Again, the views are unbeatable, and I look forward to warmer summer nights on this patio! I would recommend this hotel/spa to anyone visiting the area!
Manager Response: We love our 5-star reviews! Thank you for taking the time to leave us this amazing review. We are so glad to hear that you had a great stay on your most recent visit with us at Pasea. It is also nice to see that you were able to enjoy a lot of what the property has to offer. Tanners and Treehouse are great options. We hope to see you back in the near future. Safe Travels until then.

Summary Heading: ROOMS AT 700 DOLLARS PER NIGHT, NO MAID SERVICE, NO HOT WATER, NO WAKE UP SERVICE
Summary: Absolutely the worst service I have ever received in a 5 star hotel.  For two days, we had no hot water for most of the time.  their excuse..we are getting a specialist to fix it. (translation.....we dont really take care of our systems). No one told us there would not be any maid service...no one cleaned our rooms or gave us extra towels unless requested. We were told that they were slowly rehiring all the maids because of Covid. (translation...blame everything on Covid because we are too cheap to hire adequate staff) Twice I called for an early wake up call because of meetings scheduled.  No one called and I was late. Spoke to the manager on duty who told me that they were short staffed and apologized. (translation...I saw plenty of personnel at the front desk and in the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us feedback about your recent stay. It is unfortunate that you were not able to to enjoy Pasea the way that we would have liked. I ask that you reach out to our Director of Guest Service, Jovani Guzman at jguzman@paseahotel.com to further talk about your recent visit and to resolve some of the issues at hand. We look forward to hearing from you.

Summary: Great Great place to stay in Huntington Beach, CA.  Hotel staff was friendly and outgoing and the hotel was clean and the amenities were outstanding! The great thing about the hotel is it’s proximity next to the Pacific mall and other restaurants as well!
Manager Response: 695ginol, thank you for this 5-star review! We are so glad that you were able to enjoy your recent visit with us. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future. Safe Travels.

Summary: This was our first time staying at Pasea and we couldn’t believe how beautiful this hotel was! The cleanliness and the friendly staff was just the beginning - we then realized everything was just walking distance! Close by was an outside shopping mall connected by a food court and options for amazing restaurants. The hotel also has a beautiful rooftop bar right next to the pool (with live DJ) along with an inside restaurant/bar called Tanners. Also, you can rent bikes which are complimentary for hotel guests!   We had the pleasure of meeting Pasea manager, Jovani, who kindly accommodated my sisters and I. He even surprised us with a bottle of champagne in our suite when he found out we were here to celebrate a birthday! He also provided us an amazing suite which was on the top
Manager Response: TravelWithNina101, what an amazing review! Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. We look our 5 stsar reviews! It is so nice to hear that our staff was accommodating and went above and beyond on your most recent visit with us! We are happy you chose Pasea to celebrate the special occasion and look forward to welcoming you back for more fun in the near future. See you soon and Safe travels!

Summary: My husband and I stayed here with our dog and the staff was extremely accommodating. One very kind staff member, his name was Peter I believe, went out of his way to help me with our very skittish rescue pup and I was so grateful.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Highly recommended!!!  If i can give 10 stars, I would. This place is amazing. Everything that you need for a nice and relaxing vacation is right here. There are shops and really good restaurants around. It's right across from the beach. They have free bike rentals and we enjoyed a nice stroll at the beach in the morning. The rooms are super clean and beds are comfortable. The view from our room was awesome! We had  a balcony and enjoyed live music. (They have it on Friday and Saturday nights) The staff is very friendly and accommodating. Jovanni made our girls trip fun and the best yet. From their front desks agents, to their bellmen and valet, this is the best place if you're looking for a nice getaway in California. This will be our spot whenever we visit, for sure!
Manager Response: Rxpert1987, thank you for taking the time to leave us this amazing 5-star review! We are so glad to see that you enjoyed so much the property has to offer. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future. It is great to see that our staff took great care of you! Safe travels :)

Summary: Customer care and attention to detail is what Pasea offers! I spoke with Samantha Griffin from the concierge desk in making arrangements for 7 women to stay comfortably and in creating a special weekend for the Bride-To-Be. Upon our arrival everyone from the valet, bellhop, concierge, and housekeeping were helpful and kind. The room was clean and perfect with a great view of the ocean and pool. The amenities and location by Pacific City and Main Street was walking distance and convenient. The complimentary water, wine, and coffee in the room came to use. Sam gave a personable customer care experience and left goodie bags in each room for us. Thank you Pasea and Sam for giving us a great experience filled with memories. We look forward to coming back again. - C. Higgins
Manager Response: WOW! We love this review. We are so happy to see that Sam took great care of you on your recent visit with us. We can't wait to welcome you back in the future to celebrate even more memories. Safe travels!

Summary: The is always awesome. The pool and the service is always great. I’ve stayed at this hotel ten times and it never disappoints. The front desk supervise Andrew is the man, he’s professional and always makes sure our stay is welcome. He remembers everyone’s name and he’s super cool.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Happy to report we did get a room early on a Monday check-In though the line was super long and crowded we were lucky to get in right before check-in, seemed understaffed but may be due to pandemic so not blaming them at all. Room is okay, no extra pillows or blankets in closet, everything is bare minimum. Hotel website suggests spa day use is for good for hotel guests. It is absolutely not. One “Free” bottle of wine in room day one but daily resort fee fee is like 4x that and includes nothing else, then there’s no wine key. Try to ask housekeeping who is next door for a wine opener and they tell me to go to front desk.  call front desk, wait on hold 30 minutes with no answer, go downstairs (elevators are full so this takes another 30 minutes ), wait in line. Front desk guy
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have stayed in this hotel a couple of times now, and it’s one of our favorites. Whether you’re looking for a romantic couples getaway or you’re hosting a special event with friends, you can’t go wrong with Pasea. The location is perfect- it’s walking distance to the Main Street and Pacific City. No driving or parking required! They have live music on the Pasea rooftop every night starting around 6:45-7:30 pm. You are able to watch from your hotel room if you have an ocean/partial ocean view (the upgrade is worth it!). They also have surfboards you can rent if you don’t feel like transporting your own. And if you have a Tesla, complimentary charging! Their valet process is super easy and quickly accessible, also.   The staff are really friendly and helpful as well. One of them
Manager Response: MBN134050, thank you for taking the time to leave us this amazing detailed 5-star review. We are blessed to be located in the heart of HB with so many offerings for our guests within walking distance. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future!

Summary: We had an amazing time at Pasea. Our room was an oceanfront corner room. It had amazing views of the Pacific Ocean. The room was clean and every amenity was provided. (Even a complimentary bottle of wine). We had occasion to have drinks at Tanner's Restaurant. We were in town for a party elsewhere so we did not have time to eat there. The hotel was quiet. The following morning we ate breakfast at Blend Cafe. Lattes and pastries were delicious. Pasea is just blocks from the Huntington Beach pier and Main St., the perfect location for dining, shopping, sight seeing. The staff was courteous and helpful. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: dprince565, thank you for taking the time to leave us this amazing 5-star review! We are so thrilled to see that you were able to enjoy all that the property has to offer. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future!

Summary: This was a beautiful new hotel. However, the customer experience was absolutely terrible (minus one very kind gentleman by the name of Andrew who was amazing, empathetic and accommodating). Upon arrival, they sold us an upgrade (which we paid for. They offered no complimentary upgrade). We had a partial ocean view reserved, but upgraded to ocean view. Upon getting to the room, however, the room was clearly a partial ocean view. When I called the front desk, they told me that they consider “the view from their balcony, not from the room itself”. I have never heard of such a thing. Worse yet, they were totally rude, as if I owed them something on top of it all. Anyhow, we moved on but things got worse. The hotel didn’t even follow its own pandemic/public health safety measures.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed here last week with my friends, though it was a quick trip it was definitely memorable. The hotel itself is beautiful and the location is prime. Since the beginning we were welcomed by the friendly valet staff. As you walk into the hotel, you get total beach vibes which is great. Gio assisted us with our check-in, he was very welcoming and had a great attitude the whole time. The room he assigned us was absolutely beautiful!! It came with a balcony and some great views of the beach and the pool area. The room was also extremely clean. Every time we called down for something, Gio made sure it happened and that's what I call exceptional service. The pool and cabanas were very nice too, we had a few drinks out there and enjoyed ourselves. At check-out, we were assisted by
Manager Response: Thank you so much for leaving us this amazing 5-star review! We are so glad that you were able to enjoy all that the property has to offer. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future.

Summary: This hotel is absolutely amazing! We went for a girl's trip the first week of June and got checked in by Gio the guest service Director I believe. He was very friendly and accommodating, to say the least! Made us feel right at home! Anything that we requested, he made sure to make it happen with the best attitude. We got checked in right away and we fell in love with the room because it had a really nice ocean view! WE LOVED IT! The pool area is also very nice, you can see the ocean from your lounge chair and its absolutely beautiful! The staff and the hotel is outstanding, I will definitely be coming back and I would definitely recommend it!  Thank you, Gio! He is an asset to your company!
Manager Response: We love this amazing 5-star review. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your most recent time with us. Our property has a lot to offer and it is great to see that you were able to enjoy some of it. I am happy to hear that the staff you interacted with all were helpful as well. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future. Safe traveling until then!

Summary Heading: Nice inside but views not so much
Summary: Used a Travel Zoo voucher for Partial Ocean View room. The location of hotel is very nice. The hotel is very nice. Checkin, Valet, and bell-hop services were nice. The room is very clean.   Now for the not so good...Our Partial Ocean View room should be called ‘Listen to Valet parking horns all night’ or ‘Roof top Views’.  When contacting guest services....’We can move U away from the Valet noises and rooftop views for a FEE!’   We would have never booked and paid good money to stare at a rooftop and listen to cars all night.  Very poor customer service :(   I would recommend staying inland and parking for $15 a day at the beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us feedback on your recent stay. Although this is not the experience we wanted you to have; our partial ocean views are a very limited room type. we hope that you do choose to stay with us again and we hope to make it up to you in the future. We thank you for the feedback because it allows us to go back to our teams and correct areas that we need to improve. Safe Travels.

Summary: I can't put into words how amazing Paséa is. My home was having repairs completed due to water damage, so I had an extended stay here for 10 days. The staff were extremely accommodating, kind, and beyond helpful. The valets, front desk, housekeeping, and every staff member always greets you with a smile and asks if you need any help. I don't think I've ever seen more genuinely kind staff at any hotel no matter the price point, location, or type. Everyone wants to help and will do whatever they can. The night we checked in, the hotel was busy, so a kind gentleman who usually works security helped to deliver our luggage up to the room within just a few minutes - They work so hard to make sure you're taken care of, no matter how busy it can get. (Thank you to Dave who helped load
Manager Response: We absolutely love this review. We are so thrilled to see that you had an amazing time here at Pasea on your most recent visit. These pictures are truly the best!! We are so happy to see that you were able to enjoy so much that the areas has to offer. Huntington is a great spot with so many things to do. We look forward to welcoming you and your fury baby back sometime in the near future. Until then, safe travels!

Summary: I stayed overnight with a friend in a beautiful ocean view room.  The room was modern and spacious.  We had plenty of room to spread out and enjoy ourselves.  I especially enjoyed the luxe bathrobes and flip flops.  It was so relaxing to go on the balcony and hear the ocean waves.  The hotel is in the perfect location-- across from the beach and next door to Pacific City, which has dining, shopping, and entertainment.  We didn't get a chance to use the pool, but it looked amazing, and it looked out to the ocean.  You would really never need to leave the hotel if you didn't want since they do have a nice restaurant, bar, and coffee shop.  It's the perfect place to stay for a getaway with friends, family, or a significant other.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave this amazing 5-Star review! We are so thrilled to see that you had an amazing stay with us on your most recent visit We hope to welcome you back sometime again in the near future! All the best.

Summary Heading: Nice, but not worth the money
Summary: I really wanted to like this hotel, especially because they are dog friendly. And while the hotel is nice, it is not worth the cost by far.   We stayed in a one bedroom suite for two nights. Pillows provided are horrid. A piece of paper has more support and cushion. Furniture in the room was dirty and ripped. Shower parts were broken. They make a big deal out of the dog park, but it’s not all that. Great they have it, but it’s barely decent.  The amount of road noise that comes into the room is absurd. Not to mention the loud music late at night coming from neighboring hotels.   We did go to the spa and that was lovely.   Would not stay here again.
Manager Response: 895gregoryw, thank you for leaving this review with us. We thank you for giving us this feedback as it allows us to go back to our teams and strive to be better. We know that you have a lot of options when traveling and are sorry to hear that your recent stay was not up to your standards. We hope to welcome you back sometime in the near future, so that you are able to experience Pasea as it should be. Thank you and safe travels.

Summary: Best ocean views, incredible staff, great pool, jacuzzi, soaking pool and cabanas ( for a fee) dog friendly too! They have the cutest dog area I have ever seen. The hotel is located near great shops as well as the pier. Super cool interiors with a beach vibe, and cool wall art made from Havianas - we can’t wait to go back. We watched the sunset on the lanai and it was heavenly
Manager Response: We love our 5-star reviews!! Thank you for taking the time and leaving this amazing review with us. Our slipper wall is a guest favorite and makes for a great photo shoot! We look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future. Until then, safe travels!

Summary: I stayed at the Paséa Hotel twice during the pandemic.  Both stays were exceptional!   Friendly staff members were helpful and respectful.  The resort is modern, rooms are spacious, and the ocean views don't disappoint. I enjoyed the relaxing environment and will certainly make a return visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us this 5-star review. We are so thrilled to see that you enjoyed your most recent visit with us and we look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future!

Summary Heading: The BEST Hotel in Huntington Beach!
Summary: Pasea Hotel in Huntington Beach has THE BEST service and staff, from the moment I pulled up to valet, thru the short check in process, to the wait staff at the beautiful outdoor restaurant. BUT the best part was the clean room and the VIEWS! OMG so pretty from the balcony looking to the pool and ocean. We even got upgraded to the Penthouse and it had FOUR balconies and the most amazing bathroom ever! Perfect for the staycation we wanted, felt like we were in another country :)
Manager Response: none

Summary: I took my family to stay for three nights as a local gateway to get a change of scenery since we've been couped up at home for Covid. Let me say that I was blown away at how beautiful the hotel is and the location is perfect!   We got a room with a view of the pier, ocean, and rooftop where they have live music on the weekends! That was a pleasant surprise to hear amazing musicians while enjoying a drink on my balcony. My three little girls loved the pool and amenities. They enjoyed swimming during all hours of the day and waking around the lobby and neighboring dining area.  The staff is what really made our stay enjoyable. I have to say everyone there was super friendly and helpful. We dined at their restaurant and bar which had delicious food and great drinks that were mixed
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent Stay During a Once in a Lifetime Event!
Summary: This was my second stay at Pasea. I love this hotel for so many reasons. The rooms are well-adorned, clean and comfortable. The location couldn't be better (literally across the street from the beach). To top it off, the pool, surrounding restaurants and amenities make for a lively, yet relaxed atmosphere that accentuates the top-notch service Pasea is well known for. During this past visit, I had the pleasure of seeing one of my favorite bands, The Cold War Kids, perform a ROOFTOP CONCERT! It was the perfectly intimate COVID-era concert that I was able to enjoy from the comfort of my own balcony! I can't say enough about the creative events that Pasea puts on. Keep up the good work!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Not a Luxury Resort but Fresh & Clean
Summary: Very nice looking resort. We loved the location of our room but once we got into our deluxe edition upgraded room we were a bit shocked. Very small, carpet was frayed, bed mattresses were hard & sagging.  So uncomfortable and old my back killed me after the first night. Food was good though and place was cool looking. Not worth $300 plus per night for sure sadly
Manager Response: Thank you Raidtank for leaving this feedback. You have brought up important details that need to be addressed. We will bring these up in our weekly operations meeting. Our guests feedback is critical and we hope to resolve some of these issues in the near future. Thank you and safe travels.

Summary: I am at the hotel now. The reason we came to the hotel was to ride bikes on the board walk and lay by the pool. The bikes are limited to 2 hours so we couldn’t ride to balboa island and have lunch like we had planned. The pool is small and they reserve half of the seats for day visitors for a fee. The jacuzzi stopped working while we were in it. There was no service. The room is dirty. The slide door of the bathroom is filthy. There is blood stains on the sheets. Bed is saggy and old. I travel away from home approximately 4 months a year and this hotel is a huge let down. I do not recommend to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us this feedback. It is unfortunate that you were not able to experience Pasea the way that you should have. We ask that you reach out to Jovani Guzman; jguzman@paseahotel.com to further discuss your recent time with us. We look forward to hearing from you and resolving this in a timely manner. Thank you

Summary: I wrote to Mr. Guzman after my horrible booking experience and I never received a reply. Should have canceled then but I like the Spa. The staff was so spotty. There are some gems but they are hard to find. We were lucky to be rescued from a bad bartender and treated with 7 star service from Nicole in Tanners. The concierge did not return any of my calls. I went with 5 people to celebrate my 50th Birthday. As hotel guests we had to wait an hour for breakfast. Rather than explain the hotel is having issues hiring cooks they just avoided eye contact. The service at the pool was no where near 4 stars. There were so many kids at the pool it was tough to have adult conversations. When I found a hair in my birthday dessert at least 12 inches long the restaurant manager didn’t feel the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave this response. Please reach out to me directly; as i would like to further discuss some of the issues brought to our attention. You can reach me at Pmaddison@paseahotel.com. Thank you and look forward to further discussing with you.

Summary: Wow very disappointing return to the Pasea. Enjoyed a lovely stay 2+ years ago to this property. Rooms were well appointed with beautiful furnishings. Fast forward 2 1/2 years and this hotel is dirty and tired. My room is simply dirty. Grime on switch plates and glass doors. Furniture is scuffed up with stains and tarnish.
