Vents in sleeping rooms and conference space are actually ‘furry’.  Hallway are musty with weed permeating the hallways.  I won’t be back and certainly won’t recommend this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us this review. It's certainly not the time we wanted you to have on your most recent visit to Pasea. We ask that you reach out to our Director Of Guest Services; Jovani Guzman at jguzman@paseahotel.com to further discuss your recent visit with us. We look forward to hearing from you.

Summary Heading: Priced me out, stay somewhere else
Summary: Expect to pay $80 a nt on top of their expensive rooms rates for resort fee and parking. You’ll also have to pay extra for a room that has a slight view of the ocean and they reserve most of the pool chairs for rentals. Food at Tanners is pricey and very average. You are not allowed to bring any of your own drinks or snacks into pool area and they are not offering housekeeping due to covid.
Manager Response: D3038BGtamarak; Thank you for taking the time to leave this review. We ask that you reach out to our Director Of Guest Services Jovani Guzman, Jguzman@paseahotel.com to further discuss your recent visit with us. We hope to hear from you soon as we look to resolve some of the issues that you experienced.

Summary: This hotel was fantastic from the moment I stepped out of the car! From the valet to the pool and spa the employees were kind and courteous. The property itself was absolutely beautiful with an amazing view of the ocean along with gorgeously modern rooms. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone wishing to have a fun and relaxing time!
Manager Response: michaeljK3941IW, thank you for leaving this awesome 5-star review! We are so happy to see that you enjoyed y our recent stay with us. We hope to welcome you back sometime in the near future. Safe Travels!

Summary: This place is great. The staff is friendly and the amenities are endless! The bottle of wine in the room is a great touch as well.   This is perfect for a group of friends or a couple looking to escape. I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a nice hotel in Huntington.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time out of your day to leave this 5-star review. We are so happy to see that you enjoyed your recent visit with us. We hope to see you back at Pasea in the near future!

Summary: This place is truly amazing!! Number one thing that we loved was that it's DOG FRIENDLY!! (Complimentary goodie bag with leash and pet friendly shampoos upon arrival)🐕‍🦺🥰  As soon as we pulled up, Valet greets you and a bellhop helps you unpack all your luggage out of the car. Our staff Miguel was amazing and helpful. He waited for us while we checked in and gave us a little tour as he guided us up to our room. There was complimentary wine waiting for us along with a fantastic view overlooking the pool. You can also see the ocean as well!  We went straight to Tanner's for dinner. The service was excellent. They offered us chicken for our little dog and they were always quick to refill her water bowl. Price ranges about $20 for a salad, $45 for a steak. Very nice place with
Manager Response: CassyCampos88, thank you so much for leaving this amazing 5- star review. We love the photos that you took around the hotel as well. Here at Pasea we have a lot to offer our guest and I am so happy to see that you were able to enjoy almost all of them. We are so happy that you chose Pasea for your Anniversary Getaway. We hope that you do come back and join us soon. Until then, Safe Travels and all the best!

Summary: Worst service ever.  Front desk would answer after about 50 rings.  Spa never answered.  Room service never delivered--my husband found our food ice cold in a bag at the register downstairs. One bellman was good and helpful.
Manager Response: NorthStar628165, thank you for taking the time to leave this review. It is unfortunate that you did not enjoy your most recent stay with us. I ask that you reach out to our Director Of Guest Services, Jovani Guzman; Jguzman@paseahotel.com to further discuss your time with us and to help further resolve. We look forward to hearing from you.

Summary: Pros- the staff and hotel were very pleasant  Cons-  *I was there 6 days, no one ever cleaned my room, restocked water or towels. Never asked if I needed anything. *The hotel is a party. 2 nights in a row there were full blown parties going on in people’s rooms until we’ll after 3am. Hotel did absolutely nothing to fix this after calling multiple times. *VERY limited pool chairs. Half are reserved for “cabana” guests (cabana includes the 3 chairs in front of it) and reserved day beds are rented for a casual $359-$500.  *service at the pool is scarce. Even when there were 8 guests at the pool I was overlooked for the 2 groups of families. Finally had to go ask the bartender for a drink. This of course is fine however the 3 servers working we’re doing absolutely nothing. All in
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us this review. This feedback provides us an honest opinion on where we are and where we need to be. I ask that you reach out to our Director of Guest Services, Jovani Guzman; Jguzman@paseahotel.com. I would like to hear more about your stay and see if we can resolve some of the issues that you had. We look forward to hearing from you. Thank you and safe travels.

Summary: Located perfectly aligned with the Pacific Ocean the Pasea Hotel and spa is everything you need whether you're traveling on vacation or local and just want to get away! The lobby is spacious and bustling. Covid-19 protocol is in place and opens up to a beautiful pool that overlooks the ocean! The hotel restaurant is actually one of the better restaurants we've ever been to! Great breakfast, lunch, cocktails and dinner! If you're lucky enough to get a balcony room it's worth the upgrade! Located next to prime shopping and space if you're looking to host an event! Andrew at the front desk made sure to accommodate everything for my father who is a world war II veteran and now 102!  The entire staff made sure his stay was remarkable! If I could give it six stars I would! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Manager Response: This review is absolutely amazing! Thank you so much for taking the time to leave such a detailed review for us. We are so thrilled to see that you enjoyed your time here on property. We have a lot of amazing options to offer our guests and are happy to see you were able to enjoy most of them. Please let your father know that we thank him for his service and all that he has done. We look forward to welcoming you back soon to Pasea. Safe Travels!

Summary: i wanted time away from home just to get away it was so nice when i first walked in what a site i started to check in and was amazed at the service  at the  front desk a young man andrew was attentive professional, and very friendly during my stay
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us on your most recent get away. We are so glad to hear that Andrew was able to get you situated and that you enjoyed your time with us. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future. Safe Travels until we meet again!

Summary: This is the second time we have stayed at the awesome Pasea Hotel. We appreciate the great service especially from the director of guest services Jovani Guzman. The hotel is super clean. The salt water pool is phenomenal. Nice Jacuzzi as well.  Free bicycles to cruise the boardwalk are a nice benefit. The rooms are a good size and the ocean  views are excellent.  The hotel is super clean. the food and service are excellent.  I highly recommend The Pasea Hotel
Manager Response: Thank you jeffrA9084SJ for taking the time and leaving this detailed review. It is so great to see that you were able to enjoy all of the offerings we have here at Pasea! We are so glad to see that you were able to interact with some of our amazing team members as well. We look forward to welcoming you back to Pasea on your next trip to Huntington Beach. Safe Travels!

Summary: My husband & I booked a two night stay for our son and new daughter-in-law after their wedding on April 6th.  We are local and they live in Murrieta.  We had a pandemic wedding with masks in our backyard with  only immediate family.  They just loved everything about the hotel and Tanner's.  So clean and the view was beautiful.   The staff was wonderful as well.  Even though we are local we will make Pasea our get away place to go.  Thank you again all team members for being so warm and friendly.
Manager Response: We absolutely love this review! shortblock48 thank you for taking the time to leave us this amazing 5 star review. We will make sure to share this with our wonderful team here at Pasea. We are so glad to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to making more memories in the near future with you and your family. until then, Safe travels!

Summary: We just returned from our stay at the Pasea Resort and it was exactly what we expected.  The hotel was aesthetically beautiful, rooms were a great size, clean, and offered a great view of the Pacific ocean.  The complimentary wine and water in the room were a great touch.   The location of the resort was fantastic, all within walking distance to restaurants, activities, and much more.   Complimentary bicycles, electric scooters, fire pit with blankets, beach chairs, and umbrellas.  Jovani the resort manager was amazing and extremely helpful with any questions or concerns.    We will absolutely stay at this resort during our next trip.   I would highly recommend the Pasea Resort.
Manager Response: mickey1012, thank you for taking the time to leave this amazing 5 star review about your recent visit with us. We appreciate all of the feedback that was given and will use this to further grow our teams. We glad to see that you were able to speak with Jovani and some of our other amazing team members here at Pasea. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future.

Summary: The hotel is beautiful.  Views are good. Went with my daughters, mother, and aunt.  Had a nice time during their spring break.  Very friendly staff, and close to everything.  I would definitely return.  Thanks for the memories
Manager Response: Thank you jbnthelatino for taking the time to leave this fantastic 5 star review! We are so happy to see that you enjoyed your time with us and we look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future. Safe Travels!

Summary: I came to the Pasea for a two night stay with my two month old, four year old and six year old.  Just me and the kids.  We had a blast!  The pool and hot rub were so perfect.  Super attentive service at the pool, we had multiple snacks and meals at the pool.  Everything was so clean and every employee was super attentive and great.  I would highly suggest for families or just couples/singles.  Such a great spot!
Manager Response: We absolutely love this review! Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this amazing 5-star review. We are so glad to see that you enjoyed your recent visit with us and were able to enjoy some of the amazing things we have to offer. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future. Safe Travels!

Summary: Beautiful resort with such wonderful and friendly staff. Would and will definitely coming back. Miguel and Elizabeth were so kind. A couple of hiccups- room cleanliness and my nephew slipping on the concrete coming out of the jacuzzi. Next day they placed rubber mats. Will definitely still come back. Gym area was nice and clean, good equipment including a peleton. Location was prime! Rooms and view were awesome. Can’t wait to come back!
Manager Response: We absolutely love this 5-star review! Thank you so much for taking the time to mention some of our great team members. We are so happy to see that you enjoyed your time with us and we look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future. Safe Travels!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel because it was connected to several shops and restaurants and markets itself as the newest hotel in Huntington Beach.  Huge mistake.  We checked in at 8pm and asked the staff if room service was still available since we were traveling with two kids and didn't want to leave the room after driving 7 hours.  We were told room service ended at 10pm.  The kids got in their pajamas when we got to the room only to be told room service actually ended at 8pm.  This started off our trip on a sour note.  The next day we were going to go to the pool (which is the size of a backyard pool).  Since it was our daughter's birthday we thought we would rent a cabana until we were told they were $1500!  We decided to take the normal lounge chairs, the only issue with that is
Manager Response: G7198FIambers; thank you for taking the time to leave us this review. We apologize in advance that your recent stay was not where it should have been and not the experience we want any of our guests to experience. We ask that you reach out to our Director of Guest Services; Jovani Guzman at Jguzman@paseahotel.com to further discuss the matters that were brought up. We look forward to resolving this in a timely manner. Thank you and we look forward to hearing from you.

Summary: The hotel was in a great location.  I was traveling solo for the weekend and had easy access to the beach, shopping and a bunch of great restaurants nearby.  The room was nice and clean as well, and the staff were all helpful and accommodating.  My main issue was that I booked an Ocean View room with a balcony in the hopes of relaxing out there... and the view was great... but it was also directly over the pool which blasted club music ALL DAY and was uncomfortably packed.  Unfortunately it wasn't enjoyable to sit out on the balcony at all during the day (I was on the 4th floor, maybe higher floors would have no issue).  The hotel explained that the only ocean view rooms are looking over the pool.  At night it quieted down and was much more enjoyable to sit out there, but I was
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving this review. We seriously take the feedback of our guests and will ensure that your comments are brought up in our next operations meeting. We try to offer experiences that all of our guests can enjoy and it is disheartening to see that you did not fully enjoy your time with us. We hope that you give us another opportunity in the near future and hope you stay safe and healthy. Safe Traveling!

Summary: We were first time visitors to the Hotel Pasea and had a wonderful experience! The hotel size leads to an intimate feel in all the public areas. We used most all the hotel amenities; pool, spa, and Tanner’s Restaurant. Our couples massage was amazing! The therapists were extremely talented and we both said we’d never had a better massage. Our birthday dinner at Tanner’s was delightful! We sat on the patio and enjoyed a delicious dinner. Our server, Adriana, was so sweet and made our evening memorable.   Hotel Pasea is a gem and we will be planning another local getaway there soon!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this fantastic 5 star review! We are so happy you were able to experience Pasea for a birthday celebration. It is exciting to see that you were able to enjoy everything that we have to offer. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future. Safe Travels and we hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Wonderful experience all the way around
Summary: This hotel is completely amazing! I had such a wonderful experience all the way around and cannot express enough how nice and relaxing it really is. The oceanfront balcony is a space I found myself never wanting to leave as well as the shower with glass on both sides which allows you to see the ocean while showing is next level amazing. The location is unbelievable, not only oceanfront but also is near the Pacific City outdoor mall and plenty of good dining. I went to Tanner's for dinner and my experience was phenomenal and the food was excellent. I will definitely go back to this hotel in the future for a getaway!
Manager Response: We absolutely love this review! Thank you motomel125 for taking the time to leave this review with us. We are so happy to see that you enjoyed your most recent visit with us. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future and hope that you stay safe and healthy during these times.

Summary: Had a great stay.  Room with a lovely view of the pier..  The rooftop performers were both really good.  All staff I spoke with were very polite & courteous.   Pool was very relaxing and really nice that you could walk across the street to the beach or take a walk to Main St.  Would recommend the Pasea!😊❤️
Manager Response: Thank you so much for leaving us this 5-Star review! We are so glad that you enjoyed your most recent visit with us and we hope to welcome you back in the near future. Safe Travels

Summary: First of all this location is in the heart of everything in the way retail and shopping not to mention the beach is literally across the street. Very convenient.  The hotel is nice and new with a modern atmosphere. The only issue we had with the property was the beds in the room. At over 400 dollars a night it is unacceptable to have substandard bedding in that level of a hotel. The staff was very helpful during our stay and pool and hot are quite nice just crappy bed.
Manager Response: Thank you Rivsrul; for taking the time to leave this feedback. We know that you have a lot of options when choosing to stay at places and appreciate your business. We will take a look at your concerns with our bedding and bring it up in our upcoming operations meeting. We hope to see you in the near future and safe travels.

Summary: The Pasea hotel is the most mesmerizing, luxurious, and accommodating hotel I’ve ever stayed at! Upon check-in, Wael greeted my daughter and I and made us feel like we were royalty. The room we stayed in was breathtaking - incredibly spacious, trendy, upscale and the views were incredible. The hotel is located in the most convenient location - a short walk to the beach, Main Street, the pier - not to mention 20 steps from the hotel to Pacific City, an oasis of food, shopping, and entertainment. The pool is great for families and those looking for a more youthful vibe - with a DJ playing great music on the weekends. The spa is a must-do also - and the rooms are equipped with spa-level hair treatments and lotion - so chic. I visit Huntington Beach often, and will never stay
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave this amazing 5-Star review! We are so glad to see that you had such an amazing time here at Pasea. We also appreciate you taking the time to mention some of the great team members that we have here on staff. They do such a great job here on property. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future! Safe Travels

Summary: Although my room was fairly small, it was very clean and the view from the wraparound balcony was phenomenal. Most of the staff exceeded my expectations, with the exception of my dining experience. A large drunken group of partygoers got to really ruin the culinary experience for the rest of the guests and despite that being brought to the attention of multiple staff members nothing was done.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave this review. Although a 4 star review, you have left some great insight on some areas that we can be better. We will use this review as an example to help train our team in certain areas. We hope to welcome you back to our property sometime soon so that you can the full service that you deserve.

Summary Heading: The Perfect Beach Getaway-You Won't Want To Leave
Summary: This hotel embodies all things Beach and Coastal.  From the decor to the views to the service, this hotel has it all.  From your arrival you are immersed in the beach vibe, relaxing yet high energy at the same time.  The rooms are decorated well and comfortable and have balconies with great views.  The staff is friendly, helpful and professional.  Zach at the front desk was especially helpful and accommodating.  Restaurants and pool area were fun and relaxing, and the star of the show was the location.  Right across from the beach with easy access.  Can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave this amazing 5-STAR review!! We are so glad to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with us and enjoyed all the property has to offer. Thank you for also leaving a mention on Zach; he does a great job getting this property in order and maintaining our excellence. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future.

Summary Heading: Gorgeous Hotel - but Covid cautious travelers beware
Summary: First off I want to get the “pros” out there because there were several.  I want to say the hotel is gorgeous and a perfect location next to Pacific City and right across from the water.   The roof top concerts are awesome, and a nice perk! Free bottle of wine is really tasty, and also a great perk.  My husband is going through some health issues and we wanted to do a mini staycation an hour away from home before he has surgery. We stayed at the Hyatt in December and it was really nice. We wanted to change it up and chose the Pasea.  When checking in, I asked the lady about the breakfast package we had and her answer was “I think you have credit to Tanners, just charge it to the room” I asked how much credit and she said she wasn’t sure... okay, Friday afternoon checkin, I’m
Manager Response: “Thank you for taking the time to send your feedback regarding your recent stay. We’re glad you and your husband enjoyed the hotel’s location, guest room perks and Safe & Sounds rooftop concerts! We appreciate the constructive criticism as well regarding your check-in experience and have shared your feedback with the front office team to ensure all team members are fully informed on room package details.   In addition, health and safety protocols are of the utmost importance to maintain the safety of our team members and guests. As you mentioned, signage requiring face coverings, hand sanitizer stations, frequent deep cleaning and more procedures are prevalent on property (and on our website) to communicate these safety requirements to guests. That said, we will be discussing your review at our upcoming monthly health and safety meeting to ensure all team members communicate these protocols efficiently to guests, in addition to the posted signage. We’ve also increased security presence to ensure protocols are followed by guests.  Thank you again for your feedback. Reviews like yours allow us to continuously improve and train our team members. We look forward to seeing you again for a future staycation!”

Summary: We live just down the street and wanted to come hang out at the Pasea. It was a great stay. It was super fun at the pool during the summer time, there was a dj and it felt like Vegas vibe. We had a great time while our son was busy running out the pool. The room has the most perfect view too.
Manager Response: mimichau, thank you so much for taking the time to leave this review. We know that people want to have fun so we try to create memorable experiences for everyone. Once the weather heats up down here in HB, the pool is a great time! We are so happy that you were able to enjoy your time with us and we look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future.

Summary Heading: OUTSTANDING  Beach RESORT with   5 Star service!!!
Summary: Outstanding overnight with Teenage daughter and her friend for an overnight.  The Views are breathtaking, the service and food  are as good as it gets.  Upbeat and trendy hotel with special perks. with a complimentary bottle of wine, flip flops for the pool and jacuzzi that over look the Ocean. Tanners food can be enjoyed resort style while taking a dip in the pool  Very very clean  property with sanitizing stations throughout, shrink wrapped TV remotes  and and  extremely friendly  and helpful staff from Tom the valet/bell man to ANDREW  at the front desk who went above and beyond to make our stay incredibly fun and luxurious.  We all need a night away during COVID times and I could not recommend PASEO any more, and we are local from Newport.  The adjacent Pacific City makes
Manager Response: We absolutely love this review and are so glad you took the time to leave it! We know that you have a lot of places to choose from when booking but are happy you landed at Pasea. We are so glad you were able to enjoy what our property has to offer and we look forward to welcoming you back sometime soon!

Summary Heading: Outstanding service  and   Beach front accommodations!
Summary: Highly recommend this gem of a property! I was here for my daughters birthday- the views are breathtaking! The pool and jacuzzi and food from Tanners served resort style made the visit magical. The decor is bright and lively that have everything you need to melt into an oasis away from home. The beach walks out the front door, along with Pacific city adjacent to the resort make this a must for a so cal staycation or vacation to surf city. We cannot wait to come back- and ANDREW at the front desk was so kind and helpful. The entire crew are polished happy - LOVE the PASEO!!
Manager Response: Amy W, thank you for leaving this AMAZING 5 star review. We have a lot of great things to offer our guests and are so glad to hear that you enjoyed most of them! We are located in a great area that allows our guests to have many options when choosing to do things. Thank you for taking the time to also mention one of our team members. Andrew does a great job. We hope to see you sometime in the near future.

Summary: Terrible stay. They overcharged me twice and then could not explain the charges to me. Manager was rude, kept talking in circles. They have no clue what their rates are or taxes that they charge. They do not clean your room daily if you stay for more than a day. They should be cleaning more than usual during this pandemic, but instead they don’t at all until you check out.
Manager Response: Khrystya19, thank you for taking the time to leave this review. We see that your recent visit wasnt where it should have been and we believe does not represent who we are at Pasea. I ask that you reach out to Jovani Guzman, at Jguzman@paseahotel.com to further discuss your recent visit with us. We hope that we are able to resolve this and listen to your feedback. We look forward to hearing from you soon.

Summary: Pasea Hotel is an amazing hotel with wonderful, friendly staff. The aesthetic was extremely cute with a lovely set-up right near the beach as well as other restaurants and shopping. The hotel is packed with a variety of amenities to ensure that their customers have everything they may ever need! 10/10!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for leaving this amazing 5-star review! We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your recent visit with us at Pasea and are so thankful that you took the time to write about it! We look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future. Safe Traveling!

Summary: We stayed at Pasea one night to get away for a change of scenery. We had the Veuve package. The prawns were delicious. The caviar seemed like someone had already taken a shot at opening it. The tape was broken on both sides. That being said, we pried it fully open and it seemed untouched. Rather than upsetting my husband, I ate a bit. We had sushi, which was also good, but was not served with wasabi or ginger or soy sauce or anything. That being said, we were given glasses for the Veuve, and silverware (no chopsticks), but no plates!
Manager Response: xnyyorkr, thank you for leaving your recent feedback on your experience here at Pasea. There are a few things that draw some concern to me and we want to see if we can make it right. I ask that you reach out to our Front Office Manager, Jovani Guzman at Jguzman@paseahotel.com in hopes that we further discuss your recent visit with us. Thank you and we look forward to hearing from you soon.

Summary Heading: Best hotel and service in Huntington Beach!
Summary: From the time you pull in to valet to check in and the time you return to leave hotel for your stay, customer service is by far excellent! Valet staff very friendly, kind, helpful and knowledgeable of area. Check in at front desk is smooth, easy and quick. Jared at Front desk is very helpful. Rooms are clean, neat and fully stocked worth the price, I give five stars all around. Tanners restaurant staff and food are the best ever! Jessica at Tanners kind and helpful and can assist with big party groups. Over all stay breath taking!
Manager Response: bjbragg1; Thank you for taking the time to leave this amazing 5-Star review! We are so glad that you had such an amazing experience on your recent visit with us. Thank you for also taking the time to name some of our amazing team members! They do such a great job around Pasea and we are lucky to have them. We hope to see you back at Pasea sometime soon.

Summary: My girl and I had a great time here. Everything was excellent. The room was great, and so was the view. The Valentine’s package was excellent. We received Sushi, Prawns, Caviar, and a bottle of Champagne. The hotel provided Beach Cruisers so that we could take a ride around the neighborhood and down to the beach. The jacuzzi was warm and felt great. Also, they didn’t complain when I went a few minutes over check out time. Thumbs up. I’ll definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: WOW! We love this review. We are so happy that you were able to join us for the Valentines Day weekend! Our F&B team did amazing in prepping and it was definitely a successful weekend for all. We hope that you come back soon to visit. Safe Travels!

Summary Heading: Experience is Everything- Pasea is a unique jewel
Summary: Pasea created a unique and exceptional experience for my daughter and son-in-law celebrating their 1st wedding anniversary.  The service and staff are there for guests not only at check in but throughout your entire stay. They are welcoming, professional and make you feel so comfortable you just don't want to leave.  The wine, flip flops and cozy robes in every room make you feel special. The hotel is so clean there was never a worry.  Highly recommend this property looking for a special experience.
Manager Response: cindyvilla2021, thank you for this AMAZING 5-Star review!!! We try to continue to set the bar higher and higher here at Pasea. We are so happy that your daughter and son-in-law had such a great time here at Pasea and we hope that we created long lasting memories for their 1st wedding anniversary. We hope to welcome them back sometime soon in the near future.

Summary Heading: A lovely option for a mini SoCal getaway  🥰
Summary: Overall this is an adorable property that I'd recommend for folks who, like me, need a break from being stuck in their abodes 24 hours a day. My husband and I visited this weekend and  stayed in a standard, non-oceanfront guest room on the second floor. If you're considering staying here for a mini-getaway, check out my list of pros and cons below.  Pros : • The staff are generally attentive and accommodating.  • Free bottle of wine upon check-in -- the easiest way to my heart! ❤️ 🍷 • located close to the pier and some fabulous restaurants. I highly recommend Pacific Hideaway if you're into Latin American and Asian fusion food. 🌮 • Spacious rooms, including a sizeable walk-in shower. 🚿 • Noticeable attention to detail that elevates the guest experience. From the immaculately
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to leave this detailed review. We are happy to see that the pros significantly outweighed the cons; but will definitely take the feedback and use it as a learning opportunity for us to get better. Overall we are happy to see that you enjoyed your recent visit with us and we look froward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future so that we can earn that 5-star review. Until then, safe travels and stay safe!

Summary: Bravo Pasea Bravo!! My husband and I decided to do a early Valentine’s Day get away a week before Valentine’s. We stayed 1 night at the Pasea and they we extremely accommodating! They offered to make us dinner reservations, directions to any places we were curious about and made us feel like a valued guest. We highly recommend this hotel! The staff is friendly and goes out of their way! A bell boy named David even remembered me and my husband from a year ago, and said welcome back! We were surprised he remembered us. The morning coffee was delicious from BLEND the little shop/ cafe down stairs. They have all the necessary provisions you could need! My husband even found Advil for my headache/ little hangover at Blend. They have you covered. Staff, bartenders, bellboy, valet, and
Manager Response: Adriane C, thank you so much for this amazing 5-star Review!! We are so happy that you were able to enjoy Pasea and all that we have to offer! We also appreciate you mentioned all of the amazing team members that we have here at Pasea. We are so happy that you enjoyed you early Valentines Day celebrations and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future! Safe Traveling until then!

Summary: Had a great stay at Pasea, had a dinner / drinks at Tanners and really enjoyed. Wael from the front desk especially was great to interact with. Service was also great with fast responsiveness to our guest requests. Definitely recommend as a place to stay with friends, family or for business. Check pasea out for sure.
Manager Response: kumeilhosain, thank you for taking the time to leave this amazing 5-star review! We are so glad that we are now able to open up all of the amenities that we have to offer around property. We are so glad that you were able to enjoy Tanners for some drinks and dinner. They do such an amazing job. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future. Safe Travels!

Summary: Samantha checked us in and out.  Very helpful, friendly, and professional.  She made feel welcome.  David was our valet and was excellent.  He was wonderful with the luggage.  We had so many small pieces and he was careful and patient.  We bought our dogs and he told us all about their own dog park, and got a bed and bowl for them. Miguel was a fantastic bar tender.  He went out of his way to customize our drinks.  He really wanted to make sure we enjoyed them.     We did not get to use the surfboards or bikes the hotel provides but the pool was great.  Salt water is the best.    The location is perfect.  Great views and close to several dining and shopping options.    I’ve seen some negative reviews about how the property lacks proper COVID safety protocols.  I didn’t find that
Manager Response: Thank you so much for leaving this detailed 5-star review. From the beginning we have done our best to follow local guidelines in regards to COVID and continue to learn and adapt as we hear more. We are happy to see that you felt safe and noticed the precautions that we are taking. We are so glad that you enjoyed your time with us. Samantha is a great team member on the front desk team and does a great job with all of our guests. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime soon. Until then, Safe Travels!

Summary: What a great place to stay in Huntington.  I would call this a luxury adult resort.  When we bring our kids we stay at the Hilton next door.  But, for couples or adult groups, this place is terrific!! The decor, rooms and lobby are beautiful.  The pool is great too!  Right next door to Pacific city so your meals are just steps away.  It is pricey $$$ but what isn't?
Manager Response: Dairygirl1, thank you for the 5-star review! We absolutely love this review. We are so glad that you were able to enjoy the property on your most recent visit with us. The weather is starting to get nice again and we look forward to welcoming you back for more fun in the future. Safe Travels!

Summary: I booked our room for my wife’s birthday after driving and walking past many times, the price was surprisingly low sub $300 a night.  The valet is prompt and convenient, once in the lobby the smell is freaking amazing, fresh flowers and a spacious interior, front desk staff was quick and courteous, free water and wine in the room Heck yes!! Once we got to our room we were surprised at how clean, and how well the room flows, great balcony, nice bathroom. Exactly what it should be. The soaps and lotions are fantastic. ( lotion is $21 bucks in the spa and well worth it)  overall a fantastic stay, no complaints at all and I’m really picky.  Even took home some free pasea flip flops.  This hotel has every detail right, even the surfboard room key.  Now if I could find out what that
Manager Response: WOW! We love this review. We are so glad that you were able to choose Pasea on your most recent visit to Huntington Beach. Here at Pasea we have a lot to offer and know that people are needing a good time out. Thank you for taking the time to leave this feedback as it is a great way to celebrate with our team. P.S. we sell the lobby scent at our coffee shop and in the spa in candle form. We look forward to welcoming you back so you are able to get a couple. Until then, Safe Travels!

Summary: What a phenomenal experience! Amazing view, amazing service and amazing room. We were so happy to stay here and made Huntington Beach such a great experience. Also, Jovani & all staff was top notch . A1! Service thank you and we will be back
Manager Response: nLellouche07, thank you for leaving this review. We know that their is a lot of options to choose from when booking and we are glad that you chose Pasea. We have a great team here and we thank you for taking the time to mention them. It was a great weekend here at the hotel and are glad you enjoyed your time. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future.

Summary: This hotel is amazing! I wish I knew the names of every employee in this place because everyone deserves a  5 Star Review! A special shout out to Wael and Andrew for going above and beyond! Everyone was friendly, accommodating, kind, and went above and beyond. Bikes and scooters r available to use...pool, hot tub super clean, lavish, and fun. View from pool area, hotel rooms, and Blue Room are ‘mic drop’ perfect! While the online pics are  nice, it is more stunning in person! (The ‘vibe’ is so cool).   We attended a wedding here and it was also perfect! The views from the Blue Room were stunning, food and service top notch. Im not alone in my feelings; heard the same thing over and over again from other guests.  Bravo...this place deserves a standing ovation!  We have to leave
Manager Response: We absolutely love this review! Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this detailed review. Also we appreciate you naming a few of our team members as well. They do such a great job and are constantly going above and beyond for our guests. We happy to see that you had an amazing time and look forward to you joining us sometime in the near future. Safe Traveling.

Summary: My family and I needed a quick get away! We love coming to the Pasea! I was welcomed back by the staff as if they knew us personally. The manager Jovani was so thoughtful and gave my son some beach toys! He also checked on us later that day at the pool! The attention to detail is exactly why my family will always stay at this property. Thank you for doing a great job as usual. We will be back soon!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave this review. It was a great weekend here at Pasea and are so glad that you were able to come down and enjoy the weekend with us. Jovani does a great job with our guests as well as the rest of the staff. We are glad that you enjoyed your time and we look forward to welcoming you back sometime soon.

Summary: In these awkward times of covid I was lucky enough to come stay here for two weeks. It was awesome and they never disappoint. Great hotel! They have live music on the roof. The pool and jacuzzi are open! Comfy beds and the best sunsets. I have to shout out the manager here Gio Guzman he has been wonderful and so helpful arranging the stay for me. I’m thankful for the time I spent here!
Manager Response: COVID has thrown us all for a loop we weren't expecting but here at Pasea we have tried to re-invent comfort and fun. The roof top concert series have been a huge success and our guests love it. Where else can you get live music right now? Thank you so much for leaving this review and mentioning one of our managers. We hope to see you sometime in the future. Safe traveling!

Summary: Thank you so much to Wael & Spencer for getting us a suite at a great rate and being so helpful with a lost item. Great customer service, quick and very attentive.  Beautiful hotel with ocean views. Clean, fresh water -wonderful views!
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear that you chose Pasea as your recent get away. Thank you for taking the time to leave feedback on Wael and Spencer. They both do an amazing job around the hotel and we are thankful to have them on the team. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future.

Summary: We had a wonderful stay at the Pasea! Would have preferred to know the hours of food service availability as the restaurant and room service closed early and then Tanners was not open the last day of our stay.
Manager Response: CaliTraveler2021, thank you for taking the time to leave this review. We look forward to the days that we can fully operate like a resort again but until then, we will continue to be creative. We look forward to welcoming you back when we are fully operational again. Safe Travels!

Summary Heading: Checking in Pressure to upgrade stay.
Summary: I always enjoying stay here but this time was so different!!!! Upon checking in I was asked 3 times to upgrade to a wonderful Suite. Each time the price went down($50). It also wasted time to check in. On the 3rd time i gave in and felt this was the only way to check in. Well the room was not wonderful it was just okay. I was able to notice that wear and tear has taking a toll on this property. Not work the $570.00 extra i had to pay.
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving this recent review on your recent stay with us here at Pasea. I do apologize that you ran into this issue as this is completely unacceptable. I ask that you reach out to our Front Office Manager, Jovani Guzman at Jguzman@paseahotel.com so that we can gather more information and try to gain your trust with us again. Thank you and we look forward to hearing from you soon.

Summary: Stayed at the hotel during Christmas- all employees were fabulous and followed guidelines for distancing. The Staff at Tanners were awesome and can't thank them enough- especially the bartenders!!  Housekeeping staff was always out cleaning and spraying areas. Thank you so much..
Manager Response: E1097KIninap , thank you so much for taking the time to leave this 5-star review! We are so glad that you were able to join us over the Christmas Holiday. We know that these times are difficult for everyone but we are glad that you were able to find some comfort during your time with us. We hope to see you sometime in the near future and Happy New Year!

Summary: We have been to this resort four times now and it never dissapoints. This is hands down  the best hotel in Huntington Beach. This time we were impressed with the creative ideas they came up with to cope with the pandemic. They had a rooftop concert while we were there! They also moved their gym out onto the wedding terrace. It was nice to work out while looking at the ocean. The staff is always so friendly. One of our favorite details is all the free equipment they loan out. We were able to use their scooters and went all the way to Newport. We have also used their bikes and chairs. The resort is located right next to a mall full of delicious food and great stores. The spa is also very relaxing.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Had a great time watching a concert from our balcony. View of pier and ocean/beach were spectacular. Sam at check-in set the mood perfectly. Clean, safe accommodations. Looking forward to returning soon.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Pros- Location, beach cruiser access, pool, jacuzzi, ice skating rink, live music, free bottle of wine. Cons- Carpet in the room was stained; room service is only available from 11am-7:30pm, so you can’t order breakfast before check out; the guests in the room next to us were up partying until 4am and we could hear everything through the walls; the ice skating rink is nice, but very crowded.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My boyfriend & I had the best time at the pasea this past weekend! I think what made it feel extra special was the amazing accommodations from the staff. Specifically Jared at the front desk! He made our stay so much more relaxing & fun by getting our dogs beds so they were comfy too! He recommended some covid compliant activities for us to do like ice skating. He was so helpful and attentive for all of our needs throughout the weekend ! Our trip wouldn’t of been the same without him! ❤️
Manager Response: We absolutely love this review. Thank you Ashblastt, for taking the time and leaving us this amazing 5 star review. We are so glad that you chose to stay with us here at Pasea and are glad that you had an amazing time. Thank you for also taking the time to leave some feedback about some of our team members. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future. Safe Travels!

Summary: My wife was going to stay with my 2 daughters overnight but ripped the tip of her thumb almost all the way off trying to stop the room door from closing. Those door close way too fast at the end. Is that even ADA?  I ended up taking her home after the rooftop concert.
Manager Response: tjs686, thank you for leaving us this feedback on your most recent stay with us. This is unfortunate that this is how you had to spend your time with us and not how we like our guests to enjoy their time. We ask that you reach out to our Front Office Manager, Jovani Guzman at Jguzman@paseahotel.com to further discuss your recent visit with us. We look froward to hearing back from you soon.

Summary: Great place to stay when going to HB.  The hotel is amazing, Our room was perfect and we had a spectacular view of the pier. The staff at The Pasea made us feel welcomed and readily answered any questions we had.   Tanners food was amazing and had a fun atmosphere.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Me and 2 girlfriends decided to stay one night at The Pasea to enjoy Tanners and the beautiful hotel!  I have stayed several times at your hotel as it is my favorite place in HB.  It was fun, festive and everyone was so helpful and friendly.  The roof top singer sang Happy Birthday to me from the ROOFTOP!!!!  SOOOO FUN!!  Thank you for making this such a quality place to enjoy, great food, great drinks, great people and take in all the Christmas Decor!!!  You guys are awesome!!!!  Happy Girl Michelle
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I enjoyed the most wonderful weekend at Pasea. The hotel is beautiful and there are so many little touches to appreciate, even during COVID. It was spotlessly clean and the staff were wonderful. We felt welcomed and safe at every moment. The food at Tanner's was fantastic - the salmon tacos are amazing.
Manager Response: sarahckruer2020, thank you for taking the time to leave this amazing 5-star review. We are so happy that you enjoyed our property and glad you were able to enjoy Tanners as well. They do a great job over there! We look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future. Safe Travels!

Summary: We stayed this past weekend for my husband's birthday. Samantha went above and beyond even before we were on property - helping me get the room decorated, reserving a fire pit for ice skating and arranging a special dessert tray! (The chocolate covered strawberries were to die for!) She had awesome recommendations for places to dine too and overall was the most pleasant person to interact with!   The room was fantastic with an awesome view! David, the bell captain, was super helpful as was the entire staff! Would highly recommend!!
Manager Response: MelSize, thank you for taking the time to leave this awesome 5 star review. We are happy to see some of the awesome photos that you posted as well. Sam is a great part of our team and we are so happy to have her here at Pasea. We look forward to inviting you back sometime soon.

Summary: We have stayed multiple times at Pasea, it is our "go to" spot when visiting our son. We were a bit disappointed this go around  not only with the cost/value of the food (room service & Thanksgiving buffet) but also with a wedding at the hotel. It was a complete takeover once the wedding party arrived. the pool was covered with a dance floor and the whole pool area was shut off to other guests. One of the main things we enjoy is coffee by the pool/jacuzzi in the mornings. We were not expecting to lose access to pool amenities, this is something that is part of the "resort fee" and i think it was not fair to make this unavailable for 2 days and with no compensation. Additionally, the wedding was extremely loud but they did at least stop fairly early so it wasn't too bad.
Manager Response: I5914GKandrea, thank you for leaving this review and giving us feedback on your recent stay. We see that you are a regular visitor and ask that when you do decide to return, please reach out to our Front Office Manager, Jovani Guzman at jguzman@paseahotel.com so that we can make sure we make it up to you for the pool being closed on your recent visit. We look froward to welcoming you back sometime soon!

Summary Heading: Excellent staff, wonderful location, breathtaking views from the Rooms- Great COVID get away
Summary: With COVID it’s been a major disappointment as my family and I have had to cancel many international trips.  We are a family that typically travels about 100 days a year around the world.  We mostly stay in nice hotels.   Because of COVID we are taking many trips closer to home around California.  A few months ago my wife and I stayed at the Hyatt Regency in Huntington Beach a few buildings down from the Pasea Hotel.    While we were walking around we saw this beautiful hotel next to the Pacific City Mall.  It looked really modern and beautiful.  We decided we would stay here in an upcoming visit.  We decided to stay here 3 days right after Thanksgiving.   When looking at TripAdvisor we read many great 5 star reviews and we  also read some 1 star reviews.   I’ve been a member of
Manager Response: WOW! We absolutely love this review! Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this 5-star review. We can see by your profile that you are well traveled and know what hospitality is all about. We know how challenging these times have been on our guests; so we know the importance of ensuring all of our guests feel safe when traveling. Here at Pasea we have always cared about the safety of our guests but have since taken them to the next level. We are glad to hear that you were able to notice some of those enhancements and that you are your family felt comfortable around our property. It is also nice to see that you were able to enjoy some of the amenities that we have here for our guests. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back real soon. Until then, Safe Travels!

Summary Heading: Amenties closed when told they were open
Summary: I stay at the hotels along the PCH in Huntington Beach quite often.   We usually stay elsewhere, but thought we'd try the Pasea this time.   Understanding some hotel amenities might be closed due to the pandemic, I called two weeks before our arrival, and was told only the fitness center would be closed.   I called again the day before and was told the pool would also be closed, so I specifically asked about the hot tub.  I was told it would be available.   We arrived and was immediately told the upstairs bar would be closed for our entire stay, as would the pool AND hot tub.  Since the upstairs bar also includes a fire pit, I asked about the fire pits over by the green space.   Unavailable, they said, unless we wanted to pay $150 to rent it for a couple hours.    We wanted
Manager Response: 804markd, Thank you for taking some time to leave us with some recent feedback on your most recent visit with us. I do apologize that we did not communicate properly about the update with our amenities over the weekend on your visit with us. Your recent experience with us is not how we want our guests to enjoy Pasea. I ask that you reach out to our Front Office Manager, Jovani Guzman at jguzman@paseahotel.com to further discuss your recent stay with us. Thank you and we look forward to hearing from you.

Summary: awesome hotel, super clean and chic. I would give this place a five star rating due to the customer service Jovani Guzman provided. he went above and beyond to make sure our stay was fantastic. he went out of his way to ensure all voices are heard and that our accommodation was well taken care of. awesome views, smell, and location. highly recommended especially if Jovani continues to be front desk manager. would promote him if I was the owner of this hotel.
Manager Response: B3796BWandrewv, thank you for leaving this awesome 5-Star review. We have taken our cleaning measures to the next level and have made sure to enhance our safety protocol for our team members and our guests. Thank you for also mentioning a staff member. They make things happen here at Pasea and we are truly blessed with the teams that we have here. We look forward to your next stay with us here at Pasea. Safe Travels.

Summary: Service is excellent, hotel is clean, beautiful view definitely five stars! This is our second visit. Wael is very knowledgeable provides excellent customer service. Beautiful view. Gorgeous modern rooms. Everything you need is in walking distance - mail, restaurant, beach.
Manager Response: We love this review! Thank you for leaving this 5-star review. Wael is a great part of our staff and we are lucky to have him apart of the front office team. They do such an amazing job for the hotel. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future.

Summary Heading: Beautiful Hotel in the Perfect Location
Summary: My husband and I booked a weekend getaway at this beautiful boutique hotel. They follow COVID safety guidelines so we felt very comfortable staying there.  The whole staff is super friendly and helpful. They made us feel welcomed from check-in until the moment we left the hotel.  The décor is minimalistic with clean lines. The room was super clean and had everything we needed...even a bottle of white wine! The partial ocean view made us not want to leave the room at all.  Tanner’s restaurant offers a great brunch menu (delicious fried chicken and biscuits) in a perfect location overlooking at the amazing pool, kiddie pool, jacuzzi and ocean.  We were also able to enjoy the really cool atmosphere at Treehouse, the roof top bar and lounge with live music and great cocktails.  They
Manager Response: At MissTha, We appreciate you taking the time to leave this fantastic detailed review. We are truly located in one of the best spots here in Orange County and have really taken advantage of it. During these covid times we have had to be creative and take chances. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed the roof top concerts and we look forward to welcoming back you and your husband sometime in the near future.

Summary: I live in HB and still try to find reasons to stay at Pasea.  My favorite staycation!  Salt water pool and spa are LOVELY.  The views are amazing and the location is perfect.  It is right next to Pacific City, so there is plenty to do if  you are not in the mood for sandy toes.  Staff is equally amazing and so sweet.  Highly recommend!
Manager Response: We absolutely love this 5-star review! Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us here. We appreciate the nice words about our staff as they are the ones who make this place run. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future. Until then, safe travels!

Summary: Jared over the phone was very helpful !!!!! Also the hotel and bar was amazing, due to the shutdown we were there all night !! Room was clean and very nice, bathroom was awesome  !!! We drank looking at ocean from second story  Thank u Jared
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving this review and mentioning one of our team members. Pasea offers the best views here in Huntington Beach of the pacific ocean. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future.

Summary Heading: Best Spot for Southern California Beaches
Summary: Extremely helpful and polite staff. Beautiful rooms with plenty of hotel amenities. Very clean hotel following all COVID-19 safety procedures. We had a very nice getaway for this trip. Thank you Pasea!
Manager Response: We absolutely love this review! We thank you so much for sharing this review and we are so happy that you and your family had a wonderful time here. We hope that your travels bring you back to Pasea sometime in the near future!

Summary: My sister and I planned a getaway to Topanga Canyon that was cancelled last-minute so planned  a three-day getaway at the beach. The moment we walked into the hotel, we were struck by the lovely clean smell and the beautiful hotel. The valet, Miguel, was eager and full of personality, and Garrett at the front desk couldn't have been friendlier or more helpful. The one bottle of complimentary wine was tasty and we enjoyed the sunset from our balcony overlooking the beautiful ocean/beach. What no-one mentions is that the oceanfront room also overlooks a very busy highway that is noisy and ugly. I guess I misunderstood that this hotel was not right on the beach. They boast of concierge beach service......what this means is they provide umbrellas and chairs and you shlep them
Manager Response: CrazyhazyPlano, we thank you for leaving this detailed message. This allows us to go back and review how we are doing and where we can get better. I ask that you reach out to Jovani Guzman, Jguzman@paseahotel.com to further discuss some of the issues that happened on your recent visit. We hope to resolve some of these issues for you and look forward to hearing from you.

Summary: Some friends and I came down for a birthday weekend and it was the perfect place for our large group. Property is absolutely stunning from the decor to the ocean sunset views, it just can't be beat. Checking in was seamless and easy and there is always a staff member nearby. Brunch at Tanners was one of the highlights of our trip, highly recommend. Everyone was happy with their breakfast and the service was great. It is located walking distance to Pacific City which is filled with various shops and restaurants. Overall the hotel and location exceeded our expectations. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for leaving this awesome 5 star review. We know that setting up plans can be challenging during COVID so we are thrilled to hear you had an amazing time celebrating a friends birthday. We look forward to celebrating more events here with you at Pasea in the near future.

Summary: My husband and I have stayed at Pasea for the last six years in the fall. It’s the perfect time to visit with the weather still nice and the beach and shops less crowded.  The service is exceptional starting when we arrive the bellman Dave Ervin remembers us by name every year. He gets our trip going with great suggestions on places to visit while we’re here. He makes us feel welcome! The decor and the vibe is pure Huntington Beach. Having grown up here and Huntington I was skeptical at first of a local vibe hotel but they have pulled it off. Whether we’re sitting and playing cards in the lobby or enjoying a meal at Tanners or The treehouse, just spending time in the hotel is a treat in itself. The location is amazing right next to Pacific City and across the street from the
Manager Response: Thank you taking the time to leave this 5 star review. We also appreciate you taking the time to mention David. He is a huge asset to our team and we are lucky to have him. Since we are practically neighbors, we look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future.

Summary: I live in the area and came down for a little staycation get away and it could not have been easier! Rooms were gorgeous and sanitary. The staff are polite and ready to serve you. The ocean view and heated jacuzzi just can’t be beat. The grounds were immaculate and you can tell that management pays close attention to detail. Very impressed and would highly recommend!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Location but Spa is NOISY
Summary: Great location near the beach! Beautiful view and lovely location. Tanner's was overpriced and food was subpar. Spa was great but a bit noisy as it's near a street. Overall experience was good. Would return with my spouse again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My daughter and I just returned from a 2 night stay at Pasea Hotel & Spa. Beautiful hotel.  Very clean. Great location.  The ocean view heated pool and jacuzzi are excellent.  Having access anytime to the bikes were a huge benefit. The food is good.  I have nothing negative to say about Pasea Hotel & Spa.  I would highly recommend Pasea Hotel & Spa!
Manager Response: Thank you Jeff R for leaving this review. We are so happy that you and your daughter had a great time with us. We see you visited from La Jolla? Make sure that you check out our sister property, Estancia in the near future. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: Our stay was nothing short of amazing. All of the staff was welcoming and very friendly. Prime location, steps away from the beach. The grounds were immaculate and beautiful. Our room was cozy, clean, and very well lit-all of which is controlled from a control panel by the entrance. Management here pays attention to detail and it is all very much appreciated. We enjoyed everything from the complimentary chilled bottle of wine to the Keurig machine. The beach view was spectacular from our balcony. No need to leave the property as all of the amenities provided were up to par, however if you do, no need to drive as restaurants and an outdoor mall is adjacent to the hotel. Very impressed and highly recommended. Thank you for allowing us to enjoy our staycation just as we'd hope!
Manager Response: WOW! This review is one of our favorites. We thank you for taking the time to leave this 5-star review. We are so happy to hear that you had such an amazing time on your recent visit with us. We truly as blessed to be surrounded by SURF CITY USA! We hope that you come back soon and check out our ice skating rink that we are putting in for the holiday season. It is the only ocean front ice skating rink in California this year.

Summary: Where do I start? This place is phenomenal! It’s beautiful and right by the beach. I planned a weekend getaway for my daughters 13th bday and although I had 6 children with me, we had a great time. This place is super family and adult friendly. The food is delicious and the service we received was  5 star! It all began in valet when Andres greeted us with a smile. He was fast at getting us checked in and took our bags straight to Miguel who was our bell man. Miguel was also very sweet and helpful. Thank you to all the staff at pasea!! We will be back soon for an adults only getaway!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for leaving this amazing review! We are so glad that you were able to spend your daughters birthday here. We know that during this time things can get a little tricky, but are so glad that you chose Pasea. Thank you for also mentioning some of our amazing team members. They do such a fantastic job and it starts with all of them. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary Heading: A bit disappointing this time around
Summary: This was our 2nd stay at this hotel.  The location is fabulous, the weddings we got to view from our room were fun to see.  They did have a rooftop band that played a "distance" set to watch from our balcony.  The first downside to this trip was the lack of communication.  We knew we had some sort of resort credit with our reservation however didn't have the details and expected to learn about it at check in.  Nothing was brought up during the process so my husband asked and she said "oh yes, you have a $50 credit".  When I asked if that was per day or for our entire stay she said "for the stay".  Later that evening I called down to ask if there were restrictions on the credit and when we could use it.  The gentleman I spoke with was very friendly and explained that it was $50
Manager Response: Thank you Michelle C, for taking the time to leave this review about your time with us. This feedback allows us to see where we are and how we can improve. I ask that you reach out to our Front Office Manager, Jovani Guzman at Jguzman@paseahotel.com to further discuss your time with us. We hope to resolve this in a timely manner.

Summary: Pasea is the best Resort in OC, especially for the weekend get away.   The location is the best, and is connected to the Pacific Mall.  We really like the decor and amenities as well.   I have stayed couple times this year and were very happy each time.  Their hotel staff, including Tanners Restaurant,  were very friendly. Jovanii, the front desk Manager is wonderful, and so does with Ed their Restaurant Manager.   I highly recommended the Pasea for the couple and family too.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this 5-Star review. We absolutely love to hear that you had a great time with us and thank you for mentioning some of our amazing team members. We look forward to your return soon!

Summary Heading: Don't waste your money and stay away.
Summary: I stayed at this hotel last summer and I had by far the worst experience ever. First of all I went there I saw the room I booked online and I didn't like it, so I went back to the front desk and asked if there was any Oceanview room available to upgrade. They said yes, with an additional $250 per night I agreed to the price and when we went there I found out that the room was not an Oceanview it was a "kind of a side Oceanview". Second of all, we tried to go to Tanner's at the hotel and they told us that we had to stand on the line even though we are staying at the hotel, after 45 minutes at the line I spoke with the people at the front decks and then they let us go in saying they didn't know we were guest at the hotel even though I told whoever was at the doors that we are
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving this review. We appreciate the feedback and would like the opportunity to further hear from you about your time with us. We ask that you reach out to our Front Office Manager, Jovani Guzman at Jguzman@paseahotel.com so that we have a chance to resolve some of the issues that occurred during your time with us.

Summary: Wyel at the Front Desk was so helpful and pleasant! We are coming back because of him! 😊 We love how close Pasea is to the beach and the view from our balconies! The rooms are so clean and bright and we loooveee the shampoo, conditioner and body wash. 😊
Manager Response: We love this review and definitely agree Wael is awesome! Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this fantastic review. We look forward to you coming back in the near future sometime soon!

Summary Heading: Not great for ridiculous pricing and hype
Summary: Overpriced and service was sub par when it came to the room. They didn’t clean our room once during 5 day stay even after asking them to do so. Didn’t respond to us asking for toilet paper and towels either and had to track them down myself to get them.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for leaving this review. It is unfortunate that you had to experience Pasea the way that you did. I ask that you reach out to our Front Office Manager, Jovani Guzman at jguzman@paseahotel.com in order to further talk about your experience and hopefully resolve some of the issues at hand.

Summary: Surprised my hubby with a quick getaway.  I was get one that was surprised with all of the amenities this hotel offered. Complementary bikes and scooters to start,  there was so much we couldn’t cut it all in in just one day. Also the bite from our room was amazing.
Manager Response: We love this review! We are so glad that you ended up here at Pasea for your getaway. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future!

Summary: The staff was wonderful. We arrived very early on check in day but they got a room ready for us way before check in time. The room was very clean.  Pacific City was right next door so there were many food options. We would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much @Hilypenny for leaving this review. We are so glad that you were able to join us here at Pasea and enjoy your most recent stay. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime in the near future. Safe Travels!

Summary: Watch out for the ‘bait and switch’ - offer a staycation deal, then try to upsell you to Suite or ocean view and take away staycation benefits - understaffed, staff condescending- never staying there again!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Do NOT stay here! Lying and unfriendly staff
Summary: I stayed here with a few of my friends to celebrate my birthday and we could not have had more of a terrible stay. From the moment we checked in with the valet, they were extremely unfriendly and took the car with all of our stuff before we even had the chance to grab anything. Then, when we asked for them to bring the car back they were insisting on grabbing our stuff from the car for us and were very stubborn to bring us OUR OWN car back! The lady at the front desk couldn’t even muster a smile and refused to answer any questions I had by giving me very short and vague answers. Furthermore, I asked an employee where the stairs were and he blatantly LIED to me and said the building didn’t have any! Imagine the effect that false information could have had in the event of an
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed for the weekend at the Pasea Hotel and Spa for first time. This is a Beautiful Resort, Ocean front! Our first impression, The Valet staff, they were so helpful and enthusiastic.  The moment we walked into the Hotel was perfection! Relaxing ambiance, upscale and modern decoration. Fell in love with the Wall Art specially the creative one from Local Artist Jorg Dubin which is 1,400 rubber flip flops check it out!   Front desk staff greeted us immediately and We were extremely lucky to be welcome by Wael , it’s the best help and service you could ever ask for, he was so courteous, kind, caring and attentive, the type of service and attention you only get at a 5 star hotel and that was our whole experience at Pasea! Thank you so much Wael!! You made our stay truly
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The Best Help And Service You Could Ever Ask For!
Summary: I really don’t think I’ve ever received as much help, enthusiasm and a positive attitude from an establishment ever! Contacting the Pasea two months ago I spoke to a young lady by the name of Samantha, who helped me arrange several rooms, parking, cabana, and all manor of special touches for friends that I was hesitant we may not  receive. This young lady in our eyes was the reason we received the best stay possible, and enjoyed our three night stay in these trying times. 8 of us left this morning, and are still talking about our wonderful stay at the Pasea! I do hope senior management read this review, not because I rarely leave one... but because you need to know your staff, and the excellent 1st class service that they deliver are appreciated. I would have no hesitation in
Manager Response: We absolutely love this review! Thank you so much for taking the team to leave a review on one of our team members. Sam has always been a team player and is constantly putting our guests first. We are so happy that you were able to join us here at Pasea and we look forward to your return in the near future. Safe Travels!

Summary: Room was WONDERFUL, view was breathtaking! Everything was well kept, I was very hesitant about traveling during this time AND being 7 months pregnant, however, the staff at Pasea Hotel were more than welcoming and caring during my stay. Not only did my family and I felt safe, it was as if we were right at home. The cleanliness of this hotel was impeccable and overall location was perfect. The best part is that the shopping and dining areas are all walking distance. This was our very first time here and I must say, my family and I will definitely come back!
Manager Response: WOW! We thank you so much for taking the time to leave this amazing review. We are so happy that you felt safe during your recent stay with us. We look forward to a return visit to celebrate the addition to the family. Safe Travels and here at Pasea we wish you the best and healthy pregnancy.

Summary: I'm tired of detailing my account as it's been a nightmare. But long story short they charged $4200+ completely bogus and erroneous - it's like someone thought it would be funny. It was management and front desk. I NEVER complain, I usually stay within the Mariot Family and frequent the Ritz with Rewards. Never at a low end or high end hotel have I been treated in such a disrespectful manner- it ended up being obvious they were making a mockery. I'm sorry I don't care how much money you think someone has, I would be broke if businesses took advantage like this, or if I spent money like that on what was supposed to be a two day trip- cancelled. You name it, they charged it...it was all over the map. They stopped answering my phone calls and e-mails. Now when I call once they
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave this review. Although this does not sound like our team here at Pasea, I fully understand that this can be a frustrating time. In order to fully get this resolved; I ask that you reach out to our accounting department at accounting@paseahotel.com in order to properly go over your recent folio. We hope that we are able to resolve this in a timely manner.

Summary: When I take the time to post a review, it is either because the place is outstanding in some positive way (not this place) or it is a total waste of my fleeting life and I want nothing more than to spare another human the costly agony of regretful spending. The latter is my motivation. I'm here for a wedding. The price for a double room is 250 plus tax. To park your car 20 (this is discounted if you can believe it). The car must be valeted. Every time you need something from your car, you must call for it and they bring it up and then they must drive it back down. Tip tip tip. The room's air-conditioning wasn't functioning to speed. Getting dressed in 77 degree humid air isn't pleasant. The hot water was lukewarm at best. Is this place a spa? No wash cloths. Apparently they ran
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this review. During your recent stay I know that we had some outages that wiped all of the hotels out on this grid. We worked effortlessly to try and get this resolved as soon as we could. I ask that you reach out to our Front Office Manager Jovani Guzman, jguzman@paseahotel.com in order to resolve this issue in a timely manner.

Summary: Came here after arranging babysitting and trying to spend a minute alone with my wife but instead we were set with disappointment from the beginning.    The facility itself is nice and well taken care of, but the staff is not particularly pleasant or helpful.     On our arrival, even though we had let the hotel know before we got here that its our anniversary,  I reminded the front desk at check in of our special weekend and to please make sure we get a nice room.   So what do we get?  A room with 2 full size beds! I mean really?  I just told you I am here with my wife....a King bed would be more appropriate.    So then we are changed to a "King bed" room....but where???   On the 2nd floor with a view of the restaurant exhaust vents.....oh not to mention the balcony next to me
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave this review. I do apologize about some of the inconveniences that occurred during your recent visit with us. I ask that you please reach out to our Front Office Manager, Jovani Guzman, jguzman@paseahotel.com in order to try and correct some of these issues. We hope that we are able to get this corrected in a timely manner.

Summary: My family and I just stayed at this beautiful resort that was in the perfect location in HB.  Ocean front and everything was impeccably clean.  Every staff member was kind and courteous and always had smiling eyes which is important to see because everyone wore masks and enforced it which is also an important factor for my family nowadays to feel safe because of Covid.  I always seen the hotel cleaning staff working diligently to make sure all surfaces were clean and there was sanitizer readily available throughout the resort and our room, and even in the elevator!  This resort is close and walking distance to many things around the area so there’s always something to do.  The beach is directly in front of the resort and there’s even a mall next door with a food hall and coffee
Manager Response: 67pamelay, We absolutely love this review! We thank you so much for sharing this review and we are so happy that you and your family had a wonderful time here. We hope that your travels bring you back to Pasea sometime in the near future!

Summary: this hotel is perfect. Wonderful staff, especially Catie in the coffee shop, she was so helpful with all of our questions about the hotel. The hotel was well ran, safe, always guarded elevators to keep guest-only able to reach the rooms. Loved that. The restaurant, Tanners was delicious would definitely stay there again. Very large spa and pool with the view of the beach was wonderful.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review. We know that this may a new experience when traveling but safety is our main focus for all of our guests. Thank you for mentioning some of our amazing team members. We look forward to your return at the hotel soon.

Summary: This review is for Caty. I just wanted to say how wonderful she made my stay. We lunched at Tanners and she encouraged us to enjoy the rooftop concert, as well as all the other wonderful amenities the hotel has to offer. She made us feel extra special during our time, and I can’t wait to visit again! Thank you again, Caty!
Manager Response: 770jocelynb, we appreciate you taking the team to leave us this 5-Star review. We also appreciate mentioning Caty. She does a great job with our F&B teams. We will make sure to show her this review! We look forward to inviting you back to Pasea real soon. Safe Traveling!

Summary: We came for a girls birthday weekend trip and had the most amazing experience!! From the customer service provided by Caty, to the friendly and prompt service at Tanners the restaurant!
