Definitely planning on returning for a future visit and can’t wait to recommend to all my friends and family!
Manager Response: We absolutely love this review. We are so glad you chose Pasea as the perfect weekend get-a-way. We thank you for mentioning some of our amazing team members as well. We look forward for you next weekend get-a-way and hope that you come back to Pasea soon!

Summary: We were looking for a high-quality hotel on the beach for a week in OC and the Pasea certainly should have fit that bill. We arrived about 4:30 Saturday to check in. We spent an hour being upsold while trying to check in. I had already paid the additional fee for a high floor when booking. It was implied but not actually stated that our room type was oversold - there was a wedding there the following night. Instead of comping us to offset their mistake were were “upgraded” for $200 per night to a suite. The room was nice and the view was spectacular, but I remain appalled at being required to pay for the hotel’s mistake. While we were waiting to check in, we made reservations for dinner at Tanner's in the hotel at 7:15 for three people.  After over an hour to finally check in,
Manager Response: WyomingAunt_bb, thank you for this detailed response. I am sorry to hear that you were not able to experience Pasea how you should have. This feedback allows us to gauge where we are and where we need to improve. We ask that you reach out to our Front Office Manager, Jovani Guzmanat Jguzman@paseahotel.com to further speak on this and hopes to resolve. Thank you

Summary Heading: Sergio is an amazing maintenance man
Summary: Sergio is a maintenance worker at Pasea. He is more than that though, he took very good care of our party. He was prompt, kind, and diligent in every way. He fixed our ac issue in a matter of seconds and stayed back to ensure it was indeed fixed.  Thank you Sergio.  Pasea is extremely lucky to have you !  From, Room 324
Manager Response: Wow! We appreciate this review so much. We love our 5-Star reviews at Pasea and can't thank you enough for mentioning Sergio in this review. Our engineering team does not get enough credit at times, but they work around the clock to ensure the hotel is up and running for all of our guests. We look forward to you coming back to visit us soon!

Summary: The Pasea is an absolutely beautiful hotel! While my fiance and I enjoyed staying at the hotel very much, it was really the amazing service that set it over the top for me. The hotel staff were kind and swift and it made for an amazing experience all around. We will definitely be visiting again as soon as we can!!
Manager Response: Thank you for this awesome review. We are so glad that you and your fiance enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate you taking the time to talk about your experiences at the hotel. We hope that you choose to stay at Pasea in the near future. Till then, Safe Travels!

Summary: Great overall property, Amazing customer service , friendly atmosphere, very clean, great food, very relaxing and beautiful views. The hotel offers beach chairs and umbrellas for your enjoyment. Definitely looking forward to returning.
Manager Response: Moreann, thank you so much for taking the time and leaving this review. We love our 5-Star reviews. We are so glad that you were able to enjoy some of the amenities that the hotel has to offer. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: This was our first trip since COVID happened. We stayed for 3 nights and it was an amazing experience. The hotel was very clean and I felt safe the whole time. The location is great with endless shops, dinning, and beautiful views. Jovani Guzman and the rest of Pasea's staff were very helpful and welcoming throughout our stay. I highly recommend booking with Pasea. We will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you so much this awesome review. We are so glad that we were your first stop and we can't wait to welcome you back. Thank you for taking the time to mention some of our team members. We look forward to your next visit with us here at Pasea!

Summary: Oh how we wanted to heart this staycation so much! We came down from LA for a staycation since the photos looked so lovely. We wanted to immediately go to the pool. We arrived, got to our room, changed and went to the pool. They told us we had to wait an hour because it was full (there were seats, but understand it's a pandemic). They said we could go to the restaurant but we would loose our place in line, so upon arriving at a hotel with a $500 per night cost we immediately were standing in line for 20 minutes. There is not enough staff by the pool. Takes a long time to flag someone down to order food/drinks. The pool is full of kids jumping in and out so if you are looking for an adult pool party, this is not it. This is a mini-Disneyland. That is totally fine, just make sure
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving this detailed review on your recent visit at Pasea Hotel and Spa. I ask that you reach out to our Front Office Manager, Jovani Guzman at Jguzman@paseahotel.com to discuss this recent stay further. We do apologize for not exceeding your expectations as we know you have many options when choosing to travel. We look forward to hearing from you soon and trying to resolve the recent visit at Pasea.

Summary Heading: Skip it.  There are better options for your money.
Summary: My wife and I decided last minute to spend the Labor Day holiday weekend here with our 1-year-old daughter during COVID.  We drove up from San Diego.  It was a mistake.  The pool was unseemly and overcrowded.  The system they've developed for pool occupancy is unwieldly and inequitable.  We never felt safe or appropriately socially distanced.  They kick you out of the pool every 3 hours or less, depending on whether you arrived at the top of the hour.  Otherwise you have to wait in a long line, in the heat, to hope to have access to the pool.  The security guard at the pool handing out wristbands was rude and unprofessional.    We regularly travel to high-end resorts and are not offended by costly stays where the service and accommodations merit the asking price.  Over 3 days,
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff at Pasea went above and beyond and I thoroughly enjoyed my experience. Special thanks to Luong, Leticia, Lourdes, Kyel, Luis, Craig and the Christian(s) for making my stay feel like home. The pool was a bit crowded but it was a long weekend so I just avoided the area. My only negative feedback was with regards to one security guard at the pool who violated ADA by questioning my disability and made me feel uncomfortable. There was a concert and a wedding concurrently which made for fun watching from the balcony! Overall, a beautiful resort and very happy and loving staff. Would definitely recommend.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Christian was extremely helpful. He answered all questions, made sure all my needs were met. He has an awesome personality. He made my stay worth while! I will make make sure to be back. Thanks for all your help Christian keep up the good work.
Manager Response: none

Summary: First of all let me say, the hotel and property are BEAUTIFUL!  The location could not have been better.  There were entirely too many people at this hotel. I am not worried about Covid, but if you are; this is not the place for you. The pool was CRAZY busy. People were on top of each other.  There were loud people and loud music. You couldn't hear the person sitting right next to you.    It reminded me of what you would see in Las Vegas.   Upon check-in, they tell you there is a three hour limit at the pool.  Everyone gets a certain colored wristband when their group enters.  Three hours later, those people must leave in order to let a new group come into the area for their three hours.  NOPE!!  What they do is have you wait in a long line (  I waited for an hour and 15
Manager Response: Ginagl4544VH, We appreciate you taking the time to leave this review about your recent experience at Pasea. Our goal here at the hotel is to ensure that everyone is having a good time but also feels safe when doing so. I am sorry to hear that your visit did not meet your expectations and was not the way we would have wanted you to experience. At your earliest convenience  I ask that you reach out to our Front Office Manager, Jovani Guzman at Jguzman@paseahotel.com so that we can further look into your recent experience. We hope to resolve this soon and thank you again for the recent feedback.

Summary: This was the perfect getaway for much needed self-care! The hospitality I endured by the amazing staff was wonderful! The room is beautiful and clean. The view of the ocean from my balcony is breathtaking. While here I have enjoyed sun bathing by the poolside with a beautiful view of the ocean. I enjoyed a massage and facial at their fabulous spa. There is a shopping mall right next door. My evenings where spent dining at the restaurant at the hotel in which you can enjoy comfortable rooftop seating by the fireplace as you look out into the ocean, enjoyed a concert hosted by hotel, and enjoyed evenings walks through downtown, and watched beautiful sunsets. This is definitely my new favorite getaway location!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for leaving this amazing review. We are so glad that you enjoyed your much need self carte get away and are so glad that you ended up at Pasea. Our team over at the Spa does incredible work and glad you found your way over there. We look forward to being your escape whenever you need one! Look forward to having you back at Pasea real soon!

Summary: Very nice upscale hotel in Huntington Beach! Make sure you know the difference when booking - Ocean View and Ocean Front. The Blend Cafe is cute and the food was excellent! Very inviting pool! The front desk staff are patient, kind and helpful.
Manager Response: We love this review! Thank you for taking the time and leaving such great feedback for future travelers. We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel soon.

Summary: Not the place to go to have a relaxing, peaceful weekend getaway. Too many drunk 20 something year olds, loud music coming from a few rooms from 7am until late into the evening. Also, If you book the fire pits and a wedding or another type of event gets booked after your reservation you will be told that the fire pits are having maintenance done and your reservation will be cancelled. So disappointing! Also, the lights would flicker on and off in the room almost every 15 minutes for no reason at all and had to be turned off most of the time. Some of the staff were unhelpful and the lack of communication between them was very frustrating. Do yourself a favor and stay at the Hyatt or Hilton down the street.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your most recent time with us here at Pasea. I ask that you reach out to our Front Office Manager Jovani Guzman at jguzman@paseahotel.com to further discuss your experience. We look forward to hearing more about your time with us and look to resolve this matter.

Summary: My family and I stayed here for 3 days over the weekend and my family loved it. When pulling up, we noticed there was only valet parking, which was an okay/reasonable price. The valet attends were enthusiastic with guest which made the atmosphere welcoming early on. At check in, the receptionist (Sam) couldn’t find my reservations (which was my fault due to typo error.) she kindly talked to a manger (Giovanni). They were both pleasant and eager to help. The manager even asked us on our second day how our stay was going, and if we needed anything to let him know. I thought it was very thoughtful and considerate. After check in, I was given keys for the room that were shaped like surf boards. That was fun and different. The hotel also issued a wrist band per guest for the pool and
Manager Response: WOW! We absolutely love this review. We are glad that you were able to enjoy all that our property has to offer. Tanners and Treehouse are both fun experiences and are so glad that you had a great time. We look forward to your next mini vacation with the family and hope that you choose pasea again! Till then, safe traveling!

Summary: I can’t say enough about this hotel. The staff is amazing, especially Jovani Guzman and Samantha (front desk). The grounds are always well kept, the rooms smell great and the linens are the best. The pool is awesome and the beach views are to die for. The view from the higher floors are the best in HB.   When I want a staycation, I always choose Pasea.
Manager Response: We absolutely love this review. Thank you so much for leaving a review on Jovani and sam. They are both huge parts of our front office team. We hope that your travels bring you back to the hotel sometime soon. Safe travels!

Summary: place looked great on website,  however, the décor in the rooms for what I paid looked like it was furnished by Ikea and beds felt lumpy.  During the day I saw a lot of young drunk 20 something year old and  I saw police in the lobby coming for someone.  This is not the kind of place to relax with your husband at least not in my eyes.  Also ask if a wedding is being held the weekend of your stay.  If so they don't let you rent the bomb fire or sit around the fire pits that sat empty the entire night but we still couldn't use them because a wedding was being held there.
Manager Response: Thank you so much 766reginam for this review. I am sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your recent stay with us. Please reach our to our Front Office Manager, Jovani Guzman at jguzman@paseahotel.com so that we are able to further discuss this matter. We hope to get this resolved and hear more about your time with us.

Summary: Stayed in this hotel and was amazed by it in all aspects. The room was beautiful with an amazing view of the ocean. Hanging out at the pool during the day was very relaxing. The staff always made sure we were being taken care of. Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: TheHammer24, thank you for this recent review. We are so glad that the staff made you feel comfortable and that you were able to enjoy your time at Pasea. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime soon.

Summary: My family and I recently stayed at Pasea for 10 days and had the most amazing time. The staff remembered our names and went above and beyond in accommodating us throughout our stay.   The weather is perfect, the facilities clean and the food poolside and at Tanners was very delicious.   I felt safe, the staff was all wearing masks and there was sanitizers around the hotel and in the rooms.   We look forward to returning soon!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this review. We love that you enjoyed your extended stay with us and hope that you return soon. We are also glad to hear that you felt safe during your recent stay. Safety of our guests is our number 1 priority during this time. We look forward to seeing you soon. Safe Travels!

Summary: My family and I stayed at your hotel this past week. We were so excited it being this was our newborn son’s first time staying in a hotel and our first time out in awhile due to covid. Just wanted to share a little about our experience.        When booking the room I inquired for a room with a bathtub to make it easier for me to bathe our son. We emailed reservations and even as of now haven’t heard anything back. When checking in I requested again and the agent told me there weren’t any available until September, but if I wanted to pay an additional fee I couldn’t get a ADA room with one. So does that mean a disabled person would have to pay more for a room as oppose to a non disabled? This made no sense to me.  When checking in my email clearly stated that valet was included,
Manager Response: KTVN588, we thank you for leaving this detailed review. This allows us to evaluate where we are and make the needed adjustments. I ask that you reach out to our Front Office Manager Jovani Guzman, Jguzman@paseahotel.com to further discuss your recent visit with us. We look forward to resolving this matter as soon as possible.

Summary: One of my friends was staying at the hotel and asked to come visit for the day. I was highly impressed by the hospitality and the vibe of the hotel both by the pool and the great views from the room. Even tho I am a local this is a perfect staycation get away spot. Will visit again.
Manager Response: We love this 5-star review! Thank you so much for taking the time and leaving a review. We look forward to welcoming you back for another staycation in the near future.

Summary: Our family of 4 moved out of our Costa Mesa house and checked in to Pasea for 10 days until our San Diego house was ready for us to move in.  From the moment we walked in the lobby and saw the ocean through the glass windows we knew we chose the right place.  The weather was probably the best we have seen by the beach in Orange County in years so we were at the pool with our 4 and 6 year old boys all day every day.   This hotel has done an amazing job making you feel great during this "new normal".  They take every safety precaution for Covid but also make you feel comfortable.  The pool is open until 10pm which is amazing for a night swim or jacuzzi.  They also have these awesome Cabanas you can rent and watch sports and hang in the shade. Pacific City is basically connected to
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this AWESOME review. We are so glad that you extended stay ended up being at Pasea. We understand that moving out of a house and into a hotel can cause for some challenging times but are so happy that you enjoyed your time with us. We look forward to being your second home and can't wait to welcome you back. Safe Travels!

Summary: I absolutely love this Hotel! From the moment that I pulled up to the driveway everyone was extremely welcoming and helpful. Sam at the front desk was very sweet and checked me in to a beautiful room and Jovani was very accommodating and gave amazing suggestions on what to do on the property and around the area.   The hotel is beautiful and has a coastal feel to it which made this quick getaway feel like I was on an island vacation. The room was perfect with a gorgeous view of the pool and the beach. The treehouse bar was lively and had great cocktails. I even had dinner at their restaurant Tanners which was also delicious! I felt like I didn’t even need to leave the hotel other than when I went to the beach. They even had Beach cruisers if you wanted to bike along the beach.
Manager Response: Thank you so much Vee702 for the recent review. We absolutely love hearing about all of the fun our guests have. We hope to welcome you back in the near future.

Summary: From check -in to check -out our entire experience was nothing but top notch.   You’re greeted promptly at the front desk, even with all the Covid precautions. Most of the rooms have some sort of ocean view and I live that the fridge has water and a complimentary bottle of wine   Beds are comfy, robes are cozy, and bathroom amenities are nice!  The pool has a great view of the beach with a jacuzzi, wade pool and the larger pool  The hotel is next door to pacific city and walking distance to Main Street.   A great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this awesome review. We understand that you have a lot of options when traveling and are so glad that you ended up Pasea. Safety is our top priority and are so glad you took note of this. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: From check-in to departure the Pasea was a level 10 in service. This was my first time staying at the Pasea overnight. I had just been to Tanners many times for drinks and dinner. The staff was so friendly and accommodating. The room was clean and beautiful, view was amazing. Our favorite part of the experience was the electric scooters they have for use of hotel guests. What a great fun addition! I will definitely be back again someday.
Manager Response: Sunsetlover127, Thank you for leaving this awesome review! We are so glad that you were able to enjoy Tanners and use some of the cool amenities that we have to offer for our guests. The electric scooters are a guest favorite! We look forward your travels and hope that they bring you back to Pasea in the near future.

Summary: This was my first stay at the Pasea, it was wonderful and the environment was amazing. Giovanni did a great job at helping me enjoy my stay giving great recommendations for activities and eats. So much fun and will definitely be coming back.
Manager Response: jojos876, Thank you so much for taking time to leave this review. We are so glad to hear that our team went above and beyond to help you and meet your needs. We hope that your travels find you back at Pasea sometime in the near future.

Summary: What a great hotel!  I “had” to visit for a quick meeting with some co-workers but decided to stay an extra night.  So glad I did!  The property, location, food and service are incredible.  Very surfer/beach theme but still professional.  Very dog friendly (wish I had brought mine)!  And they have the covid protocols down to a science and yet keep it unobtrusive.  We will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this review DavidinHawaii. We are so glad that you were able to enjoy some of the great things Pasea has to offer. We hope that you come back soon (with your dog) so that you can enjoy the property some more. Till next, safe travels!

Summary: This place is our new spot ! Used to goto Newport and now the Paséa in Huntington is the way to go. The vibe is great and the views are better. Ask for Geo the manager is great he will take great care of you!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for celebrating your birthday with us. We absolutely love celebrating with our guests. We look forward to welcoming you back some time real soon.

Summary: Booked a 3 night stay at Paséa for my fiancé’s birthday weekend, the trip was more than amazing. Starting with the amazing staff who were helpful and welcoming- made sure we were taken care of throughout our entire stay. Just to name a few Andrew at check in and Jovanni the duration of our stay made the world of a difference! We will definitely be returning for future vacations! The hotel was lively and upbeat!! Truly and diamond in the rough!
Manager Response: We love celebrating with our guests. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. Thank you for taking the time to review some of our amazing team members. Andrew and Jovani do a great job with our front office team. We look forward to welcoming you back some time soon.

Summary: Just wanted to give a shout-out to Roy, who went out of his way to make my birthday really special. Upon arrival, he was so welcoming and made sure to tell me some great info about the hotel pool. When he found out it was my birthday, he made a special request to the chef at Tanner’s. To top it all off, he gifted me with lovely bottle of wine with a personal note, as I was leaving with my friends. His customer service went above and beyond. Looking forward to visiting Paséa again very soon. Thank you, Roy!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for leaving this amazing review! Roy is a huge part of our team and we are so glad to hear that he went above and beyond to assist with your birthday. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future to celebrate some more! Safe Travels.

Summary: Wife and I stayed here this past weekend to get away from all of the craziness. From the moment we arrived to when we left, we were treated like family!  The experience, service, and feel of the resort was just outstanding! In particular, Jovani (front services), Marissa (spa), and David (bell) made us feel at home. They never hesitated to make our stay feel as if we have known them our whole lives. The small touch points that were made will make us come back every time!  Even through the midst of all this craziness, we felt safe and secure. The cleanliness and safety protocols they put into place were above and beyond. Not a worry in the world except what drink to order by the pool.  Either way, I will be back because the beautiful Pasea and Cali beach are just the two that
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us such a great review. We appreciate you taking the time to mention some of the great staff members we have here at Pasea. We look forward to your next visit with us here in Huntington Beach. Safe Traveling.

Summary: We decided to celebrate my birthday as a last minute staycation at The Pasea in Huntington Beach. Boy are we glad we did! The room was amazing, the partial ocean view was gorgeous. They even had a welcome amenity for our dog! We stayed in the room mostly during our stay and the space was appointed perfectly for our needs. On the first night we caught on of the rooftop concerts. Social distancing concert?What a great touch! When we did leave to walk along the beach, I regularly saw the staff wiping down and disinfecting elevators as well as other common areas. We dined at Tanner's on the last night. The food was delicious and I will definitely be back for the Surf & Turf Burger, yum! I can not rave more about this property and their amazing staff. It was comforting to know that
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the amazing feedback. We know that this is a sensitive time to travel and are so glad that we met your expectations. We hope that you come back to see us again very soon. Till next time, Safe Traveling!

Summary: Visited Pasea recently. This place is hands down one of the best hotel in Huntington beach! The Hotel itself is very modern and clean. Perfect for weekend getaway. Their rooftop bar provides perfect costal vibe with amazing drinks! The service was also top notch as well.  While waiting in the line at the pool, they provided water and made sure everyone can get in in a timely manner. A manager name Jovani approached us at the pool to ensure if were having a great time. We thought that was very nice and felt that was elevated service which differentiates Pasea from other hotels. We will definitely be coming back and recommend this hotel to our friends!!
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a perfect rating based on your recent stay with us. We also appreciate you mentioning one of the team members that we have here at Pasea. We look forward to your next visit with us here at Pasea!

Summary Heading: Beautiful Hotel and Amazing Customer Service
Summary: My husband and I traveled down to HB on Sunday for business and decided to stay at Pasea. Our check-in experience was amazing! Yessica, was very nice and attentive. We had an issue/miscommunication with valet and she resolved it. The hotel is extremely CLEAN! The pool is amazing, the DJ was rockin the favorite jams! The room itself is clean, bright, modern, and includes little things, like: hand sanitizer in the room, robes, complimentary sandals and wine+water.   There was people in the lobby not wearing masks, which I can see a challenge for hotels to be able to tell people to wear them. People can be difficult. However, the hotel and its employees were ensuring that everything was clean. I walked down the halls at times and spotted staff cleaning and sanitizing certain areas.
Manager Response: There is nothing we love to hear more than that you our guests had a great time.......We're delighted that you had this experience and also let our teams you encounters with about your time as well! We are looking forward to your return with us.

Summary: The front desk wanted to down grade our room from our original reservations. Front desk staff is rude and unprofessional. The front desk would rather argue with you then let you speak to a manager. Rooms are dirty and had stains on the bed and on the shower doors. The rooms are very loud when trying to sleep. Rooms are not ready when you check in. Had to wait an additional 3 1/2 hours just to check in. There is to much to list. Save your money and do not ever stay here.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear about your recent experience with us here at the hotel. We thank you for the feedback and we'll continue to work on daily improvements to meet the needs and preferences of all of our guests. We ask that you reach out to our Front Office Manager, Jovani Guzman; at Jguzman@paseahotel.com, to further go over your recent experience.

Summary: A group of friends and I spent two nights Pasea hotel and spa in Huntington Beach this past weekend and loved every minute of our stay. From the moment we checked in, we were welcomed by Jovani Guzman and the rest of the staff and they ensured we had any and everything we needed to enjoy our trip to the fullest. Besides the obvious proximity to the beach, there is a plenty of fun all around the area for all ages. Will definitely be coming back for another stay soon. We finished our trip with a breakfast at Tanners, (the on property restaurant) and the food was tremendous!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this review BenC131332. We are so glad to hear that you and your friends were able to spend a few days with us here at Pasea. We are so glad that you were able to use some of the amenities on property and enjoyed yourself. We will let the kitchen team know about your time at Tanners as well. Safe Traveling!

Summary Heading: A getaway to remember for my husband and my daughter’s birthday thank you know I am
Summary: It was a family trip and it was my husband birthday and my daughter Andrea   Birthday. Thank you for an amazing weekend We all enjoyed the weekend with you. Tanner was niceAnd close so our friends can come to join us on the special occasions
Manager Response: We are so happy that you were able to have a great birthday weekend with us here at Pasea. We also are glad that you were able to enjoy your time at our restaurant Tanner's. We look forward to your return and celebrating many more birthdays in the future with you.

Summary: Got the opportunity to stay the weekend at Paséa and let me tell you that this is the place to be. Not only is the service 5 star but I felt at home and safe at all times. During these Covid times they were very accommodating and the cleanliness was at an all time high. Huge Thank You to Giovani Guzman, he made the stay very welcoming And if we needed anything he would help out no questions asked. Food was excellent, highly recommend the croissant sandwich from the world class chef inside there restaurant. One of the best trips and will be one for the books!  If you’re in the mood for some fun in the sun the pool is great and very safe! Love this place can’t wait to visit again soon
Manager Response: Dear timothycJ1199EZ,   Thank you so much for this amazing review. We are so happy to hear that you are your friends had a great time with us. We will let our team members know over in the kitchen how much you loved the food as well. We look forward to hosting you and your friends sometime in the near future.

Summary: My friends and I made an impulsive trip to Huntington and could have not had a better time. I’m glad we went to Pasea because everything was phenomenal. With the current COVID pandemic, the hotel cleanliness was supreme. All employees were taking the right precautions to ensure everyone’s safety. There were plenty of hand sanitizer stations around the hotel and outside. We enjoyed our time at the pool and had amazing service throughout. The food at the hotel was reasonably priced due to the massive portion sizes. Did I also mention the view every day? It was awesome to hang out on the balcony for hours and do nothing. I doubt I will ever go anywhere else in Huntington. Jovani and the rest of the staff treated my party and I sublime. I can not recommend this place enough!!!
Manager Response: We love this review!!!!! It was our honor to host you and your friends over the past weekend. We hope that you had a great time and look forward to having you back sometime in the near future. Safe Travels!

Summary: Hi there! I just wanted to say thank you for such great service during my stay. My boyfriend and I had a great time at Tanners and we loved our room. Special shout out to the manager, Michael, for taking such good care of us. He is a real gem and deserves some kudos! He made us laugh while keeping things very professional and safe. Overall, it was a luxurious experience and we look forward to staying at Pasea again! Thank you so much!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for specifically naming some of out team members here at Pasea. We know that this is a unique time to travel and we are so glad that you decided to stay here . We hope that you come back to see us again very soon.

Summary: Love this hotel we stayed her for our “staycation” and it’s a beautiful hotel right next to the beach plenty of places to eat and walk around. And I would highly recommend it. The service is incredible!
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to share your recent experience with us. We're hoping that your next staycation brings you right back to Pasea! We look forward to seeing you in the near future.

Summary: Had a great stay this week! Beautiful room very relaxing. Wael was fantastic really took good care of us. He gave us a corner room with a nice big balcony with a beautiful view! Will be coming back again very soon.
Manager Response: There is nothing we love to hear more than that our guests had a great time.....we're delighted that you had this experience and appreciate you naming one of our team members. Wael is a great addition to our team. We look forward to seeing you in the future!

Summary: Family of four with two young girls and a dog  We have been traveling the country as a family for the last 4 months and previously only stayed in AIRbnbs as we have two young girls and a dog so a kitchen, laundry machine, and a yard have been big needs for us. I also have been working this whole time so my need for a dedicated office space has factored into our stays.  Because of these concerns, I did my due diligence while considering this hotel stay and only booked this hotel because Darleen (business and travel/leisure manager) went above and beyond to make our stay convenient and comfortable.We were put in  connecting ocean view rooms facing the sunrise and mountains. The rooms have a mini-fridge but she also added a microwave to the girls room which helped us avoid eating
Manager Response: WOW! We absolutely love this review and thank you for going in depth about your recent 12 day stay with us! Thank you for choosing to stay with us during this time; it was an absolute honor to host you and your family. WE hope that your travels bring you back to Pasea in the near future; till then safe Travels!

Summary Heading: Expensive! Not worth it at all
Summary: I reserved the hotel because it's new and location is good. The service at this hotel is terrible. When I reserved, the guest service gave me a deal that included breakfast but when we got there, I found out that they lied to me and didn't include breakfast. Going to the pool was a big hassle because we had to wait in line for a long time. The capacity of the pool is very low so you can only stay there for three hours. Overall I didn't have a good experience with customer service but the location is good.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience on your recent stay. We're sorry to hear that your experience with our hotel was not a positive one. We will use your feedback to improve the service for our future guests and once again we're sorry for any errors that were made on our part. We forward to hosting you again and promise to deliver better service. If you choose to return; please reach out to our Front Office Manager, Jovani Guzman at jguzman@paseahotel.com.

Summary Heading: one of the best in oc
Summary: i got the studio ocean pier view  with a balcony and it didn’t disappoint! awesome views of beach/pool. big glass shower. everything was very clean. poolside service was fast and attentive. valet service was fast. I will stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your amazing review and for putting your trust in us. We look forward to serving you again in the future!

Summary: Wyel is by far the best host. He was very accommodating and helpful. Highly recommend and anyone staying here should ask for him. First time saying and we will be back because of him. If you are visiting Huntington, be sure to ask for him.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for your kind words about Wyel. We are so fortunate to have him on our team and we are thrilled to know he made an amazing impression on you. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: Took my family of four for a little staycation. With two teenage kids, it was the perfect location for us. Everyone has something to do that interested them. My son and I surfed, the wife and daughter shopped, and we had lots of choices to dine.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was an amazing one! We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future. Safe travels!

Summary: I stayed here recently with some family and friends and I can’t express enough how amazing our time was. First off the location is spectacular right on the water and walking distance to downtown. Our view from our room was panoramic ocean view, waking up to that was beautiful. We enjoyed our time siting by the pool with an ocean view while having the staff treat us with whatever we needed. We were treated so so well. They even gave us a cabana by the pool free of charge since we had a big group with us and a baby, so kind!! And an employee named Chris Lenzen was so awesome helping us with whatever we needed and showing us all the fun things the hotel offers. I would give this hotel a thousand star review because our time there was incredible. Beautiful stylish hotel with a
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very nice resort, beautiful pool, and ideally located across from the beach and close to shopping and restaurants. Resort includes bikes, beach chairs, and umbrellas - everything needed for a day at the beach which is very convenient!
Manager Response: none

Summary: My beach view was amazing, room sparkling clean and they are definitely taking care to ensure COVID-19 guidelines are followed. Loved the shower and pool as well. Customer service was impeccable. The food and wine were delicious, even by my typically-picky nieces standards. Would highly recommend a stay here as I can see it being great for a romantic couples retreat or family vacation. The beach access is wonderful as well, right across Hwy 1. We definitely plan to return and next time I'll be sure to book a spa treatment as I hear great things about their spa services.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family and I checked in for a couple of nights. Had an amazing experience the minute we arrived. The valet staff was so courteous. The moment you walk into Paséa hotel & spa. You enter paradise, so relaxing ambiance, smells so good! The front desk agents were so friendly. Management greeted us. The rooms have an incredible balcony view.! Comfortable beds.The pool and restaurant are absolutely dreamy, I felt like I was in a true California beach club. The hotel exceeded all my expectations. My kids loved every moment spent. I most definitely come back to stay here.
Manager Response: We love this review! Thank you so much for sharing your time with us in this review. They mean so much to us. We are so happy that you were able to have a positive experience with us. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: I frequent PASEA as a local in Huntington Beach often and it is a wonderful place for a staycation! This Resort hotel it’s luxurious and beautiful with an incredible beach view! Their Tanners restaurant is always delicious and their pool overlooking the ocean is a wonderful place to rest and relax. The staff and management at PASEA offers exceptional guest services and are such a pleasure to interact with every time I visit!!! They also have regular live music concerts on the rooftop on weekends to enjoy for great entertainment called SAFE AND SOUND events. I want to send out a special THANKS to Ed Christensen, Director if Food and Beverage services, for always making me at home and welcome at my staycation paradise ...PASEA Hotel & Spa!
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible. During these times we are trying to offer as much for our guests as possible. Our teams have gotten creative with offerings like Safe and Sounds, and will continue to be creative as we continue. We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary: I love the Pasea hotel! I visit every chance I get. The ocean view from the jacuzzi is spectacular. The staff are always so helpful and courteous. The food at Tanner’s is super delicious. We met Ed, one of the managers, and he was the nicest person you’d ever want to meet. 😊 The staff was careful to wipe everything down and maintain social distancing and masking, so I felt safe. If you get a chance to visit the Pasea, I highly recommend it! You’ll be glad you did. ❤️
Manager Response: Dear Vickiewing, thank you so much for leaving this great review. We also appreciate you mentioning some of our staff members here at Pasea. Ed does a great job with our Food and Beverage teams! We are so glad that you enjoyed your time with us and hope to see you back in the near future.

Summary: We spent two nights at this beautiful hotel.  Everyone was so nice and welcoming.  I love everything about this hotel, the decor, cleanliness and location.  It is right in front of the beach.  The pool area is great and tit has a beautiful view of the ocean. They have a beach entry kid friendly pool, (which my toddler loved! )regular pool and jacuzzi.  We ordered food poolside and it was delicious.   We would definitely come back to this hotel when back in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review on the hotel. We are so glad that you were able to enjoy some of the amenities around the hotel. The staff works extremely hard to ensure everything is ready and prepared for our guests. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future. Safe Travels!

Summary: Visit was great from start to finish.  Valet, check in, pool, beverage service, Tanners, room, access to beach, was all exceptional.    Room was nice & clean upon arrival, had the perfect view of the beach, pier and sunset.  Had lunch and dinner at Tanners. the staff was awesome and Ed Christensen came and checked to make sure we had everything we needed.   The food we ordered was amazing.
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out some of the amazing offerings that we have here at Pasea. We hope that your travels bring you back soon. We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.

Summary: From the time we checked in until check out we were treated as VIP guests.  Andrew at the front desk remembered us and made sure we felt at home.  The food, beverage, pool and hotel staff were exceptional.  Ed Christensen made sure our stay was top notch.  He was courteous and accomdated our special requests.  The pool experience was enjoyable.  It was also great to have beach equipment to complete our vacation stay.
Manager Response: We love reading reviews like this. Thank you so much for pointing of some of the great team members that we have here at Pasea. I know that they appreciate this as well. We look forward to welcoming you back some time in the near future. Safe travelings!

Summary: The staff is friendly  Great location. Rooms are nice.   HOWEVER, the management has turned into a complete party hotel.  Catering to the barely legal, ultra hip, tattooed, weed smoking, refusing to wear mask or practice social distancing, rudest, drunkest clientele imaginable.  They blast urban hip hop music in the pool and bar. Drunk teenagers and early twenty somethings loudly roam the halls and balconies. The smell of weed permeates the hotel.   If your into the party scene, this place is for you. If your a family or want a nice quiet stay, I would very strongly recommend someplace else. Especially when they charge 5+ star prices.  I have been coming to this hotel since it opened. I really enjoyed it. It wasn’t always like this. I won’t be back until they start catering to
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that your experience at the hotel was not a positive one. We thank you for this feedback and taking time to share some input during these difficult times. Here at Pasea, we welcome all guests and try to create a positive and welcoming environment for people to enjoy. This is why we have added offerings like live music at the pool; as well as our Safe and Sounds roof top concerts so that our guests can enjoy music during these times. Again we are terribly sorry that that you had such a negative experience at our Hotel. We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, contact our Front Office Manager; Jovani Guzman at Jguzman@paseahotel.com.

Summary: We had an incredible time at Pasea! From arrival to the last day, the service was streamlined and perfect. Everyone on the staff was helpful and great, particularly the Front Desk! They really set the tone for the whole stay. Gave us all the info we needed and were very welcoming. The manager, Jovani was especially helpful! We could tell he wanted to make sure everything was perfect, and was very genuine. Will be back very soon!
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you so much DanaS8436 for the amazing review. We appreciate you taking time and mentioning some of our amazing team members. We look forward to your future travels and hope that you choose Pasea again!

Summary: Great looking hotel. Love the modern. I had a ocean front 1 bedroom suite. Functionality was good, but found it odd there were no drawers/dresser in bedroom, except very small drawers in night stands, not a place to put your underwear! Most of staff were pleasant, but seemed to have different information regarding, restaurant/lounge/room service accommodations, hours or service. Understanding that with the changing times, I gave one extra star. Room could've been a little cleaner, but they sent housekeeping right away to resolve.  Pool experience was good. Rented a Day Bed, so that was the way to go.  Service was great, never wanted for nothing. Nice for families from morning until about early afternoon, but starting early afternoon turned into a sheet show with too many drunk
Manager Response: We' re sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectation and thank you for your feedback. We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future. If you would like to further share your experience, I ask that you reach out to our Front Office Manager Jovani Guzman; Jguzman@paseahotel.com. Thank you

Summary Heading: Not what you would expect at Pasea
Summary: Paid for a ocean view room got a sunset view room overlooking the pool. Room was not what I booked for our anniversary. Not to mention the rooms are not well taking care of need it to be better clean the balcony was dirty and the glass was filthy. We expected much better from Pasea. But for 500 per night you can find much better places.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review and detailed comments. We certainly strive to take all necessary precautions in our cleanliness of the hotel and our guest rooms. We deeply apologize that it was not satisfactory as well as the view from your room. We would love an opportunity to speak further about your concerns so that we may better address them in the future. Please feel free to reach out to Zach Kerns, our Director of Operations at zkerns@paseahotel.com. Thank you for the feedback and again, we apologize for the concerns during your visit.

Summary: Good vibes and hotel is awesome. Super clean. Perfect beach view. Staff is very professional and friendly. Room is clean. The Atmosphere Is relaxing and we recommend this place for family or date night
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review and for choosing to stay with us. We take great pride in our service as well as cleanliness and appreciate your positive feedback. Thank you again and we look forward to your return in the future.

Summary: This hotel has some pros and cons.   pros:   -The hotel itself is very nice and beautiful, our room had a balcony overlooking the ocean.  -The staff was also very nice. -Nice pool and jacuzzi overlooking the beach.  cons: - The noise from motorcycles and sport cars will drive you nuts if your room is anywhere near pch (not really the hotels fault). It makes it difficult to sit on the balcony and enjoy the ocean view.  -I can’t say this resort is family friendly. We spent two days at the pool and it seemed like people were completely over served on both of those days. It was more like a vegas pool party rather than a family friendly resort pool. Some individuals even began fighting at one point but security swiftly handled it. Seems like staff was allowing a steady stream of
Manager Response: We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us. We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback so that we are able to improve for other guests who stay. We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectation on your next visit to Huntington Beach.

Summary Heading: Horrible customer service and over priced for listening to traffic on PCH
Summary: Not helpful or accommodating. Tanners hostess asked if we had reservation and when we said no, told us to try the food court at mall. Didnt suggest bar, which we sisn’t know existed. There was no hotel info in room and nothing explained to offered at check in. $700 ocean front room and noise from PCH was so loud we couldn't sleep
Manager Response: We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel. We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience that you reach out to our Front Office Manager, Jovani Guzman. He can be reach directly at the hotel or by email: Jguzman@paseahotel.com.

Summary: It was the perfect staycation during this crazy time. Amazing service and they are taking all the precautions for a clean and safe stay. Fantastic pool/jacuzzi, spa, and restaurant. The beach and Pacific City are a two-minute walk. Loved everything about this hotel!
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out some of the precautions that we are taking. We understand that it is an interesting time in travel and appreciate that you chose Pasea in your hotel search. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: We absolutely love staying at the Pasea, it is a wonderful experience. Everyone from the GM down is courteous and helpful. Even during this stressful time with covid-19 we felt normal again and enjoyed every second we were there. Thank you Pasea!!
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about our property. Safety is our number 1 concern at Pasea right now and we are glad that you felt that! We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: What's not to love. Newest resort in Huntington Beach, water front, beautiful resort, excellent service. Central location to restaurants, beautiful spa, within walking distance to shops, beach, shopping, etc.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one. We hope to see you again on your next visit to Huntington Beach.

Summary Heading: Worst experience for a 4 star hotel
Summary: Since the time we called to make a reservation to the time we left the management and staff was so unfriendly and unhelpful. They were charging 4 star hotel prices and the restaurant and bar was closed, not offering cleaning services, the spa did not offer couples massage, the pool had a 3 hour max and you could not get  a drink at the pool bar unless you were within your 3 hour time slot at the pool. We were not able to sit and relax at the pool once our entire stay because of capacity issues. I understand the circumstances of the world right now but if you can't full operate your business and cater to your customers as a 4 star hotel should you should not being charging the price they are charging or even be open. Also not a kid friendly hotel - the pool is a vegas pool part
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during the pandemic. Our goal remains to put the health, safety, and welfare of our guests and team members at the forefront while providing exception service and a moment to getaway.  We understand the amenities are not ideal given the government restrictions and that is why we have looked to add new amenities at no charge such as live music from your balcony and our oceanfront relaxation lawn.  We agree that these times are less than ideal and would love an opportunity to welcome you back when we can truly share all of our amenities without restrictions.

Summary Heading: Don’t waste your time or money
Summary: Spa, in room dining,pool service and hotel restaurant  and bar closed during entire stay.  Was not made aware at time of booking and no discount or other available options were made available.  Very disappointed.  Was looking forward to a staycation as we only live up the street and we’re hoping to make this our go to spot.  Would not recommend.  Very unhappy with the stay and lack of accommodation.
Manager Response: Hello Crystal.  Thank you for your feedback.  We apologize that you were not made aware of the government restrictions we were forced to implement.  We look to continuously update this information on our Frequently Asked Questions page on our website, our booking pages, as well as the confirmation.  Nevertheless, we always strive to be a getaway spot for the ideal staycation. We would an opportunity to welcome you back.

Summary: I had an absolutely fun first time going here & the staff are very friendly. At night time I discovered the LED changing lights in the pool. It was really entertaining to swim and definitely one for Instagram! Especially when the pool looks straight out into the beach!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Not the cleanest or the most organized hotel in Huntington Beach
Summary: Went to this hotel based on a referral and thought it would be a great place to stay.  The suite wasn't clean and had stains, rust and stains on the chairs and metal posts.  If you want to reserve a cabana or lounge chair you really should just make friends with the security guard and give them $100 instead of the hotel $1000.  I paid the $1000 and I saw others that didn't and were able to have even better spots than what I was offered
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were not informed of Covid policies. Specifically, housekeeping services were not offered and poolside leisure was limited to three hours. While I understand the limitations, full transparency would be appreciated.  I give the spa 5 stars!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Locals Staycation Birthday Celebration Sun and Fun
Summary: We celebrated a family birthday by staying here on a sunny Monday and Tuesday in early-June.  Andrew at the front desk was extremely helpful  and pleasant.  He answered all our questions about the locals staycation package and accommodated all our needs.  Our room was a double-queen ocean front room on the fourth floor.  It had amazing views.  We spent two days at the pool and did not encounter any limitations to pool time during our stay, perhaps because it wasnt during a weekend. Even with Covid-19 precautions and wearing face masks when in public, our stay was very nice. Special thanks to Andrew.  We cannot wait to revisit!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: STAY at the HYATT Down the street instead
Summary: Several items that we unsatisfactory #1 The Hotel does not allow for more than 3 hours at the pool but did not inform us at check in nor on the website. As a a GUESTS we were not allowed to be at the pool for more than 3 hours .  They even said that after the 3rd hours GUESTS are told to leave the pool area.... GUESTS. I can see having a limit for people not staying the hotel but GUESTS. Very disappointing. (we looked at the reviews which were 1 star and saw this not not a new issue that had not yet been addressed) #2 Now on the the rooms. What hotel doesn't have water available in the rooms. They have fridge with a complimentary bottle of white wine (uhhhh why? ) , They don't ask if that's what you like but the oddest part is there is nothing else to drink like WATER. I have
Manager Response: none

Summary: While the hotel never closed due to covid, it's clearly still in 'covid-mode' and not it's normal med-high level of luxury and service.  No bell service to start, which is fine unless you stay for several days and have 10 plus bags.  Pool was open but there was no food service anywhere in the hotel, not even room service.  Thank god for DoorDash.  All that plus no spa services doesn't make for a normal experience at Pasea, especially not for $1000+/night.  We'll return but not until services are fully restored.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great times with family and friends. Jiovani, Sam and Zack and staff were amazing. The pool was great and temperature was on point. Rooms were clean and accommodations were on point. Love coming here.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Honestly, it has taken me a while to write this review because Quarantine has been crazy... and this experience was so wonderful, that I wanted to make sure I did it justice.  This hotel is GORGEOUS... but, what makes the difference is their staff. My boyfriend and I came, initially, to celebrate our anniversary of meeting each other one year ago... but, also, to get away during the intense times of quarantine to reconnect (outside of our 650 square foot apartment), get some ocean views, and reconnect with each other.  What I could have never expected was to end up extending our 2 night stay to an entire week because we found a place that made us feel like FAMILY.  Connection!  This is what it is all about, right?  Fabiana handled our reservations and went ABOVE AND BEYOND! She
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family and I planned a last minute trip. Reserved some rooms and enjoyed a great mini vacation. The hotel was clean, fun and had amazing food! Manager Jovani, Front Desk Receptionist Sam and Concierge David were three of all the wonderful staff there that made our stay feel so welcome. I’ve stayed at a lot of hotels in both Newport Beach and Huntington Beach and hands down this is the best Hotel we have stayed at. Definitely recommend this place to everyone. We will be staying there again soon!!!   -Mike Flores
Manager Response: none

Summary: I love coming to this hotel with my friends every time. Sam was wonderful when we checked in and jiovany was delightful and accommodating. Definitely  recommend this hotel over any other in Huntington!
Manager Response: none

Summary: What an outstanding property! I was a late arrival and called hotel to let them know I’ll arrive around 10pm, when i called around 10 to say Im arriving midnight, a friendly voice told me not to worry and I’ll be welcome anytime and that it was passed over to night shift:)  The staff is really kind and welcoming! The design and public space are 5 star! The brunch omelette was incredible! The room is modern with enough plug for every device! The A/C works perfectly and the view is gorgeous from the balcony! Hanging out by the pool was also fun, bartenders were nice and did prepare a no-alcohol-sugar-free-blackberry mojito with a smile on their face, reminding me that blackberries have sugar too! Hotel has bikes available and was so nice to ride one in the mornings! And although i
Manager Response: none

Summary: Time of reservation we where not told everything that was or not open. We where spending almost $2,000.00 for 4 nights. We didnt have the basic necessities in the room when we arrived and one of lights didnt work. After 6 hours and 3 phone calls to have HANDSOAP delivered the maid brought us shampoo and body wash and said that works as well. We where moved to another room where go and behold had a table (which was missing from the other room) BUT STAINED COUCH CUSHIONS!!! I'm a meeting planner and I can say this was so embarrassing and I cant believe I spent the money I did. The view is great don't get me wrong, but at what cost. They should  not be charging the prices they do for stay. Its as if they care more about recuperating from any losses they might have seen with COVID
Manager Response: none

Summary: Before we made a reservation we had asked if the hotel pool was open as this was the main focus of our stay. The reservation agent confirmed that it was but what they neglected to mention is that the pool's capacity is currently reduced for COVID. They now have a policy that states they will kick you out of the pool after three hours if there are people waiting to get in. They said that they've done this already on a few weekends and expect to do this every weekend as it gets warmer.   The other issue we had was that the rooftop deck's capacity has been reduced to 50 people and is on a first-come basis. Hotel guests don't get priority, so it was quickly filled up by locals who came early and camped out there. When we spoke to management (Patrick at the front desk) about this he
Manager Response: Hello davidlB9463RD, thank you for your feedback. It is feedback like this that allows us to improve.  We apologize for any inconvenience you received due to the restrictions we have in place as protocols to keep guests safe during this pandemic.  We agree, the protocols are not ideal and hoe we can again welcome guests to our hotel with our restrictions in the future.  If there is any other feedback you would like to share, I would be more than happy to hear how we can continue to improve to provide a positive experience during these unprecedented times.   Please contact me at  zkerns@PaseaHotel.com.  Thank you!

Summary Heading: Pasea- The light in the darkness
Summary: Hello all! I was in HB last week on business for four days and decided to stay at Pasea. I wasn’t sure what to expect especially given the current climate but what I found was amazing. After a late check in I went down to the pool and Wyel the afternoon manager made sure everyone felt like a VIP long after all the scheduled services ended. Great vibe! Made you forget for a moment all the trying times. To top it off I forgot my sunglasses and he actually remembered me and tracked me down later to return them. Who does that?! Well Wyel does! I would definitely recommend this place for business or stay/vacation. Cheers!
Manager Response: Thank you 322justin!  We just love shining a little light of joy on someone's day.  We will definitely share the good vibes with Wyel as well.  Until next time!

Summary: Wael made my experience the best ever.  He treated us like we were so important and made us feel special!  Love the Pasea and love this guy!  They have made the travel experience so awesome.  Wael is the man!!!
Manager Response: Thank you, Travlerccc.  So glad you had a wonderful time and we will be sure to give Wael an extra high-five today!

Summary: From check in to check out, this Paséa is amazing! The location, restaurants, pool are all amazing. The amenities at the hotel provided are superb. I have never been so warmly greeted before in my life until I went to Paséa and was checked in by a gentleman by the name of, Wael. He made me feel so comfortable and safe during this time of quarantine and coronavirus. I could not have had a better stay. Thank you for having us and for being available during these tough times.
Manager Response: Thank you ADC202020! We are so honored you chose to stay with us.  See you next time!

Summary: My daughter been going through a lot fighting stage 4 breast cancer. It's been really difficult for her and her children. We both love being by the water. My daughter, a friend and I decided to take a few days away in between her chemo treatment and give her a needed break and enjoy the ocean. We found this hotel. I personally called and made the reservation to make sure we could get a room facing the ocean, not a partial view or side view but a front view. The customer service representative said it was a front view. I explained to him why we were coming and the importance. We we arrived and checked in and got to our room. The room had a partial view and was not what I asked for when booking. I immediately went to the front desk and explained to the representative I had an
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great experience as always me and my fiancé spend most of out weekends at this resort. Great environment & cool vibes. Helpful staff on every visit. Mr. Wael who helped me out at this visit was very helpful and friendly. Thank you See you soon !!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I’m only giving them one star because of the location and beautiful resort views.  Other than that I would give them zero. We had multiple incidents with the staff here being extremely rude.  For the price you pay they should be way more accommodating to their hotel guest or disclose everything you aren’t allowed, they have rude uneducated people working for them. So much lack of communication among them as well.  Be prepared for crazy strict security & rules if you decide to spend a penny here. They lost a good customer who likes to spend money at these types resorts.    You can definitely find better properties if you’re looking for a staycation in the area.
Manager Response: Hello Jazminloya, I apologize for any poor customer service you may have experienced.  We have increased our security and safety protocols to ensure we can provide a safe and enjoyable experience during this pandemic as well as provide updated details of the governing changes on our website under the FAQ page.  We pride ourselves in our service and would love an opportunity to discuss how we may improve and adjust as we maneuver through this pandemic. Please feel reach out to me at zkerns@PaseaHotel.com.  Thank you.

Summary: We stayed for several days (our second trip in 3 weeks).  Our stay was a 10.  Staff is very helpful, personable and accommodating.  Rooms are clean, bright and the views are million dollar views.  They have music all day at the pool and actually had concerts at night on the hotel roof where everyone goes out on their balconies and watches the entertainment.  We have already booked our third trip here.  There are restaurants and retail just a few feet from the hotel and main street is a short walk.  This is our new "go to" spot for our periodic getaways.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Despite the views, the uneducated Weil who works the front desk has no knowledge of any packages or has any intent to take care of his guests. It was my first time To the hotel and my last. Several complaints were being exposed as I walked up to check in for my so called  staycation package, with little to no occupancy at the hotel Due to the corona virus. Trash everywhere by the pool and and an uneducated front desk agent that you leave to  manage a beautiful property. The agent had no idea what my package included or could even find my reservation and that was just the start to a terrible stay. Room Wasn’t even ready at 7pm so sat in the lobby while it was prepared for 20 min. Checked in to cigarette buts all over the balcony and blunt roaches, pics included below and get
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The only place we ever stay
Summary: The rooms are exceptionally clean, the staff go above and beyond, the facilities are immaculate. Never had a complaint in all the years I've stayed (that's saying A LOT) and I come several times a year. Loud or inappropriate guests are tactfully handled.
Manager Response: Hi Pickperson45, we are so humbled by your kind words.  I can see you have a discerning eye and having you continue to stay with us is an honor.  Until next time! <3

Summary: Absolutely amazing stay!! Sam at the front desk is amazing!   The property was extremely clean, plenty of sanitizing stations. I would see so many of the staff cleaning and cleaning.  The pool staff was amazing from Dane to I believe her name is Allison. The name recognition was phenomenal! I couldn’t be more happier during my stay and couldn’t have ask for more.  The rooms were clean, hallways clean, lobby clean.  I will be back in a few weeks!   This property should be a Forbes 4 star!     Thank you to everyone! The GM must be proud
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Staycation Disaster and Unsanitary in Covid
Summary: When you spend nearly $400 on a room which praises they practice social distancing and roll over to a contact in your bed. Sheets were never changed. Guest services says they cant have someone remake my bed due to Covid but yet does not take extra precaution to clean sheets. Im crying and disgusted. Also 3rd complaint after rooms phone was broken and pool they said was practicing social distancing allowed orgys in the spa. Dirtiest hotel ever it makes a mockery of meritage properties with whom ive worked with for years.  They only offered to move me next door at midnight and i had to ask for clean sheets because I didnt trust staying in the bed. I would have left but id had some drinks with a friend. To everyone needing to just get out... staying home is better and safer then a
Manager Response: Hi, and thank you for your feedback.  We are disappointed to hear your visit did not live up to our standards.  We have always upheld the most regimen cleanliness standards.  Our cleaning team has been briefed and trained on proper cleaning procedures to ensure the prevention of the COVID-19 virus. We clean our public facilities more frequently than recommended by CDC guidelines and continuously work with local health officials to update our guidelines which we post on our website https://meritagecollection.com/pasea-hotel/accommodations/faqs.    Also, our spa has been closed since mid-March without any entry to guests.   If there is any further details you can share with us on your experience please reach out to us as we, like the other Meritage Collection properties, pride ourselves in providing a safe and hospitable experience at all of our sprawling resorts.

Summary: Hotel staff and hotel amenities were fantastic. Rooms and pool are top notch with amazing views of Pacific Ocean with close proximity to downtown Huntington Beach. In addition, we really enjoyed the DJ by the pool and the wait staff was fantastic!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We just returned from a three day staycation and can not believe how amazing the staff were and how accommodating they were to us as guests during these crazy times. Jovani and Roy were especially kind, helpful and made us feel very special. They went above and beyond to make our stay feel like a true vacation. Rooms are stunning and very clean. We can not wait to go back!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Wow!!!  This place is a dream.  Not only do you have the best views and amenities the staff is phenomenal.  Jovani specifically went above and beyond to accommodate our group and went out of his way to make our stay special.  Attention to detail and 5 star staff. Definitely will stay again!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Cant beat the ambiance or view
Summary: I live in huntington and i still like to visit and stay at the hotel, dog friendly, zen spa, spectacular rooftop bar, great pool parties, friendly staff & danny had great customer service, great hb events & ♡ here too
Manager Response: none

Summary: The stay was a wonderful experience. The rooms are clean pretty good size. We got a double bed, queen size. Amazing view from our room. Shops and restaurants within walking distance. At first we couldn’t get in our room, our key didn’t work but Roy ( hotel engineer) came to our rescue, his fast service was amazing! He even catered to our needs. Thank you Roy!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our review was based on or stay during the pandemic, do believe it would have been different when the resort was in full swing.  Upon arrival we were excited for the early check in at 11a. We were disappointed to find the neighboring room 510 that we shared a balcony with was covered in garbage and old food that housekeeping had not cleaned up. It was a vacant room. We assumed they just had not cleaned that room yet, so we said nothing to the front desk. Everything was closed. There was no room service, even for contact free delivery. The cafe was open but had no hours. It closed very early. The food was underwhelming. We got the turkey breakfast sandwich and ham and cheese croissant, they were lukewarm even after heating in their microwave. Another guest complained of the same
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Paséa Hotel & Spa. We are honored you chose to stay with us during this difficult time. Since the beginning of the pandemic, we have worked tirelessly to put the health, safety, and welfare of our guests and team members at the forefront.  This did impact our services in the beginning of the pandemic.  Since, then we have worked closely with local health officials to safely provide some of the many amenities our guests have grown to love. We hope we can welcome you back soon in the future where you may fully be able to celebrate your missed moments in a true laid-back luxurious style.

Summary: Stayed at Pasea 4/18/20 and was extremely happy to see a business so safely allowing people a sense of normalcy. Very relaxed atmosphere and the staff was all smiles all the time. Even though they were short staffed, everyone was quick to help and the world class experience was not diminished one bit.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind words.   The welfare and safety of our guests and team members is our top priority and happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: My friends and I decided to getaway and let me tell you this hotel and there views are amazing. A special thank you to Jovani Guzman and the entire staff at Pasea for your amazing hospitality. I would definitely recommend this hotel and I will be back again soon. Thank you.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Last year my wife talked me into going to Pasea Hotel & Spa, even though I had been going to another nearby property when we would visit Huntington Beach.  Pasea is for sure the best hotel in Huntington Beach & one of the main, (but not only) reasons is their staff.  Jovany, Roy, Zach, Cristian, Lourdes, JJ, deserve a mention since they have all provided outstanding service, & especially in these challenging times. Visit Pasea for a great getaway.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Had an absolute blast thanks to Jovani and Roy! They met and exceeded every expectation. Hotel practiced social distancing and super clean overall. Will be returning soon with family to enjoy the fun all over again. Thanks Pasea!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Hippest Hotel in Orange County, California
Summary: This is the spot for great views of the beaches.  Pasea has the best vibe- my teenager loved it!  Easy access to the beach- happens to be great body boarding spot too.  Super fun place- we've returned many many times.
Manager Response: none

Summary: If this hotel wants to be an upscale hotel, then they need to rethink their entire hotel concept.  If you are going to cut your staff down to nothing, then you should not charge full price for rooms, and you should not fill the entire hotel up either.  If staff was looking to provide a Motel 6 environment, they nailed it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for choosing to stay with us during this pandemic as we were open essential travel.   We hope you will consider staying with us again when you can truly enjoy a Paséa experience we are proud of.

Summary: Wow what a blast! Stayed on the top floor with a great view of the beach. The whole experience was fabulous and so much fun. Jovani Guzman thank you thank you! Can’t stress it enough how grateful I am for such amazing hospitality. You are the best! Whole staff was kind and provided scooters, bikes and chairs for the beach. So sad to have to check out. 😭😭😭 This is going to be the spot every time I visit Cali. 👌🏼
Manager Response: none

Summary: Such a beautiful hotel only steps away from the beach!!! The staff is so kind here!! I highly recommend you to ask for Jovani Guzman at the front desk he is the sweetest guy and upgraded all our rooms with amazing beach front views!! He even provided us all with bikes and scooters!! Such a fun experience. I will definitely be coming back here again soon!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: If you get the chance, make sure you ask for Jovani! He helped us out with everything we needed while staying here. Nothing but the absolute best service! Great hotel, with an even better view of the beach! Recommend this hotel big time!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Don’t look any further! Stay here!
Summary: My family and I are from the Palm Springs area we were just coming down for a day trip but once we got there it was so beautiful and we got so tired we wanted to find somewhere to stay. So I googled some places and went by the best reviews. Number one review for this place was how amazing the staff was. So I called and book our room. From the 1st phone call with reservations down too our checkout was amazing. we came unprepared for a night trip but the staff helped us get setup. When we checked in Christian(night manager I believe) at the front desk made our trip. I feel like I called 1000x but he was so accommodating every time with a smile on his face. I see the smile through the mask! During this cOVID-19 time all employees stayed so professional they made it feel safe. Yes
Manager Response: none

Summary: Thank you to Christian and the entire crew at Pasea for your amazing hospitality and warm welcome. This is my go to hotel in Huntington Beach from heat on out. Newer than the waterfront and much better service at a lower price. That’s a winning combo in my book.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I cannot day enough great things about this hotel. My husband and I am came here, spur of the moment, for our first night of marriage. Yes we realize the plague has descended upon us and quarantine is in full effect. Before we have to embark down that rabbit hole let me just say that I work as a local RN and in NO WAY want to risk anybody’s safety. We follow all CDC guidelines strictly. We live about 2 miles from here so it was still within our circle of travel. The Pasea was very accommodating and I was not ever concerned with proximity or hygiene for our stay.
