The Pasea staff was SO courteous and  generous. We were greeted by Christian at the front desk who immediately offered us an upgrade for our special night. He was kind and thoughtful and beyond what we could have
Manager Response: none

Summary: You will not find a better place to stay in Huntington Beach! The food, the people and views were all fantastic. We will be back again and again! Special thanks to the amazing staff who made our stay extra memorable and made sure we had everything we needed. We loved waking up just steps from the surf and sand. We can't wait to visit Pasea again!
Manager Response: Carrie,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community!  We're thrilled to hear that you had a great time and look forward to seeing you again in the near future!

Summary: My wife and I stayed at Pasea last weekend and once again were blown away on how they nail their "laidback luxury" moto.  Yes the restaurant was closed because of Covid- 19 but that was not an issue for us at all.  We love to get takeout and eat in the room anyway, especially at Pasea since every room has an amazing ocean view!  The pool was open and there were only a few of us there so it was peaceful and not chaotic like beachfront hotel pools can be.  Our 5yr old had the entire jacuzzi and kiddie pool to himself.  Even though the local stores are all closed, it was a non-issue.  We scootered the beach walk and had a sunset on the beach so our son could play in the sand.  The beach here is so big that social distancing is not a problem.  Again it was a perfectly relaxing
Manager Response: Hi Sean, It's great to hear that you and your wife were able to mentally and physically get away from the crazy world we currently live in.  We'll be here ready to host you again when you're ready for your next escape.

Summary: We decided to get away and isolate at the still open Pasea Hotel.  We are locals and business owners.  Our business is still open as an essential business and tension and stress levels are high.  We needed a break and a safe clean place to social distance.  The Pasea team made us feel like VIPs.  Even though most services, and restuarants were closed due to the virus restrictions we enjoyed the beautiful views and comfort of our luxury suite.  The bed was comfy and the color shades of Pacific Ocean blue that are designed into the room are so relaxing.  We rested and regrouped while sitting on our balcony overlooking georgous sunsets.  We can't wait to come back when all is back to normal and we can party like rock stars at the Tree Top Lounge and enjoy breakfast at Tanners!  And
Manager Response: none

Summary: At a time of craziness, a little bit of paradise was much needed. From the beautiful room with an amazing view,to the helpful staff taking care of all our needs. This weekend getaway brought a sense of peace and normalcy back into our lives.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Late review!! We came here a few months ago and had an amazing tome. The location is great and the hotel is beautiful. Every person we encountered from the moment we arrived until the moment we left was very kind and professional. I highly recommend Pasea for the service, the location, the awesome pool and the really chill overall vibe the property has.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Lovely resort! Easy access to the ocean!
Summary: I loved the Whole experience! I'm used to a pretty formal setting, and everyone here is very professional yet had a "fun" vibe around them.  From the arrival with the Valet service through the greeting with the front desk girl to the Bell Hop, we were taken on a guided tour of the place that was incredibly pleasant. You can tell the people working at Pasea all love their job. And they love to help their guests with any questions or suggestions. It felt more like I was being invited to join a family in a fun adventure than sleeping at a strange hotel.  Super happy with everything from the Ocean view to the super clean pools, to the electric scooter rental that is included. We used the scooter rental to easily explore Main street shopping area. Definitely recommend checking in
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was beyond impressed by this hotel, and especially the staff.  Our stay fell right as many restaurants and business were shutting down due to the corona virus, and we were concerned that this would make the stay less enjoyable. However,  Murtaza and the rest of the hotel staff took great care of us, and we barely noticed the changes.   The grounds are lovely, and very clean.  I would absolutely return to this location.
Manager Response: none

Summary: All of the staff was welcoming and professional. We were happy to be there and they were happy to have us.  Everyone felt like a member of the family and Murtaza saw too it that everything went well during our stay.  Amid covid, they still had their kitchen running and they comped our food during checkout, hope I don't get you in trouble.  Hope to return again soon.  Cheers
Manager Response: none

Summary: I can’t say enough about our wonderful stay. Jovani at check-in took care of us and made us feel welcome with his first-class service. Zach was helpful, Jodi kept our room spotless and the rest of the staff were top notch. Of course, the view was fantastic. We will be back!
Manager Response: none

Summary: What a great hotel and staff recommends this highly. Zach was great at the front!   Pasea is very high quality and all their details have been well thought through with excellence and service beautiful and fun pool
Manager Response: none

Summary: Wow,Just wow.  This is the Best Hotel and Spa in Huntington Beach.   The service is unmatched! Special thank you to Jovani and Murtaza !   I have not experienced such exceptional service in my life; not only from them but the complete staff was wonderful as well.  All went above and beyond to make my stay the most memorable of my life.   I will never forget this Jem in Huntington Beach.  I was honored to spend my honeymoon here in the midst of the chaos of the world.  The views, walking access to the beach and the room service was hands down amazing!   Thank you all again. We will be seeing you again soon!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel in itself was AMAZING!!!!! The views from the were spectacular and breathtaking. All of the hotel staff were polite, helpful, and courteous, which made the stay there that more enjoyable. But, above all I have to give a 30 thumbs up to Samantha G. who went above and beyond to make my visit there enjoyable, even though things did not go according to plan. I talked to her about what I envisioned and Samantha definitely came through, exceeding/surpassing my expectations. So, if you want an enjoyable and memorable stay Samantha will definitely make sure that you do so. She’s awesome!!!!!
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Wow!! Thank you so much for writing this review about our beautiful property, and sharing such amazing feedback about Samantha and the fantastic work she does! We are truly very lucky to have such an amazing team member like her. Always willing to go the extra mile to make our guests feel special. She is truly a guest/team member favorite and an asset to the Pasea Hotel!  We look forward to welcoming you back with much anticipation.  Warm Regards,  Joe Leinackers General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: We were blown away by how great the service was upon walking in, were treated with respect and given exemplary treatment. Especially in these trying times, all of our questions were answered and attended to. Murtaza was extremely helpful and extremely polite. We will be coming back just for his service.
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Mauri Dos Santos,  Thank you for sharing this fantastic experience with the TripAdvisor community. We are truly grateful for it. It is so great to hear that even in these uncertain times of COVID-19, Murtaza was able to make you feel safe and comfortable at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are lucky to have team members like him who are always willing to go beyond the call of duty to ensure that our guests feel special in every way.  We look forward to welcoming you back to Pasea very soon.  Kind Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: My wife and I have stayed at the Pasea several times and cannot say enough about how delightful this hotel is.  Mr. Mehdi's staff always ensures your stay will be outstanding from the moment you check in.  Blake at Tanners bar will serve you fabulous libations and Jenny's outstanding hospitality will ensure your dining experience is prefect.  The prix fixe Valentines selections were delicious and the wine selections very nice.  The rooms are always clean and well appointed. We cannot wait to stay at the Pasea again!  Cheers~
Manager Response: Dear guest,  We love hearing positive feedback from our repeat guests. It speaks volumes about our team member's commitment to going above and beyond to ensure that our guests have an amazingly unique experience.  Thank you for recognizing some of our team members like Murtaza, Blake and of course Jenny for her great attention to our guests.  On your next stay at the Pasea, we would highly recommend checking out our latest Treehouse brunch. breathtaking views of the ocean, high end buffet, and an open air setting are sure to make an excellent stay that much better.  Thank you,   Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I Recently visited the Pasea Hotel & Spa in Huntington Beach California. Perfect beach front location attached to a new beach theme Entertainment mall but the hotel's own bar restaurant lounge was the hot spot for locals & guest due to live music & a DJ that was fire.  Staff was great & they greet u with a free beer or wine at check in.  Special Thanks to Jovani Guzman the hotel's new front in manager for going out of his way to make us feel welcome.     I highly recommend the Pasea hotel and spa & I am a hard traveler to impress.     Free beer does help. Ha ha
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for raving review. We love hearing about our well traveled guests having a great time at our property. Of course, we are biased about our restaurant and the open air treehouse lounge being the hot spot of OC, so we love hearing it from our guests. Delighted to hear that you enjoyed beer at check-in, the DJ and the overall hotel ambiance.  On your next visit, we highly recommend checking out our Treehouse brunch every Saturday and Sunday. We have live musicians, great food, and breathtaking views in an open air setting. Its truly one of a kind experience. Thank you for recognizing Jovani's efforts. We will certainly be sharing it with him.   We look forward to your next trip to OC!  Thank you,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I have stayed at the Pasea several times, the view of the beach is incredible!!  The rooms are clean, the hotel is immaculate and each and every time the staff goes above and beyond to make our experience fun and relaxing! Thank you to the Front Office Manager Jovani Guzman for being so accommodating, considerate and making our stay a memorable one!! Myself and my family look forward to our next visit!
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Than you for making us your home away from home and sharing the kind words with the TripAdvisor community. Our housekeeping team takes great pride in the cleanliness and upkeep of the property, so thank you for recognizing their efforts. we will certainly share your comments with them and also recognize Jovani for ensuring that you have a memorable stay.   We look forward to hosting you and your family again in the near future.  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Service here is great.  Everything made simple and convenient.  Located right next to a variety of shops and restaurants with the beach view.  Valet service is your only parking option here, but I did not mind it because of the polite and warm welcome from the valet guy, Cody.  We had no trouble checking in with the front desk and had all our questions answered.  Miguel the bellman was also very helpful! We'd like to thank the staff at Pasea for making our stay an enjoyable one.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Wow!  This type of feedback is what makes our work so meaningful and fun.  We are so delighted that so many of our team members took the extra steps to make your stay memorable and enjoyable. We will make sure that we share these names with them and their managers so that they can celebrated for a job well done.  Thank you for sharing this fantastic feedback from your stay and we look forward to welcoming you back with much anticipation.   Sincerely,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Love this hotel!  Great location right by the beach and Pacific City.  Rooms are nice and views are good.  Staff is excellent, especially Wael at the front desk.  Thank you for the upgrade and going above and beyond to make our stay a memorable one!
Manager Response: Dear Jess,  We are so happy to hear that you loved our hotel. Thank you for sharing the 5 star review of the Pasea Hotel and Spa with the TripAdvisor community and mentioning Wael's efforts. He is a perfect example of our team members that love taking initiatives to go above and beyond to make every guest interaction unique, and every guest experience a phenomenal one.     We look forward to seeing you again with much anticipation.   Kind Reagrds,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: My family and I recently stayed at Pasea for a quick Friday night getaway. Jovani Guzman truly made sure our stay was nothing short of perfect! We had two rooms on the top floor with ocean views...which were spectacular! The rooms were clean and the bathrooms were spotless. You also can't beat the location of this hotel...we were able to walk to everything such as the beach and Pacific City. We will definitely return in the near future!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for such a lovely review of the Pasea Hotel and Spa, and specifically mentioning Jovani for his efforts to ensure that your stay with nothing less of perfect!  We will certainly share this feedback with Jovani, and as well as our housekeeping team to congratulate them on maintaining high standards of cleanliness.   We are so happy to hear that you  enjoyed your stay to much and we look forward to welcoming you back very soon.  Kind Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Really nice hotel. Beautiful decor in common spaces; nice pool, and great proximity to many nearby restaurants. My very good rating relates to a star rating - about a 4...maybe a 3.75. I think it’s probably the best in the HB area. The complimentary bottle of wine is a nice amenity. I didn’t really understand my room assignment and I could have questioned it, but did not. Hotel was at minimum capacity, yet I was placed at the rear, in the least desirable location with marginal views. I believe a majority of the rooms have stellar ocean views. Restaurant had a nice feel, and the Treehouse rooftop bar/lounge was cool. I’d recommend and would stay here again. I’d ask for specifics on room location next time though.
Manager Response: Dear Frankie,  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay and all the fantastic amenities at the Pasea Hotel & Spa.  Thank you for the generous rating and recommending us to the TripAdvisor community. It means a lot to us that well traveled guests like yourself find Pasea to be the best hotel in Huntington Beach.   I am confident that on your next stay, we will do our very best to offer you top notch room accommodations that are worthy of 5 stars.  Kind Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I’m a frequent visitor of the Pasea, it has been my favorite place to stay in the orange country area! I’ve personally dealt with the director of guest experience  Murtaza, he personally went above and beyond to make sure my last expoerence was second to none!  Great rooms, great food, and the best atmosphere in the OC! Highly recommended!!
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Halum,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  We appreciate you recognizing Murtaza's efforts to go above and beyond to ensure an excellent experience for you.  We hope to welcome you back very soon!  Kind Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I've stayed here 2x, once last year for a work event and once a month ago as a "stay cation" since I live less than 30 min away.    Both times I had top notch service from everyone I encountered.  It is a newer hotel right next to Pacific City, literally right next to it, it almost looks attached to PC!  Location can not be beat!   The hotel is a bit more modern and definitely more hip than near by Hilton and Hyatt (which are more traditional).   The have the typical high cost parking and resort charges, typical for this area, but I felt it was worth it because the staff was so great.     Having great customer service makes ALL the difference.
Manager Response: Dear guests,  We love hearing feedback from loyal guests like yourself. We might be a little biased about our location, so it is always delightful to hear from our local guests that our location is in fact second to none!   You are correct once again that we do try to keep our parking rates and resort fees competitively in line with the market; however, with our resort fees, we offer each room a complimentary bottle of wine straight from our own vineyard in Napa.  In addition to that, the 2 pairs of Pasea branded keepsake flip flops are a guest favorite. to name a few more resort fees perks, we offer complimentary bicycles, electric scooters, and pedicab rides to the beach by our beach butlers. To sum it up, our goal is to provide the highest level of amenities and more importantly the highest level of services; therefore, we are very appreciative of guest feedback that recognize the efforts of our team members.   Thank you and kind Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Overall we had a nice stay at this spot, especially enjoying the great style of the hotel.  Our room was spacious and comfortable and included a wide sliding glass door out to a balcony with two chairs.  The bathroom was modern with a big shower with peekaboo window to the room, and a separate water closet.  There was also good closet and storage space.  Most rooms have views of the ocean from the balcony.  Ocean front rooms offer direct water views, but also overlook the Pacific Coast Highway.      The amenities of the hotel did not work out as well.  The pool is nice and big, but the water was a little cool for morning swims. The setting overlooks the ocean, but also the busy and loud Pacific Coast Highway just below the pool deck which distracts from the experience.  The gym
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for the detailed feedback about your stay, and the kind words about our property. Although we are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our property and the accommodation, I am very sorry to hear that you were not able to enjoy all of our amenities to their full extent.  As a standard, our pool temperature is kept at 82 °C and 84 °C at all times; therefore, I have asked our director of engineering to provide us with early morning pool temperature log so that we may ensure comfortable swimming conditions for our guests.  Tanner's restaurant features a wide variety of menu items throughout the day. You may visit our website to see these menu options. It is possible that you may have received our bar bites menu in between services. If that is the case, we sincerely apologize if it was not fully communicated to you by our food and beverage team members. We wish to thank you for your candid feedback about our gym at Aarna Spa. Besides the treadmills, elliptical, peloton bikes, hydro rowing machines, free weights, we also offer our guests a multipurpose circuit trainer machine. We have shared our feedback with our Director of Spa, nonetheless, so that she may reassess the equipment based on the needs of our guests.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future, and I am confident in our team's ability to provide you with 5 star service on your next stay.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: This was my first time staying at Pasea and it was absolutely amazing! The ocean views from our room were gorgeous, check in was easy - Jovani at the front desk was super helpful! I arrived four hours before check in time & only had to wait 40 min for my room to be ready. The pool staff was great - checked on us continuously and we were never without food or drink. Will definitely be staying here again!
Manager Response: Dear Maddy,  There is nothing we love to hear more than when our team member go above and beyond to accommodate our guests. I'm thrilled to hear that Jovani was able to exceed your expectations and get you accommodated quickly upon arrival. We are grateful for leaders like him on our team.    Thank you for the kind words about our pool staff as well, we will certainly share your comments with them. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.  Thank you,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: From Nicks warm welcome when we pulled up, David’s amazing care for us and our stuff, and Murtaza’s royal treatment when we checked in.  Our last minute getaway was excellent.  The four diamonds were well represented by this world class service staff. Thank you so much Paséa for making us feel like we owned the place. Best experience ever!!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your kind words about our beautiful property and recognizing Nick, David, and Murtaza for their efforts to ensure that you receive nothing short of a royal reception.  We take great pride in providing unique experiences to our guests and we look forward to exceeding your expectations again in the future.  Kind Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Beautiful hotel husband and I came here for anniversary Robert and Lourdes helped us booking our room and they were super super helpful and kind and make sure that we got exactly what we wanted when we go to the hotel to check in with Murtaza he was so helpful and made the process really easy had a wonderful experience would highly recommend this resort again looking forward to coming back soon
Manager Response: Dear Isabel,  We are thrilled to hear that you chose Pasea Hotel & Spa for your special day and delighted to hear that Lourdes, Robert, and Murtaza all went the extra mile to celebrate this special stay.  We are grateful that you have recommended us to the TripAdvisor community and look forward to welcoming you back very soon.    Kind Regards, Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Beautiful room, great staff and great atmosphere! Be aware... sliding door on the outside of shower that you cannot control from the inside of the shower is awkward if you are going with a group! We had way too much fun with that!
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for your kind feedback from your girl's getaway trip at the Pasea. We are thrilled to hear that our staff  and our property was to your liking and that you enjoyed the shower door feature. Yes, the shower window door is only operable from outside; however, we do offer the option to have the window door locked.   We look forward to hosting many more girls weekend trip for you in the future.  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Great Hotel, nice location and excellent staff
Summary: My girl friend surprised me with a weekend stay at the Pasea for our anniversary, we we’re  nicely treated by Wael at the front disk, he new it was a special weekend and made every efforts to insure we get the most of our stay which made our stay very pleasant. We enjoyed the  all the facilities of the hotel and highly recommend it. Our special thanks go to the great staff and in particular Wael that checked on us frequently , thank you Wael. Keep your good work
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for sharing this special anniversary with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa and for writing us such a thoughtful review. We are grateful for team members like Wael who are passionate about making sure that every guest feels special, and that every occasion is celebrated.  We hope to welcome you back to Pasea with much anticipation.  Kind Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I was in for a Hockey game and found this place.  I was expecting comfort but got so much more.  The pool and beach views are like Hawaii. The staff was so very warm and friendly.  The nearby open air mall and the in-site bar/restaurant were fabulous.  The music from the rooftop bar filled the air sweet sounds the entire time. I am looking forward to a three-day weekend with my wife in the near future.  The beauty of the setting matches her beauty.  Jovani took care of us so many times during our stay - I look forward to seeing him again and again.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  We are delighted to hear that Jovani took excellent care of you. He is a prime example of our team members creating loyalty by making personal connections with our guests. .   Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We had a great time at Pasea Hotel! This place is a really nice, boutique hotel with great ambiance and tremendous service. Front office manager Jovani Guzman took care of us from the moment we got there and made sure we had everything we needed for a great stay. Tanners, connected to the hotel, had a great upstairs bar with friendly staff and a great bourbon selection! Will definitely come back here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.   Thank you for recognizing our terrific Front Office Manager, Jovani. He truly leads by example to ensure that we exceed our guest's expectations in every way.   We will be looking forward to your next visit to Huntington Beach so that we may host you once again.   Thank you, Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: While trying to plan a very special birthday celebration, I reached out to the Director of Guest Experience, Murtaza Mehdi. He worked with me through all of the tedious details I threw at him, and made the stay perfect! I would expect this kind of service from a 5 Star hotel, but was so happy that I found it at this beautiful HB hotel too. Hats off to all the friendly and accommodating staff and especially, Murtaza.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Wow! Your words are music to our ears!  As someone that works at a fantastic resort, we thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting Murtaza's efforts.  He is a prime example of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Huntington Beach area.  Thank you,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: the service is amazing especially Brandon the valet guy and Daniel the bellman. the rooms are really nice and have a modern feel to them. The service is just amazing definitely will be staying at the Pasea hotel every time im in Huntington
Manager Response: Dear Joe,  Great name, by the way! So great to hear that you had a fantastic stay with us and than Brandon and Daniel provided you with excellent Service, as usual. We will certainly make sure that we celebrate them for ensuring you had a fantastic stay with us.   We look forward to welcoming you back to Huntington Beach with much anticipation.  Kind Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: If you are looking for a great space for a meeting, the Blue Room is second to none.  Lot's of natural light with a stunning view of the Surfers.  The weather is very unpredictable this time of year in SoCal, we caught a lot of the cold Santa Ana Winds for our outdoor functions.  A few of the staff stuck out as going above and beyond, Wael at the Front desk is one of them along with other staff in the front.  Thank you Wael for making the stay a little better.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing your feedback about your recent stay, and the kind words about the service. We cannot agree with you more. There's nothing like working from a room that has front row seats of the Pacific Ocean. Blue room certainly makes for a great office.  Wael is a prime example of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.    We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Huntington Beach area.  Kind Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I flew to Huntington for a company training seminar, and this hotel was beautiful and amazing. The room had a beautiful view, and the staff was friendly and accommodated all of my needs. I will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Dear Ltty,  We are delighted to hear that Paséa hotel was able to add some fun to your company's training seminar! So great to hear that you had such a great experience at our resort, enjoying our excellent service, the spectacular views from our guest rooms, and our cool California coastal vibe.   We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Paséa for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I, like many others I'm sure, rarely write a review, but our recent experience was so great that I felt compelled to recommend this hotel. My husband and three young adult "kids" stayed at the beautiful Pasea Hotel & Spa to celebrate my 60th birthday. What a perfect destination this proved to be. The location is unbeatable - the hotel sits directly across from the beach; our oceanfront room looked out at this pretty vista. Our balcony provided gorgeous sunset views and we were able to walk to many nearby restaurants. The hotel manager, Wael, was welcoming and personable. Upon hearing it was my birthday, he generously provided us with a bottle of red wine along with drinks for everyone; there was also a complimentary bottle of chardonnay for us to enjoy in our mini fridge.
Manager Response: Dear Susan,  Thank you for sharing this special moment with us at the Paséa Hotel & Spa. We are delighted that you and your family had such an amazing time with us. You are absolutely right, the location is truly unbeatable and the views from our Ocean Front balconies are second to none.    I am also very pleased to hear that Wael took the extra steps to ensure that your birthday celebrations were that much more special. He is an a shining example of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.    We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Huntington Beach area.    Kind Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: My wife and I stayed on Valentine day which was our wedding anniversary.
Summary: Excellent location, extremely clean & comfortable.    Upon check-in we were warmly welcomed by  the frienly reception staff.  Beautiful ocean view from the 7th floor.  Several resturants are within walking distant.  Would definetely recommend this hotel to everybody!
Manager Response: Dear Mmann,  Thank you for staying at Paséa Hotel & Spa and sharing your feedback about your stay. We're delighted that you had such a great experience at our resort, enjoying our unbeatable location, excellent service, and the spectacular views from our guest rooms.  We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Paséa for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Hunnington Beach Hotel that offers excellent service, amenities, and room views of the ocean.  The hotel is walking distance to beach, restaurants, and shopping.  Highly recommended for a romantic getaway.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We're delighted to hear the positive feedback about your Valentines day stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa!. Thank you for sharing your experience with us and we look forward to your next stay with much anticipation.   Kind Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Hotel is in a great location and has a great view of the beach.  Rooms are clean and spacious.  Staff are very courteous.  Location is good with good restaurants nearby.  Tea house lounge is great place to catch the sunset.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the excellent views and the fantastic service. You are absolutely correct, our Treehouse lounge is a fantastic place to watch the sunset with a cocktail!  We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Paséa for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: My company chooses Pasea for conducting our first training module and they honestly couldn’t choose a better place. From the Valet to the bell boy to the front desk and all the other employees throughout the day, service was perfect and all were extremely nice. We had drinks at the bar where they had great selection and the bartender was knowledgeable and very attentive. The room was great and the view of the ocean is always a plus.  If you looking for a great beach get away this is your place.
Manager Response: Dear Drozdor,  We are delighted to hear that Paséa hotel was able to add some fun to your company's training module!  So great to hear that you had such a great experience at our resort, enjoying our excellent service, and the spectacular views from our guest rooms.  We look forward to welcoming you back to your home away from home very soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Visited the property last week on business and they exceeded my expectations!  The staff, Spa and overall service were all top notch!  Thank you for adding to my experience while visiting your beautiful city
Manager Response: Dear NewOrleansgirl,  Thank you for such kind words about our team members, the spa, and of course, our beloved Huntington Beach! I am delighted to hear that Paséa Hotel and Spa exceeded your expectations and we look forward to doing it over again on your next stay with us.  Kind Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Extremely beautiful hotel with very attentive staff. Would recommend for both business and pleasure.The hotel rooms are fully equipped and offer all amenities. Close to beach and shopping. Lovely and friendly staff. The food was delicious.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with the feedback about our fantastic team, and our lovely amenities at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Our team takes great pride in working at such a beautiful property with such close proximity to the best of Huntington. Thank you for acknowledging this and we look forward to welcoming you back very soon.  Kind Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Beautiful rooms and Views but not the best food
Summary: The views are stunning, second floor bar is great but the food is not great at all. Fortunately you are in walking distance to restaurants nearby in the courtyard/mall that is right next door to the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with the feedback about your stay. Although I am delighted to hear that you thoroughly enjoyed the stunning views, I am disappointed to hear that the food did not exceed your expectations.  We would love the opportunity to resolve the challenges you had with the food to your highest expectations; therefore, we kindly request that at your earliest convenience, you contact our Director of Guest Experience, Murtaza Mehdi, at mmehdi@paseahotel.com.  We look forward to speaking with you very soon.  Kind Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I was fortunate enough to get to stay at the Pasea for a company outing, and I can’t say enough good words about the property, staff, food, drinks, and amenities. This place is the total package.  Mix that with the ocean views (no filter) and I’m not sure you can do much better!   I can’t wait to come back!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for such kind words about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa! Your words are like music to our ears.  We cant wait to have you back!  Joe Leinacker  General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We stayed at Pasea for a weekend getaway and the Surf City Marathon.  Gorgeous hotel with exceptional service from the staff.  Food, drinks and service at Tanners was great as well.  My only complaint was our room faced Tanners and the mall and it was very loud on friday night with the music going till almost 2am, and the pillows in the room were horrible.   We had booked an 8th floor room hoping for a quieter night........But given that I am still planning to return for a weekend get away with my girlfriends,  the location, service and amenities are well worth it!
Manager Response: Dear jennifermZ6436DS,  Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Pasea Hotel & Spa.  We greatly appreciate the kind words, compliments and high overall rating.  We’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Stayed at Pasea for the Surf City Marathon weekend. This hotel is very nice and close to the start/finish. Only downside for us was an event outside with band while we tried to get an early sleep for the marathon.   The hotel is next door to Pacific City outdoor shopping which was convenient access to many good food options.
Manager Response: Dear Nodmfinisher,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Went for Business, will come back for Vacation.
Summary: Wow , sunny California, walk to the Beach and great food/drinks at the hotel and walking mall next door.  Super clean , looks like its brand new, all staff we encountered were above and beyond what we normally expect in a hotel.   Rooms have decks and ocean views.   Gym, Pool, and Hot Tub were all clean.  Check in here and just relax on foot and avoid the crazy traffic, everything is so close.
Manager Response: Dear Adventurer790977,  We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The staff, the views, the perks, the location were all fantastic. Everything is well maintained, the rooms are great and just overall is a great experience. Will certainly be coming back next time I am in CA.
Manager Response: Dear joegeraldi,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're delighted that you had such a great experience at our resort, enjoying our unbeatable location, the spectacular views from our guest rooms, and our cool California coastal vibe. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Paséa for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: probably one of the nicer or nicest hotels i stayed at in CA. staff is great and very clean with great accommodations. i plan to stay here when i travel back to CA. they also have complimentary things that you will enjoy
Manager Response: Dear jae014,  We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.  Thank you for the kind words!  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we look forward to your next visit to the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The resort is beautiful, with great views, location has several dining options nearby, easy beach access and has some great amenities.   BUT if you plan to use the pool, be aware - they closed it for the evening (6-10pm) for a private function while we were there with no prior notice. Extremely frustrating!  The restaurant and coffee shop were over-priced for the level of service (or lack thereof). Pastries were stale and coffee was warm. Some of the staff was excellent, but many of them were rude and acted frustrated to be "interrupted" from their conversations with other staff members. Someone else had charged food to our room as well, and staff seemed to question whether I was telling the truth...  Overall, I wish I could say that I'd be back since this place has great
Manager Response: Dear 430laurel,  We are very sorry to hear that your experience at the Pasea Hotel did not exceed your expectations. We truly appreciate your detailed feedback about your stay and would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly.   At your earliest convenience, we kindly request that you contact our Director of Guest Experience, Murtaza Mehdi at mmehdi@paseahotel.com.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Everything was excellent, especially the service.  I wish the jacuzzi was open all night as I like to unwind before bed after going out.  The resort was perfect to out taste and very well maintained, but the true greatness was the service and staff!!!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Tim S,  Your words are music to our ears!  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  You have noted the efforts of some of our truly special staff and for this we thank you.  We look forward to your next visit with us!   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The hotel grounds and staff were absolutely excellent. I have no complaints at all about our stay. The location is fantastic and located within a short walk of shopping, food, and the beach. They are very dog-friendly and even have a small dog park on the grounds. Will stay here anytime we visit the area.
Manager Response: Dear Gilbert O,  Your words are music to our ears!  We appreciate all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for promising to come back and stay with us again!    Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: I can't wait to come back!!
Summary: 11/10 - Was SO happy I chose this hotel! Amazing location, amazing hotel, unreal spa, and beautiful decor! From the front desk, valet, spa, room service - All staff went above and beyond to make sure I was well taken care of. I am extremely happy and hope to be back very soon!!!
Manager Response: Dear LizIrving88,  Wow!  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I really enjoy staying at this property, rooms are spacious and comfortable with a large closet and bathroom. Situated behind Pacific Coast Highway, you are close to the beach and downtown area with plenty of restaurant choices. Staff are really friendly and make you feel very welcome.
Manager Response: Dear juliebU9760IY,  We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.  We hope that you come back to see us again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: The perfect accomodations in Huntington Beach
Summary: We've never been to Huntington Beach and had no idea where to stay.  Pasea was rated highly and we gave it a shot.  What a perfect choice!  From check in to check out, everything was perfect.  Modern, clean hotel. Top notch facilities.  Central location, beautiful views.  We look forward to our return to Pasea in the future.  We cannot recommended this hotel enough!
Manager Response: Dear bobbyj59,  Yes!  Your experience was exactly what we strive to deliver for all of our guests and it means the world to us that you shared this with the TripAdvisor audience.  We can't wait until your next stay so that we may exceed your expectations once again.  We hope to see you again in the near future!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The beach is literally across the street. It's a lovely hotel, right next to everything. Now that I've stayed there, I don't think I could ever stay at any other hotel in OC. Staying in this hotel was the closest feeling to what you'd see in movies about CA.
Manager Response: Dear nkieu8531,  We can't express how much this review means to us.  We thank you for publishing your experience and sharing some great things about our hotel.  We're glad to hear that we're your choice of hotels when in Huntington Beach.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us again in 2020!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Wonderful Hotel. Will be coming back soon. The Hotel is close to everything and very walkable to the Beach and Main Street. The Service is excellent and the coffee is the best in town and I can guarantee that.
Manager Response: Dear W2768FDkaren,  We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.  We hope that you come back to see us again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Great location, right across from the beach and next to Pacific City mall. Hotel is very nicely decorated. But there were a few housekeeping issues during our stay. When we arrived, the shampoo and shower gel containers in the shower were empty. Even when the room was cleaned, they didn’t refill the containers. So when we went to take a shower, we had no shampoo. This was very frustrating. As much as we paid for the room, things like this shouldn’t happen. When we called housekeeping to refill the bottles, the housekeeping supervisor, Lu, was very nice and helpful and was able to take care of the problem. What makes a good hotel is their attention to the basics, and Pasea needs to work on that.
Manager Response: Dear Lisa9776,  Thank you for giving us the highest rating possible in spite of not exceeding your expectations with our housekeeping.  We thank you for your feedback and we'll continue to work on daily improvements to meet the needs and preferences of all of our guests.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: This hotel will rip you off! Expedia gives one rate, then the next day you have all these charges that were not explained. Plus, a $40 dollar parking fee which you have no choice to pay because there is no other parking options! $40 resort fee. Then I called for towels and it took me to call 3 times before they brought them.  If you want ocean front for basically the same price I recommend the Pacific Edge in Laguna Beach. I booked expecting to spend a total of $238 and ended up spending $317 and that’s cause I called 3 times for towels and complained and they waived my resort fee. Before they waived that my total was $377 for one night..
Manager Response: Dear Jessica10225,  We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback. We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.  We would love the opportunity to turn this experience around for you. At your earliest convenience, if you could please reach out to our Director of Guest Experience, Murtaza Mehdi, at mmehdi@paseahotel.com, we would greatly appreciate it.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: This Hotel nails it! A must see!
Summary: This place is awesome! Staff is friendly and helpful. Clean and positive vibe in this hotel. Will definitely return in 2020. Every space is filled with a cool hip intimate spot. I helped open the Aloft Hotel in Ballantyne Charlotte NC and I know what it takes for a hotel to run smoothly and this team/hotel nailed it!
Manager Response: Dear sunbum365days,  We sincerely thank you for sharing this review, pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.   Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Huntington Beach so that we may host you once again.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Friendly staff and a lovely room facing the ocean in a hotel that is beautifully designed with cool art
Summary: We were originally booked into a king studio which the website says has an ocean view.  It does if you are standing on the balcony and looking to the left!  Otherwise it was facing the shopping mall and a neon flashing sign from there. We looked at a couple of other studios on other floors and the situation was the same.  We wanted a true Ocean View so we were offered an highly discounted upgrade over the Xmas holiday for one bedroom suite.  Huge difference!!  Gorgeous view of the ocean, lovely large bathroom and a great comfortable king bed.  Our daughter slept on the pull out sofa in the living room. Do ask about the actual ocean view from the room when you book or you may be disappointed.  The interior design of the whole hotel is gorgeous and the art is amazing.  My family
Manager Response: Dear Beth S,  Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Pasea Hotel & Spa.  We greatly appreciate the kind words, compliments and high overall rating.  We’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Pasea exceeded my expectations,  very clean and easy to find rooms, Hannah S. At front desk was most welcoming and helpful, greeted me with a smile and amazing customer service. Definitely recommend staying at Pasea, didn’t have to drive during my stay just walked over to attached mall for food, drinks, and entertainment
Manager Response: Dear rigog324,  Yes!!!!!!  Your experience was exactly what we strive to deliver for all of our guests and it means the world to us that you shared this with the TripAdvisor audience.  We can't wait until your next stay so that we may exceed your expectations once again!!!!!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Extremely overpriced with hidden fees and dirty rooms!
Summary: Overpriced, dirty, paid for an ocean view I wasn’t given, hidden fees, room service food was cold, expensive and nasty. Staff were rude! I paid a lot to stay 4 days and I wish I could have cancelled my reservations with a refund.
Manager Response: Dear nurse21sunshine,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact either our Director of Operations, Zach Kerns at zkerns@paseahotel.com or our Front Office Manager, Jovani Guzman at jguzman@paseahotel.com.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: No pool on this winters trip
Summary: Hotel is modern and fresh with a city vibe that we loved - games, an easy cafe, great art and vintage cars and airstreams for your instagrams  - nice outside area with pool but with this chilly winter we did not try it at all !! Rooms are spacious and well equipped (apart from paper mug for your coffee) we had Mountain View’s which Will also includes cars ! This is and urban setting ...but the bonus is you can walk to nice shopping and restaurants easily ..and watch the snow on the mountains ...the breakfast was excellent all a la carte and normal cafe prices !!
Manager Response: Dear beth-TRIP,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Dirty room, bad food, rude staff
Summary: Made reservations 2 months in advance. Susan told us our tiny lovebird would require an inclusive $50 fee for special pet cleaning. Turned out to be $125. The room was worn and the carpets stained. I began sneezing immediately from allergy to cats. No special cleaning was done to OUR room apparently. Terrible noise problems with adjoining guests. Front desk told us it would be taken care of, but it continued for 3 days. Dinner menu at Tanner's is sparce and the food bland and overpriced. Scallops in smashed peas with tons of cilantro? We called 4 times to get reservations for Thanksgiving dinner. Worst holiday meal we've ever had. Half a plate of flavorless brussel sprouts, jerky-dry turkey, a spoonful of gravy (asked for more and got a thimble size), over processed mashed
Manager Response: Dear Daydream402286,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact our Front Office Manager, Jovani Guzman at jguzman@paseahotel.com.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a short getaway.
Summary: We stayed here for one night as part of a staycation.  Overall, it has a great location and very nice rooms.  All staff were helpful and friendly.  The hotel is also dog friendlly which was helpful for our short trip.  Only compliant...they ran out of the fancy dog beds...  We really enjoyed it!
Manager Response: Dear 879stephenk,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Amazing Locating and Even More Amazing Staff!
Summary: Originally we attempted to book this hotel on a 3rd party site that was having some booking issues. We ultimately ended up booking directly thru the hotel via phone and email. We ended up with a package that included breakfast each day (up to $55/day) at Tanner's. That turned out to be the best decision.  When we arrived at the hotel, our room wasn't ready and so we passed the time by checking out Pacific City which is just a few steps away. It is filled with restaurants and shopping. We received a text when our room was ready. We checked in and the check in staff were very kind and even offered us a complementary mocktail. It was delicious. Up to our room we went. The decor is very coastal/modern and exactly our taste. Each morning I would call to have the room cleaned while we
Manager Response: Dear Ginger H,  Your words are music to our ears!  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  You have noted the efforts of our truly special staff and for this we thank you.  We look forward to your next visit with us!   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Best hotel to stay in California
Summary: we have stayed at this beautiful hotel many many times. It is a great location for the whole family or a great couple get away. The hotel staff is first class and the rooms are clean and the ocean views with those sunsets are amazing. The Pool and restaurants are very nice and you are also very close to fun, entertainment, shopping and other beach towns along the ocean highway. give it a trip you will be back for more.
Manager Response: Dear sssj2019,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're delighted that you had such a great experience at our resort, enjoying our unbeatable location, the spectacular views from our guest rooms, and our cool California coastal vibe. We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.  We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Paséa for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Surprised wifey on a West Coast trip to see the family with a day at the beach at this gorgeous location in Huntington Beach. Close to lots of great food and drinks and a short walk to the beach. Rooms were amazing, staff was great and the food was really reasonably priced.Wife has been everywhere but Husband did good on this one!
Manager Response: Dear Bama4Life,  We sincerely thank you for sharing this review, pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.   Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Huntington Beach so that we may host you once again.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Great place to stay with your family, co- workers or for just some R & R. Wow staff, location, and venue is so amazing!  Such a great experience and  fabolous staff that took care of my entire ream of 40 like royalty! THANK YOU PASEA!

Summary: We recently spent 3 nights at this hotel.  Our room was large and comfortable.  The closet was large enough for all our hanging clothes.  The bathroom was a nice size and there was enough counter space for all my stuff.  Our balcony was a nice size.   We ate at Tanners restaurant for breakfast every day.   The service was excellent and the food was good.
Manager Response: Dear TexasFreqTraveler,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa.  Tanner’s is the place to be for great food, fun and amazing service in Huntington Beach!!!  We love to hear that the entire restaurant staff took care of you during your recent stay.  Thank you for spreading the word and for taking time out of your day to share your experience.  We're hoping we see you again on your next visit to the area.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The Pasea Hotel and Spa was a fabulous oceanfront destination for our family. The spacious, beautifully appointed, ocean themed hotel lived up to every expectation. The special Eat, Beach, Sleep special offer made it affordable, and supervisor Skylar made sure everything went as smoothly as possible. Thank you to all!
Manager Response: Dear Diane M,  We're thrilled to hear that Skylar delivered the personal service that the Pasea Hotel & Spa is known for!  Thank you for staying with us and posting this review.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us.  We'll look forward to your next trip to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I was in town for the winefest that was hosted at the pasea hotel on October 26,2019 and Hannah at the front desk went above and beyond to make sure I was taken care of. This was in the evening and it had been slightly busy but she treated me like I was important and was patient as well as very professional and courteous. I don’t know who is reading this but she deserves a raise and a pat on the back for exemplifying what it means to have exceptional customer service.

We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Huntington Beach area.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa ,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa. Summary Heading: Best Hotel to Celebrate New Year's Eve in Orange County!
Summary: I love this hotel!! The staff is amazing - so personable and outgoing. The location is 5-star with gorgeous ocean views and the party... WOW!!! Fun!! I love themed events and the Pasea Hotel & Spa does it best with a Great Gatsby themed NYE party which is not only FUN FUN FUN but also an amazing deal on tickets and table packages!! My crew and I had a blast last year and are super excited to do it again for NYE 2020 at Pasea Hotel ...WooHoo!! And for those interested, I found the best deals for NYE at Pasea online at newyearsnightlife[dot]net - Best ticket deals hands down!!!
Manager Response: Dear Jamie B,  We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.  Thank you for the kind words!  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we look forward to your next visit to the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We were in LA for work and decided to stay the weekend. My husband surprised me with a quick anniversary stay at the Pasea.  The location was gorgeous and everyone in the hotel was so kind and helpful! I think it rubbed off on the guests because everyone we talked to raves about how wonderful it is!  We used the pool and jacuzzi, walked across the street to the beach, and ate in the restaurant.  Our room was amazing and had a great view of the ocean. Will definitely be back!!
Manager Response: Dear TravelbugTuesdae,  Your words are music to our ears!  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  You have noted the efforts of some of our truly special staff and for this we thank you.  We look forward to your next visit with us!   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Huntington Beach California Close to Heaven on Earth
Summary: LOCATION  LOCATION  LOCATION  The WELCOMING  Arrival Experience is second to none, instantly you're embraced by their Entire Team   Questions are Immediately answered with no stone left upturned.   Offerings and Suggestions  during  your Stay are gratuitously provided and armed with this New Found Information you are able to Navigate in the Vicinity like a Seasoned Local.  Spectacular Beach Views , Adjacent to an Outdoor Mall , steps from the Beach - Literally across the Street and just down from the Pier..Adjacent Mall offers Top Quality Restaurants down to simple coffee shops .
Manager Response: Dear LightPacker41156,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We're delighted that you had this experience and also sang the praises of our entire team.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Pasea Hotel & Resort did not disappoint. Not many locations can beat the view - we will differently be back SOON. The decor is fresh and the property relaxing. My favorite spot is the Tree House Bar - very festive with a view.
Manager Response: Dear dc0nner,  Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you again on your next visit to Huntington Beach.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel with a major issue
Summary: Staff very pleasant - rooms are very nice. However the last couple times I’ve stayed with you guys you incorrectly charged me money. The first time only like $50 and at my most recent stay the last weekend I was overcharged $300. It’s sad because this is my preference when staying in HB but I’ll have to do my business elsewhere because they put additional charges on your bill for nothing at all and try to get away with it
Manager Response: Dear pdonovan15,  We sincerely apologize for not resolving this issue in an efficient manner.  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel and would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly.  At your earliest convenience, please contact our Front Office Manager, Jovani Guzman at jguzman@paseahotel.com.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Hip Cool Boutique Hotel with amazing OCEAN views!
Summary: This is downtown Huntington Beach's newest hotel (3 yrs old in 2019) along Pacific Coast Highway directly across from the famous Surf City beach. It's got a cool vibe for hanging out at the pool which has great ocean views (they always have music playing either piped in or from a DJ up top at The TreeHouse), and great views from their restaurants Tanner's (ground level, in and outdoor seating) or The TreeHouse (which is an open air food/drinks lounge on the 2nd floor overlooking the pool and ocean) which has lots of fireplaces and a really cool tree bar. The hotel all together is a spectacular wedding venue! Our daughter got married here March 2019, couldn't have asked for a more spectacular day and venue, top notch all the way around.  Don't forget to book a spa treatment if
Manager Response: Dear ReJoyceJoyce,  Wow!  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Your recommendation is incredible!  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I've had the chance to stay at this hotel a few times and it Always Exceeds Expectations!  The General Manager, Joe, has a fantastic team and it shows in the design, details, and care of the property.  Room service was very impressive as it was delivered to our room on a busy Friday night in under 20 minutes.  Blend had a great assortment of retail including Trinitas Wine, Travis Mathew, and Corksicle!  Tanner's was phenomenal as well and we got to meet Chef Carlo, the genius behind the menu!  Thank you Paséa and Tanner's for making my wife's birthday amazing!
Manager Response: Dear GMACHotelTempe,  We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to share your recent experience with us and specifically point out a few of our amazing associates.  We're hoping that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: 1) ocean view from almost all rooms at the hotel 2) neat, clean, confortable, cozy 3) good food...best bar...better people 4) close to main street 5) price a little high, but quality deliver is superb, so it is a value option
Manager Response: Dear rhmejia,  Wow!  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Loved the resort. Stayed here for our honeymoon. Close proximity to everything (food, shopping, pier). Staff was friendly at check-in, valet, and room service were all great. We were lucky enough to be able to check in early on a Saturday and enjoy the hotel immediately. Beautiful views of the ocean and room was clean and modern.
Manager Response: Dear jenibins42,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're delighted that you had such a great experience at our resort, enjoying our unbeatable location, the spectacular views from our guest rooms, and our cool California coastal vibe. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Paséa for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We booked a 4 nights for the price of 3 with a special offer from our credit card.  It is a gorgeous new style hotel right across the street from the spectacular Huntington Beach.  On line showed a shopping center and MANY restaurants next door.  But things went wrong at check in when the person said there would be an additional $100 night charge for security fee which would be refunded after check out.  Since the room averaged out to be $300 for each night (including the 4th free one), this fee was strange.  When I questioned it the clerk said "All hotels in California charge this fee".  That is NOT TRUE.  Figuring I would straighten this out later with a manager,  I asked for the vouchers for the free continental breakfast as listed in our reservation.   He could not find any
Manager Response: Dear westerngal71,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact our Front Office Manager, Jovani Guzman at jguzman@paseahotel.com.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I had an amazing time here and two people really made my stay even more special. The pool hostess, Melanie was extremely friendly and fast. She was especially attentive to my daughter, which I appreciated. The pool has an incredible ocean view and the hotel is in an outdoor modern mall.  David, our bell hop was just so helpful with recommendations of the spa and other amenities. The rooms are beautiful and I love the modern feel. The lobby also overlooks the pool so I was able to work with a lovely view for part of my visit. I would highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Dear Resortstylestays,  We love this review!!!!!!!!!  It was an honor to host you and we are thrilled to hear that Melanie and David delivered another amazing experience.  Thank you for posting this review and sharing it with the TripAdvisor community.  We will be eagerly awaiting your next stay.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Really enjoyed the conference in this hotel as it is a great location, friendly staff, and great facility.  Conference was handled very well for the food, drinks, speakers, rooms, show, and all other aspects.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you again on your next visit to Huntington Beach.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Amazing service and high quality amenities
Summary: The staff was great from parking attendents, Valet, Front Desk, Concierge, Housekeeping... EXCELLENT!!! The room was clean and well laid out. The bed was wonderful and allowed for a restful sleep. Location can not be beat.
Manager Response: Dear dflatten2019,  We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.  We hope that you come back to see us again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Better off viewing the airshow free on the beach!
Summary: if you want to view the entire airshow from a hotel balcony be prepared to pay $1000's of dollars. You can only see half the air show from the side balconies. You can watch the full show from the pool area or bar but you will have to endure ridiculously loud dance music while you watch!  Your best view is by the edge of the ocean on the beach, for free! If you want a good night's sleep I wouldn't recommend the rooms as they are not sound proof - especially if you look over the pool and bar area. The doors do not cut our sound to the hallways. It seemed to be a nightclub posing as a hotel - if that is what you are looking for you will love it.
Manager Response: Dear SFCulver,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact our Front Office Manager, Jovani Guzman at jguzman@paseahotel.com.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Beautiful room; lovely view from balcony; quiet atmosphere.  Meals, open bar, and wait staff exceeded expectations.  Would definitely stay again.  Conference layout was easy to find and maneuver.  Convenient walking distance to a variety of nice stores.
Manager Response: Dear donnaryberg,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa. Summary: Great location close to shopping and beautiful Orange County views right next to the beach! We checked in with Hannah at the front desk. She helped us find a perfect room to upgrade to for the airshow and also recommended quite a few local activities. She is an asset to the company! Food from Tanner’s was delicious and overall, the staff were very friendly.  Location. Views. Food & Drinks. ALL FIVE STARS!

Summary: We had such a great night! My sister and I stayed and loved every minute. Rooms were perfect and next door. And Kayla at front desk- awesome and cute as a button! Restaurant was good.. and pool was the best and fun!
Manager Response: Dear Rebecca W,  We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to share your recent experience with us and specifically point out our amazing Front Desk Agent, Kayla. Summary Heading: Fabulous Stay at the Pasea Hotel, Huntington Beach, CA
Summary: From the moment we arrived to our departure it amazing with the staff, spa and servers.  The rooms and ocean views are wonderful.  The spa and massages were excellent.  So many activities available and the gym is great.  The location is incredible with the beach, stores and shopping.  I highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Inspire37264648869,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We're delighted that you had this experience!  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Wael! Such a great team member. I had to scan a document and Weal was there to assist my need. Something so simple like this can be somewhat complicated at some other properties I have been to so I really appreciated the service Wael provided. While I was waiting for my document to be scanned, I had the pleasure to chat with Robert, F&B Manager. Great service from both Wael and Robert. Looking forward to being back at this property.
Manager Response: Dear Jimmy Q,  We're thrilled to hear that Wael and Robert delivered the personal service that the Pasea Hotel & Spa is known for!  Thank you for staying with us and posting this review.....we'll look forward to your next trip to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Amazing location right next to the beach
Summary: The hotel has a very welcoming beach vibe. Walk right into the lobby and see the beautiful pool and ocean. The rooms are very clean and airy. The location is phenomenal and right next to the beach and plenty of restaurants. Super friendly staff (Wael is very helpful! )and great workout room
Manager Response: Dear ariva28,  Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about what a wonderful job Wael does.  We're fortunate to have him here as one of our team members.  We hope that you come back to see us again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Great four days at the Pasea. The staff were very helpful. My wife had turned her ankle badly the day before our arrival and the staff was great at helping us. The rooms are great. Lot's of fun. We look forward to returning.
Manager Response: Dear fmain720795,  We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.  We hope that you come back to see us again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Nice room at central beachfront location with nice bar
Summary: We liked our stay at the Pasea Hotel & Spa because of its central location and the nice bedrooms with two queen size beds. Everything clean and modern. From our balcony of the third floor we had little seaview, but from the bar it was excellent. Pool is nice, but it was too windy for us to use.
Manager Response: Dear bfurte783083,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Great service,  great location and satisfactory food.  I was here for business and the hotel provided a very nice venue.  I have no complaints other than the food could have been a little more diverse.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear gjgreengirl,  Your words are music to our ears!  Thank you for giving us such a great review and for promising to come back and stay with us again!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: A little too modern for my liking
Summary: Beautiful hotel, friendly staff, great scenery but just had a couple of bothersome items.  For some reason, the sleeping pillows on the beds are tiny, like couch pillows... first time I've seen this in a hotel... so I struggled sleeping at night.  The other issue was the shower pressure, it was too low.  So the shower took longer than needed. Perhaps these are minor issues to some readers, but these are two reasons why I would not stay here next time.
