Manager Response: Dear sajo25,  We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Relaxed elegant beach vibe hotel with outstanding views and amenities. Prices can get high at peak times. Overall a very nice hotel, staff and facility. Tanners bar overlooking the ocean is lovely. Fun tip... try the European-style electric scooters
Manager Response: Dear Coast2Coast314,  We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Huntington Beach so that we may host you once again.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I normally do not take time to make a review, however, my experience at Pasea was amazing, I NEEDED to say something about it.        As soon as we arrived, we walked into the inviting lobby.  Picture perfect with a view of the pool and the beach right behind it.  We were greeted by the front desk and got checked in by Savannah.  She was so friendly, fast and efficient and handed us our surf board keys! All this attention to detail just made our experience more amazing.  We got to our phenomenal room with an even more gorgeous view of the ocean.  Through out our stay we were greeted by a gentleman by the name of Jovani.  He would ask us how our stay was going and made himself available always.  He and the front desk greeted us every single time we were in sight and that made us
Manager Response: Dear LvEdisonL,  Thank you for sharing your experience and giving us the highest rating possible!!!!!  We appreciate that you took the time out of your day to share this review and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you again on your next visit to Huntington Beach.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: What a great hotel! The Pasea has the details down—from the surfboard room keys to the in-room flip flops, the Pasea is truly a great hotel. Perfect location, great vibe. I can’t recommend enough and can’t wait to one day return!
Manager Response: Dear WinetheWorld,  Your words are music to our ears!  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  We look forward to your next visit with us!   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Upon booking our room via phone with one of your agents we were quotes $295.00 for a special last minute rate. We were told the room was a "hearing" room, which was fine since we were staying for only one night. Talking to the agent we told them we would call right back to provide a credit card number so we could book the room. When we called back to the resort less than one minute later we told the new representative about the rate we were quoted, the new representative said that rate did not exist in the system and they could not find it. The rate magically went up $30 in less than a minute upon calling back to provide our CC number. The representative did not honor the quote we received and the manager could do nothing as well to get the $30 difference waived for our one
Manager Response: Dear rmsc,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact our Front Office Manager, Jovani Guzman at jguzman@paseahotel.com.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Was in HB for a sales meeting at The Waterfront next door. As there was not enough room at that property, some of us were booked at Pasea. I was worried that it would not be a good place. I needn't have.   Right from the start, the entire staff was friendly, welcoming and hospitable; they couldn't have been nicer!  The room was decorated in whites and colors of the sea. It was good-sized and the bed was extremely comfortable!  Really the only hiccup was with the complimentary bottle of wine in the mini-fridge. I was excited when I heard about it, less so when I saw it. It was a 2014 California Chard. A couple of colleagues and I pooled our bottles for our own happy hour. Unfortunately, the wine tasted old and flabby. Too bad.  Because my room was master billed, I don't know what
Manager Response: Dear TheRealAwaxy,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for giving us the highest rating possible.  We hope that you come back to see us again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: My boyfriend and I have been to Pasea a few times. They have always surpassed our expectations, especially this most recent visit. As soon as we arrived to Pasea, we were greeted with welcoming faces by the bellman staff. Throughout our entire trip, they never failed to say hello & goodbye with a smile on their face every time we exited and entered the hotel. Then, the best part... The people at the front desk were phenomenal! Sam checked us in and made us feel like we were at home. She was extremely sweet and lovely; and always talked to us every time we passed by. She gave us our room keys and upon arrival to the room, we found that we had a STUNNING view of the ocean. Not to mention that the room was in immaculate condition! The light colors of the room worked perfectly with
Manager Response: Dear lylearrianne,  As someone that works at a fantastic resort, we thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of Sam, Jovani and our Front Desk Team!  They are prime examples of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Huntington Beach area.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Ok, so I didn't really have a lot of choices booking a hotel at the last minute in Huntington Beach for the 4th.  I was pretty clueless regarding the area and ended up selecting the Pasea.  I swallowed down the price and hoped for the best.  In the end, they definitely could keep my money without question.  I travel monthly all over the US and very little impresses me anymore.  A hotel is a hotel.  However, this place impressed me without question.  From the gorgeous, very clean room that had an amazing view to the service, food, beverages and location - exactly what a boutique luxury hotel should be, no question.  The crowds were well managed and service didn't fail even though it was a holiday weekend.  Thank you to the Pasea for making the end of our West Coast vacation
Manager Response: Dear willtravel38,  Your words are music to our ears!  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day. Thank you for taking the time to share this with the TripAdvisor community and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.   We look forward to your next visit with us!   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Great views great services, but they need to work on the little things
Summary: It's a very beautiful hotel. But the little things add up. No fans in the bathroom were problematic. The doors are fancy in the bathroom but it's and a catches and was scraping the floor every time we opened it. AC in the room went out multiple times. If you are staying the weekend and your want to get some sleep then don't get a room that faces the pool. The bar over looks the pool and has a DJ that blast music most of the night. Making it difficult to get to sleep and stay asleep.   Now the catering for the event that we were there for, was amazing. The setting spectacular. Want to workout, they have the best gym that I've seen yet in a hotel, or just walk across the street and you're at the beach were you can run the paved path or workout on the beach.   Great hotel they just
Manager Response: Dear BlackHeartedBlake,  We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Don’t get me wrong it’s a beautiful property and rooms are on point. But for the money it’s not worth it there is nothing that is separating pasea from other 5 star hotels yet they charge a lot more. There is no breakfast buffet on offer, you pay extra for use of the inside spa area, 40$USD for valet parking & you have to set up your own beach seats/umbrella if you request them. Wouldn’t stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear BDownUnderB,  We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Not for anyone wanting a peaceful chilled stay
Summary: We had included this place at the end of our short trip to socal as what we hoped would be a highlight and a chance for some proper r&r  This has been far from what we’ve experienced and safe to say we’d never revisit  Whilst the place looks amazing and has a good location it’s just like a permanent disco and too much emphasis on venue hire making us as guests feel in the way  Our partial ocean view wasn’t the best, yes we could see it but couldn’t enjoy it as there was always too much noise from the roads or hotel disco so it was a real shame not to get to sit out on it Also having mostly a view of the hotel rooftops and entrance didn’t make us feel too much like sitting out either as it was noisy and smelly   The room was lovely and the only bit about the place that made it ok
Manager Response: Dear howardhildaexplore,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact our Front Office Manager, Jovani Guzman at jguzman@paseahotel.com.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: If I could give this property 6 stars I would. From the moment I stepped foot on property to checking out, I enjoyed every minute. The staff were friendly and professional, I got a beautiful ocean view room accompanied with goodies (wine, flip flops, kite and so much more) and great location. Whats a vacation without visiting the spa right? Highly recommend! In past years I've always stayed at the Hilton next door (Pasea is a newer property) but I may have found my new favorite hotel in Huntington. This all would not have been possible without Jovani the Front Desk Manager. The hospitality and genuine care shown by him is by far the best customer service I have ever received. Thank you Jovani and I will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Dear RhKampert,  We believe our amazing staff and the service they deliver are the difference between the Paséa Hotel & Spa and the many other hotels in the area and we are thrilled to hear that you agree.  Thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of our Front Office Manager, Jovani.    We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Huntington Beach area.    Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Stayed at Pasea for LDW for a wedding at the hotel.  Pros: - Location - Walking distance from beach and Pacific City - Hotel - Beautiful hotel with great amenities in the room. Clean Room but small sink area. - Staff - Staff helped with finding other arrangements when room wasn't ready and nice bellhops too! - Water & wine are included in your resort fee and provide top of the line toiletries - Pool area - restricted to guests registered, but if you need to make a change to add someone, pick a nice person! Also you can order food from Tanner’s while staying at the pool! - Spa - Clean, calming, and luxurious spa! Need to go back again!  Cons: - Parking - $40 overnight, no discount offered for hotel guests and takes a while for Valet especially if you forget something in your car.
Manager Response: Dear Ting H,  We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Check in was a breeze. The location is fantastic. I stayed the night for a wedding and our room, even though it was to the side, still looked to the ocean. The bar downstairs was good even with all the guests trying to get a drink.  The wedding was spectacular. Absolutely a place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear elsasoto83,  It was such a privilege to host the wedding and we sincerely thank you for spending this very special occasion with us.  We're delighted to hear that it was a great one and we're hoping that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: My husband and I visited the Pasea Hotel August 18-21, 2019 for our anniversary. Things started off very rocky but, Boris Banda(a hotel manager) swooped in with excellent service recovery and saved our celebration getaway!  We would like to thank Boris for his extraordinary efforts to make our stay as pleasurable as we anticipated from that gorgeous hotel and spa.  I hope the executive management team realizes what a gem and asset Boris is to their organization. We were also impressed with the daily follow up Boris provided for the duration of our stay.  He even came in on his day off to check on us.     The Pasea is a beautiful, clean, well kept hotel. The amazing views of the coastline from our suite can't be beat.   We will differently return to your hotel and our family and
Manager Response: Dear Shantray Dixon S,  Your words are music to our ears!  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  You have noted the efforts of some of our truly special staff, particularly Boris, and for this we thank you.  We look forward to your next visit with us!   Happy Anniversary!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Great new hotel right across the street from the widest beach I’ve ever seen..  corner room with balcony was terrific.  Bars inside and rooftop outside were active and fun.  Employees extremely well trained and jumped through hoops for ones comfort!!
Manager Response: Dear nash182,  Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Pasea Hotel & Spa.  We greatly appreciate the kind words, compliments and high overall rating.  We’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Recently stayed at Pasea Hotel (August 29, 2019) located in Huntington Beach, California. Incredible Hotel and incredible staff!  Pristine. Comfortable. Inviting. And breathtaking views. Most of all, though, I must say that the service was outstanding. As a world traveler (I have been to over 45 countries) I must say that the service and level of professionalism by the staff was world class. Best of the best. In particular, I found the Front Office Manager, Mr. Jovani Guzman, to be the consummate professional. Impeccable manners and someone who truly knows the meaning of "hospitality". A true gentleman who made sure that my stay was memorable. In short,  I highly this fine Hotel to family, friends and business associates. Joseph C. - Washington, D.C.
Manager Response: Dear JoeCampos777,  We love this review!!!!!!!!!  It was an honor to host you and we are thrilled to hear that our staff, particularly Jovani, delivered the personal service that the Pasea Hotel & Spa is known for.  Your recommendation is incredible and we thank you!  We enjoyed having you here and hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Pasea was an amazing place for us to stay. The staff were all very friendly and helpful. You can get little scooters from the Concierge desk to drive around the boardwalk. The view was amazing and we loved their 3 pools.
Manager Response: Dear J7571BKinfo,  It was such a privilege to host you during your anniversary date and we sincerely thank you for spending this very special occasion with us.  You have noted the efforts of some of our truly special staff and for this we thank you.  We're wishing you and your family all the best in the future.  We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Paséa for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: It was a pleasant surprise to arrive at such a vibrant and colorful resort where you can park your car and never have to drive anywhere.  Rooms and hotel in general was extremely clean and very friendly.
Manager Response: Dear francisbott,  Yes!  Your experience was exactly what we strive to deliver for all of our guests and it means the world to us that you shared this with the TripAdvisor audience.  We can't wait until your next stay so that we may exceed your expectations once again!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Tons of beach vibes and located right by the water. Downtown is just a couple of minutes of walking away. During the weekends the pool area is really popular and as a result is a bit noisy on the property. The general vibe is fine as long as you're here to have a good time and not just to find peace and quiet time.  The light settings in our room didn't work and there were some bread crumbs on the floor when we arrived but it didn't really change the experience here and was offset by the great location.
Manager Response: Dear kaminariLLC,  Thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We thank you for your feedback and we'll continue to work on daily improvements to meet the needs and preferences of all of our guests.  We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Paséa for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: great stay 3rd year in a row
Summary: just stayed here for the 3rd straight year. great hotel with fantastic pool, in pacific city with great shops and restaurants. pasea gives you a great view from any room, great staff,meet jovani, the front office manager, great guy to talk to, plan your stay here.
Manager Response: Dear njd51,  Thank you for loyalty and coming back to stay with us.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.   You have noted the efforts of some of our truly special Front Office Manager, Jovani and for this we thank you.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Hotel smells like an exotic vacation deep into the flowers 🌸 of Indonesia. 🧘‍♀️ .. room was very spacious and had a panoramic ocean view  of  Newport and Huntington.. I went back and tried Tanners the oceanfront restaurant..I had a great steak and the service was amazing .. 4 mini Shaka 🤙 out of 5
Manager Response: Dear ryan m,  Tanner’s is the place to be for great food, fun and amazing service in Huntington Beach!!!  Thank you for spreading the word and for taking time out of your day to share your experience.  We're delighted to hear that it was a great one and we hope to see you again on your next visit to Huntington Beach.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Great location and beautiful hotel...but overpriced especially for weekends
Summary: This is the second time we visited this beautiful hotel. No doubt the best location in Huntington Beach area. Rooms are specious and with breathtaking view of the Huntington Beach. However it is overly priced. Especially et the weekends, the hotel is packed with guests from outside; hence the tiny pool is full of people and the restaurants are serving too slow. We had to wait for 50 minutes for an omlette in the Tanners restaurant. You can never find free scooters and/or bikes available. They are never available and taken very early. As I commented last year, they only put 2 small bottled water in the rooms which is ridiculous. Housekeeping is improved since last year. Bellboys are very helpful.
Manager Response: Dear TC-BN,  Thank you for going out of your way to complete this review and for rating us 4 out of 5 stars.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We hope to see you back with us again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: This resort is amazingly beautiful with wonderful customer service and amenities.  It is a party atmosphere, so if loud music late into the night is not your thing, make sure your room is not any where near the pool area.  The music at the bar is until late into the night.  We had noisy, inconsiderate neighbors, which wasn't the resorts fault but is symptomatic of the party atmosphere.
Manager Response: Dear mechellesmail,  We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Not Five stars… Not even sure if this is much above three stars
Summary: Just not a five-star experience… Save your money you can get Terranea right up the road and get a five-star experience or the Waldorf and Beverly Hills I’ve paid as little as 580 a night. Much better experience
Manager Response: Dear daileytp,  We're sorry to hear that your experience with our hotel was not a positive one.  We thank you for your feedback and we'll continue to work on daily improvements to meet the needs and preferences of all of our guests.  We look forward to hosting you again and promise to deliver a great experience on your next visit.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Sad. Very sad place. One of the saddest "resorts" I have ever been to. Upgraded to the "Oceanview Room" and received a fantastic view of the adjacent roof top units, it was great to be able to inspect the nearby building for roof leaks. Thankfully I am young and able to crane my neck with extreme agility so that I could view the "ocean" from my "oceanview room".  Also, it's nice to know the resort overlooks a club however if you dream of falling to sleep before the early morning, perhaps consider packing noise-canceling headphones.  Our room keys were made of wood and powered with disappointment and frustration. Inexplicably, they would stop working immediately after being issued (this happened so many times I collected over 12 room keys)  Here's the best part... did you just
Manager Response: Dear Tarek M,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact our Director of Operations, Boris Banda at bbanda@paseahotel.com.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Overpriced, not a "resort" so beware of resort fees.
Summary: I booked a staycation for a mother/daughter weekend to enjoy the pool and watch the waves from a balcony. Definitely overpriced as I booked an oceanview room but got stuck facing the street with just a glimpse of the ocean from the side. Noise from the street was very loud during the night and early morning (sounded like drag racing outside) so not only did we miss out on a good night sleep, we could not sleep with windows open for fresh sea air. Tried to charge a "resort fee" on top of the very high price of a room when checking out and this is certainly not a resort. They waived due to the issues we had but doesnt make sense to begin with. The pool is small therefore very crowded. Pictures online over-sale this hotel.   All in all, most of the staff was very friendly and the
Manager Response: Dear Lbrown8,  We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The hotel is beautiful and clean, its in a great location across the street from the beach and beside a mall with options for food. Unfortunately the front desk staff if very vague and do not give you a lot of information about the hotel and its facilities. Bikes are only available until 4:30 you need a licence to borrow the electric schooter, not great when your with the kids?
Manager Response: Dear miritor,  Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Pasea Hotel & Spa.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We loved our stay here!  The location was awesome, centrally located in Huntington Beach.  Love that it's next door to Pacific City and has easy beach access!  Also, just a block from downtown Huntington Beach.  Would defiantly come back.
Manager Response: Dear Explorer23841969958,  Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you again on your next visit to Huntington Beach.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: This is a great find if you want a festive poolside atmosphere with live DJ, ocean view and lots of people. Treehouse rooftop bar is also great. Rooms have wonderful views and include a bottle of Chardonnay, robes and flip flops for you to keep. Great bath products too. Bikes, chairs etc available for use too. Very fun vibe here and literally adjacent to new outdoor mall with lots of shops and restaurants too. No need for a car at all.
Manager Response: Dear carrieul,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We're delighted that you had this experience as it is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: - A few friends and I stayed here and we had the best time! The atmosphere was very inviting and all staff was friendly and professional. We get to our hotel and the view included all the free robe, sandals, and CHARDONAYYYY was very nice, not to mention how nice it is inside, seriously. We got to enjoy the pool and the jets in the jacuzzi and how relaxing it was to unwind with the beach as our view. The beds felt clean and comfy and I didn't want to leave!!!  - I highly recommend staying here and having an experience you wouldn't regret! It's all worth it folks and thank you PASEA for a great time!!!!!
Manager Response: Dear miaam2019,  We love this review!!!!!!!!!  It was an honor to host you and we are thrilled to hear that our staff delivered another amazing experience.  Your recommendation is incredible and we thank you!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: The most enjoyable stay I’ve ever experienced!
Summary: I walked into my room, with two queen beds, and was taken back by how beautiful it was. The modern/ beach style felt so comfy. Unlike most hotels, you get complimentary sandals, waters, and even Chardonnay! Out of all the hotels on the block I will definitely be attending this one in the near future. Thank you Pasea for providing me the best ocean front experience.
Manager Response: Dear juliamichelle29,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: not a hotel to sleep at
Summary: This hotel has a rooftop bar that goes until 1:30 am with very very very loud music blaring until they close. If you stay at a hotel to sleep- look elsewhere. I have never complained before or had an experience like this. Moving to a different hotel tomorrow, tonight is a loss, will fight with management tomorrow for a refund. $800+ for a suite, not able to sleep here  There are other things to complain about but this is unforgivable.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  We are very sorry to hear about your experience and my delay in responding to your feedback. It is truly unfortunate that we were not able to deliver on our promise of an excellent stay. If you could kindly reach out to our Director of Guest Experience, Murtaza Mehdi, we would truly appreciate the opportunity to turn this unfortunate stay around.  Sincerley,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Great staff make this place work!
Summary: Checked in with my family and another family in mid August.  Rooms were great, however, there were some complications with our agreed upon reservation packages. (Also, on weekends, the pool area and bar is a little crazy for families as they become outdoor clubs, however, on weekdays it was enjoyable). Overall a fine stay as the staff were excellent, from the valet and bell-persons to the reception and maids, (especially the reception personnel; a young woman named Belen, she was super helpful and worth gold, highly informative and always smiling.  There was another fellow, the duty manager I believe his name was Joel, also very helpful and went out of his way to make our stay enjoyable). Cheers!
Manager Response: Dear PRPA_71,  We agree that Belen and Joel are fantastic and thank you for sharing this with the TripAdvisor community.  We are eagerly anticipating your next visit to the Orange County area so that we may host you once again!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: If you looking for a hotel and night club at the same location, go for it
Summary: Overall comfortable stay but be aware that many rooms are extremely noisy as they face the rooftop bar with loud music until 1:30am and you cannot sleep until then. Also, in our last day I noticed that they do provide bathrobe as I found it in my kids' room - we didn't have it in our room tough and during our 3-day stay we had room service every day and the personnel didn't notice the there was no bathrobe.
Manager Response: Dear Maria N,  We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Stayed for 2 nights. Big wedding party but the hotel still provided exceptional service. Room overlooked the ocean. Upgraded room. My home away from home in Huntington Beach . 5th time staying here. Excellent service
Manager Response: Dear alan l,  We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.  We hope that you come back to see us again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Our family of 4 stayed in a beautiful ocean-front room in August of 2019.  Plenty of space, plenty of towels, great views.  10 out 10 for the room.  We tried to do the beach butler pedi-bike thing multiple times on different days, but the hotel could only accommodate us on one occasion.  All of the other times, they were too busy (“there are 3 families waiting ahead of you”), they stopped the service (one day they stopped at 3:30pm), or they weren’t running the service at all.  So we repeatedly lugged four chairs, extra towels, sand toys, etc. across the pacific coast highway ourselves.  By the way, I’m not really sure what the “butler” part of this service is: the one time that we were able to use the service, the pedi-bike driver drove some of us there (it only seats 2-3), put
Manager Response: Dear Jay K,  We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Boutique Hotels Like This are the Best!
Summary: We stayed one night for my birthday, and as soon as we drove up and walked into the lobby, I knew this place was special.  Sometimes all it takes is one night and two days to decompress and recharge, esp. when the Pacific Ocean is your landscape, and the grounds are attractive, light and airy.  I felt completely taken care of and enjoyed all the little touches that make staying at a boutique hotel worth every penny.  We'll be back!
Manager Response: Dear Kay R,  Your words are music to our ears!  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  We look forward to your next visit with us!   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We loved this place.   It has an upscale beachy feel to it.   Hard to explain   Haven’t experienced it anywhere else!  Very welcoming spot with great food and party time upstairs . You don’t have to go anywhere when you stay there.   And the huge stretch of beach is right across the street    Will definitely return
Manager Response: Dear Rondog54,  Wow!  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I’ve stayed at this hotel 3 times traveling up from San Diego.  Twice in winter and once in the summer with kids.  This is the example of a well done mixed use development should be done.  The hotel is very new, airy and open.  It has a nautical, modern decor with great flow.  Service is good and good and drinks are above standard but not great.  The adjoining lifestyle mall is brand new and has great shopping and night life.  Whether it’s just the wife or I or with kids you can have a good time here.  With the wind the pool can be a bit cold but hot tub is ocean front.  The rooms are very nice and large.  If you can get ocean facing or south facing room as rooms facing the north pool side can get loud with neighboring restaurant and night club.  Not loud if sliding glass door
Manager Response: Dear CEU4040,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Located right across the street from the beach, the Pasea is a three year old hotel and about 3 blocks from Main Street.  There is a shopping mall with food court right next door.  Our room was an ocean view room on the 6th floor looking south. Rooms on the north side overlook the pool.  Beds were comfortable.  The resort fee includes a bottle of wine in the room as well as bottled water.  We lounged at the pool for a short while but otherwise didn't use any of the hotel facilities.  We would definitely stay there again if in the area.
Manager Response: Dear TwoRetiredFolk,  Wow!  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: My husband and I regularly visit Huntington Beach and on our most recent trip decided to stay at Pasea. First off the property is amazing; very clean, great location, amenities in the room were great (a bottle of wine...yes please!), cute little touches like flip flops in the room and an amazing staff. During our stay we had the pleasure of meeting the Front Desk Manager Jovani. We had a little issue checking in but was quickly resolved by the manager. During our stay he checked in with us to offer assistance and as we would pass by the lobby he would greet us by name which made us feel special. You can really tell he enjoys his job and has a passion for it. We can't thank you enough Jovani for creating a one of a kind experience, we will never stay at another hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear HenryAJLee,  We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to sing the praises of our hotel and our staff while specifically noting the efforts of our Front Office Manager, Jovani.  We love to hear that you and your husband had a fantastic stay with us and we hope to see you back with us again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: WOW. Staying at this hotel was by far the best hotel/resort experience I’ve had. The customer service across the board was incredible, everyone was extremely helpful and nice. The hotel has insane amenities included with the stay, like beach umbrellas, towels and even a bike shuttle to the beach. The room was gorgeous and clean with a beautiful view of the ocean!! The pool was beautiful, calm and had poolside service for drinks and food. I truly recommend anyone family, business or flyin solo to stay here!
Manager Response: Dear alexathompson1,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We're delighted that you had this experience and also sang the praises of our amazing team.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: My wife and I had an excellent stay at Pasea in May 2019. The hotel grounds, room, and balcony were all excellent. Tanners Bar had slow service, but not that would preclude me from staying at this hotel again. However, I believe customer service is a critical component of any stay at any hotel and I am utterly shocked how disappointing the customer service has been. I booked my stay through Expedia and provided my Credit Card at Check-In for the Resort Fee and incidental expenses. The incidental expenses should have been the Valet for my Car and any other room charges. As such, I was surprised when I received a $500 charge on my credit card from the hotel (as the room was paid through expedia). I immediately contacted the hotel and they confirmed with me that the front desk
Manager Response: Dear rumzia2018,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact our Front Office Manager, Jovani Guzman at jguzman@paseahotel.com.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Caution: Before checking out from this hotel you must make sure that all of your charges are correct. My wife and I have been trying to get a spa credit fixed for over a month now. Anytime you call everyone is so sorry and eager to help but no one ever follows through. It is a lie every time. Very disappointed. Beautiful hotel. Poor customer service.
Manager Response: Dear 538ethanp,  We sincerely apologize for not resolving this issue in an efficient manner.  Please contact our Director of Operations, Boris Banda at bbanda@paseahotel.com so that we may address this matter right away.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Absolutely love this place! The staff and accommodations made this a memorable stay and definitely a favorable impression of Huntington Beach.  The location is just across the street from the beach and the hotel provides various shuttle options including resort type umbrella and chairs delivered. Hotel is right next-door to  a wonderful mall, It is walkable to the Huntington Beach shopping area. The amenities are fabulous, and include a spa, bicycle use, and the beach accessories mentioned above. Will definitely be coming back!
Manager Response: Dear SteveSedberry,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day and your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us.  We will eagerly await your next visit.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Poor Service and Double Charged - Be Aware
Summary: I stayed there nights at this hotel - I am an experienced traveler - staying at least 200 nights year in hotels mostly 4 and 5 star mainly for business - however this was supposed to mini vacation   This hotel has extremely poor service for the stars it has given - this hotel added more stress to my life when I needed less due to:  1. I was double charged for my reservation - even though I explained at check-in and check-out. This meant spending hours on the phone with my credit card company. Very stressful and uncessary.  On a side note - Potential guests should be aware of the following:  1. Poor security 2. Resort Fee of $35.00 plus tax 3. No option but Valet Parking at $40.00 plus tax per night 4. Pool can be extremely busy and not clean.  There are far better options for a
Manager Response: Dear LoveCoolHotels,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly.  At your earliest convenience, please contact our Director of Operations, Boris Banda at bbanda@paseahotel.com so that he may address this and resolve to your satisfaction.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: My best friend and I spent a great weekend here thanks to Samantha. Sam gave us amazing an experience with a Cabana, valet parking, and a beautiful room with a view. During the day she checked on us so we had everything we wanted. We really appreciated the service from Sam!
Manager Response: Dear syrraih,  We're thrilled to hear that Sam delivered the personal service that the Pasea Hotel & Spa is known for!  Thank you for staying with us and posting this review.....we'll look forward to your next trip to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We travel to CA beaches yearly. Normally stay at the Ritz in Dana Point, but wanted to give this property a try. Beautiful property, but needs serious customer service improvement.  Pros: Beautiful property Great location, especially when traveling with teenagers  Hannah at front desk is the only seasoned customer service contact.  Cons: Tanners restaurant food and service is a hit or miss. Our first day, great food & great service. Second day, terrible food. Everything over cooked and it took forever to get our order. We’ll try again tomorrow morning only because our waiter has been great. He’s served our table daily. This morning, he credited our bill due to over cooked food & long wait.  Our room was not ready. We arrived after 4:00 check in. However, they upgraded us. The
Manager Response: Dear Sklee3,  We're sorry to hear that your experience with our hotel was not a positive one.  We thank you for your feedback and we'll continue to work on daily improvements to meet the needs and preferences of all of our guests.  We look forward to hosting you again and promise to deliver a great experience on your next visit.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Service at tanners restaurant was not good, great flavors but need to check quality control, we felt we were at a Michelin start restaurant. They were out of 3 items on menu and piña coladas for my kids took over 20 min.
Manager Response: Dear OnAir470714,  We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Modern resort with a vegas vibe
Summary: LOVE the decor of this property! Very clean and modern with all-natural materials like big tiles that resemble ocean waves, a huge art installation in the lobby that looks like the ocean which was made from thousands of flip-flops in various colors and all the cool wicker egg-chairs in the lobby. The room was very spacious and clean with a great ocean view. We truly enjoyed all these elements.  The pool deck was another story. lounge chairs are scarce due to overcrowding. Lots of "bachelorette party" wannabes, mostly very loud and obnoxious drunken women in their 20s busy with selfies and spitting out profanity left and right. If you're looking for peace and relaxation, better go to the spa, not the pool.    Beach concierge was the BEST! Easy process to secure the service and
Manager Response: Dear datadoctorswife,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Great Property & Especially Katie at Blend -- so helpful!
Summary: This is my third stay at this property, and it keeps getting better.  The staff is generally outstanding but this time Katie in Blend raised the bar by going out of her way with great customer service.  Thank you.
Manager Response: Dear MitchV271,  We're thrilled to hear that Caty delivered the personal service that the Pasea Hotel & Spa is known for!  Thank you for staying with us and posting this review.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Best Beach Front Hotel In Huntington Beach
Summary: Kellie is the best concierge ever!!! From planning till the end of our stay hands down five star service. After booking our anniversary getaway Kellie immediately contacted me to start the planning process. She gave me great tips on restaurants and things to do. Like there complementary motorized scooters and bike, which we loved and road them to the pier. She also set us up with there complementary beach butler. Love there pedicab service to the beach. He brought and set up our beach chairs, towels and umbrellas. So stress free!!! Also loved there Balinese spa. There soaking tub and couples hot stone amazing!!!  Coming back Kellie personally hand delivered pasea flip flops to take home and sent up champagne and strawberry dips for our anniversary perfect ending after the spa!
Manager Response: Dear GlobeTrotting637014,  We agree that Kellie is terrific and we're lucky to have her here at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We're thrilled to hear that she made this a memorable stay for you.  Thank you for sharing this and we are looking forward to welcoming you back to Paséa in September!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: If more space more luxury then isn’t too luxurious- beautiful property - awesome food and drinks, but just too many guests fighting for the public space especially by the pool.  Great rooftop bar - the drink of the month, watermelon mojito, was delicious.
Manager Response: Dear Stempleman,  We are grateful for such a detailed review noting some of the many positives about being a guest at the Pasea Hotel & Spa.  We promise to work hard so that we earn 5 stars on your next stay!   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Stayed here over the 4th of July weekend. Fifth time staying here. The staff was amazing. Especially Tyler, and Matt the bellman. Couldn’t of made the memories I did without Brandon’s help. Thank you Brandon. I would highly recommend this place to anyone. Keep up the great service. See you again.
Manager Response: Dear David_Ludwig2,   Your words are music to our ears! Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa. We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day. You have noted the efforts of some of our truly special staff and for this we thank you. We look forward to your next visit with us!   Warmest Regards,   Joe Leinacker  General Manager  Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Beautiful resort with improvements need in service
Summary: Checked in yesterday. The hotel in gorgeous. The room was nice as well. Bed comfortable, and the bathroom was nice. Excellent location. If the service described were accurate , I would give this hotel 5 stars. I found the concierge to be overtly scripted. The "beach service" to help us bring over the umbrella, chairs. And such does not exist. We asked for this service, we were handed 4 chairs with towels (which is great), but noone to truck them to the beach and no umbrella. If this wasn't advertised as being available, I wouldn't care. The pool service is non-existent unless you book a lounge cushion or a cabana. The front desk concierge felt extremely scripted and disinterested in provided the level of service I was hopeful for. Too bad, it's a gorgeous hotel otherwise with
Manager Response: Dear nikkip07,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact our Front Office Manager, Jovani Guzman at jguzman@paseahotel.com.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We went there as 2 couples to Tanners for the first time on Sunday afternoon July 27th, 2019 around 6 P.M.We have talked to the manager and he was so friendly welcomed us to the p lb ace. After an hour there we got to meet Mo. He was there trying to light the fire pits and we had a great conversation with him. I believe Mo is the maintenance supervisor and he told about the things that we can do their and the activities that they have at the hotel. Mo made us  love the place rven more. Mo was a pleasent person to talk to and very friendly. We will definently come back because of the Staff.
Manager Response: Dear 376issama,  As someone that works at a fantastic resort, we thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of Moe.  He is a prime example of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Huntington Beach area.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Not the high end resort vibe from the other resorts nextdoor
Summary: Pasea.has some tough competition with the Hilton and Hyatt next door.  Doesn’t meet up to them yet prices are similar. Pool area is small with poor service.  Only one restaurant which is just so-so.   It’s o.k., but I’d pick the other hotels next time.
Manager Response: Dear GoPlaces292190,  We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: First room we received smelled like mildew.  We switched rooms and the second room did not have that same smell.  Pillows and sheets could really use an upgrade.  Check-in was crazy due to 2 weddings, but the hotel should have been prepared with more staffing.  My husband and I got away for 2 nights without our kids for a luxury weekend.  However, having to wear a wristband at the pool doesn't feel luxurious.  It feels like an all inclusive resort in Mexico.  There must be a better way.   Breakfast both mornings had a 20 minute wait despite there being visible open tables outside.  More wait staff should have been hired, especially when the hotel knew that there were 2 wedding's worth of hotel guests. Breakfast was yummy. Biggest issue:  the hotel is across the street from a
Manager Response: Dear elle81898,  We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We had a very nice stay at Pasea. We took advantage of the beach butler, free use of chairs, free use of beach towels, we wanted an umbrella but they were out by 10 am, and they do not offer coolers.  The beach butler simply takes you in a pedicab across the street. He didn’t set up our stuff or anything.  It was a fun experience...but to get back to the hotel, we just walked back…it’s just across the street and there’s a crosswalk.  The hotel also offers beach bikes and electric razr scooters.  We enjoyed our free flip flops (were able to exchange incorrect sizing at the front desk) and our bottle of wine.  The shampoo, conditioner, shower gel, and lotion provided were very nice.   Walking into ‘town’ is only a few blocks.  There were restaurants, liquor stores, ice cream
Manager Response: Dear ABG678,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Got a huge run around at the front desk. From room to room, rude customer service, waiting for bell man. For the price you’d expect the service to be good and for them to have their stuff together. Wishful thinking I guess. Room is tiny and everything seems so cheap. We won’t be back.
Manager Response: Dear nbruno8008,  We're sorry to hear that your experience with our hotel was not a positive one.  We thank you for your feedback and we'll continue to work on daily improvements to meet the needs and preferences of all of our guests.  We look forward to hosting you again and promise to deliver a great experience on your next visit.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Positives Reception - always happy to help and changed my room from 3rd floor overlooking hotel roof to 8th floor overlooking pool and ocean Great pool & bar area Excellent location in HB Customer service during the day around the pool was awesome Resort fee - $35 per night was with the price considering the items included  Negatives $40 per day valet charge expensive and inconvenient having our car parked in a location we could not access Not cheap, but it is prime location with prime services (Tanner restaurant not value for money IMO)
Manager Response: Dear EMILIE8450,  We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Stayed here & worked with jasmine at check in. Jasmine could not have been nicer and more accommodating. She was such a pleasure to work with!! The Pasea is a nice hotel. The pool was packed which was a little annoying because we had trouble finding lounges near each other. The DJ was a bit too clubby for the pool. The rooms are nice - on the smaller side. They need to update their trash bins, soap holders, tissue box, etc.
Manager Response: Dear Ldg218,  We agree that Jasmine is fantastic and thank you for sharing this with the TripAdvisor community.  We are eagerly anticipating your next visit to the Orange County area so that we may host you once again!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Great Ocean View Rooms, Absentee Hotel Leadership
Summary: Nice room (incredible ocean view), newer hotel, too many service issues....  ROOM: We made reservations online and selected a small oceanfront room with a wrap-around balcony.  The view of the ocean was perfect, and there were sliding glass doors on the two adjacent walls so that a beautiful ocean breeze could go through the room anytime we wanted it.  There was regular motorcycle and hot-rod noise throughout the day, but the doors were heavy enough to insulate us from street noise.  The room had no tub, but we didn’t need one.  The room had such an excellent view, comfortable bed, and great shower (you could slide a wooden wall panel so that you could look through the glass shower wall across the room and out to the ocean if you wanted to). I’ve never seen that feature in any
Manager Response: Dear Mike P,  We offer a sincere apology for the multiple challenges you incurred during your most recent stay with us.  Your feedback is vital for us to measure our performance and improve the experience for our guests.  You can be rest assured that your comments will not fall on deaf ears and improvements will be made.  It is our hope that we have the opportunity to host you once again on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Belén from the front desk was a joy to meet and is truly gifted in hospitality! Even more so than the incredible amenities that the Pasea has to offer, it is the little encounters with people like her that separate the Pasea from other hotel alternatives. I highly recommend staying here!
Manager Response: Dear Peter C,  We agree that Belén is terrific and we're lucky to have her here at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We're thrilled to hear that she made this a memorable stay for you and hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I had a horrible experience with Skylar Smith.  He was an absolute no guy.  Wasn't willing to help at all with my issue.  Was willing to lose a customer without ever attempting to assist.  I was going to drop a boat load of cash at the spa, but, after dealing with Skyler, I just left.  He has no business skills and for something ridiculous, let me walk and cost the hotel a large profit.
Manager Response: Dear travelforfunforever,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact our Director of Guest Experience, Murtaza Mehdi at mmehdi@paseahotel.com.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The Lady that checked in from Spain was amazing! She needs to be in upper management and her work visa extended! Th overall stay was very nice. The pool was awesome. The view was great! We will be back for certain and tel all of our friends to do so!  Thank you,  David & Ebony Tye!
Manager Response: Dear dtye2019,  Your review was a great gift for us.  We are always delighted to hear stories about our wonderful staff creating lasting memories for our guests.  We thank you for this and hope you return to the Pasea Hotel & Spa soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I stayed at pasea over the weekend and the hospitality was amazing! From my first experience at Blend where Caty helped me find last minute needs that we had forgot to pack. For being such a small store I was amazed at the amount of products they had. We didn’t even need to go to CVS. The pool had a great vibe with great music. Tanner was polite and very attentive. I noticed management doing laps around the pool helping staff, and cleaning up towels. Boris introduced himself and asked if there was anything he could to for us to ensure we were getting the most of our stay. All the staff was pleasant and made us feel welcomed without being to much. Keep up the great service! We will be back!
Manager Response: Dear Passport303888,  We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  It's great to hear that Caty, Tanner and Boris yet again delivered the highest level of service to you. We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: My boyfriend and I did a mini staycation for our birthdays this weekend. We rented two cabanas by the pool and had such an amazing time celebrating with friends. Dane, the door guy, was such a big teddy bear! He could not have been any nicer and accommodating to our friends/guests. The cabanas came with a bottle of champagne and a fruit platter. They’re a bit pricey but ended up being totally worth it. Jocelyn, our server, was so efficient with food and drink requests. She was so nice and mellow even when our guests started getting a little rowdy! The rooms are so pretty and the balcony view is breathtaking! Definitely a birthday to remember and I’m so sad it’s over! I can’t wait to do this again!!!
Manager Response: Dear Briromay,  We love this review!!!!!!!!!  We are always delighted to hear stories about our wonderful staff creating lasting memories for our guests.  Thank you for posting this review and for writing about how fantastic Daniel and Jocelyn are!   We will be eagerly awaiting your next stay.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Staying over night for a special friends bday celebration... Pool, dinner and girls night out! Boris Banda was amazing in assisting with all of it! So accommodating! He went above and beyond to make us feel welcome and showcase the property! He showcased every area of services and was just so pleasant. Definitely will comeback to this hotel for future celebrations or stay-cations!!!
Manager Response: Dear pax f,  We're thrilled to hear that Boris delivered the personal service that the Pasea Hotel & Spa is known for!  Thank you for staying with us and posting this review  We'll look forward to your next celebration or stay-cation in Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Boris Banda was AMAZING. It was my first time here and he was very attentive made sure my girls and myself were takin care of. The front desk staff was very accommodating and they even upgraded our room to full ocean view! We were celebrating a friend’s and the staff made sure she felt special.
Manager Response: Dear Yvettemari,  As someone that works at a fantastic resort, we thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of Boris.  He is a prime example of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Huntington Beach area.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: My girls and I booked the Pasèa hotel for our girlfriend’s birthday. We wanted to stay somewhere that was fun and beautiful. The staff is amazing! From valet to poolside, we were treated like royalty, and it was not expected at all. They upgraded us because they knew we were celebrating. We got excellent service at the pool from Boris Banda! If you want to have a good time, ask for Boris! I love this hotel so much. It’s so clean and the customer service is beyond 5 stars.
Manager Response: Dear 106justinen,  How amazing is Boris?  Although we're a little biased, we believe he is the best manager in the area and no one delivers a personalized experience like Boris.  Thank you for spreading the word!  We hope that you come back to see us again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: My boyfriend & I visited from Vegas and came to the Pasea. We had wanted to check the pool out for the last day of our weekend and had over the top vIP service. The manager Caty greeted us immediately and her positive vibe and excellent customer service shined bright. Boris greeted us and took care of all our needs and made sure we had everything we needed to complete this perfect stay! Over the top service from Marco was also appreciated to as he checked to make sure we were enjoying ourselves all day. I would highly recommend the Pasea to all of my friends in vegas. Especially the Pool, the staff from Boris, Caty, and Marco were over the top with excellence!!!
Manager Response: Dear Ccminando,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  There is nothing we love to hear more than that our guests had a great time.  We're delighted that you had this experience and also sang the praises of our pool team.  We are eagerly anticipating your next stay with us!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The rooms are dirty, not vacuumed each day, dogs all over the place, requested tissue for the empty holder and extra towels, never got either. Not worth the money, very disappointed we were very excited to stay there as we always stay at the Hilton and watched it being built
Manager Response: Dear nvrmiss,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact our Director of Operations, Boris Banda at bbanda@paseahotel.com.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in HB
Summary: When we first arrived, we really enjoyed the contemporary decor. The staff at check-in was friendly and helpful. Our ocean view room was clean and bright. Several places were within walking distance to eat and shop. The hotel is right across the PCH from the beach and the HB Pier.   Our only complaint was the service at the on-site restaurant, Tanner's, was lacking. We waited on a server to come to our table for 10 minutes after seated and then we never had anyone consistent come around after that. They communicated poorly with each other, bringing us double items or none at all. The food was delicious though.   Overall, I would highly recommend this hotel if you plan a stay in Huntington Beach!
Manager Response: Dear kseagopt,  Thank you for giving us the highest rating possible in spite of not exceeding your expectations in our restaurant, Tanner's.  We thank you for your feedback and we'll continue to work on daily improvements to meet the needs and preferences of all of our guests.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: My wife and daughter stayed here for 3 nights July 9-12. From the moment we arrived to the time we left, we were treated like royalty. The service at this hotel is 5 stars! From valet, check in, bell service, service at the pool was unbelievable! Our room was on the top floor and had a large balcony with an ocean view. Our room was beautiful. The bathroom shower was huge with great products. I can't remember all the names but Sam, Daniel, Derek were great! But, everyone was great. I have stayed at the 2 other hotels close by and Pasea was the best and we can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: Dear jodyq2014,  We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to share your recent experience with us and specifically point out a few of our amazing associates.  We're hoping that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Tacky and not worth the money
Summary: Everyone who works at the hotel is lovely, so this review does not reflect the hospitality of the staff, or the comfort of the rooms, which are clean and well-appointed. But we paid $493 for one night in a King room, including valet, with no additional charges, and we were totally ripped off.   (1) There is a pool bouncer. He's great and friendly––but I don't consider wristbands to be a part of my "luxury" experience, and I don't want a pool that has a nightclub vibe. The music was loud.The area was mobbed, and loaded with floats and beach balls for children. I don't object to a family-friendly pool, but it was not the relaxing poolside experience I want at this price point, and I wish there was an adults-only option since there's a resort fee for this circus. Also, I felt like
Manager Response: Dear Girlskout,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact our Director of Guest Experience, Murtaza Mehdi at mmehdi@paseahotel.com and/or our Front Office Manager, Jovani Guzman at jguzman@paseahotel.com.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I'll make this short and sweet and don't normally do reviews. Bottom line is that my fiancee (who just became a Doctor) wanted a few hot tub/pool hours. Thanks to internet mistakes beyond anyone's control, that visit was a bit delayed. Here is where it gets phenomenally better. The entire staff ( most importantly, Marco Orozco) stepped up to the plate and after working some things out, made it one of the best times of my life and I will NEVER stop recommending this beautiful resort!  I would love to post pics, but I'm not a fan of bragging or making anyone jealous... lol!
Manager Response: Dear vinniesanchez,  We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to sing the praises of our hotel and our staff while specifically noting the efforts of Marco.  We love to hear that you and your fiancee had a fantastic stay with us and we hope to see you back with us again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: A large hotel with a number of great facilities, we really enjoyed our stay.  We had a partial sea view room, that worked for us. Good size room and a very comfortable bed.  The pool area was really good
Manager Response: Dear Katiebeth100,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and high overall rating.  We’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Hello y’all... Well today I spend some great quality time with my family and friends at Pasea in HB California.. the staff is unbelievable great CS and the assistant Manager Boris Banda left me speechless with his hospitality he is such a true gentleman above all very professional. One thing I truly notes was his enthusiasm to make us feel comfortable and welcome at Pasea ... great people skills and very charismatic in that note that’s a Plus to have people like him working  in a hotel as they do make the environment more pleasant. Over all our visit was amazing we never expected that Mr.Boris Banda was going to go one step above all our expectations to make sure our experience was memorable and for sure remarkable, very impressed.  I would definitely recommend this hotel to
Manager Response: Dear number1magic,  How amazing is Boris?????  Although we're a little biased, we believe he is the absolute best manager and no one delivers a personalized experience like Boris.  Thank you for posting this review and sharing it with the TripAdvisor community.  We are eagerly anticipating your next staywith us!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: My husband and I interacted with a great number of supportive Pasea Staff during our recent stay. Several team members stood out to us for their extraordinary work ethic, friendliness, kindness and helpfulness. We would like to specifically acknowledge the following people for improving the quality of our 3-week stay:  Frank - The Porter who was continually helpful, and had such a friendly demeanor! So apparent that he loves his work! Kellie - The Concierge with a gentle, kind, and real personality! She has a genuine concern for the happiness and satisfaction of her clients! Dania - The Housekeeper who was hard-working, conscientious and kind! Joel - The Front Desk Receptionist who appreciated our 'Discovery Black Status', and upgraded our room appropriately! Jeremy - The
Manager Response: Dear Vacation576718,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to share your recent experience with us and specifically point out a few of our amazing associates.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Enjoyed a nice weekend stay in May  Hotel is nice and new and had a relaxed feel about it  Check in was smooth and we got an upgrade which is always a pleasant surprise  Room was spacious and modern and good quality products / fittings. Bottle of wine and flip flops were also a nice touch Amazing location directly facing the beach   So, the but !!! There was a bar in the hotel which sounded really nice which over looked the beach - throughout our entire weekend stay this was booked out for private events. We could understand 1 event or maybe even 2 but the entire weekend for multiple events seemed a little much. This wasn’t a major problem but did mention it at check out - to our amazement the receptionist said it was outside of the hotels control!!!  Really?! We challenged
Manager Response: Dear MarkPP,  We thank you for staying with us and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We appreciate your feedback regarding event buyouts at our Treehouse Lounge and will use that to help us improve the stay for future guests.  It is our hope that we have earned your repeat business and will anticipate your next visit with us.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Excellent choice for hotel at the beach
Summary: I would absolutely recommend this hotel. I stayed here for an extended visit during home renovations and the staff were amazing. Joe & Boris from management made us feel very welcomed as guests and Kayla and Jasmin at the front desk were always very helpful when I needed assistance with my room. Jeremy @ Tanners was also very so much fun to chat with at the bar and Brandan and his team in the Valet were always so helpful. I just want to say thanks to everyone as this truly was my home away from home for almost a month and this visit, like all of my other visits to this hotel didn’t disappoint. The staff here truly make you feel welcome and like your part of their extended family. The location is amazing directly across the street from Huntington Beach and right next to Pacific
Manager Response: Dear LeissaA1,  We love this review!  We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to share your recent experience with us and specifically point out a few of our amazing associates.  We're hoping that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Spent 3 nights at the Pasea hotel over the 4th of July holiday and had a fabulous time!   The hotel is beautiful and the staff is awesome! Kellie and Nicole in Concierge were incredible!  I had many questions ahead of time regarding the hotel amenities and restaurants in the area due it being a very busy time and they could not have been more accommodating!  They helped me organize the perfect vacation!  Will definitely be coming back to Pasea!
Manager Response: Dear happycittie,  Your words are music to our ears!  It's great to hear that Kellie and Nicole yet again delivered the highest level of service to you.  Thank you for giving us such a great review and for promising to come back and stay with us again!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I was down in Huntington Beach while visiting my best friend in the hospital. I kept having to extend our stay and they were so accommodating and unbelievably helpful. It was a fun, clean, vibrant place!
