Manager Response: Dear Curious11538696265,  Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you again on your next visit to Huntington Beach.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I spent 2 nights at this beautiful hotel earlier this week.  The property is beach front and couldn't be more conveniently located.  The ocean views from the pool and hotel room were amazing.  The salt water pool was the perfect temperature and my kids really enjoyed swimming and lunch by the pool.  The staff exceeded our expectation with their great service.  The most exciting part of the trip for my kids was the daily trip to the beach where the beach butlers took us via pedi cab and set us up with chairs, umbrellas and towels right in front of the water.  The guys that took us each day were so nice and gave us some great recommendations for local restaurants.  The side entrance of the hotel opens up to an outdoor mall with some great restaurants and dessert spots.  While
Manager Response: Dear Michelle V,  Wow!  We thoroughly enjoyed hosting your family during your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Thank you for the kind words about the staff and hotel.  We'll be counting down the days until you return for the next family vacation!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The entire staff, front desk pp, and room service where totally awesome!  Even the pool staff were great.  THE BEST EXPERIENCE  EVER!  We had Ocean Front View and it was everything. The kids enjoyed it too.
Manager Response: Dear Sunshine43884848327,  Yes!!!!!!  Your experience was exactly what we strive to deliver for all of our guests and it means the world to us that you shared this with the TripAdvisor audience.  We can't wait until your next stay so that we may exceed your expectations once again!!!!!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Great views. Walking distance from the beach. Best part if you have  a EV  valet will charge your car for you.  Food is excellent. Rooftop Bar is great place to hang out with friends. Great customer service
Manager Response: Dear meena452,  Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you again on your next visit to Huntington Beach.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Free Bikes and beach umbrellas and chairs made the resort fee (That all places are charging) a bit more tolerable.  Again the parking charge is the same at all major hotels right on PCH, but its always something I dont agree with, however the staff of the entire complex including Valet was great.  Great time cant wait to return.
Manager Response: Dear Dave G,  We thoroughly enjoyed hosting you and are thrilled that you wrote about your experience on TripAdvisor.  We are delighted to read that our staff did a fantastic job during your stay and we can't wait for your next visit!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Beautiful Full-Service Beachfront Property! Great staff, clean fresh beachy rooms, fresh innovate food, fun and inviting pool along with the fantastic Tree Top Bar to sip delicious drinks while socializing and admiring the Pacific Ocean!!! Highly recommend for any stay or special occasion!
Manager Response: Dear Roving54658222709,  Thank you for this great review and for noting many highlights of your stay.  We look forward to your next trip to Huntington Beach so that we may host you once again!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Beautiful hotel, great location. All the rooms have a view. And are super clean and well decorated. Lobby is nice. They have beach chairs and umbrellas for you to use. A pedicab will take you to the beach, but it is right across the street and a quick walk. Right next to a mall with great shops and places to eat. Showers were a little weird in that you can see right into them, but there is a wall door that you can move over to give you privacy. But since I was alone in my room I left it open. No claustrophobia in that shower! I was there for a work meeting and all of the conference rooms were great. Food was really good for convention food! Lawn location was perfect! Over looking Huntington Bch. I spent every day in the summer on that beach! It was a great hotel. Highly
Manager Response: Dear CHW34,  It means a great deal to us that you had such a good stay with us and recommend us to the TripAdvisor audience.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us again in 2019.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: If you have the opportunity to visit the town of Huntington Beach, please stay at the beautiful Pasea Hotel across from the beach. The hotel staff treats you like royalty. Charley, at the front desk, was very helpful checking us in when we arrived after having car trouble. My husband and I reserved a partial ocean view for our 19th Anniversary but Charley up-graded our room to a beautiful ocean-front room with wrap-around balcony. For that reason alone, we are going to book the Pasea for up-coming birthday celebrations. The hotel staff, from front desk, to bell staff to restaurant and bar servers to housekeeping, are all top-notch and very professional. The best we've seen and we travel a lot since we are retired. A complimentary bottle of wine was included with the room. The
Manager Response: Dear 1000PalmsCarol,  We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to sing the praises of our hotel and our staff while specifically noting the efforts of Charley.  We love to hear that you and your husband had a fantastic stay with us and we hope to see you back with us again very soon.  Happy 19th Anniversary!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I had a great stay at the Pasea hotel and found the service very good Nicole and Kellie at Concierge were very helpful whenever asked questions and well trained. The food was also well above average so was the Tanners bar and Chrystal was always checking if you needed anoither beer. The rooms are clean and with great views. I will stay again as I have in my last few trips found the service poor at more expensive hotels in the area.
Manager Response: Dear BLGSat,  We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to share your recent experience with us and specifically point out a few of our amazing associates.  We're hoping that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Beautiful hotel with lots of amenities. Had an amazing facial and massage at the onsite spa. Dinner and breakfast at Tanner's were excellent.The room was good size. High points of the room were the lighting, task light on the desk, balcony with a partial ocean view.  A bottle of wine and two bottles of water were included in the price of the room. Room had a nice closet complete with shelves and large mirrors on the doors so I could check my outfit before leaving for work.  The bathroom might be a turnoff for some, but the shower had a window into the room - facing the bed and balcony.  I loved it as it let in so much natural light and with full length glass on the bathroom side, it seemed open and spacious. Much diferent than most cramped bathroom areas. Don't worry, there is a
Manager Response: Dear Lynne A,  Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Honestly one of the most memorable trips I’ve ever had! I have never stayed at a better hotel and I travel 32 weeks a year! Thank you so much for going above and beyond! They were so accommodating patient and kind!
Manager Response: Dear FaithAlexis,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are always delighted to hear about experiences that have created lasting memories for our guests.  We thank you for this and hope to see you again on your next visit to the Huntington Beach area.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I love this hotel!  I am a local HB resident and since it was built I've admired its construction, decor, staff, and the property as a whole.  This week I had the opportunity to stay for a little stay-cation to celebrate my birthday and let me say I wasn't disappointed.  I was greeted at the front desk by Savanna who warm and welcoming, she had my room ready to go with the keys, some drink coupons, and even an upgrade to an ocean front view all for my birthday!!  The room was clean and beautiful, I loved the Fresh shower amenities, the lovely gray bath robes, flip flops and cold water in the mini fridge. The bed was comfortable and I loved the pillows!  Once at the pool I was greeted by smiling staff and warm fluffy orange towels, while the sun didn't come out until late
Manager Response: Dear lyndsay h,  Thank you for providing this detailed review of the property and all of the benefits that come with staying with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa.  We're fortunate to offer such a location that provides even better service and we're glad you agree!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: 3 Mom Friends and their Kiddos enjoyed a 5 STAR EXPERIENCE at Pasea Hotel enjoying a breathtaking view; reserved Cabana and luxurious service to kick off Summer 2019. We could not be happier with the exceptional valet attendants, room service, cabana attendants and pool servers! The kids (5 ranging from 7-11) played in the pool for HOURS both days we stayed; enjoyed the Fire pits and truly were amazed at the views provided! It’s so endearing to see appreciation on a young face! If you are looking for a staycation or a gorgeous getaway; Pasea is your best choice!
Manager Response: Dear BrystinDavy,  We love this review!!!!!!!!!  It was an honor to host you and we are thrilled to hear that our staff delivered another amazing experience.  Thank you for posting this review and sharing it with the TripAdvisor community.  We will be eagerly awaiting your next stay.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I love the hotel, its location, the friendliness of the staff, the food, and the cocktails. They are all so professional and customer service is excellent. The Rooftop Treehouse Lounge is the place to be. The appetizers and cocktails are amazing. I love the centrepiece of the bar.
Manager Response: Dear Nanette V,  Yes!!!!!!  Your experience was exactly what we strive to deliver for all of our guests and it means the world to us that you shared this with the TripAdvisor audience.  We can't wait until your next stay so that we may exceed your expectations once again!!!!!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Excellent Hotel, the only area I thought could improve was the service in the upstairs bar in Tanners.  Very unorganized, ordered food they write done what table to delivered.  waited 30mins and foor was cold
Manager Response: Dear Happiness64364777062,  We thank you for providing this review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Should be more than a 5 star location. its that good.  Rooms are spacious.  Service was great.  On property restaurant is top notch.  Gym is way better than a typical Hotel gym.  Clean and top of the top.  No need to stay anywhere else. Only mark was the room phones didn't work.  But who cares.  I already have my return trip booked.   Love love this place
Manager Response: Dear TTEEKK,  We thoroughly enjoyed hosting you over Father's Day weekend and are thrilled that you wrote about your experience on TripAdvisor.  We are delighted to read that our staff did a fantastic job during your stay and we can't wait for your next trip to Huntington Beach!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Came for a 3 day business event. Great laid back feel to the hotel. Across the PCH from the beach. Tons of shopping and dining around. The restaurants roof top is incredible with stunning views. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Vacation03285390722,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're delighted that you had such a great experience at our resort, enjoying our unbeatable location, the spectacular views from our guest rooms, and our cool California coastal vibe. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Paséa for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: This was an incredible hotel stay from beginning to end and we had a truly wonderful time. Front desk staff is friendly and helpful, concierge (specifically Nicole) were accommodating and helped us make some really fun plans, the pool staff is wonderful and fun.  Highly recommend the shrimp cocktail by the pool - it was delicious!
Manager Response: Dear LittleKings,  There is nothing we love to hear more than that our guests had a great time.....we're delighted that you had this experience and also sang the praises of our Front Desk, Concierge and Pool teams.  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about what a wonderful job Nicole does.  We're fortunate to have her here as one of our team members.  We hope that you come back to see us again very soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I was excited to stay at the Pasea with my husband for our wedding night! We got married down the road at the Huntington Bay club and thought it’d be perfect. We usually stay at the Hyatt Regency so we wanted to try something new! Sad to say it wasn’t the best. I hate to compare hotels but they are right by each other. The Hyatt usually goes above & beyond so it was just disappointing.  We booked an ocean view king and got placed into a room that barely had an ocean view and was a handicapped room. It’s a beautiful hotel, just was pretty sad with the service and what we received for our wedding night!
Manager Response: Dear 573brielleb,  We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We vacation in Huntington Beach (from the South), and wanted to try Pasea - it is a lovely property with a bunch to offer - activities on site, convenient to shops and the beach.  You have to pay $40/day to park your car on top of the room fee.  Reception was very friendly but had no information about some of the activities highlighted on large signs in their lobby.  They asked around and still couldn't tell us anything about it.  Reception said we had a complimentary bottle of wine in the room, which was exciting.  We spent 20 minutes looking for a wine opener and there wasn't one.  Reception gave us a card to TEXT them for any questions or requests.  I sent several texts and got automatic replies that someone would be with me shortly.  Never heard from them.  Was on 8th floor
Manager Response: Dear goldendiv,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact our Director of Guest Experience, Murtaza Mehdi at mmehdi@paseahotel.com.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Thank you Pasea for an amazing stay! Your exemplary customer service, smiles, perks, and again, EXEMPLARY service was so appreciated! From the minute we walked in, the front desk reps made us feel so welcomed and valued! KAYLA, in particular, was off the charts friendly, accommodating, professional and positive! She answered all of our questions and went beyond the call of duty to ensure all of our requests were met—wow, wow, wow! Pasea, and KAYLA, thank you for everything! We are so looking forward to our next visit this month! PS: pool, restaurants, doggy area, doggy reception—also top notch in service and quality, THANK YOU!
Manager Response: Dear HappyDogsThankYou,  We love this review!!!!!!!!!  It was an honor to host you and we are thrilled to hear that our staff delivered another amazing experience.  Thank you for posting this review, sharing it with the TripAdvisor community and for writing about how fantastic Kayla is!  We will be eagerly awaiting your next stay.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The hotel is magnificent, we stayed in a front ocean suite for 6 nights and we enjoyed them to the max. The costumer service team are great and willing to help and solve any problem we face. Our plane was canceled and we were at the airport not knowing when we will arrive.  I called the hotel  and I spoke with Mr Wael Ghareeb who was a great costumer service representative he try to calm me down  and insured me that our room will kept for us till we arrive safely. For sure we will come back to stay in Paséa hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Sahar Y,  Wow!!!!!  We're very proud of this review and love that Wael did such a great job taking care of you after what had to be a long day.  We thank you for posting this and hope you're our guest again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Very nice hotel with friendly and helpfull staff. Very good and clean rooms. Nice dinning at Tanners.  Perfectly situated. Huntington Beach is a nice area with a good connection to all other places in LA
Manager Response: Dear Journey4866349728,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Paid over $500 for one night to listen to blaring music and windows rattle until after 1am
Summary: My husband And I decided to come down and stay the night for our 8 year anniversary. We were very impressed by the grounds of the hotel and loved all the kids we saw running around. We even looked into booking a trip to come back and stay for two days with our young boys in July. Let me tell you that won’t be happening! With the amount of money this hotel makes charging per night, over $500 they could have at least invested in sound proof glass for the balcony  doors. We listened to people yelling and blaring music until all hours of the night. So much for a romantic anniversary night. We were so frustrated by the front desks response we almost decided just to drive home that night. When I called down and politely asked when the music would stop the response was probably around
Manager Response: Dear Ddegeer02,  We're sorry to hear that your experience with our hotel was not a positive one.  We thank you for your feedback and we'll continue to work on daily improvements to meet the needs and preferences of all of our guests.  We hope to have earned another opportunity to be your hotel of choice on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Great staycation, but beware the noise!
Summary: My husband and I have stayed here several times, usually for just one or two nights as a beach getaway (we live 25 miles away). It's a very sleek, sophisticated hotel with a chic minimalist aesthetic. We love that we can valet park the car and not use it again while we are there—everything is within walking distance, from Lot 579 (a great food hall next door), to the Pacific City mall, to the pier, to the beach, to Main Street, which is Huntington Beach's main drag. There is a nice pool area, a good (if smallish) spa, and a restaurant/bar onsite. The bar has a huge open air area with views of the beach.   My only word of warning is this hotel can be noisy. This last visit, we booked an ocean front room, but it was on the second floor. This meant it was in close proximity to the
Manager Response: Dear Erika C,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The hotel and staff was amazing from check in to check out. The only problems experienced was the road noise from PCH and the noise from the wedding receptions. If you want to have a relaxing weekend, go to sleep early, and sleep in to catch up on sleep, my recommendation is to avoid ocean view rooms at all costs. You need to specifically ask for a room on the opposite side of PCH or on the North side of the building. For what the cost is to stay at this hotel, they should have the music situation figured out in the ball room where wedding receptions and night time events are held. They can't do anything about the road noise because of PCH, but PCH is a very busy road, especially in this area. Lots of old muscle cars, new muscle cars, and loud motorcycles at all hours of the day
Manager Response: Dear Explorer24079182989,  We offer a sincere apology for any challenges you incurred during your most recent stay with us.  We thank you for your feedback and we'll continue to work on daily improvements to meet the needs and preferences of all of our guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Nice glass of rose on arrival. Hotel was clean and efficient. Staff were friendly and room was great. Location was excellent across from beach, attached to Mall with food court and shopping, and a few blocks from the Huntington Beach Pier. Service was attentive but food slow to arrive at Tanner's. This was not a big deal considering we were on long weekend vacation stay. We attended a party at their venue and it was top notch.
Manager Response: Dear TravelDerm,  We thank you for the excellent rating and for the very nice words about the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We are pleased to get to host guests such as yourself and take care of them while on a holiday vacation.  We will be here continuing to deliver great service and hope to see you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel but questionable check-in time (4pm!)
Summary: I have previously posted a review on just my experience during check-in and I was not impressed with the check-in time or the 2-hour wait to be given the key to my room. But having stayed at the hotel I am editing my post with full experience. I must say it is one of the nicest hotel I have stayed in during all my visits to LA and the location is fantastic. The view of the beach from the balcony of the room is something to behold. The room was kept very clean and tidy. The pool area is great if you want to just lie down  and relax. The hotel staff are very polite and helpful. Overall I have enjoyed my stay at the Pasea but as mentioned earlier, not impressed with the check-in time.   I would request Pasea management to consider changing the check-in time to maybe 3pm which will
Manager Response: Dear Jesan K,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're delighted that you had such a great experience at our resort, enjoying our unbeatable location, the spectacular views from our guest rooms, and our cool California coastal vibe.  Your feedback is vital for us to measure our performance and improve the experience for our guests.  It is our hope that we have the opportunity to host you once again on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: The Best Hotel in Huntington Beach!
Summary: We just stayed at Pasea and were blown away by the hospitality and all the cool amenities the hotel had to offer.   First off, the hotel has the perfect location right along Huntington Beach and right beside to Pacific City mall. It is also only a 5-10 mins walk to Main Street and the pier.   The hotel is also beautiful with many gorgeous design elements. We stayed in an ocean front room with beautiful views out to the beach. The room itself has really nicely designed finishes as well and the bathroom is really sexy with a shower that has a glass wall that opens up to the rest of the bedroom (with a sliding door if you want privacy).   They charge a small resort fee but it includes a wide range of amenities including a welcome drink, a bottle of wine in your room, bottles of
Manager Response: Dear asianmapleleaf,  As someone that works at a fantastic resort, we thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of Murtaza.  He is a prime example of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Huntington Beach area.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The Pasea is an amazing place whether you’re looking for a cozy, romantic, active or entertaining stay. The staff is super attentive, friendly and helpful. I’d pick this place any day and you probably should too. We loved our stay!
Manager Response: Dear Betinaop,  Thank you for posting this review and for giving us such a high rating.  We believe that we have the best staff in the area that deliver a personalized service for each of our guests and we're happy to hear that you agree.  We hope that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Great location to everything Huntington Beach. Love this hotel!
Summary: Well designed hotel. Close to a variety of food options from 5 star to 1 star. Shopping at Pacific City Lot 579 and downtown Huntington Beach. Close to beach, pier and easy walking to and from with transportation rental options (bikes, scooters,etc.)
Manager Response: Dear Roving27406543028,  Thank you for this great review and for noting many highlights of your stay.  We look forward to your next trip to Huntington Beach so that we may host you once again!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Just stayed there for a week due to house construction. Beautiful property, all rooms have an ocean view, all the staff are super friendly and totally accommodating to all of your needs. Room service food is amazing and even better than their Tanners restaurant. The included pedal car to the beach is awesome and they set everything up for you and your family, even s’mores in the evening! Just an amazing high class experience there.
Manager Response: Dear 1badcarp,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  We believe that we have the best staff in the area that deliver a personalized service for each of our guests and we're happy to hear that you agree.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: This hotel is so beautiful! The location cannot be beat. We usually stay at Luxury Hotels all over Chicago and New York and we absolutely love them. But Pasea is what new luxury hotel’s should take lessons from.  The beautiful Ocean Front rooms, the complimentary wine bottle, the keepsake flip flops, the amazing Pool Cabanas, the Rose wine upon arrival, the hotel staff playing guitar in the lobby, different types of sweet delighters in the lobby each day, and the list goes on and on of all the other small details!  This is just and incredible hotel with amazing people.  Best of all, Murtaza and his team who manage all the desks and rooms are the best part of this hotel. Genuinely nice hotel staff that are willing to go above and beyond to take care of every need.  We will
Manager Response: Dear JJFishFry,  Thank you for posting this review and for giving us such a high rating.  We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to sing the praises of our hotel and our staff while specifically noting the efforts of Murtaza.  We look forward to your next trip to Huntington Beach so that we may host you once again!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Beautiful hotel. The architect deserves a medal but something just isn't right. I feel they definitely OVERCHARGED us for our room. We paid almost $500 a night to sleep on a very cheap mattress. The bathroom door almost broke off of the hinges. There are better tv's at Walmart for $199. The bicycles they loan you are so cheap they don't even stand up with the kickstand down.  A maid walked in as I was getting in the shower without even a knock. The tiny refrigerator barely cools down below room temperature. The water pressure in the shower feels like a light sprinkle. The sink kept clogging up. I don't know who's decision it was to fill this beautiful hotel with the cheapest quality stuff they could find.  They should be ashamed of themselves or charge a quarter of the price.
Manager Response: Dear dugjames,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact our Director of Operations, Boris Banda at bbanda@paseahotel.com.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I can't speak highly enough about this hotel. Dog Friendly is not the word... it's a Dog Lover hotel. They have a Private Dog Park with fun things for dogs to run up and down on, walking distance next to Park City and Top Dog store, and 2 miles from HB Dog Beach and Park. The staff were wonderful and very nice. They really went out of their way. The doggie treats on arrival looked good enough for a human to eat. You get free shuttles to the beach, bike and surf board rentals, beach towels and chairs. The food was great, the rooms lovely, and bed comfy. I can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: Dear AvecPierre,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us.  We will eagerly await your next visit!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Thank you so much Paséa staff for making my proposal super special.  Everything I could ask for, you provided.  The room was clean, large, and comfortable. The views from the king suite with ocean view was relaxing and the furniture/mattress was so comfortable. This hotel is the perfect blend of hip and luxury without being stuffy! Even the robes were so plush and amazing, I wish I had asked to buy one but we were so wrapped up in the moment. The room was available early for us, and the staff was so friendly. Felicia helped me beforehand to prepare the surprise. She gave me many options and suggestions. I decided to send my fiancé down to the spa for an hour, Felicia had an amenity sent up, which was perfect. Some chocolate covered strawberries and drinks, I had the flowers
Manager Response: Dear supaflymo,  We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  It's great to hear that Felicia yet again delivered the highest level of service to you and your fiance.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Huntington Beach area.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Service needs Improvement, but great location!
Summary: I stayed for my sister's wedding in town; and will never stay here again!  They had just opened (this was back in May 2017), and I don't think any of their staff were trained in how to treat their guests - no customer service standards.  Because of the lack of service when needing something as simple as a 'manager to talk too', I vowed never to return to this hotel.  The manager was also very rude, and we never had our problem resolved.  For the price you pay, and premium you need to pay for something as basic as a 'late check-out', this place is just too expensive w/ rude service.  Not worth returning too.
Manager Response: Dear Wendie177,  We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: From the front desk to the restaurant, the staff at the Pasea made us feel like VIPs! On top of that the location is unbeatable. I would definitely recommend this destination hotel to anyone traveling to Huntington Beach.
Manager Response: Dear Blopez5030,  We love this review!!!!!!!!!  It was an honor to host you on your recent stay and we are thrilled to hear that our staff delivered another amazing experience.  Your recommendation is incredible and we thank you!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Traveled from San Diego for a mid week stay. Location is beautiful, right across from the ocean. Upgraded our room to Ocean Front and absolutely loved the views. The front desk agent was Andrew. He was very nice and got us into a room very early. Everything was perfect and we will definitely be coming back soon.
Manager Response: Dear leehenig,  Wow!!!!!  We're very proud of this review and love that Andrew did such a great job taking care of you during your stay.  We thank you for posting this and hope you're our guest again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Since we arrived until we left. Everything was perfect! Great staff at the front desk and great amenities. Loved the delightful little treats in the lobby every afternoon and the live music in the evenings. Very subtle and unique touches that made our stay so amazing! Housekeeping lady was very nice as well. Room was very clean and maintained. Our new favorite hotel because of the housekeeping and desk staff. Sorry I lost the card with everyone’s names but they were so good to us!
Manager Response: Dear SergejTrifun,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We're delighted that you had this experience and also sang the praises of our front desk and housekeeping teams.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We recently stayed to celebrate our 5 yr anniversary as well as attend a concert festival nearby.  We were blown away by how nice the hotel was!  The sandals and free bottle of wine in the room was a nice touch.  We loved how clean and comfy the room was and enjoyed the view from our balcony.  Andrew at the front desk did a great job making us feel welcome and let us check in early which was sooo nice!   We wanted to get a little work out in before the indulgences started and not that I’m a super big gym rat, I have to say it was the best gym at a hotel I’ve ever seen.  The equipment was clean and modern and they even had TRX bands and kettle bells which are my new workout jam.  There were ice cold towels to use after your workout was done as well. Very nice touch! We hung out
Manager Response: Dear megand813,  As someone that works at a fantastic resort, we thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of Andrew.  She is a prime example of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Huntington Beach area.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: From Location to staff and service, everything was PERFECT! Ocean room was beautiful and the pool was a hot spot! Charlie and Murtaza were Awesome guys who took great care of us. They put us in a beautiful room and sent up an anniversary gift. Latest furry member of the family bruno had a great time as he was treated like a VIP. Everyone wanted to offer him treats and hang out with him. Front desk reception also offered free bikes and chairs for the beach which was awesome. Cant beat this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Fearless373664,  Thank you for posting this review and for the great things about our hotel Charlie and Murtaza......they are TripAdvisor superstars!!!!  Thank you for spreading the word.  We look forward to your next trip to Huntington Beach so that we may host you once again!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Great hotel, great location, most rooms have balconies
Summary: This hotel is great, walking distance to Huntington Beach main street and lots of bars and restaurants.   I love the location because you don't need a car once you arrive.  The hotel is brand new so the the rooms are nice and fashionable.  I love the showers in the rooms and the fact that the rooms have balconies.  The lobby area is nice and the bar is great.  They make a good old fashion.   You can walk to about 20 different restaurants, make sure to have breakfast at the sugar shack, a surfer favorite after the waves.
Manager Response: Dear Mike V,  We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Huntington Beach so that we may host you once again.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Exceptional and Grade A Customer Service
Summary: I stayed at Pasea Hotel in Huntington Beach this past weekend, and proposed to my girlfriend on the balcony of our room overlooking the ocean. Kayla and Ankit helped me  at the front desk by finding me an amazing room and making sure my now fiance and I were well taken care of the entire stay. They were very professional, courteous, and provided outstanding customer service. The hotel itself is very clean, smells great, and the rooms provide you with more than you need amenities. Every time we were greeted by a staff member, they were absolutely helpful and sincere. Great stay, highly recommend. We'll be back!
Manager Response: Dear ericmac24,  We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to share your recent experience with us and specifically point out a few of our amazing associates.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Huntington Beach so that we may host you once again.  Congratulations on your engagement!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Wow what a great experience we had! From the moment we walked in the friendly staff made our trip special.  A  staff member named Catie really went above and beyond for us to make our stay memorable. I believe she was concierge, she was friendly and professional. I knew I could go to her for anything we needed, she  exceeded our expectations with everything. From dinner reservations and suggestions to sending us a cheese platter to our room after the pool, to helping me pick the right spa service to go get pampered at the spa. Over all I give this experience 5 five stars and would highly recommend this hotel thanks to the friendly staff. Thank you again for making our anniversary a special one! Thanks Catie at the Pasea Huntington Beach Ca.
Manager Response: Dear Adriane C,  How amazing is Catie?????  Although we're a little biased, we believe she is the best concierge in the area and no one delivers a personalized experience like Catie.  Thank you for posting this review and sharing it with the TripAdvisor community.  We hope to see you again on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Just got back from a second stay here, this time Easter weekend. I cannot say enough about this hotel. Where to start? The hotel even SMELLS good -- they literally pump in a scent that reminds you of the beach and... flowers?  Hands down, this is the BEST customer service from the FRIENDLIEST and most HELPFUL staff I have ever encountered at a hotel.  If you run a business, go here and observe how amazing their employees are. This has not changed from my last review but it still blows me away.  When I found a cheaper rate online, the manager not only switched our price, but just to be nice, offered us a room on the highest floor. The concierge is ALWAYS ready to help with their services (more on that in a second), but the valet, the coffeeshop women, the maids -- everyone from
Manager Response: Dear JarJar319,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're delighted that you had such a great experience at our resort, enjoying our unbeatable location, the spectacular views from our guest rooms, and our cool California coastal vibe. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Paséa for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Great stay at Pasea Hotel! We rented a Cabana through resort pass and Nicole at concierge was super nice. She made our stay so pleasant as we were celebrating my daughter's bday! Some other concierge person was not! food was great at the pool and service was wonderful! Except the coffee shop indoor had nothing to offer and in the morning. They said they ran out of all sandwiches and at checkout time we ended up with old bagels and yucky oatmeal. Wish i had thought of walking to Portollo for coffee at the mall next door. Rooms were so nice we upgraded to ocean front! The hotel gave us a nice break on the upgrade and a discount on the valet. Overnight valet is $40 even for guests which doesn't make sense because they charge you for resort fee. Anyway i would go back again. We had
Manager Response: Dear KSD999,  We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  It's great to hear that Nicole yet again delivered the highest level of service to you and your family.  We hope your travels bring you back our way in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: IF YOU LIKE GETTING SCREWED, STAY HERE.
Summary: My mom, sisters, and I took a girls trip here in March. It was supposed to be a break from kids and to spend quality time together. The first night we were there, kids were throwing a party right above our rooms. Not cool with the amount of money paid towards these rooms. Then, after we had cleaned our rooms and left tips on the night stands for the housekeepers, the housekeepers reported our robes stolen out of BOTH ROOMS. We would NEVER steal robes, let alone average hotel ones. In fact, we hung up the robes before we left. Pasea then charged us $400 for BOTH rooms, for TWO robes clearly in the room. That is $800.00! Then, not only have they charged us and refuse to refund it, they have charged us this amount 3 different times! WE HAVE BEEN CHARGED OVER $2,000.00 for robes
Manager Response: Dear cooolwhit,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact our Director of Operations, Boris Banda at bbanda@paseahotel.com.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I actually stayed here for my HONEYMOON. But the SECOND time I stayed here with my sisters for my sisters “baby moon” we were accused and charged $398.00 for taking hotel robes that we NEVER took. I don’t understand how a hotel can just charge someone $400.00 whenever they want. We DID NOT take the robes and feel very taken advantage of. Our Integrity is being questioned over their housekeeping. My sister and I hung our robes up and my other sisters left them on the bed. In fact, when we were leaving my sister said, “oh I think someone forgot something and picked up the robe and said, “oh no, it’s just a robe” and dropped it back on the bed. They have charged the credit card THREE times now and we keep disputing the charges through American Express. Horrible hotel. Dishonest
Manager Response: Dear alexafeinauer,  We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you have experienced at our hotel.  At your earliest convenience, please contact our Director of Operations, Boris Banda at bbanda@paseahotel.com so that he may get further details and resolve this to your satisfaction.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We stayed for one night only since we had to catch the Angels in Anaheim. This hotel is fabulous! We got a front view room and it was perfect. The room itself was spotless, with sweet bathroom products and clean robes. They also provide Keurig coffee and Evian water. The staff is nice and helpful, from the valet to the restaurant waitresses. The location is as convenient as you can get, as is right next to the mall and all the food spots.  I'll be in town again soon and I'm definitely staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Paradise17675577597,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Staff not friendly. Tanners food great, service was awful. Paid extra for pull out couch - all springs, no way anyone could sleep on it, spa was ok, again staff just doest seem to want to be there . Pool service awful.   Disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear Curious39843424787,  We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We sincerely apologize and would like the opportunity to get some more details and resolve this to your satisfaction.  Please contact our Director of Operations, Boris Banda at bbanda@paseahotel.com at your earliest convenience.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Ok stay but with the $$ paid you can get better
Summary: Not worth the money, house keeping dont change the sheet , you hav to call them to do it . Slept on a dirty sheet . Tanners restaurant are overpriced and the service was below average. There were no one at reception twice and i had to wait for someone to show . Its a new hotel and they need training and maybe a better management
Manager Response: Dear Departure34339692201,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact our Director of Operations, Boris Banda at bbanda@paseahotel.com.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: My husband and I stayed at the Pasea for our one year wedding anniversary. Kayla at the front desk was so accommodating and helpful, she was such a sweetheart and made us feel like the only hotel guests. This was our first time staying here and because of her hospitality we will absolutely be back! Thank you, Kayla for going above and beyond and making our anniversary weekend so special!
Manager Response: Dear 139brittanyd,  We agree that Kayla is terrific and we're lucky to have her here at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We're thrilled to hear that she made this a memorable stay for you and hope to see you again on your next visit.  Happy Anniversary!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Should let people about charges before charging them!
Summary: We were there for a quick long weekend stay and the resort and people seemed 5 stars. We checked in from a long 6 hr flight around noon and have them my credit card. Wasn’t told what it was used for. Didn’t ask if I am valet parking and just pretty much assumed I had a car even when we ubered we the whole trip. I know about the $39 daily fee resort ahead of time so I didn’t question. My husband and I had 3 hours of sleep and couldn’t wait to get into the room so we can rest. As we were told they will “text us” when room is ready but 3 hours of waiting and lounging around in the lobby area. I decided to walk up and ask only to find out our room was already ready. We’ve been to many 5 stars and never had to ask if the room is ready and never had to wait that long. I know check in
Manager Response: Dear Islandgirl830,  We sincerely apologize that your experience was not a good one as we take our role in hosting our guests as our most important goal.  At your earliest convenience, please contact our Director of Operations, Boris Banda at bbanda@paseahotel.com so that he may get further details and resolve this to your satisfaction.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Great place ! Perfect location.  Staff is amazing!  Valet parking is a piece of cake ! Food and drinks are delish at the pool and Tanners.  Views are breathtaking!  Pool is heated and Jacuzzi is perfect!  Most comfortable bed I've even slept in.
Manager Response: Dear Passenger62912830539,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Group of about 12 teenagers hoodwinked their way into the private pool area and spoiled the day for so many families with young children. Foul language & inappropriate behavior. They obviously were not guests nor did they purchase day passes. Security or supervisors? Zero! Nowhere! What a joke!   My son ordered chicken tenders & the meat was virtually raw. No offer to replace them ... just “Oh we won’t include that on your bill”.   Couldn’t sleep properly the first night, not because of the immense noise from PCH but our AC unit. When I looked closely I’d say the last time the filters were replaced was a year ago!  Nice building & surrounds but doesn’t live up to the hype!
Manager Response: Dear CP634300,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact our Director of Operations, Boris Banda at bbanda@paseahotel.com.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Stay somewhere else. Left my headphones in the room and they made little to no effort to recover them. Ultimately told me there’s no sign of them which means the staff either lost them out of negligence or stole them.
Manager Response: Dear Explorer27125614686,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact our Director of Operations, Boris Banda at bbanda@paseahotel.com.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The pros: the setting is nice and the staff are nice. The cons: they have an outside bar right next to the pool across from the rooms. From 8:00 until 12:00 midnight it is a 20-something electronic dance party for non-guests. And, as the night goes on, the inebriated yelping gets louder. We tried to go to sleep at 10:30 but it is impossible because the crowded bar is right there and the thumping bass line is intolerable if you want to sleep. Seems like they they forget that there are numerous guests right there. My suggestion is if you want to stay here only do so if you can book a room on the opposite side of the building as you can still hear the road noise, but it is nothing compared to the bar.
Manager Response: Dear Twar,  We apologize that this hotel wasn't a fit for you on your recent trip to the Paséa Hotel & Spa .  While we do our best to get guests to an area of the hotel that will be best suited to them, we have many families and visitors which we offer a quiet and comfortable experience to and we are committed to keeping that promise.  We thank you for your feedback and we'll continue to work on daily improvements to meet the needs and preferences of all of our guests.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I was here for a business event of 100 plus. The conference room has an amazing view. The food was delicious. The decor in the rooms is bright and relaxing. The ocean viw from my room was beautiful. I can't wait to return for a personal stay.
Manager Response: Dear Tour20221638905,  We thoroughly enjoyed hosting your group and are thrilled that you wrote about your experience on TripAdvisor.  Thank you for giving us such a great review and for promising to come back and stay with us again!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Not into guests over 45. We were ignored all three days and nights by bar staff at night, pool servers and bar staff, and we received the overall impression that we were not part of the crowd they wanted at their social hot spot. Tanners takes care of the young and attractive crowd, ironically the twelve of us and two children we wearing more on our left wrists then the combined income of any one nights' worth of guests. We are the guests they should be attracting as we tend to be more well traveled verses the local see and be seen crowd..  The hotel and spa is very nice, but we waited an average of 35 minutes by a very low quality bar/server staff. Food was cold drink orders were always incorrect and very slow.
Manager Response: Dear Jet33382114846,  We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: A surfer's dream and a perfect anniversary get away
Summary: My husband and I recently stayed at Pasea to celebrate our Anniversary.  My husband is a surfer and he loved all the surf and ocean details in the hotel. The hotel staff was very warm and friendly.  When we first arrived, we were greeted by Ankit at the front desk and his friendly and helpful attitude set the tone for a great vacation. They even upgraded our room to a gorgeous Ocean Front room.  The hotel's location was amazing! Right across from the beach with some great waves! We parked our car when we first arrived and didn't have to drive anywhere. We used the complimentary hotel bikes to explore the area and walked to the nearby restaurants to eat. Tanner's restaurant, which is in the hotel, was delicious!  We will definitely plan to come back again!
Manager Response: Dear autumneb2016,  We're thrilled to hear that Ankit delivered the personal service that the Pasea Hotel & Spa is known for!  Thank you for staying with us and posting this review.....we'll look forward to your next trip to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: From the moment I stepped on the Hotel grounds, I was blown away. The location, the ocean, the pool. It was incredible.   While the hotel was picturesque, they say a place is magical because of the people who are there. And to tell the truth, the staff made my stay amazing!   Thanks!
Manager Response: Dear MattBMiami,  Thank you for posting this review and giving us the highest rating possible!  We believe our amazing staff and the service they deliver are the difference between the Paséa Hotel & Spa and the many other hotels in the area.  We are thrilled to hear that you agree and we look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Huntington Beach area.    Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I have nothing but great things to say about the PASEA. We come every year for an industry conference and have never had a bad experience. This time, I received above average service from Ronni and the front-desk team! She was super friendly, very welcoming and went above and beyond to make my experience a positive one. The rest of the team followed suit in the days that followed and Felicia, Nicole and Caty all took such excellent care in making sure our stay was excellent. Thank you all. I look forward to greeting you all again next year, with my red hat!
Manager Response: Dear dteda,  Your words are music to our ears!  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  You have noted the efforts of some of our truly special staff and for this we thank you.  We look forward to your next visit with us!   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: This hotel is beautiful, and for me, of utmost importance, spotlessly clean. It is situated conveniently right at the heart of the Huntington Beach boardwalk, near shops and wonderful restaurants and nightlife. The staff was friendly and helpful. I definitely recommend!
Manager Response: Dear Tara T,  We love to hear that the cleanliness of our hotel exceeded your expectations! Your experience was exactly what we strive to deliver for all of our guests and it means the world to us that you shared this with the TripAdvisor audience. Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and we look forward to your next trip to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,   Joe Leinacker  General Manager  Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Beautiful location, pretty hotel but unaccommodating staff.  Realize we arrived at hotel early but took them 5 hours to get us in our room.  Sat by the pool for hours which was understaffed and then was asked to move all our travel things so they could use our lounge chairs for a rentable cabana.  There were many other chairs around but thought it OK to move us so it was easier for them.  Waited 20 minutes for someone to take our order at the bar which should have been indicator on service for dinner, which was slow and inattentive.  Kids called front desk to ask how to find kids channels and after waiting on hold For 15 minutes were told ‘just look at the guide’ (Which wasn’t working).  Customer service is Extremely lacking for a place that should be all about customer service!
Manager Response: Dear jillyousaf,  We sincerely apologize that your experience was not a good one as we take our role in hosting our guests as our most important goal.  At your earliest convenience, please contact our Director of Operations, Boris Banda at bbanda@paseahotel.com so that he may get further details and resolve this to your satisfaction.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The staff of Paséa hotel is wonderful! From valet to housekeeping, they are welcoming, polite, and friendly. And the spa was a little slice of heaven! But the concierge desk IS the face of Paséa hotel! I don’t know how I would’ve gotten through the week without their help. I was traveling with a handicapped family member and Nicole and Felicia saved my sanity! They truly cared about me and about making my stay as comfortable as possible. I wouldn’t have known about all of the amenities that the hotel has to offer without their expertise. They clearly love their job! They were very accommodating and made wonderful suggestions for restaurants and shopping.  Thank you, ladies, for your assistance and your kindness!
Manager Response: Dear mmK5378BO,  Thank you for the outstanding comments about Nicole and Felicia; they are shining examples of our wonderful and caring staff that are here to ensure our guests receive the highest level of service that the Pasea Hotel & Spa is known for!  We are always delighted to hear about experiences that have created lasting memories for our guests.  We thank you for this and hope to see you again on your next visit to the Huntington Beach area.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The Pasea Hotel is found at the intersection of Perfect View, Fantastic Service and Awesome Accommodations. This three year old beauty is situated on the Pacific with views of Mt. Baldy.  Peter was especially helpful and welcoming!
Manager Response: Dear GaryT0924,  Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about what a wonderful job Peter does.  We're fortunate to have him here as one of our team members.  We hope that you come back to see us again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I stayed here this past weekend with a few of my girlfriends to celebrate a birthday and from the moment we walked in we knew it was going to be a great time and Ronnie at the front desk reassured that. She was beyond helpful and made sure we were well taken care of! Ronnie did everything with a big smile on her face and was so fun. We had an unforgettable weekend at pasea and we cannot wait to be back again & to tell all our friends about this hotel!!!! Thank you a million times over Ronnie, well see you soon!!!
Manager Response: Dear jackieab23,  We love this review!!!!!!!!!  It was an honor to host you and we are thrilled to hear that Ronnie delivered another amazing experience.  Thank you for posting this review and sharing it with the TripAdvisor community.  We will be eagerly awaiting your next stay.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Beautiful hotel near the ocean with fun surf board room keys! Awesome artwork throughout the lobby and a cute pet area to take your dog to get some relief and run around. Centrally located hotel with great views. Daniel at the porter desk was awesome and did a great job showing us to our room and the amenities. Comfortable beds and relatively quiet.
Manager Response: Dear colettem2303,  Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about how fantastic Daniel is!  We enjoyed having you here and hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Stayed here with my family of four, for four nights in mid March.  From the moment we arrived till the time we left, EVERYTHING was spectacular.  All the staff we encountered were polite, professional and VERY pleasant.  They couldn't seem to do enough for us, volunteering things I wouldn't have thought of.  Everyday there was a treat in the main lobby. The rooms were clean, comfy and beautiful. The gym was sufficient to get a good work out in each day. The pool was beautiful, looking out towards the ocean. The hot tub was even better, a comfortable 94ish degrees, perfect!!!!  Usually, hotel hot tubs are too cool and a waste.  Not here!!  The location was great too, right across the street from the ocean and a quick walk along the beach to the Huntington Pier.  Pretty well
Manager Response: Dear Dlboosh,  We love this review!!!!!!!!!  It was an honor to host your family and we are thrilled to hear that our staff delivered another amazing experience.  Your recommendation is incredible and we thank you!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: What an amazing hotel.  From check in to room fabulous service and room spacious,clean and modern decoration.  Loved the location.  Ocean view.  Staff friendly and very attentive.  Close to beach and main activities.  Restaurant breakfast and lunch great.  Very fresh and flavorful.  Pacific city shopping right next door.   Conference rooms great. Lunches and dinner buffers during business outstanding.   Love love this hotel.  Will be back !!
Manager Response: Dear annsG6714MA,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We're delighted that you had this experience and also sang the praises of our amazing team.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Really great hotel perfect location and fantastic staff, we will be back asap. Can not ask for more. Helpful staff that made our stay fantastic and Flawless hotel with high standard as it should be for that price but so well worth every dollar.
Manager Response: Dear joilind,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We are currently staying here. The hotel is beautiful. The ocean art throughout the hotel is fun and the blue and white palatte of the rooms is well chosen to remind us we are at the beach. I love the design of the bathroom that brings light and a feeling of space into the whole room. (I'd read in other reviews that there's no privacy in the bathrooms from a glass wall but this isn't true. There's a sliding wood door to cover the glass wall of the shower if you desire. In the age of the flimsy barn door on hotel bathroom doors these bathrooms are thoughtfully designed to bring both privacy - if you want - and light into the room.   The staff has been overly accommodating to my kind but excessive requests. The gym is awesome with all new equipment and as a gym addict it has all
Manager Response: Dear 26irisw,  We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Where do I begin.... we arrived and were greeted by Ankit “Kit” who checked us in. He was very friendly and polite. When he found out that we came for our 5 year anniversary, he helped us upgrade to an amazing room at a very low cost! He also gave us 2 free drink cards & told us that he will also do something special. We went up to our amazing ocean front suite and then went out for dinner. Upon returning we were greeted with 2 full plates of beautiful and delicious desserts and a handwritten card. He truly went above and beyond to make this time special for us! Thanks Ankit!
Manager Response: Dear dandorosh92,  We're thrilled to hear that Ankit delivered the personal service that the Pasea Hotel & Spa is known for!  Thank you for staying with us and posting this review.....we'll look forward to your next trip to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I fell in love with the West Coast all over again! This location was the perfect place to enjoy the beach, the sunset and the vibe of Cali.  Excellent accommodations, staff and service all around.  Highly recommend for a West Coast getaway!
Manager Response: Dear Scenic62376276561,  Wow!  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words about the hotel and the staff and we look forward to your next visit to the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: From the moment you arrive, even prior, the drive up PCH, you find yourself in the new Paradise of Huntington Beach , The Pasea Hotel & Spa!  It is truly an absolute gem.  We were treated by an extremely fast and friendly valet.  Katie checked us in with a smile and genuine hospitality.  Miguel made sure our bags and luggage were set up in our room upon our arrival.  The concierge was lovely.  She set us up for dinner at the exclusive LSXO inside the Blue Gold Restaurant. The GM, Joe Leinacker and his executive Boris made sure we were happy with our room and the amenities.  I cannot say enough about these gentlemen.  Their entire staff reflected them perfectly. The hotel staff, managers and GM went above and beyond. We did not have time for the Spa (next time) but the gym was
Manager Response: Dear travisaaron10,  Thank you for giving us a perfect rating based on your recent stay with us.  We agree that our associates are part of what separates us from other hotels in the area and we thank you for singing their praises.  We're hoping we see you again on your next visit to the area.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: This was a great venue for us to have our meeting - everything was right there and within reach!  What a lovely setting with an amazing rooftop bar.  The overall feel of the resort was just wonderful - fancy but not too fancy - laid back but just the right amount!  Amazing view from the room of Huntington Beach!
Manager Response: Dear Companion57813856916,  We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  We enjoyed having you here and hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I was @ the Pasea for a company destination conference.  Enjoyed my stay @ Pasea.  Staff was very helpful and friendly.  Conference areas we were in had great views of the ocean.  Also enjoyed the rooftop bar!
Manager Response: Dear Sherpa18923573684,  We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  It's great to hear that our team yet again delivered the highest level of service to you and your group.  We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Pasea for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Had a great time celebrating my dogs 3rd birthday. We ate all our meals at the treehouse lounge and room service one meal.   Loved being on the south side of the property. We would walk to Dog Beach at sunrise two miles away and play there and then come back for breakfast and soaking in the morning sun.    Also nice to be next to the mall area.    Recommend and would go back.
Manager Response: Dear maggielovesorbit,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we look forward to your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The Pasea sets the standard for hotel experiences for Southern California beach trips.  The rooms are clean, the service is fantastic, and the location cannot be beat.  Tanner's restaurant has excellent food, drinks, and there's nothing better than the rooftop treehouse lounge for a sunset.
Manager Response: Dear Pioneer32617266097,  Wow!  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: My wife and I stayed a couple weeks ago! Great view of the pier and ocean from our balcony. Upon room arrival, we were welcomed with a basket of ice cold beers, bottle of wine and truffles! The staff and service were absolutely wonderful. Thank you Josh Gitsham for the opportunity! I will recommend The Pasea to all my friends, family and strangers! Thank you for a much needed fantastic getaway!
Manager Response: Dear Mike D,  As someone that works at a fantastic resort, we thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of Josh.  He is a prime example of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Huntington Beach area.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Great room with nice amenities, the view of Pacific City and the beach was outstanding. The staff was warm and welcoming and gave a nice little tour of the facility when we checked in. Great shopping right next door with plenty of restaurants to satisfy everyones taste buds.
Manager Response: Dear Sean G,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We're delighted that you had this experience and also sang the praises of our staff.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We were placed in a handicapped room upon arrival. Not a great first impression. The room we were reassigned to was not completely clean, stocked with decaf coffee only and was missing the "complimentary/gift" bottle of wine that we were told was part of our resort fees being charged. We waited for over an hour the second day for regular coffee pods and shampoo/conditioner.
Manager Response: Dear Richard H,  We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Great stay with ocean views! Comfortable room and comfy bed. Decor was tastefully done and the customer service was exceptional from the moment we hit the entrance until we left. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear Y0ungatheart53,  Your words are music to our ears!  Thank you for giving us such a great review and for promising to come back and stay with us again!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: My wife and I had a local getaway to celebrate our wedding anniversary.   Ankit and Andrew took great care to ensure our anniversary was amazing.  From selecting the right room ( ocean view) to a nice bottle of bubbly waiting for us in our room.   Thanks guys!!
Manager Response: Dear s c,  It was such a privilege to host you during your weeding anniversary celebration and we sincerely thank you for spending this very special occasion with us.  You have noted the efforts of some of our truly special staff and for this we thank you.  We're wishing you and your family all the best in the future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Amazing wedding location with gorgeous view!
Summary: We had our wedding reception at Pasea and I couldn't think of a more perfect location! It was honestly everything I could have hoped for and more. It was always top of my list but it was a stretch budget wise, but I will say I am so glad we decided to spend the money and go for it because it was money very well spent! The staff went above and beyond to make sure our wedding day was perfect!   Getting ready there was perfect. We had the suite and it was the perfect size for everyone in my bridal party to be able to get ready and hang out without it being too crowded. The patio was gorgeous for photos, even if it was foggy it looked really pretty. We took photos all around the hotel and they turned out great. I love the ones we took in the lobby.  As far as the reception goes,
Manager Response: Dear erintrinidad,  It was such a privilege to host your wedding and we sincerely thank you for spending this very special occasion with us.  You have noted the efforts of some of our truly special staff and for this we thank you.  We're wishing you and your family all the best in the future and look forward to your next visit to the Huntington Beach area.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Absolutely loved my time spent at the Paséa hotel. Enjoyed the beautiful ocean view from my rooms balcony. The staff was beyond welcoming, room service was delicious and speedy, also room amenities were terrific. Breakfast at their downstairs restaurant was amazing. Definitely will return to stay at Paséa hotel and spa on my next Huntington get away.
Manager Response: Dear ggaspar992698,  Your words are music to our ears!  Thank you for giving us such a great review and for promising to come back and stay with us again!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Love the décor, bathroom views, and AWESOME staff… Daily treats in the lobby made every entry a welcoming and enjoyable one… Roni was A-M-A-Z-I-N-G, the coolest in reception! After traveling all the way from Brazil she was a breath of fresh air. As was KYLE at Tanner’s bar, he was super dedicated and organized it showed in his service that -no cut corners. There is nothing not to like at Pasea. I can only wish that I find my way back to this hotel. 😊
Manager Response: Dear FabRelaxin,  We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to share your recent experience with us and specifically point out a few of our amazing associates.  We're hoping that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We are completing our stay at this hotel as I write this.
