In all fairness, I had read almost 100% positive reviews of this property so I was excited to surprise my husband with this BD special getaway. We reserved an ocean front room which just seemed like perfection from the reviews and promo’s. Caveat: We are not overly picky people, but the advertisement certainly does not match the ideal experience as portrayed in ad/marketing efforts.  Positives:  * Gorgeous Grounds, attentive front desk and lobby staff * The Beach is Nearby — Across the insanely busy PCH, past the junkie RV Park, then the sand and sea is just steps away. * Hot tub is delicious however it’s also right on top of the PCH so don’t expect a calm, peaceful experience. * Room is spacious & Clean (until looking
Manager Response: Dear sassyshar,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience on your recent stay with us.  We typically deliver a great experience across the board for our guests and we sincerely apologize that this was not the case during your visit.  We'll use the feedback you've provided to review and improve our moving forward.  We hope to have the opportunity to host you again on your next visit to Huntington Beach as we promise to exceed your expectations.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: What great plane to stay for a long weekend and wedding. The staff is very pleasant and accommodating. Room service was relatively quick and delicious. The food at Tanner’s; their restaurant, was innovative and very tasty. The rooftop bar at Tanner’s was had a great ambiance with live entertainment and great drinks. The pool and large hot tub were a great temperature. The beach is right across the street and easily accessible. The gym and spa looked very nice but I didn’t use either. The Pacific City mall is directly next door with nice retail stores and food options. Main Street is a few blocks away with many great dining options and stores. I highly recommend this spa/hotel for a relaxing getaway.
Manager Response: Dear MikeN668,  Thank you for taking the time to share this review with the TripAdvisor community and we're delighted to hear you had such a good time for the wedding this past weekend.  We greatly appreciate the kind words about the service our staff delivered and we hope to see you again on your next visit to Huntington Beach.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Fresh , fun, lively hotel! Beautiful decor and great surroundings.  Rooms were beautiful with ocean views and a terrace.  Hotel room was surprisingly quiet once I shut the door.   Staff was friendly and helpful especially the folks I encountered in the coffee shop!  Very friendly and warm both times I visited!  Great stay overall.  I’ll be back again!
Manager Response: Dear Mimics46,  Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Pasea Hotel & Spa.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: This is a beautiful property that truly speaks for itsel,f but the service is what keeps you coming back!! The front desk team is a delight and were very knowledgeable and helpful. A special shout out to Manager, Josh Gitsham, for taking such great care of us during our arrival. We will surely be back!
Manager Response: Dear Nick W,  Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about what a wonderful job Josh does.  We're fortunate to have him here as one of our team members.  We hope that you come back to see us again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: From the check in to departure we had a most enjoyable stay. What a nice surprise it was to learn that everyone gets a bottle of wine in their room on arrival day and we thoroughly enjoyed sitting on our balcony taking in the view of the ocean. If you can ask for a room that overlooks the pool so you can see the sunset from that side. We only had a road view. They also give you complimentary flip flops, how great is that. So let your feet do the talking as you wear them back home and others will see the Pasea logo and want to go too! The hotel is super convenient to the walkable food and shopping next door and your likely to find a unique spot to gather with friends or just people watch. Beyond the mall area go down to Main street to find local pubs and T-shirt type shopping as
Manager Response: Dear Corinne D,  Wow!  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Your recommendation is incredible.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Excellent Quality for the Price Point
Summary: This was a last minute online search while traveling and we were pleasantly surprised with the quality.  We will definitely keep this on our list for next trip to Napa.  We loved the contemporary decor and style.  The in-room amenities were awesome.  I wish I could purchase the shampoo and conditioner as well as the robes.  Complementary wine in the room....loved our stay.
Manager Response: Dear Tourist01532235001,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We're delighted that you had this experience.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The rooms were nice, but all rooms facing the rooftop bar (best views) are very noisy until at least 1:00am.  There was a problem with the poolside speakers when we stayed there and they played very loud music until 4:00am
Manager Response: Dear Larry W,  We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We had our first visit to Pasea last year- and we loved this place! We spent hours on research back in Europe for where we would stay this time when visiting Cali again but we ended up with Pasea again- even though we like new experiences and only have a few places we keep coming back to. As newlyweds we decided to go for an Ocean View room. To our disappointment this was only partial with our view being distorted by some white plastic roof just beneath. Very “charming”. When checking in we heard another guest complain about this so we asked politely if this was a guaranteed Ocean view and it was a definite yes.  I will be honest, you can see the ocean but it’s from the side of the building. Other hotels call this “partial sea view”. The Pasea makes it sound like you are on the
Manager Response: Dear Missjetlagged,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact our Director of Operations, Boris Banda at bbanda@paseahotel.com.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: BEYOND Amazing! BEST Hotel and STAFF in Huntington Beach
Summary: This is my second stay at this hotel and I can't get over the quality of service and staff at this amazing resort. Seriously. It's amazing. We were there for a long weekend and Ronnie at the front desk was so sweet, gave us a great room and gave us a direct number if we needed anything or had any questions. We rode bikes (free for guests) down to Newport Beach and got caught in a rainstorm, Victor - a driver from the hotel, came and picked us all up and took care of our bikes. WHAT? I thought we were going to have to find some weird giant Uber with a bike rack. Amazing. During our stay, we randomly met this fun gal in the lobby, Brie Anderson - head of Sales for Hotel. She gave us great local recommendations and took the time to send us a little note to our room. After we
Manager Response: Dear AlohaRise,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa  You specifically pointed out a few of our amazing associates and for this we also thank you. We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Your kind words are appreciated and we look forward to your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Roni was great when I first arrived at the hotel. Friendly, attentive, and a pleasure to deal with after a cross country flight. My room was beautiful and the property is walking distance to several beaches, restaurants, and bars. I would definitely stay at this location in the future.
Manager Response: Dear kvanthof,  Wow!!!!!  We're very proud of this review and love that Roni did such a great job taking care of you after what had to be a long day.  We thank you for posting this and hope you're our guest again in the vary near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I stayed at Pasea recently for a business trip and had a wonderful experience.  I found the staff to be incredibly friendly.  My room was spotless and had a gorgeous patio and ocean view.  Our food was catered for most of our meals and I thought the quality was excellent.  The only thing that would make this place better is if they have more dining options.  There was another company hosting an event there and they shut the entire restaurant down, so we had to leave the hotel to visit a bar elsewhere.
Manager Response: Dear Litlbarnes,  We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.  We love to hear that the cleanliness of the room exceeded your expectations!  We look forward to your next trip to Huntington Beach so that we may host you once again.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Because of my job, I went to a career-enhancing seminar in August, 2018. It was held at the Pasea Hotel & Spa in Huntington Beach, California.I had never been there before, but the seminar was appealing so off I went. I never expected the location (Pasea Hotel & Spa) to be one of the great highlights of the week!   My seminar was awesome. Great speakers and programs.   But my hotel stay was spectacular! Loved the comfortable and well-equipped room. Loved the views from my room and from throughout the property of the blue Pacific Ocean. Loved the meals I enjoyed at the Pasea.  The hotel staff are experts in customer care. I think this experience ranks as one of the most customer-friendly experiences I have ever had while traveling or attending a seminar.  What an awesome place
Manager Response: Dear JackpotCharlie,  We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  It's great to hear that our hotel staff yet again delivered the highest level of service to you and your group.  We hope your travels bring you back our way in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We attended a conference at this hotel. All the staff was very pleasant. Rooms are nice and clean. The deluxe room has a huge tub. I’m a short person and could almost swim in it. Amazing. The food was okay. What I really loved was the view and Pacific City. We could walk around and find places to dine and shop. We loved how convenient everything was.
Manager Response: Dear Helena9933,  Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you again on your next visit to Huntington Beach.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Came over from Europe and was suggested to go to this hotel.  From the start everything looked so nice.  Location is really 50 meters by the ocean.  Then the hotel staff was so helpful.  At the desk Veronica greeted us and gave us suggestions about what to do and where to go.  I would suggest you guys to go to the next door mall (pacific city).  Pretty good Pizza at Il barone, literally 100 meters from the hotel lobby. (I am italian, so I know pizza) If you want great service and an amazing time go there, I know i will.
Manager Response: Dear Bernardo P,  Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about how fantastic Veronica is!  We enjoyed having you here and hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Great place for a relaxing getaway...or a work weekend ; )
Summary: My partner and I recently stayed here for a weekend work event. The hotel design is lovely, tasteful and creates a relaxed environment. Our front desk person, Roni, was the best and so accommodating! The staff were all friendly and super helpful. The hotel has a great comfortable vibe and the restaurant has plenty of tasty eats. The club next door was a little rowdy on Saturday night, so if you're a light sleeper you may want to request a room a little further away--I'm sure the staff would be happy to accommodate. I hope we get to come back soon for a non work weekend!
Manager Response: Dear mitzymarmalade,  We're thrilled to hear that Roni delivered the personal service that the Pasea Hotel & Spa is known for!  Thank you for staying with us and posting this review.....we'll look forward to your next trip to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Stayed twice - upon opening and the next year later.  The attitude from the front desk is awful.  Condescending - no idea why.  Repeat guests are treated poorly.  No way would I ever stay a third time.  Totally not Californian - unwelcoming.  I regret every dollar I spent on my second round.
Manager Response: Dear David D,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact our Director of Operations, Boris Banda at bbanda@paseahotel.com.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: This hotel is seriously on point and captured the details of true hospitality! From the moment we checked in (also our first time), we felt like a special guest. Ankit was super friendly and accommodating to make our stay more comfortable, especially given the race I was running the next morning. We had been to Tanner's Treehouse only 3 months prior for my birthday but didn't stay at the hotel that night so it was great to finally experience Pasea! The hotel picks up on the fine details of a getaway, even if you're local. The rooms are modern and cool with the true feel of coastal California. I love the bottle of wine with the room (I wish we had an option for white or red though because red was in the room and I would have preferred white) and the take home flip flops are a
Manager Response: Dear daisies12,  Your words are music to our ears!  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  You have noted the efforts of some of our truly special staff and for this we thank you.  We look forward to your next visit with us!   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: A good location with good views of the sea on one side of the Hotel. Balconies are a great place to sip your drink, whisper sweet nothings and take in the view. Good sized rooms. Carpets a bit dated. The big draw back are the pillows loads of them but not comfortable as they are the size of cushions. Dog friendly, out door pool and walking distance from the sea. Please be aware that the restaurant service can be slow, however there are plenty of eating places around. Valet parking for car available.
Manager Response: Dear T5622KK,  We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Stayed in room 332 and had an amazing view of the beach, pier, pool and tree house bar!I love the Wine Wednesday Yoga offered free to guests.  Cool perk.I loved the gym and all the equipment was working and newRoom colours were uplifting.The location is adjacent to excellent restaurants and shops that is only a two minute walk.
Manager Response: Dear FarAway31359597933,  We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  It is very rewarding to receive such a highly rated review from you based on your recent stay.  Thank you from the entire staff!  Please come back and see us very soon.  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Amazing hotel. Unfortunately, room service was a letdown.
Summary: Pasea is nothing short of breathtaking. What an outstanding property. The hotel itself oozes luxury and sophistication, with the relaxing beach theme consistently displayed everywhere. Pasea is unlike any other hotel I’ve stayed at. It sets itself apart in all aspects: from the 24-hour coffee shop, to the wooden room keys shaped like surfboards (which we all found adorable), to the quirky messages on blackboards spread across the hotel lobby.  My room was extremely comfortable: very spacious, well-appointed, and very elegantly decorated. I appreciated the control panel for all the lights at the entryway; however, having one by the bedside would have been beneficial too. The balcony was a lovely feature. My room had an amazing view of the beach and sitting on the spacious balcony
Manager Response: Dear deniseacole,  We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Just want to take a quick second to send a huge shoutout to Chelsea the manager of the front desk! She was absolutely amazing, and caring. Wish every hotel interaction is like this was! Overall beautiful hotel, and amazing location.
Manager Response: Dear americanfreedom,  We're thrilled to hear that Chelsea delivered the personal service that the Pasea Hotel & Spa is known for!  Thank you for staying with us and posting this review.....we'll look forward to your next trip to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Beautiful Hotel - Great Place to Stay in Huntington Beach
Summary: Beautiful, relatively new hotel.  Rooms are well appointed with everything you need, clean and bed is very comfortable.  Take home flip-flops and a bottle of wine are a nice touch!  Staff is great - very warm and welcoming - Roni at the desk was especially helpful. Fitness Center is fantastic! Only caveat - if you have a room with a balcony facing north and go to bed before the DJ at Tanner's finishes (about 1:30 am it seemed), bring earplugs as the sound might bother you (didn't really bother me).
Manager Response: Dear ChRubin,  We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  It's great to hear that Roni yet again delivered the highest level of service to you.  We hope your travels bring you back our way in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Even as an HB local, staying at the Pasea puts it in a whole new perspective. Boris and Roni provided the BEST hospitality and made our stay so amazing. The hotel is great, the view is amazing, and the staff is the greatest!! Couldn’t have asked for more for a perfect birthday celebration. Pacific City and Main Street HB are easy walking distance and Tanner’s has great food. They also have a coffee shop that’s open 24 hours!! Can’t wait to do it again, til next time :) Highly recommended and will definitely recommend to all my friends
Manager Response: Dear SarahP12681,  We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to sing the praises of our hotel and our staff while specifically noting the efforts of Boris and Roni.  We love to hear that you had a fantastic stay with us and we hope to see you back with us again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: My husband and I recently stayed here for a work conference for him.  We loved the hotel, all staff were so helpful and friendly.  It was my birthday weekend as well, and they were extra gracious with our requests.  It is right across the street from the beach.  They have a lovely pool (which we did not use, but other guests did). Our room was a King with beach view, lots of room and nicely furnished.  I was disappointed to not have a tub in our room, but the shower is nice and had a sliding wooden door that you could pull closed or open to see out into the room.  We only had drinks at the restaurant downstairs, Tanners, but I think my husband had lunch from there one of the days and said it was good.  We had drinks and snacks at the outside "treehouse" bar a couple of times,
Manager Response: Dear 425Mom,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: DO NOT GIVE THEM YOUR KEYS OR CARD!
Summary: This resorts staff is complete inadequate and unable to read special reservation notes. They in total charged us up to $500 of extra charges on everyone's room because they did not see we had already paid the resort fee. They also wrecked my car in valet and have put me in a difficult situation with repairs and my job and being a full time student.
Manager Response: Dear FarAway35282110986,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience on your recent stay with us.  We typically deliver a great experience across the board for our guests and we sincerely apologize that this was not the case during your visit.  We'll use the feedback you've provided to review and improve our service moving forward.  We hope to have the opportunity to host you again on your next visit to Huntington Beach as we promise to exceed your expectations.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Amazing Place. Even More Amazing Service
Summary: I came to stay at Pasea hotel in HB to escape the cold for a bit and boy I wasn’t dissapointed. The second I walked in the door I was greeted by Veronica. Her demeanor was amazing and she was so helpful. She went above and beyond to help us and tell us about the local attractions. We were also greeted by the manager Joshua who you could tell genuinely cared about making us feel welcome and comfortable. We went to Tanners rooftop and I got the cucumber delight made by Tanzara. The drinks here are well made.  I love Huntington Beach and the Pasea hotel is awesome but I believe it’s the staff that sets an establishment apart and they definitely have figured out the secret to customer service. Can’t wait to come back
Manager Response: Dear Travisrobertson,  We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to share your recent experience with us and specifically point out a few of our amazing associates.  We're hoping that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: What they don't tell you: Tanner's (restaurant inside the hotel) has a DJ until 1:30am on weekends
Summary: I am not sure how this hotel has so many great reviews. I was recommended Pasea from friends that live in the Huntington Beach area and was so excited to surprise my boyfriend with a birthday getaway. I paid extra for the ocean front view only (figured it would be romantic and relaxing). What they DON'T tell you at check in- Tanner's Restaurant which connects to the hotel has a DJ that BLASTS music on Saturday nights. Our room was vibrating and they were not able to switch us rooms because the hotel was fully booked. To add to this, we were locked OUT of our room after being promised late check out the next day. It took about 30 minutes for someone to finally let us in our room. Don't get me wrong- the gentleman working at the front desk (Andrew) was VERY helpful and
Manager Response: Dear jrs0131,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact our Front Office Manager, Joshua Gitsham at jgitsham@paseahotel.com.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Beautiful location. Lots of things to do within walking distance. The hotel staff was very friendly. The hotel lobby is clean. The room was clean. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone wanting to stay in Huntington Beach.
Manager Response: Dear phanrx,  We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: My husband and I spent 5 days at the hotel.  The room was spacious, and very clean.  The treetop (outdoor bar) is a must to watch the sunset.  Everyone friendly and Andrew at the front desk gets 6 stars! He was so friendly and helped us navigate the hotel.   The workout facility is clean, not real large but enough for anyone to get a good workout.  Spa is lovely but a little pricey.  General hotel accommodations were super!
Manager Response: Dear rainydaymmk,  Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about what a wonderful job Andrew does.  We're fortunate to have him here as one of our team members.  We hope that you come back to see us again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Great hotel at a terrible time for me! The room was spacious, clean, just wonderful in every way! I highly recommend this hotel whether for solo or a romantic get away! The latter would have been preferable!!!
Manager Response: Dear Booboo811,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Really good place , good ood , the pool is a Little small  and sometimes gets kind of crowded so you feel like getting out from it.  Their restaurant and food is great , roof top Bar shopping area very good , awesome view.  You can get a chair and towel from the Lobby and walk to the beach. 1 block from down town HB . Valet parking.  Room are beautiful ,big and confortables , partial ocean view and beach front.  We stayed there with my family and kids on July , we had a great time.
Manager Response: Dear luis A L,  We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: My husband and I stayed one night at this beautiful hotel. We had an ocean front view that was spectacular!  One of the staff, named Roni, made our stay extra special and went above and beyond the norm.....Being from land-locked South Dakota, we will cherish the memories of our Huntington Beach stay.
Manager Response: Dear Angie O,  We're thrilled to hear that Roni delivered the personal service that the Pasea Hotel & Spa is known for!  Thank you for staying with us and posting this review.....we'll look forward to your next trip to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Restaurant is excellent, Hotel experience not so much. Service did not match beautiful new hotel. Safety concern by pool. I reported it as I watched one non hotel guest let himself in by reaching over and opening the gate. I also told Hispanic Ops Director about trash over flowing and lack of cleaning staff and lack of pool towels. As he was folding towels by the pool, he denied there was a lack of staff. I'm a HR professional and I volunteered that information. I was quiet shock about the way he reacted to my feedback so decided to write.  Brittany auditor was excellent, she noticed I was looking for coffee and had some sent to me early in the morning. Need more staff like her. Restaurant was excellent as well as the service in the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Christine S,  We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We had a lovely time at Pasea and I can't wait to come back! We did a Suite deal which included parking and resort fees (otherwise $40/day each).  We got a one bedroom suite facing the ocean with views on two sides- the ocean and the pool.  Our room was large and amazing!  I don't think I've ever had a larger bathtub in the room- I literally could lie down all the way and still not touch the other side of the tub.  We had plenty of towels and amenities each day, so great job housekeeping!    The location of the resort is perfect- far enough from the hustle and bustle, but just a few minutes walk to the downtown area and restaurants.  There's a food court type place just next door and it connects to a mall.  Check in was very quick/easy and the front desk was always helpful.  We
Manager Response: Dear zeppgirl,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: There are only a few places where you're able to find people who truly go above and beyond. Paseo is one of those magnificent places. The service has been top notch and everyone here is very enthusiastic and excited to help you. I want to call out Dominique from the restaurant and Andrew from the front desk, who both went above and beyond.
Manager Response: Dear seanbF7055CG,  As someone that works at a fantastic resort, we thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of Dominique and Andrew.  They are prime examples of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Huntington Beach area.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I was very excited to go to this resort initially. however had a few negative experiences - the first was the 'hidden' resort fee which was a substantial amount. I have travelled to the US and Europe many times and have never paid such a high fee even at the trump resort! The room was serviced daily however never really cleaned properly. I let it go for a couple of days then was a little fed up especially given how much we paid. we also never received our flip flops. I alerted the staff via hand written notes providing evidence. The manager rectified the situation straight away I think her name was Jody? However this was probably an isolated experience. the gym is great the coffee shop is awesome and has great coffee the lobby is lovely. if I can make a suggestion they may want
Manager Response: Dear Maria F,  We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We had and amazing experience at this hotel. Jake who was our valet parking attendent was amazing! He was so sweet and ensured our needs were met and went above and beyond. Then we went down for breakfast this morning and another Jake was our bartender super friendly made great bloody Mary’s and was super personable. We had a great time with him. Looks like hiring guys with the name Jake is working!
Manager Response: Dear Connector451176,  We love this review!!!!!!!!!  It was an honor to host you and we are thrilled to hear that our staff delivered another amazing experience.  Your recommendation is incredible and we thank you!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Beautiful property with ocean front views
Summary: I stayed at Pasea for one night in May. I was greeted by their friendly staff and the bellman assisted me with my luggage to my room. The room was spacious and had an amazing view of the ocean.There was also a balcony attached to my room. We had dinner at Tanners, both the service and food were excellent. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone who is looking for exceptional experience.
Manager Response: Dear alimil5,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We're delighted that you had this experience and also sang the praises of our bellman team.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We had the best time - we were looked after very well by Ankit & Craig from valet, the cleaning staff are also very honest as we left behind some clothing and they were all returned, I traveled from Australia and highly recommended this beautiful hotel to anyone wanting to experience the wonderful customer service we experienced along with the perfect room. Thank you again ankit for making our stay awesome!!!
Manager Response: Dear Compass12037945644,  Thank you for posting this review and for giving us such a high rating.  We believe that we have the best staff in the area that deliver a personalized service for each of our guests and we're happy to hear that you agree.  We hope that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I have never written a complaint about anyone or anything. But this man was so rude and arrogant to myself and my family. First point of contact you wouldn’t want to come up against him. Nothing but terrible manners.
Manager Response: Dear Pioneer42621248904,  We apologize and are greatly concerned about the feeling you had after interacting with the Paséa front desk agent at our property.  We would like to the opportunity to resolve this to your satisfaction.  At your convenience, please contact our Director of Operations, Boris Banda at bbanda@paseahotel.com.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The staff at the dog friendly Paséa Hotel are wonderful. Matthew and Peter at the front door bell service, the front desk with Caty, Felicia and Stephen are all awesome and once again went above and beyond to make our staycation comfortable.   Angelina the maid is also awesome and very thorough in her cleaning!  Murtaza went the extra mile to ensure my disabled husband had all his disability equipment in the room prior to checking in. This is our second time staying at this beautiful new modern hotel.   The food at Tanners is excellent - especially the fun breakfast options. We have an oceanfront room and it’s been a delightful peaceful trip.  I really applaud the staff working at the hotel!   One of the highlights at the hotel is the new Paw-Sea grounds where you can let your
Manager Response: Dear Daydream247581,  We love this review!!!!!!!!!  It was an honor to host you and we are thrilled to hear that our staff delivered another amazing experience.  Thank you for posting this review and sharing it with the TripAdvisor community.  We will be eagerly awaiting your next stay.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I stayed for 3 nights in December and found the hotel to be beautifully appointed and the staff to be incredibly friendly.   The guest rooms are very comfortable. The hotel is well situated across from the beach and close to restaurants and shopping.  I reserved an ocean view room which would have been called a partial ocean view in other locations.   My only problem with the stay was a malfunctioning thermostat that had to be replaced.  Even after it was replaced the thermostat was poorly responsive and wouldn't adjust the temperature for 45 minutes or more.    An intoxicated abusive guest in the hot tub was promptly removed by security.
Manager Response: Dear tenrivers,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: This hotel definitely brings the welcoming vibe. This was our first visit at the Pasea. Having grown up in Huntington Beach, my wife and I visit 2 times a year to visit family. We have found our new default resort to stay at! I definitely recommend booking direct through the hotel website. It offers room packages that include discounts, complimentary valet and resort fee. 24 hour Room service is great, especially when you had a long night. We booked a one bedroom corner suite. Absolutely best view in Huntington Beach hands down. If there was any negative I had to say about this beautiful hotel, it would be get better pillows and maybe mattresses. Other than that, it’s perfect. Staff is nice and the location is perfect. What a view!
Manager Response: Dear jgonzalez385,  We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I travel a lot for work.  I travel a lot for pleasure.  I stay in A LOT of hotels across the nation.  I am very picky about my surroundings in a hotel.  The Pasea was amazing from top to bottom.  I looked for something wrong and couldn't find 1 thing to complain about.
Manager Response: Dear Victoria Kathle... D,  Yes!!!!!!  Your experience was exactly what we strive to deliver for all of our guests and it means the world to us that you shared this with the TripAdvisor audience.  We can't wait until your next stay so that we may exceed your expectations once again!!!!!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Stellar experience at Pasea Hotel & Spa
Summary: From the time I was on the phone with Andrew, the front desk representative, to meeting him when I arrived, I knew we were going to have a superior experience. And in person, Andrew and his colleague, Stephan, stepped up to the plate with critical knowledge, great suggestions, and superb teamwork. Their support for each other, along with a third colleague whose name I don't remember, but she was equally superb. Add to this professional  teamwork such important factors as a stunning room that was immaculate and contemporary. It all worked. And so did their teamwork--something hard to see displayed in the way I did during this 2+ day experience. When team members enjoy their experience in working with customers, service is likely to be impeccable, which it was for us. My partner
Manager Response: Dear PS201819,  Your words are music to our ears!  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  You have noted the efforts of some of our truly special staff and for this we thank you.  We look forward to your next visit with us!   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Stayed here for a week at the end of October, great rooms plenty of room and great views over the beach. Short walk to downtown and pier. Would definitely stay again. Parking for a car can add up so be minefull if hiring a car. Planning to stay next year again.
Manager Response: Dear 833adriann,  Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: What a way to enjoy Huntington Beach!! So highly pleased with the attitude and offerings at this hotel. The staff was very polite and always seemed to be a step ahead. The drinks at Tanners bar were exquisite. The bar staff was accommodating and my fav was drinks for sure. Very tasty! I certainly will not forget Veronica, at the front desk. She went ABOVE and beyond to do the sweetest stuff for me! I ran out of hairspray one of the day and commented on her super neat ponytail and she literally made me up a goody bag that she PERSONALLY put together with gel, hairspray, and a comb. Who does that!? Made my visit feel very homey!! If you run into her you will surely be safe in her care of. The whole staff was just doing a great job. From bell boys to room service to even
Manager Response: Dear johnniemodel,  As someone that works at a fantastic resort, we thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of Veronica.  She is a prime example of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Huntington Beach area.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Trying to find the valet parking was a pain; they need more signs to direct everyone to the entrance. The room with an ocean view did not have a tub so they moved me to an ADA room (next door). There were no safety strips on the bottom of the tub; it was as slick as glass and a hazard - for anyone - and for sure if they have a physical disability; I sat on a towel so I wouldn't slip. The tub was very deep and I had difficulty getting out of it. The ADA room had an ocean view but the sliding glass door did not have a screen so bugs can get in. The music was so loud outside and didn't stop until 2:00 a.m. when the bars closed. The only redeeming quality was Daniel in guest services who helped move my belongings to the adjacent room. He was polite, helpful and professional, and
Manager Response: Dear Lessonlea,  We sincerely apologize that your experience was not a good one as we take our role in hosting our guests as our most important goal.  At your earliest convenience, please contact our Director of Operations, Boris Banda at bbanda@paseahotel.com so that he may get further details and resolve this to your satisfaction.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Our company had their holiday event here - including an overnight stay.  The meal we had was AMAZING - melt in your mouth filet.  The view from our room was fantastic.  And everybody we encountered was super helpful and nice.  They really made us feel welcome.
Manager Response: Dear M5Stickman,  Your review was a great Christmas present for us.  We are always delighted to hear stories about our wonderful staff creating lasting memories for our guests.  We thank you for this and hope you have the happiest of holidays.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Excellent Stay in Excellent Hotel in Excellent Location
Summary: I visited the Pasea as part of a business trip. From check in to check out, the whole stay was a joy. The room was clean and tidy, very comfortable. My room was advertised as "partial ocean view". Well, that was a full ocean view when sat on the balcony overlooking the 3 pools below! Beautiful sunsets too. The conference facilities were excellent, the occasion was very well catered, and the one occasion I had to eat in Tanners (the restaurant in the hotel), the food was excellent and good value. The hotel location is on PCH on Huntington Beach, with the historic pier in full view. A short walk away we have Main Street, and it's next door to Pacific City. Therefore a tremendous number of shops, restaurants and bars from which to choose.
Manager Response: Dear Geoff H,  We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: This is my kind of hotel. The staff is awesome. The food is delicious. The rooms are comfortable. The whole experience is so relaxing. This hotel is top on my list. I have spent many days in hotels and this one is my favorite.
Manager Response: Dear Jim R,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Great Hotel on the Beach in Huntington Beach.
Summary: My wife and I cycled from Pasadena to Huntington Beach, on our way to the Mission Inn in Riverside, and stayed the night in the Pasea Hotel.  We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in the Pasea.  All of the members of the staff we encountered were welcoming, friendly and accommodating, even to the two of us rolling in the front door with bicycles and loaded panniers.  The Hotel is beautiful, with many architectural features that catch the eye, and the rooms are full of design details that add to the enjoyment of the stay.   And then, of course, are the amazing views across the beach and across the ocean, all the way to Catalina Island.   Stunning at sunset.  Finally, we enjoyed a drink at the comfortable Tanner bar and a delicious breakfast the next morning before departing.  We will
Manager Response: Dear Destination260517,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: UPDATE:  I wrote the review below, the manager replied to my review and asked for me to contact the hotel.  As per his request I contacted the hotel and never heard back.  I waited in the valet line for 45 minutes to check in (they had a Gala onsite). I called the hotel, spoke to the manager 3 times while in line to check in, he offered me no alternative other then to sit and wait in my car. Unacceptable. He saw me check in and offered me nothing, the person checking me in offered me a "late" check out at 12:30pm, wow, big deal. We then went to get a drink at the rooftop bar, literally had to flag a waitress down to take our order. We literally sat there fir 20 minutes and no one approached us to take our order. The hotel was noisy. Music was thumping until 1:30am, we could hear
Manager Response: Dear travelforfunforever,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact our Director of Operations, Boris Banda at bbanda@paseahotel.com.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Ronni and Felicia went above and beyond
Summary: I was staying at the Pasea for a work party and ended up getting sick the night I arrived. This was a bug brought from home since my wife and daughter had it before I left-nothing to do with the hotel. Anyway, I had to get a gift wrapped for a white elephant gift exchange and wasn't feeling well enough to walk to CVS to get wrapping paper (or take a car as I was feeling nauseous). Ronni and Felicia not only found a gift bag, but they deconstructed it and wrapped my gift with the paper and it turned out great! They were also very accommodating in getting a late room service cleaning in, as it was around 4p before I even got up and moving. They were able to go just that extra mile and do just a couple little things that meant so much to me as I was not feeling well. This is the
Manager Response: Dear Daniel T,  We believe our amazing staff and the service they deliver are the difference between the Paséa Hotel & Spa and the many other hotels in the area.  We are thrilled to hear that you agree and we look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Huntington Beach area.  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Everything was spectacular. New and clean, with a perfect location in Huntington Beach. Great service, very friendly. The room, pool, restaurant all top notch. We had a wonderful vacation and cannot wait to come back soon.
Manager Response: Dear Fearless08821367936,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're delighted that you had such a great experience at our resort, enjoying our unbeatable location, the spectacular views from our guest rooms, and our cool California coastal vibe. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Pasea for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Friendly and helpful staff. They clearly take pride in their work and treating guests like each are someone special. The room was so comfortable and the view was amazing! Loved that the shower was visible from the room or rather that I had a view while bathing!
Manager Response: Dear vaccarisl,  There is nothing we love to hear more than that our guests had a great time.  We're delighted that you had this experience and also sang the praises of our awesome team.  We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Pasea for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Long day of travel well worth it
Summary: My wife and I flew in the day before Thanksgiving to visit family.  We were traveling cross country and had a very long day.  We got to Pasea at around 10pm and were greeted by two nice young men.   The nice Indian man, sorry I forgot his name, checked us in and had such a great attitude and was so welcoming.  Standing out in the lobby was a man who asked how our trip in was.   I told him it was horrible and I was ready for a drink.   After check in I dropped my bags in the room and headed straight down to the bar with my wife.   This same man saw me back down in the lobby and asked if I was ready for that drink.  He walked us over to the second floor lounge, ensured we got a nice seat, and even bought my wife and I a round of drinks.   He gave us his card and let us know to
Manager Response: Dear Yankees61in61,  Your words are music to our ears!  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  You have noted the efforts of some of our truly special staff and for this we thank you.  We look forward to your next visit with us!   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Great location, poor service, don't forget to add $80 a day for the resort fee and to park your car. The resort is beautiful and the location is amazing. The staff we encountered came across very disinterested in looking out for us. We came in early and were told that our room wasn't ready but they would call us when it was. They never called. We messaged for our car and waited a long time with our bags in the lobby for our car to show up (valet parking only), with no staff bothering to give us a heads up that we should have been waiting in the basement garage. When the car didn't show up after nearly an hour I went outside to the valet parking desk where I was finally told where to go. There is more, but you get the gist.
Manager Response: Dear Jeffrey N,  We offer a sincere apology for the multiple challenges you incurred during your most recent stay with us.  Your feedback is vital for us to measure our performance and improve the experience for our guests.  You can be rest assured that your comments will not fall on deaf ears and improvements will be made.  It is our hope that we have the opportunity to host you once again on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The hotel is magnificent, wonderful amenities but Roni really made our stay memorable! She definitely goes above and beyond with exceptional service, talent like that is rare! We will definitely be back here.
Manager Response: Dear Kelley B,  How amazing is Veronica?????  Although we're a little biased, we believe she is the best Front Desk Agent in the area and no one delivers a personalized experience like Veronica.  Thank you for posting this review and sharing it with the TripAdvisor community.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I tell everyone about this place! Every employee is so pleasant, from check in to check out. At check in Leo was so nice, and got us squared away quick. Josh, the manager came around the desk and chatted with a few different groups of guests which was nice to see management interacting with people directly. The tree bar are nice and the coffee shop in the lobby is really convenient. I always recommend this hotel to anyone looking for beach hotel, this is it.
Manager Response: Dear Jayerod,  As someone that works at a fantastic resort, we thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of Leo and Josh.  They are a prime example of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Huntington Beach area.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: A phenomenal stay at this gorgeous hotel. The ambiance here is wonderful gives you the relaxing feel of a resort while still keep a modern take on what's trendy for hotels. Upon arriving I was breath taken by how attentive every staff member were towards there guest. Even as a hilton honors member I highly recommend this hotel over the waterfront and hyatt as they go above and beyond. Also a big plus is they offer late night room service. Will definitely be coming back soon.
Manager Response: Dear AYRZ,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Overall experience was great - love the comp'd bottle of wine provided in the room. Checking in was seamless and the staff were extremely helpful. The bar associated with the hotel, Tanner's, was a great time.  Kyle was super helpful with getting my car when checking out via valet.  Overall 5/5
Manager Response: Dear micahwillis,  We love this review!!!!!!!!!  It was an honor to host you and we are thrilled to hear that our staff delivered another amazing experience.  Your recommendation is incredible and we thank you!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Peter, a bellman, greeted us as we arrived and he was so friendly and helpful.  Took us to our room and explained everything about the hotel and room. Next day, in the lobby, he greeted us by name and offered to go to our room and put the luggage in our trunk while we had lunch nearby.  The hotel is beautiful and very inviting and Peter's personal touch made it all the more special for our time at the Pasea Hotel
Manager Response: Dear ronbsa,  How amazing is Peter?????  Although we're a little biased, we believe his the best bellman in the area and no one delivers a personalized experience like Peter.  Thank you for posting this review and sharing it with the TripAdvisor community.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Stayed here a few weeks back for my girlfriends birthday party, and it was perfect! The staff were all wonderful from the time we arrived, the valet attendants were pleasant, Leo was great when we checked in. Once we told him we were there for a birthday he gave us so many recommendations for great restaurants and bars. Rooms were nice and clean with a great view. Great location, near main street and attached to Pacific City made it the perfect location of a girls weekend. Definitely plan on staying here again!
Manager Response: Dear sandybeachOC,  Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about what a wonderful job Leo does.  We're fortunate to have him here as one of our team members.  We're delighted that you had this experience and also sang the praises of our valet team.  We hope that you come back to see us again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: My stay here was perfect, beautiful view and amazing service ! Bellman and Front desk staff were really helpful and friendly , very professional. Highly recommend a stay here . Stephen at the front desk was very welcoming and knowledgable of the area and a special thank you to Boris for being very hospitable.
Manager Response: Dear Crodriguezz,  As someone that works at a fantastic resort, we thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of Stephan and Boris.  They are a prime example of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Huntington Beach area.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We are Huntington Beach locals... and my friend and I enjoyed a fabulous birthday stay-cation.They hotel is beautiful, the staff is extremely friend and very attentive. The room decor and amenities are top notch. The spa experience was lovely although the spa facility itself was smaller than I was expecting.
Manager Response: Dear karrier206,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're delighted that you had such a great experience at our resort, enjoying our unbeatable location, the spectacular views from our guest rooms, and our cool California coastal vibe. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Pasea for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We stayed at this beautiful property with several other family members. Upon check in we were greeted warmly by Veronica who was friendly and knowledgeable and very professional. Later when I spoke with Veronica and shared with her the reason for our visit she couldn’t have been more kind. Veronica not only made sure our stay was memorable by providing a room with an amazing view, she sent the most beautiful heartfelt card and fruit. So while this hotel is lux and sleek our experience was truly touching and personal. I’ll treasure my stay at Pasea and will always remember a kindness shared. Thank you for all.
Manager Response: Dear Moggylover,  We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to sing the praises of our hotel and our staff while specifically noting the efforts of Veronica.  We love to hear that you and your family had a fantastic stay with us and we hope to see you back with us again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The hotel Pasea is located in walking distance to the beach, a large choice of restaurants and shopping. The staff is friendly and helpful. Estefalyn is lovely and helped make our stay extra special. The rooms are clean and with a fresh beach modern decor.
Manager Response: Dear francadesign5,  We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  We enjoyed hosting you and hope you're back as our guest in the very near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Nice property and location. The front desk and mannagement know nothing about hospitality. Looks like a 4.5 star hotel from the outside but is run as a 2 star hotel. The Bellmen know more about how to treat guests then the front desk and or management
Manager Response: Dear Sunshine51349107989,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact our Director of Operations, Boris Banda at bbanda@paseahotel.com or our Front Office Manager, Joshua Gitsham at jgitsham@paseahotel.com.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Everything was first class all the way! Mayra at the front desk was amazing and so accommodating very friendly! The rooms were very clean and comfortable....we were upgraded to an ocean view which doesn't get any better than that! Thank you for all the extras for making a birthday unforgettable!!
Manager Response: Dear Trek210663,  As someone that works at a fantastic resort, we thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of Mayra.  She is a prime example of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Huntington Beach area.  Happy Birthday!!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I recently had the pleasure of attending Pasea's annual tree lighting. What a GREAT way to ring in the holiday season.  Everything was top notch from the entertainment to the magnificent tree lighting to all the special treats. The staff was exceptional. THANK YOU Josh Gitsham for all the personalized attention. I love having a top notch resort close to home for mini vacations throughout the year. Keep up the great work!
Manager Response: Dear  HBHomebody,  We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to sing the praises of our hotel and our staff while specifically noting the efforts of Josh.  We love to hear that you had a great experience with us and we hope to see you back with us again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: My family and I traveled from out of state to be with our family here for thanksgiving and was told to try out pasea since they had heard such great things about the hotel. I would have to say, they did not dissapoint! We had such a beautiful room facing the ocean which was such a treat. We were told when we were checking in by the manager Josh that they would be having a tree lighting that Friday at the hotel. On Friday after dinner at pacific city we were actually walked over to the tree lighting by Josh the front office manager and he got us the perfect spot to watch the lighting and took some great pictures of our family. He definitely went above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable and had a great time. I will definitely recommend this hotel to everyone I know, and
Manager Response: Dear jamierob123,  Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about what a wonderful job Josh does.  We're fortunate to have him here as one of our team members.  We hope that you come back to see us again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I had an amazing time at Pasea! I stayed here with my fiance celebrating a birthday night and we were happy the entire time! Upon walking into the beautiful hotel, the contageous smell of the lobby (Seriously, can I have this in my home please?!) was just the start to a wonderful evening. Check in was a breeze and a Mr. Boris Banda took us under his wing. He was very kind to escort us through the hotel, take care of our luggage and wish us a beautiful stay.   When we walked into the 8th floor room, I was in awe with the modern vibe, the nice cheese platter and champagne awaiting us and a beautiful view looking over Huntington Beach! (Not to mention the complimentary bottle of wine in the fridge) They took the request very seriously when I mentioned this was for a birthday
Manager Response: Dear NikonWorldTraveler,  Your words are music to our ears and we're thrilled to hear that Boris delivered the personal service that the Pasea Hotel & Spa is known for!  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  We look forward to your next visit with us!   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Weekend in Huntington Beach at Pasea
Summary: The location is wonderful and the rooms are stylish overlooking the beach. However, the pool area was littered with plastic cups and soggy napkins, the lounger area smelled of urine, the pool staff was busy chatting by the cash register rather than out serving guests, and no towel attendant. For a world class resort, I was underwhelmed. Our valet, and  activities bellboy were the balancing act. They provided us with a welcoming feel and were very helpful. We had catered events for our business trip where the food was delivered late and the dishware was dirty with food and lipstick. The buffet was unattended, the food was lukewarm, but the rooms were spacious and the adjacent firepits were perfect for a chilly fall evening.
Manager Response: Dear terrielm,  We offer a sincere apology for the multiple challenges you incurred during your most recent stay with us.  Your feedback is vital for us to measure our performance and improve the experience for our guests.  You can be rest assured that your comments will not fall on deaf ears and improvements will be made.  It is our hope that we have the opportunity to host you once again on your next visit to Huntington Beach. Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Amazing views, beautiful hotel, and Outstanding Service!!
Summary: We have been to the Pasea hotel twice within the last two months. The first time was for a weekend getaway and we stayed in an Ocean Front Suite. At first glance we were impressed with the furnishings and vibe - very beachy and very SoCal. Then we were taken up to our room, with the most outstanding ocean front views. Our bellman explained about the amenities like free beach gear, the free take-home flip flops, and the complimentary wine. How nice! Then we happily started our getaway by heading down Tanner's for a drink and maybe dinner. Our bartender was Blake. He made us feel welcome and at home, so we stayed in and enjoyed dinner sitting at his bar. The concierge assisted us in reservations for our other nights. All in all, it was an absolutely perfect weekend.   Which is why
Manager Response: Dear Vacation298740,  How amazing is Blake?????  Although we're a little biased, we believe he is the best bartender in the area and no one delivers a personalized experience like Blake.  Thank you for posting this review and sharing it with the TripAdvisor community.  We enjoyed hosting you and hope you're back as our guests in the very near future.  Congratulations on your engagement!!!!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I stayed here in June 2018 for a work convention and was so pleased with everything! My sister and I ate breakfast at the hotel every morning and the staff quickly learned our drink order and made great conversation. The hotel offered many amenities for her to enjoy (bikes, beach chairs, spa, ect.) while I was in my trainings throughout the day. It’s also connected to a mall that has a ton of lunch and dinner options so you don’t have to go far after a long day. I’m here again now in November for the same training, although this time my service was even better. The front desk was so welcoming, the wait staff was phenomenal (they offer blankets for those sitting outside for dinner if you get chilled) and the attention to detail throughout your stay is unmatched. I cannot tell
Manager Response: Dear hayivan,  Your words are music to our ears!  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  You have noted the efforts of some of our truly special staff and for this we thank you.  We look forward to your next visit with us!   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The hotel is very Ikea looking,  food is very good, atmosphere very friendly and warm.  The rooms are not top comfort.  In order to put anything in the safe you need to get on your hands and knees to set the code and later to check if you have cleared all your belongings or take something out you do the blind man feel!  The mattress is one step up from terrible did not sleep well for 7 nights, pillows same. Bathroom does not have a sprintzer... thank God no children were with me. I would have loved to rinse my feet after walking on the beach, heck no not at the Pasea Hotel.  Also no place to sit down,  there is a very uncomfortable lounger with hard pillows,  no comfort there to be found!  Decorating was for show not for human comfort.
Manager Response: Dear Meander38368437455,  We offer a sincere apology for the multiple challenges you incurred during your most recent stay with us.  Your feedback is vital for us to measure our performance and improve the experience for our guests.  You can be rest assured that your comments will not fall on deaf ears and improvements will be made.  It is our hope that we have the opportunity to host you once again on your next visit to Huntington Beach. Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: I feel like I should have been more impressed more a 3.5
Summary: There are parts that I really liked about the place and things that I was unimpressed with.  Rooms were nice, clean and no issues.  Pool was unexciting, clean but very little energy. We got a cabana to watch football etc but really aside from the tv there was no special service there. We approached the concierge about the phone chargers not working in our cabana and were met with "yeah none of them work" and she left.  Same with our room and an issue with the lock not working. it did get fixed but no one ever came to us to alert us that it was fixed.  Perhaps a bit disappointed only because I expected more.  Location is nice, walking distance to ocean.
Manager Response: Dear goatluv,  We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: This was my 2nd trip and very positive, the first was not as had an emergency and trying to get a hold of someone to change or add a name on the room was next to impossible. The site did not recognize my booking numbers or the credit card i booked with.
Manager Response: Dear Departure12883814715,  We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Huntington Beach so that we may host you once again.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: My new fav hotel in SoCal
Summary: I can’t say enough about this hotel.  The spa and pool were wonderful. The room was well appointed.  Absolutely perfect location with breathtaking views of the beach and pier. So glad my corporation placed me in the overflow hotel! My hotel stay was way better than my colleagues who stayed in the conference hotel.
Manager Response: Dear sunkissed1908,  We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to share your recent experience with us and sharing this with the TripAdvisor audience.  We're hoping that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: After visiting Hyatt, Hilton and Kimpton Hotel. This hotel Pasea so far the best experience ever. I was greeted and welcome by the amazing valet parking team and acknowledged by my name at the time of arrival by Chelsea. Great smile and she made me feel like a  king.  This hotel has a great breakfast and go called Blend you can find everything from a breakfast item to a nice and cold beer. The hotel cleanliness was on point. Very moderns rooms with the best view of HB Pier. At night time we visited the rooftop bar and we had a great experience.  Breakfast at Tanners was the best. We had the best view of the ocean. At check out we met the Hotel Manager who helped us with our bags and directed to Valet area his name was Borris and he was very courteous and invited us to come back
Manager Response: Dear RichardEAZ,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I can’t express how I’m upset with this hotel! I stayed here only 2 nights and not only did they fail to tell me that they will hold $100 per night but they took more money from credit card without my authorisation!    Luckily after checking out the next day I checked my online banking and I saw they called for 2 payments from credit card both totally for nearly $1400!!! I was so shocked!! I’m an ex cabin crew and never ever have I experienced this. I spoke to 5 different people and they but never properly acknowledged all the stress, tears and inconvenience they caused me! Apart from a love Gentleman called Andrew.   One lady called Lynette was extremely rude and was extremely defensive! Not surprised as they don’t record their calls!  The hotel have constantly ignored my
Manager Response: Dear queenofsuccess,  We sincerely apologize that your experience was not a good one as we take our role in hosting our guests as our most important goal.  At your earliest convenience, please contact our Director of Operations, Boris Banda at bbanda@paseahotel.com so that he may get further details and resolve this to your satisfaction.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Great spot to stay in HB
Summary: We stayed at the Paséa for 6 nights and had a great time.  We had a Ocean View room that had a wonderful view of the HB Pier and overlooked the pool and Tanner's.  The hotel is in a fantastic location.  It is directly on the PCH which makes getting around very easy, and it has easy access to the Beach (just across the PCH).  It is also beside Pacific City which has shopping and many different eateries.  The hotel amenities were great.  The food and drink at Tanner's was fantastic and the shop in the hotel (can't recall the name) had lots of selection including wine/beer that you could purchase. The heated salt water pool and hot tub provided a great place to relax as well if the ocean was too cold or rough for our liking.
Manager Response: Dear Dylan C,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're delighted that you had such a great experience at our resort, enjoying our unbeatable location, the spectacular views from our guest rooms, and our cool California coastal vibe. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Pasea for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Arrogant and unfriendly staff at the hotel. II have stayed at several other hotels in the area and have had great experiences with nice service. Both Hyatt and Hilton for instance are really nice. This hotel was really different. Alos be cautious for hidden fees.
Manager Response: Dear Carl5621,  We sincerely apologize that your experience was not a good one as we take our role in hosting our guests as our most important goal.  At your earliest convenience, please contact our Director of Operations, Boris Banda at bbanda@paseahotel.com so that he may get further details and resolve this to your satisfaction.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Do NOT come here for rest or peace
