Summary: Very beautiful and nice 👍🏼 but BLARING LOUD, LOUD, LOUD did I say LOUD! music until after 1:30 am. I stayed from October 30-(tonight)November 4, leaving tomorrow at 9am. I will never stay here again. There’s no peace or rest! Just blaring, jarring music from 11:30AM until the wee hours from the evil little restaurant called tree top. When I called front desk the guy was nice but said it will close at 1am. 20 after 1 I called back a very hateful woman said they couldn’t do anything about the noise. So why don’t they put sliding doors the shut out noise under the curtains? Doesn’t Huntington Beach care about noise pollution? All day & night —- It’s ridiculous! If you stay here get a room away from the Pool Area! They should give you the option of getting a NO SLEEP & rest room
Manager Response: Dear Tripor123,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to get further details and resolve this with you directly.  At your earliest convenience, please contact our Director of Operations, Boris Banda at bbanda@paseahotel.com.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: A perfect location and space for a personal retreat.  Safe, secure location within walking distance to coffee shops, restaurants and bars.  The staff couldn't be nicer.  I woke up the next morning to the sound of the ocean feeling refreshed and relaxed.   Modern.
Manager Response: Dear Fabienne N,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're delighted that you had such a great experience at our resort, enjoying our unbeatable location, the spectacular views from our guest rooms, and our cool California coastal vibe. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Pasea for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Another Great Staycation at our favorite local hotel...
Summary: We only live 3 miles from this hotel, but we love to stay here on the weekends from time to time.  This trip was none other than perfect.  From the easy check in process to the spotless room and amazing hospitality, everything was perfect. One of the managers there Josh Gitsham helped make this the best stay yet. He checked in with us throughout our stay to make sure everything was 100%.  We used every part of the resort, the pool, our ocean view balcony, the gym, room service, the restaurants, and the rooftop bar.  Friends and family came to visit and it was a breeze.  We met Joe Leinacker the General Manager as well and he asked if there was anything he could do for us.  The answer was no because everything was already perfect and I complimented him on his resport, staff, and
Manager Response: Dear bigboss8710,  It was a pleasure meeting you!  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Stayed here week of October 23 to visit my son. Within walking distance to just about everywhere you would want to go in Huntington Beach. Beautiful property, friendly staff, and the lobby smells so good!
Manager Response: Dear Companion39937161523,  Thank you for this great review and for noting many highlights of your stay.  We look forward to your next trip to Huntington Beach so that we may host you once again!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Amazing hotel with great view ! Hospitality was a great experience, I will definitely be back. From the moment we got to the hotel we were well taken care of. We enjoyed our time at pasea hotel, thanks for an awesome experience!!
Manager Response: Dear sbsenior2007,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're delighted that you had such a great experience at our resort, enjoying our unbeatable location, the spectacular views from our guest rooms, and our cool California coastal vibe. We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to welcoming you back to Pasea for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: What a wonderful place to stay. Awesome people, great service, beautiful rooms, the best view and walking distance to everything you need to have a great experience.... the pool was awesome and the rooftop bar was the cherry on the top this place is a must...
Manager Response: Dear JustgoGaby,  Your words are music to our ears!  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  You have noted the efforts of some of our truly special staff and for this we thank you.  We look forward to your next visit with us!   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Summer Breezes, Surf and Skate Boards
Summary: We stayed at this great property courtesy of Vans! Our experience was top notch from the room to food, and night life. Everything you need for a great get-away is within walking distance of the front entrance of the resort and we could not have asked for better service. Staff were helpful and responsive to all our needs and requests.
Manager Response: Dear coachscoggins,  Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for giving us a perfect rating based on your recent stay with us.  We agree that our associates are part of what separates us from other hotels in the area and we thank you for singing their praises. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: This was touted as a high end hotel-facility is beautiful but staff are terrible!  We checked in very late and were exhausted.  I asked for a little bit later stay so we could take a shower and get dressed but they were very rude and said if we paid $50 we could stay.  But they offered bikes and beach towels for the day but then called my cell and said we had the bikes out too long!  It was not relaxing-Staff we’re constantly put out by helping us and it was super stressful.  My suggestion-stay somewhere else!
Manager Response: Dear E N,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact our Director of Operations, Boris Banda at bbanda@paseahotel.com.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: A few friends and I stayed here as a pre-wedding relaxation, and did we luck out! First off, the Huntington Beach Air Show happened to take place while we were there, and is that location perfect. We got to see the Thunderbirds practice Thursday with front row seating on the beach and then sat at the pool Friday for the entire show - what a wonderful surprise. This location is also perfect location to the beach, Pacific City shopping center, and downtown Huntington. Amenities are top notch and even got to take a yoga class on the lawn (the yoga instructor, who owns her own studio (Caffe Yoga) in Tustin, was top notch and was very cognizant of making sure you were properly in position). All the staff were incredibly helpful too, and maybe this is a female aspect, but the hotel
Manager Response: Dear Becky S,  Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Gorgeous hotel in a great location!
Summary: From the gorgeous lobby and pool to our fantastic room, this is a beautiful place to stay.  We were here for a weekend without a car and enjoyed our walks on the beach and to the restaurants and shops right next door as well as downtown.  The complimentary beach cruiser bikes made for a fun bike ride down the path right in front of the hotel.  The weather wasn't great so we didn't get in the pool but did sit by the side for awhile which was very enjoyable.  Great breakfast at Tanners.  All of this plus excellent friendly service provided every step of the way made for an incredible stay!
Manager Response: Dear acolli278821,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're delighted that you had such a great experience at our resort, enjoying our unbeatable location, the spectacular views from our guest rooms, and our cool California coastal vibe. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Pasea for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We checked in late night on Saturday, pulled right into valet got checked in very fast.  The lobby was so beautiful so many different thinks to look at.  The keys to the room were these cute little surfboards, very different.  There definitely is a lot of attention to small details.  The room totally exceeded our expectations.  Huge rooms lots of space, the bathroom was so beautiful.  Rain shower with beautiful tile and glass door and a fun peekaboo glass window with a sliding door on the bedside.  The room has high ceilings, furniture is so clean on modern.  The had great in room coffee with a mini Keurig.  There was a mini fridge with complimentary water bottles and they did refill, as well as a complimentary bottle of wine.  The balcony was amazing with chairs set up and a
Manager Response: Dear Xochitl C,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Great looks, but looks aren't everything
Summary: Pasea is a beautifully designed hotel and has staff who are eager to please, so I wish I could give it a higher rating.  But there were a couple of significant customer service issues I observed during two days there that should never happen at a 4-5 star property.  First, I drove up late on a Friday evening expecting a valet to be at or near the front door to take my car - SOP.  No one there.  I mean no one.  Except the 3-4 cars along with me that waited and waited and waited.  Until, after about 15-20 minutes, I gave up and just left my car where it was, walked in and handed the keys to the front desk.  I was too tired at that point to figure out what the problem was with their valet service, nor should I have to.  Second, the service at their restaurant was a mess. I went
Manager Response: Dear BronzeWings,  We offer a sincere apology for the multiple challenges you incurred during your most recent stay with us.  Your feedback is vital for us to measure our performance and improve the experience for our guests.  You can be rest assured that your comments will not fall on deaf ears and improvements will be made.  It is our hope that we have the opportunity to host you once again on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Stayed here for a weekend getaway with the family. Great customer service from the moment we pulled into valet! Friendly front desk. Complete staff friendly and attentive to any needs! Recommend this for any occasions. Rooms are very luxurious and modern!
Manager Response: Dear cidenr,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Huntington Beach.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We loved the Pasea hotel, stayed there while attending Sammy Hagar High Tide concert and where beyond impressed.  Everyone was friendly the room was beautiful and they have beach cruisers you can take out for a ride along the beach.
Manager Response: Dear Cheryl H,  Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you again on your next visit to Huntington Beach.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Great hotel, not great customer service
Summary: The location and beauty of this hotel is a solid 10. You can’t beat the location. The staff was all pretty rude though. When paying top $ for hotel rooms, staff should be more kind. Still a good time!
Manager Response: Dear Ethdog127,  We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We had 2nd floor, odd numbered side of the hallway, incredible ocean views and a very large patio as opposed to the balconies on the rooms of the upper floors. Hotel is spitting distance to Pacific City and walking distance to downtown Huntington Beach. A big negative is the fact that the rooms aren't cleaned until late in the afternoon, about the time you are returning from the beach or shopping, etc.Another negative is the $35/night parking fee. We were early checking in so the room was not ready. The young man at the desk assured us he would call/text when the room was ready. We got neither. One evening after returning to our room after it was cleaned, no clean glasses were left. I approached one of the housekeeper cleaning person in the hallway for some clean glasses and she
Manager Response: Dear mikelB8940KJ,  Thank you for giving us the highest rating possible in spite of the few missed opportunities.  We thank you for your feedback and look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: One of the best hotels on the Pacific Coast Highway
Summary: Top notch hotel with loads of character! Very nicely done. We stayed here during our PCH road trip. Excellent location. You can easily walk everywhere. The rooms were clean and very modern. The onsite rooftop bar was awesome. It was buzzing with both locals and tourists alike. The beach butler service made us feel like we were at a Ritz or Four Seasons property! We're already making plans to return.
Manager Response: Dear warrenholland12,  We love this review!!!!!!!!!  It was an honor to host you and we are thrilled to hear that our staff delivered another amazing experience.  Your recommendation is incredible and we thank you!  We are eagerly anticipating your next stay with us!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Everything was first class all the way!  The staff is amazing and  so accommodating......very friendly!  The rooms were very clean and comfortable....we were upgraded to an ocean view which doesn't get any better than that!  Thank you for all the extras for making a birthday unforgettable!!
Manager Response: Dear kristilothian,  We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.   We're in the business of hosting guests for special occasions and thrilled to hear that we achieved our goal.  Come back and stay with us again on your next trip to Huntington Beach!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Beware!!  Full ocean view means NO ocean view!
Summary: For everyone but Pasea Hotel abs Spa, a full ocean view means you look at the ocean from your windows. I verified this three times on my reservation call. When I arrived I opened my door, walked to the window you see the roof of an ugly building. IF you walk out into the balcony and look west you can see the ocean. I called the front desk and they said that their definition of a full ocean view means you can’t see the ocean from your room. I asked what a partial ocean view was and they stated it was the same thing but further back so you could only see a sliver of the ocean. Terribly misleading. Don’t stay with them.
Manager Response: none

Summary: First off I have stayed in dozens of hotels over the last few years for business and pleasure and never have Experienced the level of awesomeness as our housekeeper provided. My kids were a disaster. Room was sandy, clothes and purchases stroon about. When we returned clothes were folded, food stuff was organized, even Jack Surf board stickers were piles and organized. Truly unexpected and I raced down the hall to give her a big tip. We used chairs, beach towels, bikes and surf boards all free of charge with a smile.
Manager Response: Dear bj0iner,  There is nothing we love to hear more than that our guests had a great time.....we're delighted that you had this experience and also sang the praises of our housekeeping team.  We are eagerly anticipating your next visit to Huntington Beach!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Love this hotel! Best service and great valet!
Summary: Upon a girls weekend we were so impressed by this hotel from the amenities at the spa, gym, view from the pool, Tanners management and treehouse bar. What a perfect little get away. Also, Daniel B. and Joseph R. did such a good job answering any questions we had regarding the area/directions and were just beyond impressed with the service we received. I would HIGHLY recommend this hotel for any LA locals looking to escape or anyone traveling to this area this hotel is located right next to Pac City and main street.  The Aarna Spa is AMAZING and worth booking a treatment.
Manager Response: Dear ar0undth3world,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Just stayed at Pasea, My wife and I liked everything about this hotel. The location to the beach, location to shopping, and the hotel was very clean, comfortable beds, roof top bar was a lot of fun. The food was pretty good. My only negative was probably service around the pool was a little slow. But I could live with that. Overall a wonderful experience.
Manager Response: Dear viking0808,  Thank you for giving us the highest rating possible in spite of the slow pool service.  We thank you for your feedback and we'll continue to work to improve our service on a daily basis to meet the needs and preferences of all of our guests.  It is our hope that we have earned your repeat business and will anticipate your next visit with us.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The Paséa Hotel & Spa is amazing. My family stayed here for two nights & could have definitely stayed longer. My son even said everyone is so nice! The highlight of our trip was our personal bicycle transport to the beach with complimentary chairs, towels, umbrella, & beach toys! We have lived our stay!
Manager Response: Dear Julie B,  Thank you for this great review and for noting many highlights of your stay.  We love to hear that you and your family had a fantastic stay with us and we hope to see you back with us again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Excellent service. Staff is very friendly and accommodating. Rooms are gorgeous and very clean. Excellent location as well. The toiletries in the room are excellent brands. WiFi available throughout. We’ll definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear jfigueroaaz,  Your words are music to our ears!  We're fortunate to offer such a location that provides even better service and we're glad you agree.  Thank you for giving us such a great review and for promising to come back and stay with us again!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The room could use a deep cleaning. It wasn't horrible. There was hair on the bathroom floor, the wash cloth and the bed sheets had stains on them. Other than those few things the stay and the view from 814 was amazing. This was my first visit to California and the Pasea set the bar very high.
Manager Response: Dear h0ndagirl1.  We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I attended a national convention at the Pasea Hotel.  The location is fantastic and the hotel was wonderful.  Almost brand new with spacious rooms.  I had a perfect view of the Pacific Ocean from my balcony.  Hard to top seeing a huge full moon rising over the waves at Huntington Beach!!
Manager Response: Dear jbg79,  We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  We're delighted that you had such a great experience at our resort, enjoying our unbeatable location, the spectacular views from our guest rooms, and our cool California coastal vibe. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Pasea for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Loved the view on the 8th floor from the nice size balcony overlooking the beach.  Our room was a king suite, basic hotel room size.  Very beautiful area, and perfect for walking across the street to the beach, or to so many shops, restaurants, and the wonderful Main Street district.  Hotel decor is very attractive.   Employees are friendly and helpful. Pros: The bed was very very comfortable.  The bathroom was quite nice because of the large walk in shower, but not significantly nicer than other high end hotels.   The hotel is very clean.  Keurig coffeemaker in room is great.  Modern lighting and design to room.   Cons:  you can really hear noise from the hallways and sometimes adjoining rooms.  There is no microwave, and the fridge is extremely small.  Like a micro fridge.
Manager Response: Dear SimplyBC,  Thank you for providing this detailed review of the property and all of the benefits that come with staying with us at the Pasea Hotel & Spa.  We're fortunate to offer such a location that provides even better service and we're glad you agree!  It is our hope that we have earned your repeat business and will anticipate your next visit with us.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Pasea is an awesome hotel!! I live in Huntington but love to stay there. It is a fun, beachy and different than any hotel in HB. The staff is very friendly, the food and drinks are great. Your stay includes beach cruisers, beach chairs, etc. It is great. Everything is newer and in great condition. The free flip flops in your room are a nice touch. I love it.  Thank you very much to Chelsea Schmidt, who was very kind and helped us at the front desk. Joe she needs a raise! Thank you Pasea
Manager Response: Dear anmorgan22,  How amazing is Chelsea?????  Although we're a little biased, we believe she is the best Assistant Front Office Manager in the area and no one delivers a personalized experience like Chelsea.  We are grateful for such a detailed review noting some of the many positives about being a guest at the Pasea Hotel & Spa.  We can't wait until your next stay so that we may exceed your expectations once again!!!!!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I am a local to Huntington Beach and stayed at the Pasea as there was mold removal being done at our residence due to a major leak, so I thought what a hassle to have to be relocated but to my surprise no hassle at all,  to book the rooms online was so easy and I was so happy to see they are pet friendly because my two little cuties came with us. When I checked in the staff was so nice, I especially loved Kyle K. the head valet he was so professional and 5 star service all the way. When I first walked into my room what was waiting there as a welcome but a bottle of champagne and some yummy desserts!!!! Oh yes this was so nice coming from work on a weekday to this, then I look in the closet and there are the cutest flip flops and a wonderful comfy robe I put it on that very
Manager Response: Dear jaynehuntington,  We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  As someone that works at a fantastic resort, we thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of both our Kyle's and Chelsea!  They are a prime example of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  We look forward to hosting you again and hope to see you soon in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Spent two nights on business and loved the experience. Room had a nice ocean view and balcony. Relaxing atmosphere with a friendly and attentive staff. Great spot to walk next door to the outdoor mall or across the street to the beach. Nice pool too. I'll be back!
Manager Response: Dear DJLee2014,  We thank you for staying with us and are delighted to hear it was a very good experience.  It is our hope that we have earned your repeat business and will anticipate your next visit with us. Thank you for sharing this and we hope to see you on your next trip.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I was far too old to be staying here. If in your 20’s or 30’s and looking for a beach vacation you are in luck, however. Very hip and very casual. Decent gym. Shopping center and beautiful , endless beach right there. Very trendy rooms. The food is quite good in the restaurant and the flat bread ( pizza) via room service delicious. Expensive  hotel for what it is.
Manager Response: Dear HOOVER2016,  We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Stayed two nights at this hotel, I had an ocean view room, the view was great. I would highly recommend this hotel. Close to an outdoor mall, plenty of places to eat in the area. The hotel is right across from the beach. Their is a walkway to walk along the beach if you prefer not to walk on the sand and there is a pier near by . I would definitely like to visit again.
Manager Response: Dear NSD70,  We are grateful for such a detailed review noting some of the many positives about being a guest at the Pasea Hotel & Spa.  We promise to work hard so that we earn 5 stars on your next stay!   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Lovely place!!  Free bottle of wine waiting in your room and sat outside on our balcony overlooking the ocean while we enjoyed it.  Just across the street from the beach and they loan you chairs, towels and umbrella.  Concierge was absolutely fantastic!  Tanners hotel top bar was fun and the bar was really cool!  Highly recommend it!!
Manager Response: Dear LisaJoe123,  We love this review!!!!!!!!!  It was an honor to host you and we are thrilled to hear that our staff delivered another amazing experience.  Thank you for posting this review and sharing it with the TripAdvisor community.  We will be eagerly awaiting your next stay.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: What more can you say, ocean front, 3 balconies, gorgeous room, very accessible.  We only stayed one night but I have not stopped thinking about it since.  We are returning for 3 nights in a couple of weeks and I can’t wait.  The staff from minute one were attentive, friendly and helpful and made the stay wonderful.  Every aspect of our stay was first class.  I want to stay there forever!
Manager Response: Dear Carol M,  We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  Your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Spent a weekend in June spur of the moment. Hotel is right across street from beach. The pool area was busy and active. Hotel lends beach chairs and umbrellas. Such a nice touch. All rooms have private patios with views.   Room features a glass shower that you can open up and see off the patio. ( no one can see in) wished we had more time there so much to do and see.
Manager Response: Dear petra623,  We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to post this review as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  We're hoping that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Pet-friendly luxury and shower with a view
Summary: I love finding high-end pet-friendly hotels that welcome dogs and the Pasea Hotel & Spa rolls out the red carpet for both you and Fido. Pet amenities include dog bowl, dog treat and use of dog bed during your stay. The personal welcome note to Honey was a nice touch. If you forgot your guitar at home, pick up the perfectly tuned instrument in your room and strum out your favorite Beach Boy song. A fun aspect of the room presents itself with a window from your shower so you can view the ocean.  There is a privacy sliding door should you decide to do without the view, however, our helpful bellman Mark assured us no one could see in.  Our dog Honey was right at home overlooking the pool below and seemed to appreciate the music playing from the hotel's bar as much as we did. The $35
Manager Response: Dear Susan S,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to Huntington Beach.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: great location, big room with great view, modern furnishings, attractive hotel, good food, excellent hospitality, great beach accessories such as chairs available from hotel, just steps from Huntington Beach
Manager Response: Dear D K,  We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Room with a beautiful ocean view
Summary: The view from the hotel is amazing, overlooking the beach and beautiful sunshine to go with it. The room was clean and the bed was comfy, the bathroom was spacious and free flip flops were provided. Coffee machine and WiFi was also provided. The pool was very busy, filling up quickly so get a space early.  Overall, the hotel was brilliant deserves a 5 star rating!
Manager Response: Dear Natalie W,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa and giving us a perfect rating based on your recent stay with us.   We're delighted that you had such a great experience at our resort, enjoying our unbeatable location, the spectacular views from our guest rooms, and our cool California coastal vibe. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Pasea for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We stayed over Labor Day Weekend. We are "Locals" and have been in HB since 1964. A lot has changed. The Pasea Hotel is a new hotel with a hip modern surf theme. Swimming pool seems kind of small but gets the job done. Service in the pool area is excellent. Staff all around is nice and friendly. Room Service is good although not the fastest but who's in a hurry ? Robes in room along with a free pair of flippy flopies is a good PR move. Free WiFi is strong and constant. T.V has all of the latest techie stuff.  Beds are super comfy. Being local we have been to all the hotels along PCH and The Pasea Hotel and Spa is a nice addition.
Manager Response: Dear Rondo,  We love this review!!!!!!!!!  It was an honor to host you over the holidays and we are thrilled to hear that our staff delivered another amazing experience.  Your recommendation is incredible and we thank you!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The hotel is gorgeous with an amazing view of the ocean. The staff were all kind and helpful, particularly the valet staff. I was impressed with how friendly and accommodating they were. I will surely come back.
Manager Response: Dear Tina C,  We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.   We enjoyed hosting you and hope that you come back to see us again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: This is an Amazing Hotel!!! It is in town and on the main street, but it is also an amazing resort hotel and spa. Every staff member that we came in contact with was very hospitable and friendly. Highly Recomend
Manager Response: Dear SunSandH20,  We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I travel a lot and this hotel is AMAZING.  Great location and amenities.  Helpful staff.  The salt water pool is good and nice to hit after a full day at the beach. Nearby are lots of good food choices as well.  It it pricey ($400 a night) but it was so worth it for everything like free beach chairs, umbrella, towels, etc.
Manager Response: Dear tom d,  Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Wonderful hotel, great location, accommodations excellent. Would come back recommend that everyone visit make a visit. Beach views are amazing, plenty of restaurants and places to visit locally. Make it one of your next spots to visit.
Manager Response: Dear FrRush,  We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Beautiful, new, upscale yet laidback Hotel
Summary: I spent 3 days at the Pasea Hotel & Spa, and had a most relaxing and invigorating stay. From the cheerful and friendly valet attendant to the equally cheerful, friendly and efficient front desk clerk, every aspect of the stay was delightful. My room was spacious, clean and modern. It had a large flat screen tv with a comfortable lounge chair from which to watch it. The shower was like a spa. I can't wait for my next visit to this excellent hotel.
Manager Response: Dear BronxLiam,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Good combo of laid back California beach resort and a luxury feel!  The food was outstanding.  Don't forget to try their perfectly cut bacon.  The Blue Room was the perfect place for lounging during the sunset hours.
Manager Response: Dear Carlo C,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're delighted that you had such a great experience at our resort, enjoying our unbeatable location, the spectacular views from our guest rooms, and our cool California coastal vibe. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Pasea for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The Pasea is great!  They take great care of their customers and are very friendly and efficient.  I ate 5 catered meals with them, and each one was fantastic.  I wanted to overeat at every meal!  I would definitely go back.
Manager Response: Dear alinn26,  Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.  We look forward to your next visit to the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We have been there several times now. The rooms are amazing, the views are stunning. Really enjoyed the food and like being adjacent to Pacific City. Definitely recommend this place. Also a really cool place to hang out during the week. Definitely like the bar area and find it to be a great place to meet when we decide to go to hang out in Huntington. Perfect location for the Airshow (our favorite).
Manager Response: Dear TravNEXTplace,  We can't express how much this review means to us.  We thank you for publishing your experience and sharing some great things about our hotel.  We're glad to hear that we're your choice of hotels when in Huntington Beach.  Thank you for posting this review and for continuing to stay with us.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Pasea hotel was nice.  Great location, nice updated rooms.  Amazing views.    I had a bad experience with the valet a check out.   My husband and I both had cars to get when we checked out.  His is expensive mine is a minivan.  I don’t think they knew we were a couple, because they got his with in a minute while I had to wait over ten minutes.   They pulled cars for people that weren’t there while I waited.   I had all the luggage, when the car arrived the valet parked the car as far away from the luggage as possible and then just walked away.  Didn’t off to help with the bags, didn’t give me the keys.   Just walked back to the desk.  Needless to say I kept my tip money.  I called the hotel to let management know, no one has returned my call in over twenty four hours.    I was
Manager Response: Dear 847michelle2018,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact me at jleinacker@paseahotel.com.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We checked in on Saturday the 18th and upon arrival we were working with a young man Who couldn’t find our reservation because there have been some problems with the wrong people being cancelled by Mrs. Donatelli. Emily at the front desk overheard what was going on knew what very professional and helped him helped us with no hassles at all She is a very positive young lady and very helpful and I think you guys should know that you have a really great employee with Emily. We were there for the Donatelli Stanford wedding reception on Saturday night .  Sincerely  Beth Willis  Henderson,Nevada
Manager Response: Dear Steve W,  Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about what a wonderful job Emily does.  We're fortunate to have her here as one of our team members.  We hope that you come back to see us again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Still great but don't pay extra for ocean view
Summary: Great hotel, a year later, nothing had changed.  Everyone needs to pay a visit.  Last year I stayed in a partial ocean view and it had better view than the ocean view room I paid extra for this year.  No need to spend extra.
Manager Response: Dear Steve K,  We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Huntington Beach so that we may host you once again.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Don't Stay Here - Expensive and Not Worth It
Summary: Ocean view = rear parking lot view. Stay elsewhere with actual ocean views. Paid $400 for ocean view and didn't get it. Overall terrible stay. There was a party next door with BLARING MUSIC until 2AM. Zero customer support despite multiple complaints. Don't stay here at ANY COST.
Manager Response: Dear T7468XVbenjaminl,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact me at jleinacker@paseahotel.com.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I waited over 10 minutes at check in whilst the receptionist was engaged in a card trick with a guest. (1 member of staff checking people in, 3 guests waiting) When I was eventually seen I asked for a manager - I waited a further 4 minutes for her to show up. On asking what she finds acceptable for a wait time she answered 10-15 minutes was 'normal'. I do not find it acceptable.Especially as on the website it is suggested that you get a 'welcome drink' - not even a glass of water was offered in 100+ degree temperatures. The manager upgraded my room type, but to be honest, an extra balcony did not make me feel any better about how I was ignored at check in.When I finally got to my room (this is now 60 minutes after arrival) I was not shown how to use anything, was not told
Manager Response: Dear IamBasketgirl,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact me at jleinacker@paseahotel.com.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Came up to Huntington Beach from Laguna. Could have just driven up but decided to treat me and Fenway to resort living for a couple of days. Fenway is a maltese/shi tzu. We met up with friends and basically hung out around the pool, had lunch, went nextdoor for dinner and dancing. Best. Time. Ever!
Manager Response: Dear Shanta C,  We thoroughly enjoyed hosting you and Fenway and are thrilled that you wrote about your experience on TripAdvisor.  Thank you for sharing your experience and giving us the highest rating possible!  We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Pasea for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We had never been to Huntington Beach and were not sure what to expect. We had a great time.   The hotel is new, clean and very conveniently located. We really liked our room. And I liked the gym. It has a Peloton Bike which is always a plus   The real treat were the people who work there. They were friendly, informative and welcoming.   We will be back!
Manager Response: Dear Happado,  Your words are music to our ears as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day!  Thank you for giving us such a great review and for promising to come back and stay with us again!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Room had an unprecedented sea view of Huntingdon beach and pier. Absolutely beautiful. Valet parking is expensive $50 a night but don’t risk parking on the street. The hotel has a $25 a day ‘resort tax’ so make sure you budget for an extra $75 a day - something I didn’t do! The major down side to this hotel is the pool. We got lucky on the first day getting 4 beds straight away but I felt for hotel guests coming into the pool area having nowhere to sit. This was due to the selfish idiots who leave towels and hats on sun beds then bugger off for hours. The hotel said they give non attended beds 30 minutes then remove the towels to free the beds up. I never saw this happen. The pool area has 4 massive VIP tents anyone can hire for the day. Again, although there was evidence of
Manager Response: Dear Woozle47,  Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Pasea Hotel & Spa.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The staff and the hotel are top notch.  The amenities and the services provided are one of the best I've ever experienced.  The location is superb and within walking distance to the best that Huntington Beach has to offer.  Great place for family and kids.
Manager Response: Dear Ricardo N,  We love this review!!!!!!!!!  It was an honor to host your family and we are thrilled to hear that our staff delivered another amazing experience.  Your recommendation is incredible and we thank you!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Great place to relax and do nothing!
Summary: I stayed here with my son after a busy week in NY on our way home to NZ. First off this place is on the pricey side but you get what you pay for ! We had a partial Ocean View Room for 7 nights with 2 Queen / Double Beds not sure now .  The room was great and big enough to not feel crammed up if you chose to stay in.  There was a good selection of TV viewing, WIFI was good and unlimited in addition to lots of other things which came with the resort fee.  We ate at the restaurant on site 2 nights and the food was great. Loved the pool area, unfortunately didnt find the weather quite warm enough to be at the beach. The surrounding shops and restaurants are very upmarket, so this is not a place to stay or area to visit if you on a tight budget. Had a lovely relaxing week , last
Manager Response: Dear 255KarenB255,  We are grateful for such a detailed review noting some of the many positives about being a guest at the Pasea Hotel & Spa.  We promise to work hard so that we earn 5 stars on your next stay!   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I am writing this review exactly one year after our week spent at the Pasea. (The system doesn’t let me enter back to August 2018) We are planning a week in California again this month, I have been browsing reviews for several days and realize how valuable they are to many people including myself.   This hotel is gorgeous and the service excellent. We stayed at the Balboa Bay resort for a few nights before making our way to Huntington, so our expectations were high but the Pasea did not disappoint. Absolutely gorgeous and very clean rooms, offering the Fresh brand products which is a treat. Very spacious and bright.   Concierges and pool staff were particularly helpful and warm. The whole property is pristine and tastefully decorated. First room we checked into was on pool side
Manager Response: Dear Mimi L,  We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Great hotel, superb location. Trendy and Modern decor
Summary: We had a great stay at the Pasea. Room was 2 Queens, good size with balcony. Robes, toiletries and flip flops all provided in the room.  Hotel has a beach shuttle service which includes parasol, deckchair and towels all free of charge for guests which is a nice touch. Pool area was busy and noisy but we never struggled to get beds. It seems quite a ‘party’ hotel but we had the kids with us and yet we still felt very welcome and service at front desk and round the pool was good. Saturday night the bar is open v late (circa 1.30am) and its a trendy spot so was v busy. would suggest anyone with kids request a room away from the pool area (we had one round the back and heard nothing at all). Rooms, corridors and lobby all beautifully decorated - it’s been recently done I think and
Manager Response: Dear PeaLomax,  Yes!!!!!!  Your experience was exactly what we strive to deliver for all of our guests and it means the world to us that you shared this with the TripAdvisor audience.  We can't wait until your next stay so that we may exceed your expectations once again!!!!!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Highly Disappointing - not worth it - stay in better hotels closeby
Summary: My sister booked a room at the Pasea for my birthday.  Upon arriving the front desk could not find my reservation.  Thankfully my sister has sent me the printout confirmation from the hotel itself, which I was able to give the front desk clerk.  He didnt recognize this was his own hotel's confirmation, and kept asking: where did you book this?  Is your sister here?  After about 10 minutes, he realized he was searching for the wrong name...the confirmation number wasn't a clue?  Second, my sister had paid over $600 per night and was assured an ocean view on the top floor.  We were given a side room overlooking a noisy pool, and on a mid-level floor.  Possibly because they hadnt found the reservation or lost it?  The restaurant at the hotel was good - one of the best burgers I've
Manager Response: Dear JamesBirthday,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact me at jleinacker@paseahotel.com.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Great vacation...but a few words of caution
Summary: Greetings from NC!  We had a phenomenal visit at this hotel. We are.family of four and stayed for 4 nights.  The view from our room was amazing.  The service from beginning to end was more than I could ask for.  The pool area was nice, not crowded at all.  We did rent a pool cabana which was amazing, although we got it at a very reasonable rate.  I have seen then for as much as $750 for the day and we paid nothing close to that. There isn't much I would change about the stay.  The rooms were immaculate, and we loved the bathroom, plush robes and we all got flip flops and there was the great bottle of wine waiting for us.  Now, please know, you will be charged a per day resort fee and parking plus a $400 hold on your card. I knew this, but for some, you may not want to use your
Manager Response: Dear devonjs,  We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  We enjoyed hosting you and your family and hope you're back as our guest in the very near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Spent a night away, hotel staff was friendly and grounds were clean and pretty. Rooms were spacious and modern. Some of the rooms away from PCH have limited ocean views due to the building lay out. Right next to some great shops and restaurants at Pacific City center, we didn't try the hotel restaurant food. Walking distance to main street and pier and of course the ocean is across the street. The pool was adequate size for when we were there with enough chairs for people though the drink staff didn't come around as often as they should. Some great views of the Pacific from the Jacuzzi. We will be back.
Manager Response: Dear SoCalExplorers,  We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Loved this place. They treat you very well, everything there is beautiful, it's very modern and fresh. It's really close to the famous pier and also right by a super cool outdoor shopping mall. The room keys are mini wood surfboards. I was with my kids so didn't make it to the outdoor rooftop bar but it looked amazing. I can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: Dear Heidi W,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're delighted that you had such a great experience at our resort, enjoying our unbeatable location, the spectacular views from our guest rooms, and our cool California coastal vibe. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Pasea for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: One of the best hotels by the amazing Huntington Beach
Summary: Amazing location, clean and modern rooms with full sea view large balcony. Providing beach gear (towel, chairs) for the guests. Beach is 2 min. walking distance across the street. Direct access to a small but amazing shopping center with a lot of amazing food outlets.Also the Tanners restaurant inside the hotel serves good food.  The negative comments are; 1) Housekeeping is always a bit delayed. Despite calling the guest service and room service several times every day, the room is tidied and cleaned very late in the afternoon and unfortunately they kept on excusing that the hotel was busy which is not an acceptable excuse. They rather hire more staff during high season and improve operrations 2) The valet parking for guests is overpriced 3) And also the hotel is a bit stingy
Manager Response: Dear TC-BN,  We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We come to Pasea ALL THE TIME and we absolutely love it!  The vibe is perfect- the staff is amazing.  Ana from Club Blue, Tyler at the pool- thank you for being so good to us. We are also always blown away by the valet- specifically Zach, Daniel and Mario- thanks for being awesome guys, you go above  and beyond! We so so appreciate it!!!
Manager Response: Dear Melissa S,  We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to share your recent experience with us and specifically point out a few of our amazing associates.  We're hoping that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Has to be THE best hotel in Huntington Beach. Trendy upstairs bar with dj Fri Sat into early hours so if that’s not for you ask for back rooms (off numbers). Has to be coolest place to be in town esp for younger crowd on weekends. Fab pool area which has busy with weekend crowd. Right on beach and next to Pacific City shopping and dining complex. 10-15 mins walk into town centre (closest of all big hotels). This resort has a lot to offer, just ask what’s available!
Manager Response: Dear car0travel,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel... location, service, cleanliness and amenities!!
Summary: Incredible hotel. Don't hesitate, just book it. It's been a couple of weeks now that we're back home from the vacation, and can't stop talking about how great the hotel was, how amazingly they treat their customers, the proximity to nearby things to do and places to eat, and how clean the place was. Fantastic! What a well kept property. And it starts all the way at the top - Joe and Chris are everywhere, all the time, and the team that surrounds them make it enjoyable for all.   We stayed for 9 nights and that wasn't enough. We were very impressed, certainly more so than nearby hotels we stayed in the area on past visits. You can't even compare!   Way to go folks. Thank you for having us. We'll see you again.   Your friends from Toronto!
Manager Response: Dear Rob G,  It means such a great deal to us that a guest that stayed with us this long gave us 5 stars!  We can't thank you enough for sharing this detailed review and for sharing this with the TripAdvisor community.  We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Pasea for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: When a hotel double books your reservation it's hard to extend a 5 star review. We've stayed at Pasea and other Meritage resorts in the past, but to be brutally honest there's zero excuse to double book a room and then provide a room to a guest that wasn't properly cleaned. Yes, we arrived early the next morning for our booking but we let the hotel know and prepared them for it.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience on your recent stay with us. We absolutely regret the missed opportunities and housekeeping errors made and would like the opportunity to get more details and resolve this to your satisfaction. Please contact me at jleinacker@paseahotel.com at your earliest convenience.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Great location but the hotel needs to work on its customer service
Summary: I recently stayed at this hotel for a business conference.   On the plus side – this hotel is right next to Huntington Beach, the rooftop bar is fantastic, and the food was very good!   When I went to check-in, a man was standing next to me at reception. It was impossible not to overhear his conversation with a member of staff – he had booked a hotel room that the hotel had given away to another customer who had trashed the room. Naturally he was very upset about the situation and the fact that there wasn’t another room available for him and his wife. From what I heard, the only room that was available was a suite which the man would have to pay full price for. The hotel didn't take steps to talk to this customer in private so a couple of the other guests (including myself)
Manager Response: Dear LauraE04,  We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We stayed at this hotel recently for a wedding and my girlfriend and I were super impressed. Despite showing up hours before check in, the front desk was able to get us into a great room early where we were able to get ready for a day at the beach. The hotel seems to have a fun vibrant atmosphere and doesn't seem too stuffy. Everyone we interacted with was kind and helpful. We enjoyed sitting by the pool, some drinks at the upstairs bar, and a nice gym with modern equipment. Can't wait to go back.
Manager Response: Dear sgothard77,  Thank you for taking the time to share this review and we're delighted to hear you had such a good time for the wedding.  We greatly appreciate the kind words about the service our staff delivered and we hope to see you again on your next visit to Huntington Beach.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Loved the appearance of this hotel online, the location and the pool/nice rooms. I booked the package that offered free drink vouchers for the pool, thinking we would be able to spend some time there during our two night stay. Unfortunately, the hotel seems to market to families, despite the appearance and suggestion of others from the area that this was a nice, mainly adult hotel where we would be able to relax and drink by the pool. The pool was packed, and the whole hotel was overflowing with families with very young children. From 8 am until sundown, there was little to no room at the pool, and absolutely no room at the hotel bar, which was connected to Tanners. Our experience at Tanners was very undesirable, drinks took about 15-20 minutes, and I felt like we received
Manager Response: Dear mollyrtexas,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact our Corporate Food & Beverage Director, Stephen Schackne at sschackne@pacifichospitality.com.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Overall, the hotel and pool did not disappoint. It is located next to Pacific city and a short walk to the pier.  Tanners has great breakfast and is a good place to have a drink in the evening. It was slightly difficult to get a table there on Sunday. There was an hour wait for guests while multiple tables were unoccupied. The staff was generally helpful. In particular Jake in the valet department was exceptional. He resolved an issue professionally. He was eager to help and showed great interpersonal skills.
Manager Response: Dear Ashley H,  We're thrilled to hear that Jake delivered the personal service that the Pasea Hotel & Spa is known for!  Thank you for staying with us and posting this review.....we'll look forward to your next trip to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The Pasea had been my favorite hotel in California, particularly given its location by the Pacific at Huntington Beach. However, after a visit in June, it is no longer my go-to place. While the hotel has its merits—the casual, beach feel that epitomizes sunny SoCal—the lack of professionalism at the front desk mars any pleasant memories.  I had previously stayed at the Pasea in January 2017 and January 2018 and found the experience stellar. So much so, that I reserved a corner suite to share with my family this June. Definitely a splurge, but one that I thought would be worthwhile, particularly since we were commemorating various family milestones.  Unfortunately, the discourteous and rude comments at the front desk overshadows the facilities as well as the friendly, welcoming
Manager Response: Dear Janette C,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We offer a sincere apology for the multiple challenges you incurred during your most recent stay with us.  Thank you for taking the time to speak to Joshua Gitsham, Front Office Manager.   The detailed feedback you provided is vital for us to measure our performance and improve the experience for our guests.  You can be rest assured that your comments will not fall on deaf ears and improvements will be made. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Great location for a work conference
Summary: I travelled from the UK for a two day work conference at the Pasea Hotel, and was blown away by the location and service. Everything was top notch.   We ate in Tanners the first night and as there were 30+ of us, we had a family style meal. Wow, it was delicious.   During the conference itself we ate breakfast and lunch on the patio overlooking the ocean. It was hard to concentrate on work when you had such great views in front of you!   I’d love to return again in the future with my family.
Manager Response: Dear U2fan,  We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  It's great to hear that our team members yet again delivered the highest level of service to you and your group.  We hope your travels bring you back our way in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Stayed here for a few nights before heading back home after a couple of weeks in California. We’ve stayed in Huntington Beach quite a few times and was looking forward to staying at a new hotel. Nice modern rooms, comfy beds, great pool overlooking Huntington Beach. Tanners thé bar/restaurant has lovely breakfast and is a nice place for an evening drink too. The hotel is ideally located next to the nez shopping complex Pacific city which has restaurants and bars. Huntington Beach Main Street is about 5 mins walk. The only negative is the resort fee does not include the car parking so you have to pay an additional $40 a night for your car as well as approx $36/8 a night resort fee. Also the coffee shop in the hotel closes early and there were quite a few people along with
Manager Response: Dear lollipop9,  We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We stayed (family of 4, 2 kids aged 10 &14) for 4 nights in May and could not have  have had a better experience.  We came here for a wind down sfter Disney. Staff was AMAZING!!  Ocean front room was STUNNING!!  Location was PERFECT!!  The cruiser bikes are the BEST!!   The pool area feels like a RESORT!! Keep doing what you are doing Paséa.  ❤️ from the Paulsen family.
Manager Response: Dear Pauly2707,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa and for taking time out of your day to share your experience . We're delighted that it was a great one, enjoying our unbeatable location, the spectacular views from our guest rooms, and our cool California coastal vibe. Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we hope that you come back to see us again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: This is our second stay at this hotel.  The rooms are comfortable, shower amazing and beds good! I love that we get water each day.  The staff is very friendly and helpful.  It’s located right across the street from the beach.
Manager Response: Dear jsmcchesney,  We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The Pasea seem to rely entirely on its location and facade to impress its guests. Upon check-in we discovered there were no coffee and tea pods for our Keurig, the toilet seat was left up and there were missing bathroom toiletries.  We informed the front desk that evening and called them again in the morning, it took housekeeping another hour to deliver the missing items. There was endless number of mosquitoes in our room despite us keeping our door closed, they seem to have came out from the closet. We opted for the 'Bed & Breakfast' package which included $50 daily breakfast credits, note, this credit would not go towards tips as those will need to be 'out of pocket'. At check-out, not only our bill did not include the credits, it included someone else's bar tab. INSPECT YOUR
Manager Response: Dear tetua,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience on your recent stay with us.  We typically deliver a great experience across the board for our guests and we sincerely apologize that this was not the case during your visit.  We'll use the feedback you've provided to review and improve our service moving forward.  We hope to have the opportunity to host you again on your next visit to Huntington Beach as we promise to exceed your expectations.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I would like to start by saying that I only take time to write Trip Advisor reviews about hotels and restaurants that far exceed expectations.   We just spent 5 days at the Pasea Hotel and Spa and this place is totally deserving of a shout out.  I booked our stay at the last minute without doing much research because we had some family to visit in the Long Beach area.  We expected a decent hotel with an ocean view, but we were rewarded with way more than that.  Every staff member we interacted with was helpful, kind, authentic and genuinely proud to work there and be part of the Pasea Hotel team even down to the housekeeping staff.    We took full advantage of the restaurants, pool service, beach butler, beach cruisers, sunsets, all of it.   Our room was clean, modern and well
Manager Response: Dear Roostbrew,  Thank you for sharing your experience and giving us the highest rating possible!!!!!  We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  We believe our amazing staff and the service they deliver are the difference between the Paséa Hotel & Spa and the many other hotels in the area.  We are thrilled to hear that you agree and we look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Huntington Beach area.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: My husband and I just recently celebrated our 5 year anniversary and have heard such great things about Pasea and decided to give it a try, and I am so glad that we did! We booked a 2 night stay in an ocean facing room, and it did not disappoint. Right from check in we were amazed by how beautiful the lobby/view was. We had the front office manager Joshua assist us with checking in, and had mentioned that we were celebrating our anniversary. After settling in we had the best surprise with champagne and strawberries delivered to our room. Not knowing much about the area, and inquired about fun things to do in Huntington. Joshua had sent us over to Pacific City which was right next door for dinner and we had the best time.   You can definitely count us in for visiting in the near
Manager Response: Dear pgriff233,  As someone that works at a fantastic resort, we thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of Joshua.  He is a prime example of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Huntington Beach area.  Happy Anniversary!    Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: This Hotel was one of the best experiences of our life.  We were here for one night last weekend to celebrate our anniversary.  The first impression was amazing!!  We tried to check in at noon but our room wasn't ready.  While we waited for our room the staff walked us over to the bar and bought us a round of mimosas to celebrate us.   Once our room was ready about an hour later and we went up to the top floor to check it out and we had a bottle of champagne waiting for us with an anniversary card.     Everyone was so friendly and this hotel really went over the top to make our Anniversary special.  Well done Pasea and we look forward to our next Anniversary to make this a tradition!
Manager Response: Dear JGray626,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and we sincerely thank you for spending this very special occasion with us.  You have noted the efforts of some of our truly special staff and for this we thank you.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I recently stayed here with my family for the 4th of July week and was blown away by this hotel. The view of the beach was absolutely amazing. The bedrooms were luxurious and comfortable. The gym and spa were a treat! Relaxing and I loved the views from the gym!   In general, our family had everything we needed. The restaurant inside, Tanners, was amazing. The meals were perfect portions and beautiful presentation. As a vegetarian I felt like I had a lot of healthy and delicious options. The roasted vegetables are perfect as an appetizer or meal, in my case.   My son and I loved the pool. It had a perfect view of the beach and pier. It was relaxing and lively all at the same time.   It was a prime location to shopping, restaurants, the beach, and anything we could have asked for
Manager Response: Dear Lauren B,  Yes!!!!!!  Your experience was exactly what we strive to deliver for all of our guests and it means the world to us that you shared this with the TripAdvisor audience.  We can't wait until your next stay so that we may exceed your expectations once again!!!!!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Nice beach front (across PCH) hotel beach views
Summary: Nice hotel and spa close to beach and Huntington pier. If want to see fireworks on 4th be sure to reserve well in advance " beach FRONT" room or " Pier view room" otherwise you will get a beach view but on opposite side of pier so you won't see fireworks on pier from room. Jacuzzi pool has view of beach and pier as well as pool. Restaurant "Tanners" has great breakfasts and drinks are "ok". Best to buy wine by the bottle for best value. You get a bottle of wine with room. Spa is wonderful and only 25 bucks a day. Massages and other services extra but you get use of sauna,steam room, and jacuzzi as well as unlimited iced tea and water, relax room or outdoor garden area. Beach butler is complimentary and will get you to and from beach on a rickshaw bike with umbrella, chairs,
Manager Response: Dear Steve E,  Yes!!!!!!  Your experience was exactly what we strive to deliver for all of our guests and it means the world to us that you shared this with the TripAdvisor audience.  We can't wait until your next stay so that we may exceed your expectations once again!!!!!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: This was one of the best vacations I've ever had. We came for a few days to visit family and Disneyland. Close to everything including an outdoor mall, the beach, and entertainment. Shout out to all the staff we ran into who were always friendly and willing to help.
Manager Response: Dear joey99999,  We believe our amazing staff and the service they deliver are the difference between the Paséa Hotel & Spa and the many other hotels in the area.  We are thrilled to hear that you agree and we look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Huntington Beach area.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel, beautiful people, beautiful weekend
Summary: Service was all wonderful.  Just make sure to reserve a room that doesn’t face the pool otherwise you will have club music until 2am blasting through your windows on a Friday and Saturday night. Otherwise it was a great getaway!
Manager Response: Dear ctwich391795,  Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Pasea Hotel & Spa.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I attended a Locale Magazine party last week at Paséa Hotel in Huntington Beach. It’s the fancy one on PCH next to Pacific City. The hotel is gorgeous and we were out in the courtyard by PCH. The food vendors were set up along the courtyard and there was a live band. The venue was perfect for the Red, White and Luau theme. The views of the ocean are incredible. While I didn’t stay here, the staff I interacted with was great. Pricing for rooms at Paséa is on the high end, but worth it if you’re looking to celebrate a special occasion. Check-in is at 4 pm. There is no self-parking, valet only. They have resort fees as well.
Manager Response: Dear Trina D,  Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during the recent event at the Pasea Hotel & Spa.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Extra credit card charges and poor customer services
Summary: Accommodations were fine (despite our "ocean view" room looking primarily at the roof of the adjacent building), but after we checked out I noticed that the final charge to my credit card was higher than expected. I called and was told that it was due to the $90 breakfast we charged to the room. We never ate at the hotel and I asked if they had a receipt they could show me. The person I spoke with said he would have to look into it and that someone would call me back. I never received a call back and ended up having to dispute it with my credit card company. Over a month later, they have not responded even to American Express. Disappointing customer service after a lackluster experience at the hotel. I do not recommend staying here - there are other, much better options in the
Manager Response: Dear bkbostonma,  We sincerely apologize for not resolving this issue in an efficient manner.  Please contact me at jleinacker@paseahotel.com so that we may address this matter right away.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I spent $1500/night on an oceanfront suite and was forced to listen to music blasting until 1:00 am each night.
