I honestly don’t understand how guests directly across from the pool can bear it. I understand the PCH traffic (motorcycles zoom by 24 hours/day), but the music in insane. The pool is on the smaller side. They sell day passes, so it’s hard for paying guests to get chairs unless you get there by 9:00 am (we did).  It feels more suited for a Vegas-style pool party, not a luxury beach hotel.  We dined in their restaurant Tanner’s twice, dinner Saturday night 7/7 (5:45-7:45) was atrocious. We had a reservation and waited 10 minutes for water and our waiter, 20 minUtes for our drinks to arrive. We had to constantly flag our waiter down for silverware, drinks, and 30 minutes
Manager Response: Dear TravelHappyJo,  We sincerely apologize that your experience was not a good one as we take our role in hosting our guests as our most important goal.  At your earliest convenience, please contact me at jleinacker@paseahotel.com so that I may get further details and resolve this to your satisfaction.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The location is the best...right on the beach, and easy walking distance to other restaurants, shops & nightlife.  Fabulous rooftop bar and a great location for a cocktail at Sunset. Comfy swings tucked in a nook were my fav.  Keep in mind that this is a beach resort and prepare for some noise. But that's what you'll find in most beach towns!
Manager Response: Dear saraheT922KB,  Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Hotel seems to cater to 20 somethings.   Loud dance music played late into the night - sounded like a club in my room.  Staff is not very friendly, waited 25 minutes for a cup of coffee in one of the restaurants.  Waiter never came back - at all!   Spa was nice but they charge a gratuity automatically to your bill and only give 50% of it to the person that performs the service.   If you want to leave an additional tip for the person that did the service, they take 50% of that too.
Manager Response: Dear kaytee25,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact me at jleinacker@paseahotel.com.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We were relocating to the area a few months ago and decided to stay in Huntington Beach and the Pasea Hotel was an easy choice.   I travel often for work and leisure and can truly say that even as a new transplant I would stay at this hotel in a heart beat.   First the staff: everyone from the valet to the front desk staff were warm and welcoming. They greeted us every time we entered the property and made sure we were comfortable.   Second the ambiance: from the calming spa like smell to the beautiful blue colors on the walls and the gift shop this place oozed of charm and luxury. Our room was beautiful and the flip flops and robes were a wonderful plus.   Finally the location: you can’t beat it. It’s right across the street from the beach and steps away from the Huntington
Manager Response: Dear ChipperNTravel,  We love this review!!!!!!!!!  It was an honor to host you and we are thrilled to hear that our staff delivered another amazing experience.  Thank you for posting this review and sharing it with the TripAdvisor community.  We will be eagerly awaiting your next stay.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Hotel was very beautiful—nice decor, clean, fresh. Our room was overlooking the pool though and there was a rooftop restaurant bar across from the pool that was playing loud music until 12:30am. I would go back but I would make sure to ask for a room away from the pool. We got breakfast and the food was good too.
Manager Response: Dear Amanda B,  Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Pasea Hotel & Spa.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We had a company meeting here. Very nice decor, they gave us a tour of the building including the pent house suite. Very nice but for $4k a night, out of my league. We did a bike tour on the beach, they tell you about the history of Huntington. That was nice. They let you keep the water bottle that is also a blue tooth speaker.  Our meeting room was nice but in the after noon the bar started playing loud music that was annoying. Plus they did not have any signs up saying meeting in progress so we kept having people opening the door and walking in.  This is a very upscale, modern hotel, located in the center of Huntington Beach. So there is plenty of activity and shopping.  Hotel staff were extremely pleasant and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Dave K,  We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: 3 days in a suite was wnjoyable
Summary: We didn’t want to stay in LA for this trip as had been there before. Chose the Pasea at Huntington. Was an easy drive to Disney and the suite was lovely. Hotel is new so fitout is still nice. We stayed mid-week and got a good deal. Lots of restaurants are within walking distance which made it easy with kids.
Manager Response: Dear Mkm82,  Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we're hoping we see you again on your next visit to the area.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: What an amazing surprise - made a spur of the moment decision to go to HB and randomly found this place online.  Had no idea what to expect.  Holy wow!  Beach-chic, modern and gorgeous - rooms reminded me of the W - super comfortable. FlipFlops waiting inside, along with a bottle of wine. Wanted to take a shower right away just to enjoy the view through the cool sliding door. Views were amazing.  People friendly.  All excellent.
Manager Response: Dear marycrow5,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're delighted that you had such a great experience at our resort, enjoying our unbeatable location, the spectacular views from our guest rooms, and our cool California coastal vibe. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Pasea for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Dream Wedding at Pase Hotel & Spa
Summary: Our son just got married last weekend at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. Everything went off without a hitch thanks to Tina, wedding coordinator.  She was on top of everything and very responsive.  The venue, hotel and staff were just wonderful. The rooms are gorgeous. The perfect location for a wedding - everything was right there - the ceremony, reception and dinner.  Highly recommend the Pasea Hotel & Spa.
Manager Response: Dear Sheila C,  It was such a privilege to host your son's wedding and we sincerely thank you for spending this very special occasion with us.  You have noted the efforts of Tina and our truly special staff and for this we thank you.  We're wishing you and your family all the best in the future.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Came here for a 3 day business conference, stayed one extra Saturday night, and it was lovely - but so loud. Hotel is brand new, fresh, clean, sharp design, interesting art, super friendly staff, quality amenities (free flip flops, free bottle of red wine, quality toiletries, frette robes), they offer kids toys, bikes, beach towels, text updates and have a coffee shop with snacks in the lobby. Pool looks great for families.   Numerous phone calls to front desk at midnight and 2 am went unanswered (associate with an urgent medical situation), phone rang and rang, no one ever picked up. Our fridge stopped working (took a day to have it addressed, so did someone else's. LED light in the fridge started flashing brightly in the middle of the night, similar to a fire alarm.  They had
Manager Response: Dear Susi M,  We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community and for rating us 4 out of 5 stars.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Huntington Beach and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: This hotel was lovely with a beautiful view from my corner, ocean front room.  The staff was friendly, helpful, and quick to respond to any request.  The location was perfect.  A quick Uber ride from the airport.  I  will definitely return!
Manager Response: Dear mc_bancroft,  Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We arrived around midnight on 6/8/2018 for a two night stay. I prepaid for one night in one of the burgundy rooms; however, when we arrived, the hotel receptionist told us that they ran out of that particular room.  I told her I was disappointed, because we had chosen this room based on good reviews on line.  Danielle was at the front desk and she said she would be right back...she came back and told me we had been upgraded to a suite. It was amazing.  What impressed me the most is the level of customer service.  I didn't have to get angry or throw a fit for the hotel to try to make it right. We will stay here again. Danielle deserves kudos!  thanks!
Manager Response: Dear KiminAustin,  Wow!!!!!  We're very proud of this review and love that our Front Desk agent did such a great job taking care of you.  We thank you for posting this and hope that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Great night sleep but few issues.
Summary: Hotel is extremely nice inside and out. Beds where comfortable and had a good nights sleep. However, we had two king beds in out room and one of them seem broken on one side. It sank on on side. the door to the shower was also very hard to open. Also, The restaurant was nice but the sorbet tasted like a wet tea towel. Not too good.
Manager Response: Dear XStark1ll3rX,  We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Beautiful Hotel in Beautiful Huntington Beach!!
Summary: Everyone was beyond friendly and helpful from the time we pulled up to Valet, through Check In, dealing with Concierge, During our day at the pool, the bell service, everyone was amazing. We were treated like royalty from the time we arrived to the time we left. Highly recommend staying at The Pasea Hotel & Spa.
Manager Response: Dear mattg1223,  Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The Pasea hotel looks beautiful, great location, however—-the hospitality was poor. We had a bad first impression as soon as we arrived. 4 of us booked 2 nights in a double queen room, for my friends 30th birthday celebration ($400 a night). When we arrived, the ‘systems’ were down so we couldn’t check in—the front desk attendants did not offer any latitudes for the inconvenience—or tell us when we can have our room. We waited for 2 hours before we could get to our room, once we did—our keys didn’t work. Our room keys didn’t work on 4 other occasions—front desk managers never seemed like they knew how to handle situations that arose. Upon check in, i also told them it’s my best friends birthday if they had any amenities to help make her experience memorable—they said yes, but
Manager Response: Dear sonnatomassian,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact our Front Office Manager, Joshua Gitsham at jgitsham@paseahotel.com.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: This hotel is by far the best place for couples! Allow me to elaborate:  Location: The hotel it situated in walking distance to Pacific City. I mean walking distance relative to a fat man so you know it's close. The driveway for the food court and the hotel's lobby is the freaking same! This a new outdoor shopping leisure area for beach goers and oc locals. It has plenty of people watching areas as well as an abundant collection selection of dining options. Oh, if you couldn't tell from the pictures, it's across the street from the beach.  The hotel: The porerty itself is very posh with a beach theme. The keys to rooms are these little wooden surboards that I hope they don't charge you for taking because, yeah, they're not getting that little souvenir back. The lobby has an
Manager Response: Dear Jonathan L,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're delighted that you had such a great experience at our resort, enjoying our unbeatable location, the spectacular views from our guest rooms, and our cool California coastal vibe. Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Like a Monet,  looks great from far but up close its a bit of a mess.  First the pro.  Location is great. Especially how close it is to the pacific city the new mall/food center.  It’s also right across from the beach.      Con:  the room is not very clean.  The bathroom/vanity accessories were used.  The mirrors had numerous smears.  It was as if the maids were untrained or rushed with there job.  Balcony had great view, however one can smell marijuana thru out.    If i was twenty, this would be a great hangout place and would over look the unkept work of the maids but unfortunately at 300-350 per night, one would expect more hight quality and more attention to detail.
Manager Response: Dear asiamutt,  We offer a sincere apology for the multiple challenges you incurred during your most recent stay with us.  Your feedback is vital for us to measure our performance and improve the experience for our guests.  You can be rest assured that your comments will not fall on deaf ears and improvements will be made.  It is our hope that we have the opportunity to host you once again on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Absolutely beautiful hotel, great accommodations and the staff was by far the best in Huntington! Restaurant food was great! Loved that we could check out a beach chair and towel! Pool was beautiful as well! Definitely will return!
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer J,  We love this review!!!!!!!!!  It was an honor to host you and we are thrilled to hear that our staff delivered another amazing experience.  Thank you for posting this review and sharing it with the TripAdvisor community.  We will be eagerly awaiting your next stay.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Amazing Staff, great location, great food!
Summary: It is very apparent from the minute you walk into the doors at The Pasea that hiring great people and training them properly is first and foremost for this hotel. Rooms are very comfortable, great views, great room products. Great food.  Awesome location next to Pacific city. The Beach Valet is very convenient. I would like to make this my home away from home!!
Manager Response: Dear kreinman2018,  Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: 5 Star Hotel but noisy as hell
Summary: I   went to Pasea in Huntington beach over Memorial day weekend May 25-28 as a weekend get away for the wife and I .  We arrive and they park our car (the car is 35 bucks a night to park by the way plus tips) and they take our luggage up to our room 637.  The room and the view of the beach are amazing.  We settle in and tip the bell hop.  I   open the balcony door to a very noisy Pacific Coast Hwy (and it got worse). It was a rare sunny day for May so we went to the bar next to the hotel pool and enjoyed the sunshine and a few drinks overlooking PCH and the water.  But what loomed next door had me worried.   Right next to the hotel is a place called Pacific City, its a sort of walk through outside mall with a few eateries and small bars, but there was also a upper deck bar next
Manager Response: Dear Michael D,  We sincerely apologize that your experience was not a good one as we take our role in hosting our guests as our most important goal.  At your earliest convenience, please contact our Front Office Manager, Joshua Gitsham at jgitsham@paseahotel.com so that he may get further details and resolve this to your satisfaction.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Hip Hotel in a beach town
Summary: Pros:  Great hotel, great location, friendly staff. Located right next to Pacific City shopping area.  Plenty of restaurants to walk to for a nice lunch/dinner. Rooms were nice and comfortable with ocean views available. Pool & jacuzzi have ocean views. Hotel provides beach chairs and umbrellas if you want to spend a day at the beach.  Bike racks are on site if you bring your own bike.  Pedicab is also on property if you need a ride somewhere (not sure how far they go). The Bali inspired spa is also very nice and peaceful. Check Groupon for discounts.   Cons: There is no self-parking - only Valet. The hotel is up front about the $40 expense as it states it on their website. $40 seems unusually high for a beach town!  Plus a $36 resort fee, you’re looking @ $76 additional charges
Manager Response: Dear hardydesk,  Thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars and for sharing your direct feedback regarding the valet and resort fees. While the fees are mandatory, the value of these fees in relation to other hotels in the area is unparalleled. Included in the fees are parking, complimentary WIFI throughout resort for unlimited devices, one complimentary bottle of Trinitas Wine per room per stay, in-room coffee and tea service with Keurig machines, access to Fitness Center, access to thousands of online newspapers and magazines via Press Reader, complimentary use of Hotel’s surfboard storage, beach cruisers beach chairs, umbrellas, and beach towels.  As such, many of our competitors charge $36-$39 for parking, $35 average Resort Fee in Huntington Beach.  We apologize if we did not better explain this bundled package and thank you for an opportunity to explain.  We hope to have earned another opportunity to be your hotel of choice on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: What a hotel...and what courteous staff! A beautiful, cheerful girl checked us in with great politeness, and the rest of the stay was equally delightful.   This hotel has no keys. Nor key-cards. It has these wooden-chips that serve as keys. The room I stayed in was super. While it did not really give the ‘frontal’ sea-view the website promised, it was great anyway.   The breakfast in-room of scrambled egg & pork sausage was delightful. The banqueting facility was also world-class.   A modern & stylish hotel, high on service levels. (Real rubber slippers!)  Nothing should stop you!
Manager Response: Dear 202vineetb,  We love this review!!!!!!!!!  It was an honor to host you and we are thrilled to hear that our staff delivered another amazing experience.  Thank you for posting this review and sharing it with the TripAdvisor community.  We will be eagerly awaiting your next stay.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I specifically asked for a room away from the elevators.  when I arrived, they had a room early for me and the first room the staff put me in was a room next to the elevator and the electrical room.  I am curious do the staff members not read the special instructions and why do you put the first guest that arrives in the worst room.  When I got into the room the fan motor was loud and ready to be replaced. They then accomodated me an put me in another room. Beds facing the wall and not the ocean.  Very disappointing for the expense of this hotel. In addition the beds are extremely uncomfortable and the pillows are an inexpensive foam.
Manager Response: Dear donnabois,  We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.  If you have a moment, please contact our Front Office Manager, Joshua Gitsham so that he may get more information from you to resolve this to your satisfaction.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Best Luxury Hotel in Huntington Beach
Summary: Location: 5 star, no other hotel on the beach offers what the Pasea Hotel can.  Shopping, great restaurants all attached to Pacific City, and everything you need on site, too.   Luxury Appointments/staff: Impressive from the valet, lovely front desk team, beautiful guest rooms with plush carpeting, high-end appointments.  The other hotels in the area must be envious of this hotel.   The hotel vibe is more of a lifestyle versus the generic big hotel box as the neighboring Hilton and Hyatt - why stay there?  Josh and the front office team provide such a welcoming and friendly energy.   Chuck the bell captain is an industry icon, great stories and great service.
Manager Response: Dear LADouglas,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're delighted that you had such a great experience at our resort, enjoying our unbeatable location, the spectacular views from our guest rooms, and our cool California coastal vibe. We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to specifically point out a few of our amazing associates.  We're hoping that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I specifically chose this resort as it is one of my favorite places in OC. I grew up in Newport - and the beachy vibe and incredible customer service at the Pasea is unmatched.  I know that my 340 guests attending the event and then staying at the resort will have an incredible time. I highly recommend staying here when visiting the OC - it has a charm and boutique first class style to it.  The employees are amazing: Josh Gitsham, Christine D., Alexa P, - the list is long. You are greeted with a smile and kindness immediately.  Love this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear martin6002018,  We're thrilled to hear that Joshua, Christine and Alexa delivered the personal service that the Pasea Hotel & Spa is known for!  They are prime examples of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  Thank you for staying with us and posting this review.....we'll look forward to your next trip to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We stayed here during our first visit to California - this hotel is stunning and very clean!   Everyone was polite and very accommodating!   There are lots of shops/restaurants within walking distance. The cart to the beach was fun even though the beach is just across the street!  Tanners Pub (upstairs) is a great place for a cocktail (or two :-) and a conversation around the
Manager Response: Dear 757Cole,  Wow!  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: My wife and I came here for a maternity and baby photo prop trade show and were extremely impressed with everyone who worked here. Mark in the Cafe was super cool to us and everyone in Tanners restaurant couldn't have been more genuinely kind and considerate to us. Every one at the hotel was so happy and positive. They must be happy because they are paid well? Haha. Anyway, Joshua at the front desk helped me with a quick valet issue and was so friendly that I knew I had to do something to give alittle back, and give everyone there a quick 5 star review on here. My wife and I will definitely be back here in the future for vacation. Not to mention how gorgeous the place is!
Manager Response: Dear Trey M,  We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to sing the praises of our hotel and our staff while specifically noting the efforts of Mark and Joshua.  We love to hear that you and your wife had a fantastic stay with us and we hope to see you back with us again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I give this hotel an excellent review for the customer service and the amenities including the pool and spa. It was a little more pricey than what I would normally pay but this hotel was worth it! I came here for a family wedding/vacation.
Manager Response: Dear MS80s,  It was such a privilege to host your family's wedding and we sincerely thank you for spending this very special occasion with us.  You have noted the efforts of our truly special staff and for this we thank you.  It's great to hear that you had an amazing stay and we hope to see you back with us again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Perfect mix of relaxation and fun!
Summary: We stayed here for a night while in town visiting friends. They are pet friendly, which is great and they are close to dog beach. Service was awesome, especially the bell staff Katin, (I think) was incredibly helpful and patient. Lively pool with good drinks, great views from the room, and easily walkable to Pacific City and Main Street.
Manager Response: Dear wshannon w,  Thank you for this great review and for noting many highlights of your stay.  As someone that works at a fantastic resort, we thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of Kalin.  He is a prime example of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Huntington Beach area.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: This is the 2nd stay at the Pasea and didn’t disappoint.  A great location with so many things close by!  We love that they provide what you need for a day at the beach without having to lug it all with you from home.
Manager Response: Dear bakstephens,  Wow!  We love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: This is a great hotel with great service. The staff are very friendly and go out of their way to assist guests. Rooms are excellent, new and very clean. Right across the street from the beach and with great views. Will definitely be back
Manager Response: Dear Arog14,  We love this review!!!!!!!!!  It was an honor to host you and we are thrilled to hear that our staff delivered another amazing experience.  Thank you for posting this review and sharing it with the TripAdvisor community.  We will be eagerly awaiting your next stay.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Great hotel, location, service,,,but the noise
Summary: Newer hotel, in excellent location and next to a new shopping area.  Makes it nice for close by restaurants too!  And a short wall to Main Street and the pier. We were warned checking in that the noise level is high on weekend, as the bar cranks up music that seems to run till 3 in the morning.  Each Friday and Saturday night, the latter night is louder.  Our room was ocean corner facing to the pool with wrap around balcony.  Needless to say little sleep those nights! Staff was very helpful, but the check out at 4 in the morning.  The lady did not bother to ask how our stay was and had no personality.  Terrible service for checkout.
Manager Response: Dear Philip M,  We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Escaping from LA is something my husband and I love to do. We weren’t sure whether 1 night here would be enough to rest, recoup and recharge us... but it was! The food was great, the room design was modern & beachy, and the nearby area (beach, shopping & dining) was great. Only notes of contention were (1) the rooftop bar at Tanners serving extremely watered down drinks, (2) the few employees we interacted with were either not friendly or clearly forcing a smile, and (3) being denied a king-bed ocean view room despite booking one (we received a 2 queen ocean view, so we opted not to complain). All in all a pleasant experience despite some kinks. We would consider returning.
Manager Response: Dear Blake C,  We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: A very enjoyable stay,all was perfect. I loved the hotel so much, I’m thinking of moving to the area. Can’t wait to return. Brunch and dinner at Tanners restaurant was absolutely delicious, and the spa was first class
Manager Response: Dear rdkashan,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit. Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Awsome hotel, great location, personal touches.
Summary: Beautiful pool, location, manager Joshua really took care of us.  I highly recommend the hotel.  The room was clean and great ocean view.  The food at the pool was delicious and the vibe was just right.  Order the quesadilla :)
Manager Response: Dear Cami M,  We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  We thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of Joshua.  He is a prime example of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Huntington Beach area.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Hotel is new and gorgeous, in a great location and the staff seems genuinely happy to be there.  The exception would probably be Tanner's, where some of the management and hosts were snooty and preferred to talk in groups rather than help guests.  Service at the pool (provided by Tanner's) was very slow.  One girl was working on Thursday and I was there for FOUR hours and never looked in my direction, let alone stopped to ask if I needed anything. Pool service was very slow on Friday as well - same girl was working.  Took 45 minutes to get ONE drink and she actually brought  the check before the drinks!!  Front desk staff was awesome - great leadership by Josh.
Manager Response: Dear 224AnneC224,  We're thrilled to hear that Josh delivered the personal service that the Pasea Hotel & Spa is known for!  Thank you for giving us the highest rating possible and for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests at Tanner's and our Ninth Island Pool. We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Everyone at the hotel was so friendly and helpful. The rooms are a good size, and we had a nice ocean view. Cute little touches throughout the hotel like the flip flop art in the lobby. Fitness center is pretty well appointed, and the pool/hot tub area overlooks the ocean. We were able to borrow bikes to cruise along the beach and there are plenty of food options next door at Pacific City.
Manager Response: Dear Freya H,  Thank you for posting this review and for sharing your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  We believe that we have the best staff in the area that deliver a personalized service for each of our guests and we're happy to hear that you agree.  We hope that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Ok, so the room was great and the employees were friendly but this is not a romantic hotel as advertised. We were right above the pool and the music didn't stop from Thursday through Saturday. The hotel was completely booked so we couldn't move. Saturday was one of our last night's so of course the 21 year old party ends up next to us. Nothing was done about it so of course we didn't sleep. I've been 21 before but these young girls were yelling pointless nonsense at 8 AM so that then ruined our morning. The valet is great and the place looks amazing but don't make it a romantic getaway.
Manager Response: Dear Paul Anthony H,  We apologize that this hotel wasn't a fit for you on your trip for a romantic getaway.  While we do our best to get guests to an area of the hotel that will be best suited to them, we have many families and visitors which we offer a quiet and comfortable experience to and we are committed to keeping that promise.  At your earliest convenience, please contact our Front Office Manager, Joshua Gitsham so that he may get further details and resolve this to your satisfaction.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: This hotel was beautifully decorated, and a very relaxing atmosphere.  The views are just spectacular.  Check In and Out was one of the easiest I have experienced.  The Service Staff was always friendly and willing to help.  Can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: Dear crea2018,  It's fantastic to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we sincerely thank you for taking time out of your day to post this review.  We will be eagerly awaiting your next stay.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Modern hotel that feels like a RESORT with the beach, dining & shops all walking distance!!!
Summary: My husband was here for a work event from 4/24/18-4/26/18. I was lucky to be able to tag along with him. This would be a "staycation" for me as I live about 30 minutes away from Huntington Beach. There's only valet parking for $40. The hotel is located right across the street from the beach! It can't get any better than that! Our room was a king sized bed with a partial ocean view, but basically the view is stunning even though it's technically considered "partial". Our room was clean. My only complaint would be when the sliding glass doors are open, you hear the noise from next door at the restaurants and Pacific City.  Another great perk is that this hotel is adjacent to an outdoor dining and shopping mall, Pacific City! It was so convenient for me to walk across the way to
Manager Response: Dear OC_Cali_Gal,  We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: First time staying here. Was quite impressed. Loved the jacuzzi and pool area. Staff is friendly and helpful. Bedding comfortable. Clean all through the hotel. Restaurants in hotel and walking distance to Pacific City. Will return.
Manager Response: Dear ellendeette14,  Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We are a middle class family and we took a TWO DAY vacation, one of the days we stayed at this hotel(we didn't know much so we gave everything we could a try)... We regreted just staying for ONE day. The staff is unreal! So attentive. Everybody! Breakfast was awesome, front desk people were absolutely knowledgable and willing to help.  SPA was incredible. We had spent one full day at Disneyland and my back was killing me, my massage was unveliebable and It made the rest of my way back home 100 times better.  Room service was attentive too and food was really good (after disney I was starving).  Bed was SO comfortable and even though we didn't have a straigh view to the ocean (we thought we would be bummed because of some reviews) man, this view and the hotel and everything was
Manager Response: Dear juligesualdoc,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're delighted that you had such a great experience at our resort, enjoying our unbeatable location, the spectacular views from our guest rooms, and our cool California coastal vibe. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Pasea for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: The perfect hotel for a trip to Huntington Beach, Surf City USA!
Summary: Pasea Hotel is in the heart of Huntington Beach, adjacent to Pacific City where you will find trending restaurants and bars. With the ocean view and ocean front rooms, modern beach decor, and excellent service this is the perfect getaway.  Being a self-confessed hotel snob, I enjoyed the spacious accommodations and amenities. We spent one afternoon at the hotel enjoying the views from the pool and rooftop bar. Having been to the Pasea hotel several times, this trip we enjoyed the ocean front suite. Take a soak in the tub, chill on the couch or relax on one of two balconies... it's a vacation to remember.  As seen in the photo, the guitar is part of the amenities when booking this room. Many places around the entire hotel to sit and enjoy the atmosphere.
Manager Response: Dear wknipp,  Thank you for this great review and for noting many highlights of your stay.  We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community. We believe our amazing staff and the service they deliver are the difference between the Paséa Hotel & Spa and the many other hotels in the area.  We are thrilled to hear that you agree and we look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Huntington Beach area.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: This Place is amazing . The location is perfect , right in the heart of Surf City . You are in walking distance to all kinds of restraints and Pubs . All kinds of stores for shopping , located directly accross from boardwalk . The Hotel , rooms restaurant ,and the staff were tops . Friendly courteous and very professional . You will not be disappointed !
Manager Response: Dear 598armadillo,  We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Paying for location, not much else!
Summary: I’ll review in chronological order-   Valet: Swarmed before I even unlocked my doors, and I mean that in a bad way.  Felt very rushed.  Nobody except the gentleman apparently in charge looked me in the eye asking to assist.  A few days later, they were the opposite- very clingy, very used car salesman-like, as if they were just begging to be tipped.  Front Desk & Concierge: Very professional and extremely personable 99% of the time- felt like they were genuine in their expression to help as well as to interact with kids.  But, the 1% when they weren’t top-notch, it was a doozy.  Upon asking about the hotel’s policy on daily vacuuming, I was both puzzled and perturbed.  The gentleman explained that the hotel only vacuums and does additional house cleaning for when a room is
Manager Response: Dear Edward D,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience on your recent stay with us.  We typically deliver a great experience across the board for our guests and we sincerely apologize that this was not the case during your visit.  We absolutely regret the missed opportunities and would like the opportunity to get more details and resolve this to your satisfaction. Please contact our Front Office Manager, Joshua Gitsham at jgitsham@paseahotel.com at your earliest convenience.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I spent 3 nights at his beautiful hotel for a sales meeting. I enjoyed every night. The entire hotel has a chic beach decor. I did find it stange that they only provided one piece of soap, a separate siso for sink to wash hands would have been nice. I also found the light controls confussing.
Manager Response: Dear Matthew B,  We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The place to stay in Huntington Beach! Best views, service and beach vibe. Restaurants amazing and right next to Pacific Center Shopping. Just say yes and stay there! love all the Beach touches right down to the surf board electronic room key👍
Manager Response: Dear dme39859,  Thank you for this great review and for noting many highlights of your stay.  We look forward to your next trip to Huntington Beach so that we may host you once again!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We had an amazing experience at this hotel. I absolutely loved our room and the service provided. The only thing I would complain about is check in time is late. We started driving at 4am and got to the hotel at 2pm, our room was not ready so we had to wait about an hour. Other then that, everything was absolutely beautiful and we will defiantly go back.
Manager Response: Dear mm0tt,  We are honored to receive a perfect review in regard to your most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Beautiful new hotel right on PCH and a few blocks from Huntington Pier.   Everything is clean and modern, and they offer all the amenities needed - nice spa, gym, beautiful pool area (with a kid pool and hot tub) and free bikes (although they are a bit heavy). They offer on-site parking, but we opted to park a few blocks away to save some $$.    We had an ocean front room, 2 beds for our family of four.  The room was a decent size - and the balcony was great to sit out at night, overlooking the ocean, while kids went to sleep.   The staff were all friendly and welcoming.   There is an on-site restaurant, but wasn’t great (menu is a bit off in my opinion).   The hotel is right next to an outdoor mall with nice stores and restaurants- so all you need is right at your fingertips.
Manager Response: Dear karagoski,  We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The hotel is absolutely spotless the location is fantastic for the beach and visiting the area, the roof top bar has great views and a lovely place to watch the sunset. The rooms a large and have everything sound need for a holiday. There are lots of options for food within walking distance to the hotel. The pool area is clean and when we were there had plenty of sun beds. The downside is the parking and resort tax costs, make sure you budget for the costs. I would recommend staying and I would return if ever I go back to the area.
Manager Response: Dear Jeff B,  We can't express how much this review means to us.  We thank you for publishing your experience and sharing some great things about our hotel.  We hope to see you again in the near future!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Made me feel like a VIP
Summary: This hotel has nailed customer service!   I have been in hospitality industry my whole life  and Pasea is one of the best hotels all around!  It all started with the Front office manager Joshua who greeted us at the pool side cabana that we rented for the day.  He greeted us and showed a genuine interest on why we were there and really made us feel like a VIP.  He came back 2 more times to check in on us to ensure we were doing well.   He gave us his card and told us if we needed anything at all to please contact him directly and he would take care of us.  We had great service at the pool by our server Alexa, who constantly checked in on us and was always smiling.   On our way out there were three people at the front desk and they all smiled at us and asked how our day was.  A
Manager Response: Dear ilovepeanuts669,  As someone that works at a fantastic resort, we thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of Joshua, Alexa and Peter!  They are prime examples of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  We can't thank you enough for sharing this detailed review and for sharing this with the TripAdvisor community.  We'll be here eagerly awaiting your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: A friend and I wanted to get away for a "girls' weekend", and the Pasea did not disappoint.  It's a new hotel, with modern and kitschy design & furniture, and looked awesome.  The service at the front desk and concierge (especially the very helpful guy who helped us borrow the bikes) was fantastic, top to bottom.  Our room was very spacious with two queens, and we had an ocean view with a great balcony.  The bathroom was very nice and had a toilet with a door, which is great for sharing.  We enjoyed the ocean-view pool & hot tub.  And we LOVED the rooftop bar.  From about 5-7, they had live acoustic guitar music, which I really enjoyed.  And their drinks were absolutely divine.  The customer service was excellent, too -- I had a problem with my sandwich, and the manager came out
Manager Response: Dear JarJar319,  Yes!!!!!!  Your experience was exactly what we strive to deliver for all of our guests and it means the world to us that you shared this with the TripAdvisor audience.  We can't wait until your next stay so that we may exceed your expectations once again!!!!!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Visited for business in January and brought the family back for a few days last week. Great resort at a great location on Huntington Beach. We enjoyed the beach, the pool and the “treehouse”. Rented surfboards and bikes right in front of the resort. My teenage daughters were thrilled with the mall right next door which also provided some great dining options for our stay. We will be visiting again!
Manager Response: Dear Jeffrey T,  Your words are music to our ears!   It was an honor to host your family and we are thrilled to hear that you all had a great time. Thank you for giving us such a great review and for promising to come back and stay with us again!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I’ve stayed here for work and pleasure multiple times over the last year. Great hotel, great staff and great location. They have everything you need for the beach as well. Grab a bike and ride the boardwalk to NPB.
Manager Response: Dear Peter W,  Yes!!!!!!  Your experience was exactly what we strive to deliver for all of our guests and it means the world to us that you shared this with the TripAdvisor audience.  We can't wait until your next stay so that we may exceed your expectations once again!!!!!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We just finished 7 days at the Hotel Pasea. It’s right next door to Pacific City with a lot of shops. We ate a couple of times at a Mexican restaurant and had the Nachos and tacos. They were great. We had Coffee a couple of times at Philz Coffee and it was ok if you like the hand pour thing. We upgraded to the beach view which was probably not worth it just because there’s a huge road, The Pacifc Coast Highway, between you and the beach so it’s really loud! Plus the Tanners Bar pumps the tunes pretty late into the night so the extra 50 bucks a night isn’t worth it. We have stayed ON the beach in Florida and that’s awesome. This is not that. However, the experience is very Southwen California. Next time we might stay here for a couple of days and then move down to Laguna or
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Great location, very nice rooms and the valet service is excellent , especially Ryan B. Thanks, we’ll come back for sure !☀️ Huntington Beach is fantastic. Breakfast before surf at Main street is just so nice. Didn’t try hotel restaurant . Pool area is very nice.  .
Manager Response: Dear Maria C,  We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  It's great to hear that Ryan yet again delivered the highest level of service to you.  We hope your travels bring you back our way in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I am a group travel agent that works with hotels all over the world and was truly blown away by the Pasea Hotel and Spa. There are very few hotels that get a trip 100% right, but the Pasea Hotel and Spa did.  The rooms, lobby, pool, restaurant, location to the beach, shopping and dining was perfect.  I cannot say enough about the staff and their attention to detail. They were flexible, pleasant and willing to accommodate any request to perfection.  A special shout out to Front Desk Manager Joshua Gitsham, Group Coordinator Viviana Cerda, Event Coordinator Kara Ison, Sales Manager Olivia Novak, the Concierge Staff, the Bellman and the Front Desk Staff.   If you are thinking about a nice getaway with the spouse or family, this is a perfect destination. Excellent for business
Manager Response: Dear Group-Travel-Advisor,  Thank you for posting this review and for giving us such a high rating.  We believe that we have the best staff in the area that deliver a personalized service for each of our guests and we're happy to hear that you agree.  We hope that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Pasea Hotel in HB is one of my wife and I’s favorite hotels.  The staff are great and very accommodating.  We visited for our 20th wedding anniversary after staying the year prior when it first opened in 2016.    The hotel always smells great and is impeccably clean.  Pasea is very well situated being connected to Pacific City and directly across the street from the beach.  Good ocean views and well appointed rooms.  Pool side service is great along with Tanner’s.  Pasea is definitely on our annual trip list.
Manager Response: Dear cfoster34,  We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to sing the praises of our hotel and our staff.  We love to hear that you and your wife had a fantastic stay with us and we hope to see you back with us again very soon.  Happy Anniversary!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: This is a party hotel. If that’s your jam, then stay here. Partial ocean view is a joke, but I did have a perfect view of the roof below and the a/c units. Don’t think that paying extra for a higher floor guarantees you a good view. Request a room facing west (over the pool) if you want to see the sunset. Cafe is cute. Brunch on the patio was nice. Tanners was super crowded with bachelorette parties. Massage was good, but spa was subpar. It’s a locker room with a hot tub. Also, there was no esthetician on duty the whole weekend, so that was super lame for a place that touts having an excellent spa. All the good chairs and cabanas at the pool were reserved, so reserve them ahead of time. Actually make reservations for everything if you want to be assured to have access to
Manager Response: Dear SVgirl83,  We offer a sincere apology for the multiple challenges you incurred during your most recent stay with us.  Your feedback is vital for us to measure our performance and improve the experience for our guests.  You can be rest assured that your comments will not fall on deaf ears and improvements will be made.  It is our hope that we have the opportunity to host you once again on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We typically have our regional conference in Huntington Beach and this is the first year at the Pasea Hotel and Spa. I was blown away by the friendly staff, cleanliness of the hotel and convenience to shopping and dining in Pacific City which was steps away from the hotel. I highly recommend this hotel for business or pleasure.
Manager Response: Dear slancaster2018,  We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The Pasea Hotel and Spa is a wonderful place for a business trip or family get away.  Located right across from the beach so it has great access to the beach and other restaurants and clubs in the area.
Manager Response: Dear James R,  Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Huntington Beach is a great destination. The Pasea is a wonderful hotel. friendly staff. Great hot tub. Location is fabulous. Across the street from the beach, next door to fine shopping. Sweet coffee shop on lobby level with fabulous service. The ocean view rooms were a stretch. I paid for an upgrade, and didn't feel quite upgraded. But that was the only hiccup. Valet guys were great. Super speedy. Parking was pricey.
Manager Response: Dear chanalew,  Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Pasea Hotel & Spa.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: One of nicest hotels I have been to! It had everything anyone would want from a coffee shop downstairs to a heated pool to a list of fabulous eateries to shopping through the hallway to enjoying the beautiful HB! This place will impress the deserving! Definitely will be back again!
Manager Response: Dear Cvancity,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: My daughter and I really enjoyed the stay, the room was fairlyclean, the hotel itself was clean. Except for a gross stain on the sheet, I slept on a towel over the stain, then the next day asked the housekeeper to change that sheet, and she did. Valet was very efficient. We had room service one morning and enjoyed it, 23% gratuity added...I said to the room service waiter " I see the gratuity is included" and she started to tell me how the hotel get 30% and the wait staff gets to split the rest, it was too much information, and frankly not my problem how the gratuity is divided.  It was a poor attempt for me to leave more cash, and the breakfast with tip was $90. Two omelets, toast ,coffee ,sliced banana, oj and a pot of coffee, yikes. The only down side is that the restaurant
Manager Response: Dear ribso,  We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Welcoming, professional and friendly staff, super amenities including top notch spa and fitness center, dreamy , comfortable and well planned rooms all across from the beach and adjacent to a new shopping dining plaza! Relaxing getaway and great experience.
Manager Response: Dear gretagirl9,  Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Have stayed here before and had a positive experience came back less than a month later and my husband and I were very disappointed. We checked in and were just dropping off our bags as we were running late to meet friends so we did not notice that the room was not adequately cleaned. The bed sheets seemed dingy and as they had not been changed  there also was a large stain on the floor next to the bed. Then when walking out onto the balcony to enjoy the view we upgraded to the railings and patio set were very dirty. All in all  very disappointed in the experience.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact me at jleinacker@paseahotel.com.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: There were two days where the room service did not service our room. The first day, we returned to our room at 4 pm and the room was not serviced. We needed to get ready for our evening engagement so we told the staff it would be ok to give us a few towels and we will be fine. The next day, the same thing. We arrive at our room, and it was not serviced. I proactively asked the staff if they wanted to clean it then, or they can return at 4:45 when we would be finished getting ready. The THREE people I spoke to said ok, they will return. When we returned to our room at 10 pm the room was still not serviced. We had a pile of towels on the floor and needed shampoo, conditioner, cups, and water. For the amount of money spent at your hotel, I was very frustrated. We usually stay at
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience on your recent stay with us.  We absolutely regret the missed opportunities and housekeeping errors made and would like the opportunity to get more details and resolve this to your satisfaction.  Please contact me at jleinacker@paseahotel.com at your earliest convenience.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The rooms are spacious with great views, a relaxing pool. The atmosphere was luxury without the attitude. Staff was really great, especially Matthew on the bell team. The hosted some amazing events for a conference i was attending.
Manager Response: Dear Jessica L,  We're thrilled to hear that Matthew delivered the personal service that the Pasea Hotel & Spa is known for!  Thank you for staying with us and posting this review.....we'll look forward to your next trip to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Wonderful and beautifully decorated, nice amenities, quiet but close to everything, the staff is super - check in and out so easy, amazing spa, top notch food and wine....could not have asked for better!
Manager Response: Dear Win707,  Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Happy Anniversary!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: The room view was beautiful. I was able to see the ocean and feel the breeze. I would definitely book at this hotel for even just a stay vacation. The rooms are very well kept and the key feature for me was the shower view in to the room area. :) The valet parking was nice and easy and the Captain, I believe his name was Andres was very helpful in getting my car in and out very quickly.
Manager Response: Dear mvigil2018,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're delighted that you had such a great experience at our resort, enjoying our unbeatable location, the spectacular views from our guest rooms, and our cool California coastal vibe. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Pasea for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Stayed at the Pasea for a Sales Conference, the entire staff was very nice and friendly, especially the Valet Captain Andres Lopez. The room was wonderful with a great view. Easy access to shopping and restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear razanskas,  Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about how fantastic Andres is!  We enjoyed having you here and hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Fun and close to all the action. Great location, The room was very clean and tidy. This hotel is pretty new, so things are in tip top shape. The staff is what really sets this hotel apart from others. They went out of their way to make sure we were happy.
Manager Response: Dear Patrick H,  Thank you for this great review and for noting many highlights of your stay.  We agree that our associates are part of what separates us from other hotels in the area and we thank you for singing their praises.  We hope that you come back to see us again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We had an excellent stay at the Pasea Hotel & Spa. We visited Huntington Beach for the first time and to celebrate our Honeymoon. We were pleasantly greeted, and the staff were always helpful, whether it was providing us with suggestions for where to eat, what to do, and allowing us access to our room before the provided check in time, as well as enabling us to check out an hour after, therefore not having to sit in airports any longer than necessary! I realize, that this is likely only possible when the hotel is not at full capacity, but either way it was much appreciated. The location of the hotel is impeccable, right next door to Pacific City - shopping, restaurants, and nightlife, and within comfortable walking distance to Main Street & HB Pier. Yes, the Pacific Coast Hwy
Manager Response: Dear cdndutchgirl,  Wow!  We love this review and we're delighted to hear you had such a good time for your honeymoon.   We thank you for publishing your experience and sharing some great things about our hotel.  We greatly appreciate the kind words about the service our staff delivered and we hope to see you again on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Had a three day stopover in LA and needed to relax, and the Pasea hit the mark. A little expensive, but you get what you pay for and I no worries about service. Really well located for restaurants and bars, and an excellent little gym to work off the pounds.
Manager Response: Dear TobTobTob,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're delighted that you had such a great experience at our resort, enjoying our unbeatable location, the spectacular views from our guest rooms, and our cool California coastal vibe. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Pasea for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: A new, modern hotel at the Beach
Summary: This is a relatively new hotel located on PCH across from the sand.  It is about a 3 block walk to the Huntington Beach Pier.  There are adjacent shops and restaurants of all varieties nearby.  I came for a meeting over the weekend and the accommodations were entirely adequate.  The hotel is located about 15-20 minutes from the Santa Ana John Wayne airport.
Manager Response: Dear Jack F,  Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Pasea Hotel & Spa.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Paséa went all out to make sure our room was covered in roses after we returned from getting engaged. They even upgraded us to a suite! Seriously the best weekend I could have ever imagined. Thank you so much again!!
Manager Response: Dear themaretsky,  Your review was a great gift for us.  We are always delighted to hear stories about our wonderful staff creating lasting memories for our guests.  We thank you for this and hope you return to the Pasea Hotel & Spa soon.  Congratulations on your engagement!    Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Direct Access to the beach, beautiful Pool area with Great Service, beautiful Roms with amazing view!!We loved everything about it except the valet parking for 35$/night as only Option. Try the breakfast at Tanner‘s!
Manager Response: Dear carolinsoulek,  We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Absolutely love this hotel! My husband and I came to check out the area and were absolutely blown away by the friendliness of the staff, BEAUTIFUL and modern rooms, warm and inviting atmosphere, and amazing views of Huntington Beach.   Waking distance to everything, beautiful spa on site, restaurant, coffee shop- you will never want to leave.   We loved this property so much we extended our stay!! We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Dear ChipperNTravel,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're delighted that you had such a great experience at our resort, enjoying our unbeatable location, the spectacular views from our guest rooms, and our cool California coastal vibe. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Pasea for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Recently stayed at Pasea for the first time. Located directly across the street from the Huntington Beach and walking distance to the pier and several shops and restaurants.   Hotel is comfortable, not overly extravagant.  Rooms are nicely appointed but seemed noisy (front side of hotel) from traffic and loud music from the pool. Called down to desk at 2:30 to ask if they could shut it off and they were very pleasant and did so.  Beds were comfortable but pillows were not.  Nice touch with the bottle of wine and Pasea flip flops that are included with the resort fee.   Neat coffee shop off of lobby.  Dinner in hotel restaurant was excellent.
Manager Response: Dear Michael B,  Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Pasea Hotel & Spa.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us. Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Excellent accommodations. Don't miss out on the shopping and restaurants next store - a bit of a hidden gem. Also the bikes are on property and at no additional charge to guests. a great location! would stay again!
Manager Response: Dear alanaE5291SE,  It is very rewarding to receive such a highly rated review from you based on your recent stay.  Thank you from the entire staff!  Please come back and see us very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Had a conference in Anaheim and decided to come a day early and stay in Huntington Beach...Stayed in February and it was great!! Room was nice, Staff was great and the location and views were awesome!!
Manager Response: Dear edreib921747,  We love this review!!!!!!!!!  It was an honor to host you and we are thrilled to hear that our staff delivered another amazing experience.  Your recommendation is incredible and we thank you!  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Loved the hotel, great service, great decor, but lots of fees
Summary: This is a really great hotel.  We like staying at really nice hotels via hotwire even though we aren't the typical clientele.  This was one of our favorites.  Some high end hotels think high end service is to look down at people not in a luxury car, but everyone at this hotel was just really laid back and friendly, but service oriented.  Attentive but not presumptuous.    The decor is really cool, the restaurant was very good, nice pool area with a lot of seating options.  We were on a family trip and our kids really liked it.  Look forward to returning without kids as well.  Nice views of the beach from our room and balcony.    We were caught a bit off guard with over $60 in fees ($35 for parking, $30 for resort fees).  But they do at least give you some cool stuff for the
Manager Response: Dear zracoon,  Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Paséa Hotel & Spa.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We just went for a Staycation. It ended up being such a great time with friends. Being so close to Pacific City mall and all the resturants and bars on top of Tanners is just the perfect location, something for everyone. We love it here. Wish it was a little cheaper for the rooms but it does not keep us from going, LOL. We can't wait to go back!!
Manager Response: Dear julieannnicholson,  We are honored to receive a perfect review in regard to your most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: We decided to celebrate our 25th anniversary at wnat we thought would be a romantic ocean view room. We were disappointed when we got to our room and saw that the room is as tiny as a cruise ship room and there is no ocean view until we got to the balcony and saw a little bit of ocean in the corner of the balcony. We thought there was a mistake and we were given a partial ocean view ( even though no view could be seen from the room itself). Front desk informed us that they define ocean view as the view from the balcony and it is not considered partial view because we are on the 4th floor and they consider that full ocean view. Okay, I guess we should have read some contract somewhere for their definitions of ocean view. They claimed that they were fully sold out so they could
Manager Response: Dear puravida822,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience with us and on behalf of the entire staff, we apologize that it was not a positive visit.  Your comments are important to us because they allow our team to grow to become the preferred hotel for our customers.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly.  We invite you to give us another try to regain your trust in our hotel. Please feel free to contact Chris Kielb, our Director of Guest Experience at ckielb@paseahotel.com to discuss this visit or a future visit with us.   Sincerely,   Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Light and modern ambience with great views
Summary: Of all the four PCH located hotels in Huntington Beach, the Pasea is the newest with the most fresh and modern feel.  Rooms are spacious and airy-- well appointed with complimentary flip flops for your beach stroll, bottle of wine and Fresh body products.  Ask for a room on the quiet side of the hotel looking south on PCH-- there is a club close by and rooms facing north will struggle to fall asleep with the pounding sounds of music going until 2 am.
Manager Response: Dear slfong123,  We are grateful for such a detailed review noting some of the many positives about being a guest at the Pasea Hotel & Spa.  We promise to work hard so that we earn 5 stars on your next stay!   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: from the time I arrived I felt right at home. The beds are comfortable everything is brand new and modern. The internet is the best I have ever used. I would definitely stay here again, just minutes walk away from the beach!!
Manager Response: Dear D1826BCjames,  We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Huntington Beach so that we may host you once again.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: I visited the Aarna spa last month and had a wonderful experience.  The hotel itself is in a beautiful location with a picturesque view of the ocean.  Hotel staff was warm and welcoming, especially when we entered the spa.  The staff at the spa desk were very cordial and helpful, and assisted me with retrieving my bag from the car / valet.    The spa is exquisitely decorated in a Bali-type décor.  The quiet rooms have the most comfortable lounge beds with comfy blankets to use while you wait for your massage.    I highly recommend the ESPA massage .  There were numerous essential oils to choose from and the massage was tailored to my needs.  My therapist was Masayo and it was one of the best massages I've ever had.  I'm looking forward to returning to the Aarna Spa in the near
Manager Response: Dear Brenda C,  Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about what a wonderful job Masayo does.  We're fortunate to have her here as one of our team members.  We hope that you come back to see us again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: the view is phenomenal.  the personnel was very courteous and welcoming,  each and every one of them made me feel very welcomed and at ease.  I would absolutely stay  here again.  thank you all very much for the hospitality.
Manager Response: Dear asanchez910,  Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you  again on your next visit to Huntington Beach.   Warmest Regards,  Joe Leinacker General Manager Paséa Hotel & Spa

Summary: Upon arriving at the hotel and checking into our room, we opened the balcony door to see our view and saw a used condom on the floor in between the balcony door and the hotel room.  We were shocked and disgusted and have never experienced something like this, in the US or abroad.  We called the front desk and notified them of the used condom to which the woman stated someone would come to the room to clean it and we would be upgraded to a new room.  After waiting some time, no one came to the room so we went back down to the lobby and notified the front desk, again, of the used condom in the room.  We were given a new room, which was the same style room as we reserved, not upgraded.  The new room was not clean either and had foreign hairs in the bathroom.  We were only staying
