Summary Heading: Biggest problem with this hotel is that it is separated from the beach by the noisy Pacific Coast Highway
Summary: I candidly was underwhelmed by this new hotel. Oceanfront rooms have a lovely view, but it's noisy  if you open the window , especially during rush hours (7-9:30 am  and 3 pm until 9 pm!)  I tried to get a higher floor, but was told the desk had no authority to change rooms (although they had changed my room from a king to a less desirable 2- bed  room , so I could occupy it before 4 pm. The outside patios were nice for events though. Staff needs more training. I prefer hotels in Laguna for a stay.
Manager Response: Dear sfmaria101,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Pasea Hotel & Spa. While we are pleased that you appreciated the lovely oceanfront views, as well as our outdoor patios, we regret that your stay with us did not meet your expectations. We do hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future for a stay that truly overwhelms you.   Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: I stayed for only a night at the Pasea for work.  I arrived early - about 11:00 am - but they already had a room available for me.  I had called a few days earlier to let them know that my flight would be arriving that morning, and it would be great if I could get into a room.    The room was very nice and modern.  A wall panel controlled the lights.  There was a nice TV.  There was a complementary bottle of wine, 2 bottles of water, and flip flops.  There was a great chaise lounge, and a very bright bathroom.  My balcony was nice and big, but had a view of the construction across the street.    I went to the pool, which was great and overlooked the PCH and the beach.  The only negative here was that I didn't get any service at the pool.  It seemed like there was someone taking
Manager Response: Dear TexasBlum,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Pasea Hotel & Spa while in Southern California on business. We're so pleased that you enjoyed the comfort of your luxurious guest room, along with the cuisine served during your meeting. Thank you for the excellent rating you have awarded us. We hope to welcome you back to Pasea soon for another great experience.   Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Beautiful and new hotel right on the beach!
Summary: In town for business and stayed at the Pasea.  The views are fantastic and the location is perfect.  Walking distance to downtown which is filled with excellent restaurants and bars!  I love the see through shower.  The pool area overlooks the beach and I've spent my free time moving between the pool and the beach!  Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: If I could, I would give Pasea 6 stars for service, cleanliness and experience. We got married here over Labor Day weekend and over two dozens of our guests flew in from across the country to stay at Pasea to attend our wedding. All of our guests who stayed at the hotel, all of our wedding guests and all of our vendors who were working on-site day-of have nothing but great things to say about Pasea. We were so lucky to get married here, and we would like to thank the exceptional staff at Pasea, from the valet parking attendants, front desk, room service, in-room dining, banquet staff, set-up crew, clean-up crew and everyone who helped create our special day. Special shout outs to our hard-working, venue coordinator Miya Williams, Alex from Banquet, Chef Kevin, and David, Mathew
Manager Response: Dear bliudolfin,  Congratulations and thank you for choosing to celebrate your wedding at Pasea Hotel & Spa. It was an absolute joy to assist you in this most significant of occasions and we are thrilled that you had such a spectacular experience here. We truly appreciate you taking the time to share such a detailed review for our future guests to read, highlighting the exemplary service provided by our staff, our savory cuisine, and our breath-taking wedding venues. We will be sure to share your comments with our entire team, making special note to share your review with the team members you mentioned by name. We are truly delighted that you and all of your guests had such a marvelous time at our resort. Thank you for the excellent rating you have awarded us. We look forward to welcoming you back to Pasea soon for another magnificent stay.   Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Some bright spots but need to work out some kinks
Summary: PROS 1. Large bright airy room 2. Fresh brand bathroom toiletries 3. Heavenly beds 4. As a brand new hotel (~2 mos old) everything was spotless  5. Great location with ocean views near a multitude of shops, bars, and restaurants  WHAT NEEDS IMPROVEMENT 1. Water replenishment everyday as part of resort fee had to be requested. Not automatic. At one point during my stay they told me they ran out of water bottles. 2. Spotty service at bkfast on my 2nd day with more customers. Waited forever for coffee. Then another forever for milk for my coffee. Had to request for glass of water twice. It was a service meltdown. From other tables I saw customers grumbling and waiting forever for their orders. Servers were serving the wrong orders to wrong customers. My check arrives but waiter did
Manager Response: Dear worldtraveler43Usa,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're so pleased that you enjoyed the luxury of our guest rooms, as well as our fabulous oceanfront location, and the exemplary service provided by our porter. We appreciate all of your feedback and have shared your comments with the appropriate management teams to be used in the continual training of our staff members. We strive to provide our guests with extraordinary resort experiences and hope to welcome you back to Pasea soon for a stay that surpasses your expectations.   Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: Everything about this place is amazing from the champagne reception to the rooftop bar. Plenty of places to eat within walking distance. Great view of HB and lovely sunsets. Welcome home to my fav beach town. You've been dearly missed.
Manager Response: Dear Donna G,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're so glad you had an amazing time at our new resort, enjoying our fabulous location and deluxe amenities. We appreciate the excellent rating you have awarded us and we hope to welcome you back to Pasea soon.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: The staff is excellent, the property is beautiful.  However, the pool area is overcrowded as well as the upstairs bar and Tanners restaurant.  The modern facility has lots of amenities, but because of the enormous price and overcrowding it made the stay disappointing.  The pool area was to be our spot for this trip, not enough chairs, towels or servers and the bar staff was friendly but over-worked and understaffed (super slow).  I would not stay again, even if a less busy weekend because they can not charge that amount and not accommodate the guests.
Manager Response: Dear Roz064,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are so pleased that you enjoyed the beauty of our resort, as well as our array of modern amenities and our excellent team of staff members. We do apologize, however, that you were disappointed with some aspects of your stay. We truly hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to Pasea in the future for an experience that surpasses your expectations on every level.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: Great location adjacent to Pacific City and across Huntington Beach...you can walk everywhere.  Many restaurants, bars and surf shops are located just blocks away also.  Great souvenier shops right across the beautiful Huntington Beach.   Dukes is a very nice restaurant right on the beach for an upscale dinner.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nicely decorated but far from luxury when it comes to true luxury amenities!  Beds are bad , tiny pillows, low water pressure.  Cool restaurants but good mediocre , waited forever to order and to get food, salads never came but we were still charged!  The worst part is the next door club Bungalow will blast music until 2AM !! The flimsy glass doors hardly keep any noise out , you can hear ppl laughing and talking ! I called the front desk several times and was told it should stop by 1AM but no such thing happened it just keeps going! I would much rather stay at close by Hyatt and come here to ppl watch as wanted !
Manager Response: Dear elle n,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Pasea Hotel & Spa. While we are pleased that you appreciated the cool coastal decor of our resort, we sincerely apologize that your stay with us did not meet your expectations. We value your feedback and would appreciate the opportunity to speak with you directly regarding your experience. We have sent you a private message and hope to hear from you soon.  Very Sincerely,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: This amazingly modern addition to the Huntington Beach landscape is an elegant piece of art. This new hotel is just across the beach, near the pier  and right beside the Pacific City shopping center. The service was excellent and the staff very friendly and courteous and so accommodating. The view from my room was outstanding. The valet fee comes with it free bottle of wine and unlimited coffee -Keurig at that and of course Fiji water.Wish the pool was heated though. Very nice place. I'd come again.
Manager Response: Dear Oscar D,  Thank you for choosing Pasea Hotel & Spa as the destination for your weekend getaway. We truly appreciate your review and the excellent rating you have awarded us. It's a delight to know how much you enjoyed our spectacular location, our modern coastal decor, and the stellar service provided by our staff. We hope to welcome you back to Pasea soon for another extraordinary stay.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: This was an awesome choice. Free bottle of wine, Fiji water and unlimited coffee and tea comes with the room. Had a view of the pool and ocean. Walking distance to shopping and restaurants. Staff is amazing. The grounds are secure as well as a key needed to go to your floor in the elevator. Across from the beach and walking distance to the pier.
Manager Response: Dear Marviana J,  Thank you for choosing to celebrate your anniversary at Pasea and for sharing your review and great photos. We are thrilled that you had a spectacular stay at our hotel. We truly appreciate the excellent rating you have awarded us and hope to welcome you back to Pasea Hotel & Spa soon.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: On check in we were told that our room with a great view of the pier will be ready at 3 PM. Room reserved was ocean view and not partial view. When we checked in the room was everything but ocean view. You had to go out to the balcony make a right to see the ocean. The view was actually a very ugly view of roof top and buildings. After discussion with the manager and another waist of 2 hours for room to be ready and transferring over we had a very nice room we were promised at check in. Branden  the manager was was very nice and professional.  Generally the staff were outstanding and very pleasant.  Lobby very nice, modern rooms, average size otherwise.  Pool was extremely cold, we were told it is 80" but definitely not. It was almost as cold as the ocean. Pool also very small
Manager Response: Dear MitchyR,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Pasea Hotel & Spa. While we are pleased that you appreciated the service provided by Branden and the rest of our team of dedicated staff members, as well as your ocean view guest room, we sincerely apologize that there were aspects of your stay with us that did not meet your expectations or accurately reflect our commitment to providing stellar resort experiences at Pasea. We appreciate your feedback and have shared it with the appropriate management teams at our resort and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to Pasea in the future for an exemplary stay.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: What a great hotel!  From the moment we arrived we loved this hotel!  The staff was so helpful and courteous.  The hotel is clean and smells like new carpet.  The beds were really comfortable and even debated on stealing a pillow 😁.  The views are great and the pools were perfect.  We travelled with our 2.5 year old and 7 year old and they enjoyed it.  The bike took us to the beach and they provided towels, chairs and an umbrella!  We were so close to shopping and many good restaurants.  I can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Excellent service, best views, connected to Pacific City : best overall resort in OC. A little hipster on the weekend but family friendly. Extremely updated rooms from being able to connect devices to the tv, high quality materials and quiet rooms for being on PCH. Tanners has great food and service ( not here on the weekend) while a short walk across the patio is pacific city with multiple local food options.  Excellent staycation without ever having to leave the extended property. Well done by the Meritage Group.
Manager Response: Dear P D,  Thank you for choosing Pasea Hotel & Spa and for taking the time to share your review. We are thrilled to have earned your title of "best overall resort in OC" and truly appreciate the excellent rating you have awarded us. We hope to welcome you back to Pasea soon for another remarkable staycation!  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: Wonderful stay. Probably the best hotel out of a dozen we stayed in during our holiday in Cal. The hotel is very new, it even still smells new. Super friendly staff. Very nice views from the spacious balcony, the most comfortable beds, airy rooms. We got free flip flops (so cute), a free bottle of wine in our room as a welcome gift and there are free Yoga and meditation sessions. Well, you do pay a resort fee for these things but it felt very reasonable. The pool is fantastic with a great view and attentive staff.
Manager Response: Dear Kerstin2011,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Pasea Hotel & Spa while vacationing in California. We appreciate the excellent rating you have awarded us and are so glad to hear that you enjoyed the friendly hospitality of our staff, the luxury of our guest rooms, and our array of exemplary amenities. It was our pleasure to have you as a guest at Pasea and we hope to welcome you back to our Huntington Beach oasis soon.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: This hotel is a fun place to stay. Views of the Pacific are amazing if you have an ocean front room. Staff was amazing but I have to lower my overall rating of this property due the quality of food, small pool, TV reception was poor and large doors in the rooms were really heavy and difficult to move. I will try this property again to see if some of the bugs are worked out since a new property🌴
Manager Response: Dear Stanhanstad,  Thank you for choosing Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're so happy that you had a fun stay at our resort, enjoying the spectacular views of the Pacific and the stellar service provided by our team of dedicated staff members. It was our pleasure to have you as a guest at Pasea and we are looking forward to welcoming you back soon for a stay that surpasses all of your expectations.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: Loved this hotel! The decor, the staff, the pool, the food, the guests, the feel...all excellent! My only suggestions to the hotel management would be to add a top sheet to the beds (they don't have them currently so you have to use a heavy comforter or nothing  at all) and allow your guests to have complimentary late checkouts. I felt that the girl who checked me in almost said "no" to me before I could even complete my sentence! I arrived very late so I really wanted to opportunity to relax and enjoy the property with a late checkout, but she was not open to that at all. They did, however, allow me to use the property once I checked out. I would also suggest that they heat the pool. It was really cold!! Other then that, I absolutely loved everything about this hotel and will
Manager Response: Dear Debra K,  It was our pleasure to have you as a guest at Pasea Hotel & Spa. Thank you for choosing our resort and for sharing your review. We are so pleased that you loved the cool, coastal California style of our hotel, along with our deluxe amenities and the hospitality of our staff. We appreciate the excellent rating you have awarded us and look forward to welcoming you back to Pasea soon!  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: I was not sure what to expect with a brand new hotel. At first when we arrived our room smelled like dirty diapers, and continued to smell over the course of a few hours. I noticed the smell in some other areas of the hotel so it might be a sewage problem. Luckily, they changed our room to an upgraded studio room. I would recommend the studio over the regular room. The manager was also very helpful in extending my stay, instead of switching to the Hyatt for the wedding I was attending. However, I think some of the front desk staff needs some more training in properly accommodating the guests (since they originally said it couldn't be done and basically was forcing us to move). The maid service is VERY good but they ended up throwing away items from my room that I needed (such as
Manager Response: Dear Stefaniefarrah,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Pasea Hotel & Spa while in California for a wedding. It was our pleasure to have you as a guest and we are so pleased that you appreciated the luxury of our studios, the exemplary service provided by our housekeeping staff, and the deluxe amenities and activities provided for the enjoyment of our guests. We appreciate the excellent rating you have awarded us and all of the feedback that you have provided, which we have shared with the appropriate management teams. We sincerely hope to welcome you back to Pasea Hotel & Spa should your travels bring you back to sunny Southern California.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: Cali Coastal at it's best this new hotel convenient to the beach and the pier is a clear winner.  The decor is fresh and fun with art infused at every turn.  Floors named after soothing blue colors and tropical updated lobby florals to welcome guests.  The staff is accommodating but not overbearing, cheerful and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear BeachyBride2010,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are so happy that you enjoyed our fabulous location in Huntington Beach, as well as our modern, fresh decor and the friendly hospitality of our staff. We truly appreciate the excellent rating you have awarded us and hope to welcome you back to Pasea soon!  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: 2016 Kaiser Permanente Orange County Family Medicine Residency Graduation
Summary: I'm late in submitting my comments as our event was in June 2016.    Outstanding service by Banquet Captain, Humberto.  Took care of all of our needs.  Jacqueline is an amazing Event Manager working her magic before, during and after our event!  LOVE HER!!!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is brandnew. There are still few details to be adjusted but the staff is working hard to overcome the typical problems of a start up business. Everyone has been so attentive and kind. They let us check out at 12.30 and let us use the pool until we left at 5pm. The hotel features greatly designed areas. The rooms are very comfortable. The design of the spaces is very detailed!
Manager Response: Dear Silvia Z,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We appreciate the excellent rating you have awarded us and are so pleased to know that you enjoyed the attentive service of our staff and the laid-back luxury of our guest rooms. It was a pleasure to have you as a guest at our hotel and we hope to welcome you back to Pasea soon!  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: After my last experience with the Hampton inn viera in Florida that I am about to sue for fraud and bad customer service I am happy to see what real professionalism , great customer service, high end cleanliness and quality in detail are the standard of this hotel here. Although the espresso machine was out, the server Megan was super friendly and delivered high end customer service and walked the extra mile to get me my cappuccino . And not only that, she put her heart into my cappuccino. Seriously, coming from Florida but being experienced traveling around the globe , this lady Megan just made my day and showed me what customer service is all about. The restaurant is attached right next to the beautiful lobby. This hotel is a must if you ever here.
Manager Response: Dear Michael R,  Thank you for choosing Pasea Hotel & Spa and for taking the time to share your review. We are delighted that you had such a fabulous experience at our resort. Megan is a true asset to the Pasea Team and we appreciate you letting us know how much her passionate and expert hospitality impacted your time with us. We will be sure to share your comments with her. Thank you for the excellent rating you have awarded us. We look forward to welcoming you back to Pasea when your travels bring you back to sunny Southern California.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: I wanted to take my family and my special son on a mini vacay close to a beach but didn't want to go too far because of my son's needs. I was looking into beach houses but of course everything was booked or over priced. Then I decided on looking into hotels on the beach or near the beach and found Pasea. I was sold once I saw how beautiful the rooms were with the breathtaking views. I was surprised to find out how fairly new the hotel was when they informed me that it was just finished in May which was an extra bonus. Once we arrived we were happily greeted by Ryan at the valet. Cole, the bell boy kindly helped us with our bags to bring up to our room. As we entered the hotel we were welcomed and offered complimentary cheese, crackers, fruits, wine and champagne! I can honestly
Manager Response: Dear ginelle626,  Thank you for choosing Pasea Hotel & Spa for your mini vacation. It was truly our pleasure to welcome you to our resort and we are thrilled that your stay with us surpassed your expectations. It's a true joy to know that the exemplary service provided by our staff had such a remarkable impact on your experience at Pasea. We will be sure to share your comments with each of the team members you mentioned by name, knowing they will all be delighted to know how much you appreciated their warm hospitality. Thank you for sharing your review and awarding us an excellent rating. We sincerely hope to welcome you back to Pasea soon for another amazing getaway.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: We finalized our trip to CA at this lovely hotel, it smelled brand new and had everything we could ask for steps to the beach, restaurants and shops, loved our stay and won't hesitate to go back again, super friendly and helpful staff as well!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: New contemporary upscale resort in Huntington Beach, CA
Summary: I travel around the world for business and personal, extensively. I find this brand new contemporary upscale resort is a breath of fresh air in Southern California. This resort in my humble opinion is very well designed with a contemporary feel along with excellent location overlooking the pacific ocean with professional, courteous and mild manner staff. Great place to watch sunset from your room.....I would recommend to anyone who wants to chill out and recharge your battery as I did, is a great choice. Tiger S.
Manager Response: Dear Tiger P,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Pasea Hotel & Spa while visiting Huntington Beach. We are so pleased that you enjoyed our cool, coastal California style, as well as our spectacular location and the warm hospitality of our staff. We truly appreciate your recommendation and hope to welcome you back to Pasea for another relaxing and rejuvenating stay soon.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: We loved this place.  Very family friendly and right across from the beach. Perfect location!  It's close enough to down town with shops and dining, but far enough away that the crowd does not bother. Rooms were beautiful and the staff was extra friendly!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have never been taken care of so well in my life.  The staff is amazing! They anticipate your every need, and even some you were not aware of.  The hotel is  beautifully decorated, the location is perfect, the amenities beyond reproach.  They even give you a nice bottle of wine and flip-flops! I hope to come back every year.
Manager Response: Dear morewind1,  Thank you for choosing Pasea Hotel & Spa and for taking the time to share your review. It's wonderful to know that you experienced an exemplary level of service throughout your stay with us. Additionally, we are so pleased that you appreciated the beauty of our resort, our array of deluxe amenities, and our spectacular location in Huntington Beach. Thank you for the excellent rating you have awarded us; we hope to welcome you back to Pasea soon!  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: Went there for the weekend with a date and had the best time ever. Best hotel in Huntington Beach heads down ! Got the studio suite ocean view which I think is the best deal !  Loved all the free stuff at check in and was amazed by how good the service is at every level and from all the hotel workers. I had a upset stomach so I called for milk at 3 am, which I got in no event 5 min and it was free of charge.  Will only stay there when I got to Huntington Beach.
Manager Response: Dear Sarhan M,  Thank you for choosing Pasea for your weekend getaway. We're thrilled that you found us to be the best hotel in Huntington Beach! Thank you for sharing your review, awarding us an excellent rating. It's a delight to know how much you enjoyed our dedicated, personalized service and our deluxe amenities. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Pasea soon!  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: I was happily surprised with the overall feel of the hotel. Everyone was kind and willing to help if I had a question or request. There were young people there ready to go out but the staff were quick to quiet them down or move them along. Overall there was a great chill about the place and I am glad I chose to stay there for my quick get away. I will be back.
Manager Response: Dear kharbison06,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Pasea Hotel & Spa for a quick getaway! We're so happy that you enjoyed our cool, California vibe and the exemplary service provided by our staff members. We truly appreciate the excellent rating you have awarded us and look forward to welcoming you back to Pasea soon!  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: We checked in for a friends birthday and and were surprisingly stunned at how beautiful the property was! Brendan from the front desk was very polite, professional and helpful and even walked us to the elevator when we asked him how to get to our room! Room was clean, spacious and had an amazing view of the Huntington coastline! Spent most of our time at the pool relaxing in the sun. Pool has a nice fun vibe with great views of the ocean. Blake from the pool was our server and was very friendly and tentative to our needs! Thank you guys for an amazing weekend, look forward to coming back soon!   Chris
Manager Response: Dear Chris,  It was our great pleasure to welcome you to Pasea for your friend's birthday celebration. We're so pleased to know that you had a fabulous time at our resort, appreciating the spectacular beauty of our hotel, our luxurious amenities, and our fun California vibe. Additionally, we love hearing that the warm hospitality of Brendan and Blake had such a positive impact on your stay; we'll be sure to share your comments with both of them. Thank you for the excellent rating you have awarded us. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Pasea soon for another amazing weekend!  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: This hotel caters as a party ground for the neighborhood crowd and is far from being family friendly or having good service in any way. If you are over 25 or have kids please do yourself a favor and stay away or get ready for sleepless weekend nights and a low pool scene.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I surprised my husband for a overnight at the Pasea. We have been to the other hotels (check my other reviews) and wanted to check this one out..I was a little disappointed with this one even though it is really nice..I was not too impressed with the rooms and the balcony had no barrier from your neighbors. The view of couse was beautiful as always. We did enjoy the pool area and right next door is Pacific City, an outdoor mall, with shops and places to eat.  Try Lemonade, it's really good. Pasea only has valet and it is pricey.  Try the breakfast at the little market located in the hotel lobby. The hotel is right across the street from the beach and only about a 10 to 15 min. Walk to the pier. Overall I like this hotel and will be back
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: AMAZING STAFF, AMAZING PLACE, AND AMAZING LOCATION!!!!
Summary: Everything is so beautiful and clean in the hotel!! The staff is superrrrr accomodating and friendly and so helpful!! It is in the BEST location and has beautiful views of the pool and ocean from the room!! Already planning my next trip!!!
Manager Response: Dear mollysocher,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We are delighted that you had such an amazing stay at our resort, enjoying our spectacular location, as well as the friendly hospitality of our staff and the beauty of our hotel. We truly appreciate the excellent rating you have awarded us and are looking forward to welcoming you back soon for another remarkable stay!  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel, but if your looking for beach view room this may not be for you.
Summary: The hotel is really nice, the rooms are VERY CLEAN, room service was great, the pool is relaxing (we came mis week to hide from the crowds) Its perfectly located to the shops and restaurants. Were hotel snobs and this place is super nice. The only thing I wish, was that the view was better. We asked before we booked that we would have a complete view of the beach, they get away with cutting out the highway in the photo. You won't be disappointed unless you wanted a complete beach view. Ive attached the photo from our room.. were on the 8th floor last room before the mega suite. They told us we had one of the best views in the hotel.... and we hear the cars all night long.  again Beautiful hotel to get away too, just don't come if you want to hear the waves... you will hear the
Manager Response: Dear BellaRenee,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Pasea Hotel & Spa. It's wonderful to know that you appreciated our fantastic location, deluxe amenities, and luxurious guest rooms. We do apologize that the traffic on PCH negatively impacted your stay with us, however, and we hope to welcome you back to Pasea in the future.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Trendy but not up to par on the service side
Summary: My husband and I visited the Pasea, its a nice hotel much smaller then the Hyatt down the street but nice, clean and trendy. The rooms were nice, extremely small but clean. The pool was fun and hip but felt to enclosed for being at the beach. The most beautiful spot in the hotel is the rooftop bar or the spa. I really enjoyed the atmosphere in both locations. The place itself is beautiful but that doesn't always cut it when your paying top dollar to stay at a resort. There are a laundry list of items from the waitresses never getting an order right to the coffee shop boys paying more attention to flirting with the girls there then doing their job, or just in general zero follow-thru from the staff. A staff member thoughtfully told us he'd send up a bottle of wine to celebrate
Manager Response: Dear Sarah J.,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Pasea Hotel & Spa in celebration of your anniversary. We're so pleased that you enjoyed our exclusive rooftop bar, as well as Aarna Spa, the beauty of our resort, and our deluxe amenities. We sincerely apologize, however, that the level of service you experienced during your stay was not reflective of the high standards we hold ourselves to. We have shared your comments with the appropriate management teams at the resort, as we value your feedback, and we truly hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to Pasea in the future for a stay that far exceeds your expectations.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: So far it's been hard to contact concierge to answer questions before our visit but hopefully it will be good once we check in. The hotel operator and reservation agent has not been helpful answering questions so far. I will update after the end of our stay. Stayed in a room facing the pier and pool. The view is beautiful. However, I do not recommend staying here if you want a peaceful nights sleep. You can hear music from the various bars and restaurants right across the way until 1:45am. The air conditioner was also pretty loud and the balconies are not really private.  My daughter enjoyed the pool.  But unless you come early and stake your claim to a lounge chair by an umbrella or pay $$$ for a cabana, you'll have to roast in in the sun.  I was told by the server at the pool
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: THE place to be in Huntington Beach!
Summary: Amazing new hotel on PCH in Huntington Beach.  Great service, great rooms and numerous things to do within walking distance!  Make sure to check out the Tree Top bar above Tanners with amazing views of the ocean.  Bear Star across the street is a great hot spot at night.  As well, Pacific City is next door offering a variety of shops and restaurants.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Such a great place to stay!!  Right next to Pacific City, you can walk next door to great bars and restaurants.  Pasea and Pacific City both have a really fun laid back vibe.  Definitely stay in an ocean front room, the view is spectacular!   The Treehouse bar at Tanners is the perfect place to drink and soak in the view. The only reason I had to give 4 stars instead of 5 is because the in-room dining left much to be desired.  We always come back from a night of partying and like to order breakfast in bed at 2 or 3am but there is no room service after 10pm except a few sandwiches.  We did order in dinner one night and it was very bland.  They definitely need to work on this aspect.   We will absolutely still stay at Pasea again as we really loved the overall vibe, the view, and
Manager Response: Dear Troublemaker2014,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're delighted that you had such a great experience at our resort, enjoying our unbeatable location, the spectacular views from our guest rooms, and our cool California coastal vibe. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Pasea for another stay soon!  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Talk about apocalyptic fall from top to bottom
Summary: I rarely have this type of review.  Here is an awesome property where I stayed twice before and I was looking forward to bringing my wife from Manhattan NY to join me for a small vacation. ..  This third time, I arrived to find the restaurant closed, a pool menu with 5 items on it from the coffee shop, and no cable for the entire stay.  Now stuff happens, so OK give them a break is what we may say...  Here is the kicker.  I call about the cable and am told 15 minutes, I call again the next morning, again, the engineer is still on the phone with the cable company - hope you get it by now.  Nobody had a clue what happened.  Now I work in FInance and usually watch various market channels before making calls on business issues, so for me that was a big problem.  Finally I resorted
Manager Response: Dear Tiberius V,  Thank you for choosing, once again, to stay at Pasea Hotel & Spa. It was our great pleasure to welcome you back to our resort for your third visit. We sincerely apologize, however, that your most recent stay fell so short of your expectations and was not accurately reflective of our commitment to providing our guests with exemplary resort experiences. Please know that we value you as a guest, take your feedback very seriously, and will be contacting you via telephone to further discuss your stay. We look forward to speaking with you and hope to welcome you back to Pasea again soon.  Very Sincerely,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: this hotel is in the perfect location.  Across the street from beach and you can swim in pool and see the beach and the palm trees swaying with no sand issues. Can easily walk to the strand and the pier.  We walked to the new pacific city shopping center and had lunch at lemonade! Lemonade was a modern twist on cafeteria style ordering.  Very yummy.   Hotel is decorated beautifully. It really is done with such style, yet very comfortable and beachy with such great taste and a mixture of textures!  Makes me want to go home and remodel!!  Pool service great!  Definitely coming back here again.  4 stars only because our room was it cleaned when we got back to room at 3:30.  However when I called it was quickly cleaned.  Also food and drinks are on the expensive side. Poolside
Manager Response: Dear ckpsgv,  Thank you for staying at Pasea. We're so pleased that you appreciated our spectacular location and the comfortable luxury of our resort. It was our pleasure to have you as a guest and we look forward to welcoming you back to Pasea soon!  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: We recently stayed at the Pasea based on trip advisor reviews. We have never stayed in the Huntington Beach area previously. We did not know what to expect.   From the moment we arrived , until  the time we departed, we were treated like royalty by the entire staff at the Pasea. We knew the hotel was only two months old, so we expected nice accommodations. The suite was simply outrageous. The view was unsurpassed, as were the amenities.    We loved the newly opened outdoor mall next door to the Pasea, as it  had a warm welcoming feeling, with many choices of restaurants and quaint shops. Also walking distance from the hotel, was Main St. and the pier that included additional shops and restaurants.   Getting back to the hotel, the property was kept immaculate at all times.
Manager Response: Dear Edward L,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Pasea. We are thrilled that you had such a spectacular experience while staying with us! It's a joy to know how much you enjoyed our luxurious suites, our deluxe amenities, and the warm, genuine hospitality of our staff. Additionally, we are excited that this was your first trip to Huntington Beach, as Pasea truly does provide the best location in the area for an amazing Huntington experience. Thank you for the excellent rating you have awarded us. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Pasea soon.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: We came here for business with my husband and daughter. It is a spectacular hotel and close to everything! The employees were excellent and very polite. It's across the street from the beach and right next door to this beautiful outdoor mall with great restaurants!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Delightful new hotel near the Huntington Beach pier. Great sunset view of palms and pier from our balcony. We loved the very modern decor! & light and beachy feel. The room was airy with soft colors and light wood. The bathroom felt spacious with sliding door on window between room and shower. Lots of light. The fixtures were both sleek, modern and very functional. We stayed on a high floor, Azure. Check in was efficient. Ate at both Tanner's and lobby coffee shop. We looked at the spa but did not have time to book treatments. Lobby and restaurant is adjacent to a new shopping mall. Many restaurants nearby. The buzz on a weekend night does create some noise while sitting out on the balcony but the room was quiet. check out efficient. Well itemized bill. There is an underground
Manager Response: Dear dziran,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're so pleased that you appreciated our beautiful decor, along with the luxury of our guest rooms and our fantastic amenities. It was a delight to welcome you to our resort and it's wonderful to know that you had a lovely stay. We hope to welcome you back to Pasea soon.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Our first visit to HB and the Pasea made the difference
Summary: Great hotel. Beautiful design and exceedingly friendly, customer-focused service.   The hotel appears to have been built to very high standards.  The rugs are thick, with substantial doors, furniture and fixtures.  Our room was spotless with excellent sheets, towels, robes and amenities, a huge flat screen. It had a great shower (no tub) and separate WC area, with the option for a peek-a-boo shower window or an easy fix with a sliding door to offer privacy. Nice mood lighting options. Ample outlets and charging stations  We were on the 6th floor, poolside, and despite the party scene at Tanners, we heard no noise when the balcony doors were closed. The interior design is impressive throughout the hotel and outside - beachy and light without being tacky.  The pool and hot tub are
Manager Response: Dear 43reds,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Pasea and for taking the time to share such a detailed review. We're delighted that you enjoyed the beauty and comfortable luxury of our hotel, along with our array of deluxe amenities and the friendly hospitality of our staff. It was our pleasure to welcome you to Pasea for your first visit to Huntington Beach and we truly appreciate the excellent rating you have awarded us. We look forward to welcoming you back to Pasea soon for another magnificent stay.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: No room service for three straight days/ 3 1/2 hours waiting for room
Summary: My family had to wait 3 1/2 hours for our room. I watched other guest get their room one by one. Did not get room service for three days. Also huge construction site going on right next door it is very noise !!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The oceanfront room, amenities and staff were for the most part very nice. If you have an aversion to the smell of burning wood this place is not for you because the entire first level has the quaint aroma of several wood-burning pizza stoves. For a property which bills itself as a "Spa" the equipment in the exercise room was lacking. In fact, the Courtyard by Marriott where we stayed days earlier had a far bigger facility with a MUCH larger variety of equipment.  Before arriving we were running 25 min ahead of schedule so we called Pasea to ask if an early check-in would be possible. After having difficulty locating our reservation the staff member told us we would be placed on a list and that, if possible, they would try to secure an early room.  We arrived at Pasea at 3:35
Manager Response: Dear Kenneth S,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're delighted that you enjoyed our oceanfront accommodations, as well as our deluxe amenities. We sincerely apologize, however, that there were aspects of your stay that fell below your expectations, as well as our high service standards. We appreciate your feedback and assure you that your comments have been shared with the appropriate management teams at the resort. We are dedicated to providing our guests with exemplary resort experiences and your feedback will be used to further the training of both our staff members and management teams. We truly hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to Pasea in the future for a stay that exceeds all of your expectations.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: Coming down from Las Vegas with quite a lot of  bad experiences, we now had to find out that it can be very worse! Arriving at the PASEA: first impression, new hotel, great guys!That was ok for 2 hours ,then ee were informed that our first dinner was our last dinner, the only restaurant had to be closed for 3 dayd, time of our stay. So :NO BREAKFAST ,NO DINNER, NO CORRECT POOL SERVICE, only coffee shop or very bad inroom dining(no space to eat and extremely bad food), but a check of   !!! 2.500-USD HOW ABOUT A COMPENSATION?? But this for the DEEF😡😡😡  The guest from 541
Manager Response: none

Summary: last week my husband and I had a the priveldge of staying at the beautiful Pasea Hotel & Spa. Our stay was absolutely perfect in every way. We were warmly welcomed by the entire staff. Mr Brendan Turner assisted us with checking into our room. Brendan's warm and caring hospitality went beyond our expectations.  The grounds were impeccable and the decor did not miss a beat of perfection.  We will be returning in the very near future and recommending Pasea to all of our friends.
Manager Response: Dear stormidebbie,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Pasea Hotel & Spa. It's wonderful to know that your experience at our resort was so fabulous. Thank you for sharing your review, telling us how much you appreciated the gorgeous decor of our luxury hotel and the stellar service provided by our team of dedicated staff members, especially Brenden. He is an exceptional member of our team and we will be sure to share your comments with him. We truly appreciate your high recommendation and the excellent rating you have awarded us and we look forward to welcoming you back to Pasea soon for another perfect stay.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: At check in our confirmed room was not available. They put us in a room right in front of a huge air condition , which as reception told us "they normally no longer use". Next day we got our room but over 6 hours they were not able to move the luggage. Pull down service was skipped twice, no water in the room, food in restaurant was poor - then restaurant closed for four days so you could get breakfast only in the room. The only bar was closed for a private event .... "You find something in the area".  Not one real sorry, not one offer to compensate for limited service. The property is nice was very loud/noisy. At night music and during the day there is a huge construction side where they build a massive apartment block. I stay over 150 nights per year in hotels and never
Manager Response: none

Summary: My boyfriend and I were celebrating our anniversary and wanted to find somewhere close by that still felt like a get away.  We found the Pasea Hotel and it was AMAZING. When we first arrived, valet was there to greet us and take our car offering any assistance. At the front desk we were greeted by Brendan. Not only was he helpful and quick with checking us in, he also had wonderful advice with the surrounding area.  Once we were checked in, Brendan walked us to the elevator and wished us a wonderful stay. But wait it gets better! A few hours later, we came down to hit the pool. Brendan welcomed us and walked us to the pool making friendly conversation.  He made us feel so welcomed. On top of the great service, the rooms were wonderful with beautiful views and the most
Manager Response: Dear Danielle R,  Thank you for choosing to celebrate your anniversary at Pasea. It's a delight to know how much you enjoyed the luxurious comfort of our guest rooms, along with the spectacular views, our deluxe amenities, and the exemplary level of service shown to you by our staff. We will be certain to share your comments with Brenden, as he will be particularly pleased to know how much you appreciated his genuine, warm hospitality. Thank you for the excellent rating you have awarded us. We hope to welcome you back to Pasea soon for another phenomenal stay!  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: It's a brand new hotel with most rooms facing the sea. We had a road side room but the sound proof was very good that we hardly heard any road noises.   The hotel is right next to the Pacific City, a shopping mall full of good shops and restaurants. Really convenient.   We used the free bikes from the hotel to cycle along the beach.   Friendly staff and good experience overall.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Beautiful modern hotel located on beach. Amazing views from conference space, hotel lobby and pool. Hotel is immaculate, well trained friendly staff and great location next to pacific city. I will definitely stay here in the future for location alone
Manager Response: none

Summary: Huntington native here; return "home" every year. I typically stay at Hyatt Regency or Hilton Waterfront. Took a chance on something new and boy were my instincts right. This hotel is simply STUNNING and thoughtful. It is a textural masterpiece worthy of a week's stay. The rooms are well laid out, the bathroom is exceptionally appointed with modern fixtures and calming beach colors. Complimemtary bottle of good wine. Common area and hallways are simply gorgeous. Pool and lounge areas nice. Bar and restaurant fantastic. I toured the penthouse-breathtaking! Only a couple cautions/observations: restaurant/bar were closed for most of our time at the hotel which deflated our experience, large construction projects behind the hotel so room location is important for now, and the hotel
Manager Response: Dear XCalifGal,  We are thrilled that you chose to stay at Pasea for your annual return to Huntington Beach. Thank you for taking the time to share a review of your experience at our resort. It's fabulous to know that you appreciated the spectacular beauty of our resort, with its gorgeous decor, exemplary amenities, and breathtaking guest rooms. We truly appreciate the excellent rating you have awarded us and look forward to welcoming you back to Pasea soon!  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Cool hip hotel next to main street, shopping, and the beach
Summary: Great new hotel with amazing access to shopping and some nightlife - not to mention day time beach trips! If you get a higher floor you can see the entire boardwalk and down the coast in both directions. Pretty funny to watch the great HB police case off the night time beach goers!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel has only been open for 7 weeks so I have taken that into consideration when giving this review.  Having said that, there is a lot of attention to detail missing. We stayed two nights during the week so the hotel was not at full capacity, they have 250 rooms.  Service was from the valet and bell was exceptional, Mark and Mark are spot on with service!  Poolside was lovely, the salt water in the pool is a plus, downside, the layer of filth attached to the wall of the pool which was right at eye level, what a shame that someone on the property isn't paying attention to that.  The poolside service was good, Blake did an okay job.  Mike the bartender was very professional and courteous. The hotel provides beach chairs that have a place to stow your stuff that was a nice
Manager Response: Dear Kircal61,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Pasea Hotel & Spa and for taking the time to share such a detailed review. We are so pleased that you appreciated the dedicated service provided by the exemplary staff members you mentioned by name. We will be sure to share your comments with each of them. We do apologize, however, that you were disappointed with your experiences at Aarna Spa and Tanner's, as they were certainly not reflective of the high service standards we hold ourselves to. Please know that we value your feedback and have shared your comments with the appropriate management teams at our resort, as we are committed to providing our guests with the best possible experiences at Pasea. We truly hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to Pasea in the future for a stay that surpasses all of your expectations.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Just missed a five star rating for some small faults but best service ever
Summary: The hotel was brand new and over the road from the beach. The rooms were not huge but with great sea views and balcony. The service was unbelievable the coffee shop, the cleaners, the porters, security staff all went out of their way to be welcoming. The car valet parking was excellent. The pool area was nice with sea views. The restaurant lovely and it is walking distance from an amazing surf beach and attached to a nicely decorated shopping mall. My slight criticisms without which I would give it a 5 are on one weekend a lot of very loud rough people rented a cababa with swearing and drinking. The pool seating is lovely but there are better seats you can only use if you rent a cabana at 700 dollars. Why have them? On checking out they said we rented a movie and added it to the
Manager Response: none

Summary: Loved this hotel.  The room and whole hotel is beautiful. The service was excellent and very relaxed and friendly.  Loved our room and balcony overlooking the pool and the beach.  It is next to Pacific city and a short walk to downtown Huntington Beach and the pier.  Great restaurants nearby.  Some building work going on around the hotel but it didn't cause us any problems.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is easily one of my favorite hotels that I've stayed in. First and foremost they are pet-friendly which is a HUGE plus, in my book. Secondly, the hotel decor and style is very modern and beachy, a perfect combination of style, class, and relaxing. The location in fantastic -- literally right on PCH, steps away from the beach and tons of shopping and dining. And finally Tanners, the on property restaurant was fantastic, great service, especially our waitress Rachel, and delicious and creative food and cocktails. Everyone at the hotel from valet to housekeeping was friendly and welcoming- it appears their management knows how to treat their employees. Highly recommend this locale and will definitely be making the drive up from San Diego to stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: What an amazing location. I wish that my stay could of been lounger, it was a quick work trip and after looking at the hotel online, I'm glade that i took the short drive from the OC to stay in Huntington Beach. The staff and the hotel are top shelf.
Manager Response: Dear David L,  Thank you for staying at Pasea Hotel & Spa while in Southern California on business. We're delighted that you had a flawless stay at our new resort. Thank you for taking the time to share your review; we appreciate the excellent rating you have awarded us. We look forward to welcoming you back to Pasea soon and, hopefully, for a much longer stay!  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: New cool surf style hotel which is beautifully decorated. Nice rooms with the latest gadgets and great pool with great views of Huntington Beach, which is right across the road. Immediately adjacent to a brand new shopping mall which is handy and has some nice alternative dining options. The reception and valet/bell staff were friendly and efficient.  The hotel restaurant 'Tanners' is its weak point. The service is really very sloppy and clearly a lot more training is required of the staff here. They made us wait 15 minutes to be seated in a half empty restaurant for breakfast on a Saturday morning, forgot to provide cutlery when the food was served - twice - both at lunch and breakfast...etc etc. This is not acceptable for a hotel of this price and caliber.  Hopefully this is
Manager Response: Dear HongKongGobel,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're delighted that you enjoyed our spectacular location, as well as the luxury of our guest rooms and deluxe amenities. We do apologize that your experiences at Tanner's did not meet your expectations or our high service standards, however. Please know that we appreciate your feedback and have shared your comments with the appropriate management teams. We hope to welcome you back to Pasea when you return to vacation in iconic Huntington Beach!  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: We stayed at Pasea for the Vans US Open of Surfing - the location is incredible, right across the street from the beach with amazing ocean views. Short walk to the pier and all the shops and nightlife on Main Street.  Beds were uber comfortable, and I'm obsessed with the hooded sweatshirt robes (seriously how do I buy one of these??).  The hotel is brand spanking new and still working through some operational issues: we checked in late at night to a room that was not ready (no sheets on bed, etc.). Hotel manager was great in fixing the problem and giving us an upgrade, but was pretty rude to the housekeeping and security staff about it.    Any cons: it smells like burning in the lobby all the time.  Not sure why, but it smells like bonfire.  (Rooms smell great.). Also, the
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed at the brand new Pasea for a week with my daughters.  Check in was a little rough as we came in on a Friday afternoon, but the staff was accommodating and had a welcome to the weekend table of cheese and crackers as well as beer and wine. We were given a beautiful room overlooking Huntington Pier. This hotel was next door to the new shopping/dining area, Pacific City. We enjoyed the proximity to Noth Pacific City and downtown HB.  We would definitely recommend it for couples or families with older children.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We arrived here straight from an 11 hour flight and were greeted with super friendly valet & bell boy  who explained everything , walked into a wonderful reception area with a view of the pool and the beach to die for ! The rooms were spotless and a good size ( double queen , sea view )and we had great views from the balcony . The beds were super comfy and we slept so well . The coffee shop in reception was also excellent . All in all a wonderful stay , it was so hard to leave , so much so we're returning to finish our holiday there !
Manager Response: Dear Jeanette H,  Thank you for choosing to spend your holiday at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're so pleased that you enjoyed the laid back luxury of our guest rooms, along with our array of deluxe amenities. We appreciate the excellent rating you have awarded us and are looking forward to welcoming you back to Pasea soon for the end of your holiday!  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: From the moment we arrived at valet, entered the lobby, checked in - everything was great! Even the smell in the lobby was welcoming. The beautiful ocean view, awesome pool and even room service was fantastic. We had a fabulous dinner at Tanner's Restaurant! I highly recommend this hotel. I only live 15 minutes away and enjoyed a fabulous 2-night "staycation" here!
Manager Response: none

Summary: My wife and I live in South Orange County and we wanted to get away from the kids for a weekend. Instead of looking to San Diego or Los Angeles, we decided to stay somewhat close and found Pasea through a friends' recommendation. I booked our 2-night stay-cation by calling the hotel directly. The lady was very friendly and took care of our reservations in June for our stay in late July 2016.   When we arrived at the hotel, we were greeted by Scott, who we would come to find out is the General Manager of the hotel. He asked if we preferred red or white wine and then directed us to the cheese and dried fruits table while we waited to check into our room. The lobby is beautifully appointed in a modern beach theme and is very inviting. We were then directed to the "front desk" which
Manager Response: Dear joelfeeser,  Thank you for choosing Pasea for your staycation and for taking the time to share such a detailed review of your recent stay with us. It was an absolute delight to read how much you enjoyed the luxury of our resort and the hospitality provided by our team of dedicated staff members. We're so happy you had such an extraordinary experience at our spa, as well as at our exclusive Sunday Brunch. Thank you for sharing all the photographs from your stay! We truly appreciate the excellent rating you have awarded us. We look forward to welcoming you back to Pasea soon for another spectacular staycation and hope to see you at Tanner's for dinner soon.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: Every staff member I dealt with here was very friendly and accommodating.    The pool is located off the reception area so that walking in to the hotel to check-in on a summer Saturday afternoon you are presented with what felt like a Vegas pool party.  The pool area was packed with people and the music was loud.  I will add that by Monday that area had mellowed considerably.  Free wifi is offered as well as beach chairs, umbrellas and a pedicab ride to the beach!  This is a great perk.  As for the room - I found it to be uninspiring - especially for a new hotel.  Our room had a dirty ceiling (already?) and missing baseboard trim.  There is only one small towel bar in the bathroom and the doorstop for the main door is in such a place that you will continue to hit your foot on it
Manager Response: Dear susanlbinn,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're so pleased that you appreciated the warm hospitality of our staff, as well as our exclusive array of luxurious amenities and our ideal location. We do regret that you found our coastal California style to be uninspiring, however. We appreciate your feedback and ask that you please send us a private message, informing us of your room number, so we may address the concerns you voiced. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to Pasea in the future for a stay that surpasses your expectations.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: If you'd like to enjoy your beautiful town listen up.  Paul will Valet your vehicle at a greater value than Pacific City, and understands his job better than the parking attendants in pacific city.  7$ to valet your vehicle for 3 hours on a Saturday night!  Yolanda is exceptional at customer service, and goes the extra effort to ensure your night comes to an exceptional end.  Andrew, is a friendly face who appreciates HB life, he is appreciative, gracious, and highly recommended.  ***** stars to the Pasea, and thank you for exceeding my expectations for date night.  Please use this review sparingly as my fiance and I expect to utilize their services in the near future, and were very pleased at the impression left by the Pasea's staff.  Thank you for the small details that create
Manager Response: none

Summary: Beautiful resort, Great staff, and location...:) Amazing!  Rooms  were so comfortable & spacious.  Newly open resort.  They just need to smooth out some service issues at Tanners & Tree Lounge Bar!  Otherwise, we had a great stay!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Love the style of this hotel and restaurant !!  The vibe of the hotel is unlike anything else experienced.  Even the valets are adorable.  Jack was a cutie patootie greeting us w service and a smile...:)  Didn't stay at hotel, but ate at Tanners.  Place is super cool offering outstanding views of the Pacific. A GREAT addition to HB places to eat & drink..  Can't wait to return and try the RoofTop...:)
Manager Response: none

Summary: Was able to attend a couple events at this new hotel in Huntington Beach and its amazing in design and layout from the moment you walk into the lobby. The ocean front view is at every turn and the beautiful design and flow is done so well.  The servers and staff go out of their way to make your visit a pleasure.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Thank you for a Special and Memorable Anniversary!
Summary: I am writing this letter as a humble note of appreciation for the outstanding customer service provided by your staff at the Pasea Hotel and Spa in Huntington Beach. I booked a stay to celebrate our anniversary, and wanted to make it a very special one. Your staff delivered and then some. Special Thanks to Christine S., Justin R, Leo, and the young lady that went out of her way to run to a nearby shop to get us some bubble bath. Also thank you for the engineer on duty that came up several time to show us how to use all the fancy stuff! GREAT Spa, and got an upgraded room for our anniversary. Room was set up with in room dinner for 2, Champagne, chocolate covered strawberries, and rose pedals. Coming back next month for another visit! Can't wait!
Manager Response: Dear everlastingtdetail,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Pasea in celebration of your anniversary. We're so pleased that you had a wonderful stay at our resort, enjoying the luxury of our guest rooms and our deluxe amenities. Additionally, we're delighted that the exemplary hospitality shown by our staff had such a wonderful impact on your stay with us. We will be sure to share your review with our entire team, especially with those you mentioned specifically. We are very excited to be welcoming you back to Pasea next month and are looking forward to providing you with another spectacular stay!  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: 5 starts because the awesome team ! Mathew the bellman 👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻  it's amazing !!! Thanks for all your cares and attentions !  ... The person who made our Check-in was amazing too unfortunately I can't remember his name ! (If it helps is tall and use glasses the check-in was like at 5 pm).
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband booked the Pasea to celebrate our 1 year anniversary! We have visited San Fransisco and the San Diego areas but never have been to Huntington Beach before. This place was absolutly amazing!!!!!!! We already are looking to go back soon!!! Wow so impressed.  As soon as we pulled up to the hotel we were greeted by a caring and welcoming hotel staff.  We felt like we were treated like royalty! Ryan out in front by the cars was always looking out for us by giving us directions to nearby restaurants, running paths, shops etc.  Peter always smiled and greeted us while he took our luggage up to our room and helped us get acquainted with the beautiful ammentities in our room! The rooms are INCREDIBLE!! We loved the modern beach style.  The view from our balcony was stunning
Manager Response: Dear ktrego3,  We're so happy you celebrated your anniversary at Pasea. It's a real treat to know how much you enjoyed the luxurious coastal style of our guest rooms, our array of exclusive amenities, and the warm hospitality shown by our team of dedicated staff members. We'll be sure to share your comments with Ryan and Peter, both of whom will be delighted to know how much you appreciated their service. Thank you for taking the time to share such a detailed review; we are truly grateful for the excellent rating you have awarded us. We hope to welcome you back to Pasea soon for another remarkable stay in iconic Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: I booked a room at the Pasea for my birthday weekend, and from the time I made my reservation to when I had to leave, I experienced nothing but 5 start service. I was greeted with a hand written birthday note, chocolates, and an absolutely amazing stay. The hotel pool & tree lounge bar were wonderful, and the location was perfect. I cannot wait to stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear mpetroni09,  Thank you for celebrating your birthday weekend at Pasea! We're so glad you enjoyed our amazing location, spectacular amenities, and the warm, personalized service of our staff. It was a pleasure to have you as a guest at our resort and we truly appreciate the excellent rating you have awarded us. We hope to welcome you back to Pasea soon.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: LOVED this hotel!  It is new so they have some hiccups.  But nothing major, at all.  And they overcompensate when there is an issue. We had an amazing room with an even better view!  Love the balcony!  We requested a quiet room, as I have a hearing disability and unknown noises can be disconcerting.  They delivered!   Our room was quiet! The beds are great. Housekeeping was amazing! The bathrooms are gorgeous!  Love the Fresh products, too. We had room service breakfast every morning.  It was all delicious--nutella french toast, bagels, house made vanilla yogurt, fresh fruit and juice, breakfast burritos, etc.... One day, room service was running about 15 minutes late.  They gave us a large fruit tray to make up for it.  Very nice! Our room safe wasn't working and they
Manager Response: Dear janet g,  Thank you for staying at Pasea and for sharing such a detailed review. We're so happy you loved your time at our resort, enjoying our spectacular guest rooms, delicious cuisine, and stellar levels of service provided by our staff. We truly appreciate the excellent rating you have awarded us and sincerely hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to Pasea soon for another remarkable stay.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: Another great hotel by the beach!  Room has view of the ocean, located on the shopping area of pacific city.  Modern decor and vibrant colors, beautifully blended, everything is nice from bathroom to bed linen, great staff.  The best time to check in is on Friday got a complimentary champagne and au derves!
Manager Response: Dear Sugaylange,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Pasea Hotel & Spa and for taking the time to share your review and array of great photographs. We're so pleased that you appreciated our gorgeous coastal style, the comfort of our luxurious guest rooms, and the outstanding service provided by our staff. Thank you for the excellent rating you have awarded us. We hope to welcome you back to Pasea soon for another remarkable stay in Huntington Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: Thisis a new property in Huntington Beach. I have been coming to this area for the last six years and this is so far my best Hotel experience so far. I know the property is new but is just more than that. Rooms are airy and bright, all with some kind of ocean view. WiFi clocked at 115 Mbps download! Room was very well sound proofed, coffee machine and supplies all there, even H&H. Excellent FRESH amenities, free slippers, his and hers. Tanner's restaurant for Breakfast was very good, food and service. The mall location is a big plus with all the food options at walking distance and of course Surfside USA just up front the porperty. Pricing is very competitive too. Definitely recommend Paséa.
Manager Response: Dear juanpenso,  It was our great pleasure to welcome you to Pasea during your recent visit to Huntington Beach. Thank you for taking the time to share a review of your recent stay with us. It's a delight to know that we provided you with your best ever hotel experience. We're so pleased that you enjoyed our gorgeous guest rooms, exclusive amenities, spectacular oceanfront location, and savory cuisine. Thank you for your high recommendation and the excellent rating you have awarded us. We hope to welcome you back to Pasea soon for another world-class resort experience.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: The Pasea was amazing!  The hotel, staff, and spa exceeded all of my expectations. The property is  centrally located in the newest section of HB.  The room had a fantastic view of the ocean front and a great place to watch the sunset. The service was impeccable.    Thank you Christina!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff were friendly but they did not know what they were doing !!  I asked to speak to a manager for some issues and every time I was told they were in the meeting. Waited so long to check in .Bed was not comfortable and I went out  and bought a pillow the next day . Hair salon was expensive and the hair dresser did not know  what she was doing.
Manager Response: Dear Sara k,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Pasea and for sharing your review. While we are pleased that you appreciated the warm hospitality of our staff, we truly apologize that there were aspects to your stay that were disappointing. Providing our guests with extraordinary experiences is our top priority and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to Pasea soon for a stay that exceeds all of your expectations.   Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: Pasea definitely delivers a memorable and unique so-cal experience. We felt we were taken care of from the moment we checked in with Katie and the friendly front desk staff. Katie has excellent room selection as she set us up with a great room, thanks again! We came before our room was ready, but still felt like we started our vacation as we were offered access to the pool area. Blake and Easton were super helpful at the pool bar and gave us some great drink and dining recommendations. After a great start, our room became available and it was definitely worth the wait. Amazing view of the resort, beach, and pier while looking down PCH. Our room was modern and trendy, the bed super comfortable, and the shower was spacious and fun. Lydia and the fabulous in-room dining team
Manager Response: Dear Chisenberg,  Thank you for selecting to stay at Pasea. We're so happy that we were your choice for a birthday celebration and it's a thrill to know what a spectacular experience you had at our resort. Thank you for sharing a review of your stay with us; it was truly a delight to read and it pleases us greatly to know how much you enjoyed our luxurious guest rooms, world-class hospitality, and savory cuisine. We appreciate the excellent rating you have awarded us and hope to welcome you back to Pasea soon for another spectacular resort experience.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: We were lucky enough to spend a long weekend at this new hotel.  The hotel is gorgeous!  Our room was very well appointed and comfortable -- we wanted for nothing.  The view of the ocean was spectacular.  Everyone on the staff from bellmen (James was wonderful!), desk staff, wait staff in the restaurants, valet staff and housekeepers were all exceptionally friendly and helpful  -- we could not have felt more welcome.  The restaurant, Tanners, had a good choice of food and the waiter for dinner(Aaron) knew the menu and were helpful in assisting us with our choices.  Ruben was our server for breakfast two mornings, and was great.  The Tree House Bar is not to be missed -- beautiful rooftop bar with interesting cocktails and a great view of the ocean.  The location is excellent --
Manager Response: Dear Casa295,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Pasea Hotel & Spa. It's a true delight to know how much you appreciated the comfort of our luxurious guest rooms, our spectacular location, and our array of world-class amenities, as well as the stellar level of service provided by our dedicated staff members. We will be sure to share your comments with those you've mentioned by name. Thank you for taking the time to share your review and for the excellent rating you have awarded us. We are truly looking forward to welcoming you back for another visit soon!  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: If you want to feel like you visited and experienced someplace new and trendy, this is it!  However the bonus is you feel welcomed, pampered, and comfortable too!!  We live in HB and anticipated the opening of this new hotel. The location is KEY. You are literally minutes from the pier and all the action, yet you can have your own private sanctuary from it all if you desire! We highly recommended this place for young and young at heart alike! Great service and hospitality! We will definitely return for a stay-cation!
Manager Response: none

Summary: First off, let me start by saying it was the hotels first time being open over the 4th of July holiday so I am not sure if they new how busy it would be. We were greeted by Paul at the valet. He was wonderful! Our room wasn't ready when we arrived, so we thought we would visit the pool. Well that was a problem....The pool was a zoo! There was staff all around, however, not one person offered to help trying to find any sort of chair or towel for that matter.  We left the hotel property and visited our friends at a property next door and hung out at their pool until our room was ready. We finally called the hotel to check to see if our room was ready (3 pm) and spoke to a wonderful guest services representative by the name of Mary Carmen. She was wonderful! She made a few calls
Manager Response: Dear Supemoto,  Thank you for choosing to celebrate the Fourth of July holiday at Pasea. We're so happy to know that you enjoyed the beauty of our resort, our comfortable accommodations, and the fabulous service provided by our staff. We will be sure to share your comments with our housekeeping staff, as well as the team members you have mentioned by name, as they will all be pleased to know how much you appreciated their attentive hospitality. We are excited to be welcoming you back for a Labor Day weekend getaway and look forward to providing you with an experience that surpasses your expectations.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: I stayed here with my wife and son for 3 days. The customer service was phenomenal from beginning to end. Upon check in Ali was great and very helpful. The room was wonderful as well as the view. We stayed in an "oceanfront" room where we could see the shoreline as well as Pacific Coast Highway. There was complimentary wine in the room which was awesome. The bed was super comfortable. We slept great. Housekeeping was also great with providing extra towels and amenities when needed.
