The hotel was absolutely kid friendly. They even had a kiddy pool which is very shallow. My son loved it! Overall it was such an amazing stay. Great customer service. Special cudos to the two girl security staff who were very helpful with  getting our luggage stored upon check out so that we could
Manager Response: Dear aamuhammad,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Pasea while vacationing in southern California. We are absolutely thrilled to know that you had such an outstanding experience at our resort, enjoying the luxurious comfort of our guest rooms, our array of deluxe amenities, and the exemplary levels of guest service provided by our team of dedicated staff members. We know how very important favorite toys are and it was our pleasure to assist in retrieving such a special item for your son. We truly appreciate the excellent rating you have awarded us and are looking forward to welcoming you back to Pasea soon and often!  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: We stayed 3 nights in an ocean front room on the 4th level....the room was beautiful and well-appointed. The Frette linens and bedding were a nice touch. Obviously the view of the water and HB were fantastic, and the traffic on PCH was well insulated courtesy of the high-end sliders. We really enjoyed the breakfast offerings included with our package at Tanner's each morning, as well as the cute coffee shop in the lobby and the open air bar above the restaurant. To a person, the staff was friendly and welcoming; the valet boys, in particular. It would be easy at this price point to nitpick the odd item here and there, but as a hotel GM who has also opened a brand new property, I have to say its amazing that a place open barely six weeks seems to have found it's service footing
Manager Response: Dear Jeff W,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Pasea Hotel & Spa and for taking the time to share a review of your recent experience. We're delighted that you enjoyed the luxury of our guest rooms, as well as our dining options and the warm hospitality of our staff. We truly appreciate the excellent rating you have given us, along with your affirming comments. It was a pleasure to have you as a guest at Pasea and we hope to welcome you back soon.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: "The Best Hotel I have Been to".... I give it 10 + Stars.
Summary: The best hotel i have ever been too.. First off this is a brand new Hotel, Nice Location, Clean, Friendly Staff, Nice Pool, Great Food....I went there for the July 4 weekend, Best choice ever.. When i checked in Brendan (Supervisor) At the front desk was so helpful in ever way possible. You do not even need to leave the hotel they have everything you need in there. It was like a resort.  I will for sure stay here again and again. If there was 10 stars I for sure would give them that.
Manager Response: Dear MK91021,  We are thrilled to know that your stay at Pasea was worthy of ten stars! It's a true delight to know how much you enjoyed our fabulous location and deluxe amenities, along with the warm hospitality of our staff. Thank you for choosing to spend your Fourth of July weekend at our resort. We truly appreciate the excellent rating you have awarded us and hope to welcome you back to Pasea Hotel & Spa soon for another unbeatable stay!  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: Hello all you global travelers looking for that wonderful experience. we just had an amazing sales meeting with our global team at the brand new pasea hotel in beautiful Huntington beach ca. The service was outstanding, the property is located directly across the street from a world class beach and surf spot. Yet, the hotel creates a classy ambience in which you may feel like your somewhere in the south of france or on the beaches of miami....great service and the bar upstairs is first class.. we really enjoyed our time and we will  definitely return soon....talk with all you worldly travelers soon...
Manager Response: Dear bww205,  Thank you for sharing a review of your recent experience at Pasea. We are so pleased to know that you enjoyed our spectacular location and the exemplary service provided by our staff, making your event such a success. It's wonderful to know you truly enjoyed your time at our resort. Thank you for the excellent rating you have awarded us; we hope to welcome you back to Pasea soon.  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Brand Summit Event a Stellar Success at Pasea Hotel & Spa!
Summary: Our organization held its annual meeting and brand marketing summit at Pasea Hotel & Spa in Huntington Beach on June 28th. General Manager Scott Blakeslee and his team of professionals created a stunning environment and beautifully executed presentation event for us in the ballroom, with a fabulous reception on the Ocean Lawn afterwards. Special kudos to Jacqueline Um, Executive Meetings Manager, for working so hard to make sure no detail was overlooked, and to Claudio Bornanini and his staff with Five Star for the flawless A/V execution. Well done, Team Pasea!
Manager Response: Dear SCGirlintheOC,  It was our great pleasure to hold your organization's annual summit at Pasea Hotel & Spa. We're delighted that you had such a fabulous experience at our resort, enjoying the seamless execution of your event. We truly appreciate the excellent rating you have awarded us and hope to be the chosen destination for all your organization's events in the future.   Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary: I booked a room for two nights to celebrate my birthday At Pasea and it was nothing less than phenomenal !!! . When we checked in the front desk supervisor formally introduced himself and gave us such a wonderful experience, I think his name was Brendan, he had a wonderful Australian accent! We went down to the pool the next day and even though it was cloudy, the pool attendant was so friendly and helpful! I've never been to a resort where the pool attendants are so on top of their customer service! I was very impressed. Lastly, our room service gal was just an absolute sweetheart. We ordered a pitcher of orange juice (prices are a bit ridiculous) but anywho, she was so quick and friendly. I think her name way Lydia? I'm not sure. And Sylvia at the front desk was wonderful as
Manager Response: Dear ashleyresendiz,  Thanks for choosing to celebrate your birthday at Pasea! It's thrilling to know how much you enjoyed your stay with us. We're so happy you experienced the friendly hospitality of so many of our staff members while enjoying our luxury resort. We truly appreciate the excellent rating you have awarded us and are looking forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa

Summary Heading: Beautiful, new and motel hotel at a great location!
Summary: My family and I stayed at the Pasea hotel for my parents' 50th Wedding Anniversary.  The hotel had just been opened for 2 weeks so it was brand new when we checked in.  The decor in the lobby is modern and beautiful as are the rooms.  The staff is friendly and knowledgeable.  We ordered room service both mornings because the restaurant in the lobby has a very limited menu.  The room service menu has a great variety and the food was delicious.  We definitely would stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Olympicshopper,  It was our pleasure to welcome you to Pasea while celebrating your parents' 50th wedding anniversary. Thank you for sharing a review of your stay with us; we're delighted that you enjoyed our savory cuisine, as well as the friendly hospitality of our staff and the beauty of our resort. We appreciate the excellent rating you have awarded us and hope to welcome you back to Pasea soon!  Warmest Regards,  Scott Blakeslee General Manager Pasea Hotel & Spa
